de: Sechs Prozent würden sie nicht unterstützen.
translated_de: In fact, they would not support them.

en: Perhaps not surprisingly, Clinton's current supporters are especially likely to be enthusiastic about her.
de: Vielleicht nicht überraschend, dass Clintons aktuelle Unterstützer vor allem von ihr begeistert sind.
translated_de: It may not surprise that Clinton' s current supporter is particularly enthusiastic.

en: Views are more mixed among those not currently backing Clinton - only about a quarter would enthusiastically support her.
de: Die Ansichten sind stärker gemischt bei denjenigen, die derzeit Clinton nicht unterstützen - nur etwa ein Viertel würde sie begeistert unterstützen.
translated_de: The views are more affluent among those who are not supporting Clinton, and only about a quarter would be supported.

en: While 48 percent of Democratic primary voters say they would enthusiastically back Clinton, fewer Republican voters say that about their frontrunner, Donald Trump (35 percent).
de: Während 48 Prozent der demokratischen Wähler der Vorwahlen sagen, dass sie Clinton mit Begeisterung unterstützen, sagen weniger republikanische Wähler dies über ihren Spitzenkandidaten Donald Trump (35 Prozent).
translated_de: In the 48 percent of democratic voters in the primary, Clinton supports the democratic electorate, and less of the Republic' s electorate is Donald Trump' s top ranking (35%).

en: When Clinton's supporters are asked in an open-ended question why they want her to be the nominee, the top answer is that she has the right experience (16 percent), followed by it's time for a woman president (13 percent), and that she is the best candidate for the job (10 percent).
de: Wenn Clintons Unterstützer in einer offenen Frage gefragt werden, warum sie wollen, dass sie die Kandidatin ist, ist die häufigste Antwort, dass sie die richtige Erfahrung hat (16 Prozent), gefolgt von der Ansicht, dass es Zeit ist, dass eine Frau Präsidentin wird (13 Prozent) und dass sie die beste Kandidatin für den Job (10 Prozent) ist.
translated_de: If Clinton is asked to support a question about why they want to be the candidate, the answer is often that it has the right experience (16%), and that it is time to be the candidate for the job (13%) and that she is the candidate who is the best (10%).

en: Also mentioned by Clinton supporters is her association with Bill Clinton (9 percent).
de: Von Clintons Unterstützern wird auch ihre Verbindung mit Bill Clinton (9 Prozent) erwähnt.
translated_de: Clinton supporters will also mention their relationship with Bill Clinton (9%).

en: Agreement on the issues, and electability are also cited.
de: Zustimmung zum Umgang mit den Problemen und die Wählbarkeit werden auch zitiert.
translated_de: The debate on the way to dealing with the problems and the wilability will also be emphasized.

en: As the vice president weighs a potential run for president, 57 percent of Democratic primary voters would like to see him jump in the race - although a third don't think he should.
de: Da der Vizepräsident ein Potenzial für das Präsidentenamt in die Waagschale wirft, möchten 57 Prozent der demokratischen Wähler der Vorwahlen ihn im Rennen sehen - obwohl ein Drittel glaubt, dass er es nicht tun sollte.
translated_de: The Vice-President, who is a potential candidate for the presidency in the Waagschal, would like to see 57 percent of the democratic electorate in the election in the rennen, despite a third of the reason that it should not be done.

en: When Democratic primary voters are asked who would be their second choice for the party's nomination, Biden is the top pick.
de: Wenn demokratische Wähler der Vorwahlen gefragt werden, wer für die Partei ihre zweite Wahl wäre, ist Biden an der Spitze.
translated_de: If a democratic electorate wants to be asked who would vote for the party' s second choice, Biden is the top choice.

en: Among Clinton supporters, more than half say Biden would be their second choice, far ahead of Sanders.
de: Von Clintons Anhängern sagen mehr als die Hälfte, dass Biden ihre zweite Wahl weit vor Sanders wäre.
translated_de: Clinton supporters say more than half that Biden would have a second choice than Sanders.

en: If Biden chooses not to run for the Democratic nomination, Hillary Clinton's lead over Sanders widens, from 20 points with Biden in the race to 30 points without him in the running.
de: Entscheidet sich Biden, nicht für die Nominierung der Demokraten zu kandidieren, erhöht sich Hillary Clintons Vorsprung vor Sanders, von 20 Punkten mit Biden im Wettlauf auf 30 Punkte ohne ihn im Rennen.
translated_de: If Biden is not able to candidate for the Democratic Party, Hillary Clinton has increased his lead in Sanders' campaign by 20 points, with Biden in the race at 30 points, without him in the race.

en: Fifty-five percent of Democratic voters see Clinton as the candidate with the best chance of winning the general election; however that figure is down from 78 percent last month.
de: Fünfundfünfzig Prozent der demokratischen Wähler sehen Clinton als Kandidatin mit den besten Chancen, die Wahl zu gewinnen; jedoch ist diese Zahl von 78 Prozent im letzten Monat gesunken.
translated_de: Five-quarters of the democratic voters see Clinton as a candidate with the best chance of winning the election; however, this figure has dropped by 78 percent in the last month.

en: Biden is a distant second on this measure, but the percentage that sees him as the most electable has risen.
de: Biden ist mit Abstand ein zweiter bei dieser Messung, aber der Prozentsatz, der ihn als den "wählbarsten" ansieht, ist gestiegen.
translated_de: Bid is a second in this measurement, but the percentage of the percentage which is considered the "worst" is increased.

en: Still, when asked which is more important in a nominee, Democratic voters pick issues over electability.
de: Dennoch, bei der Frage danach, was bei einem Kandidaten wichtiger ist, nennen Demokratische Wähler Fragen über die Wählbarkeit.
translated_de: However, the question which is then asked is what is important for one candidate to name democratic voters on the dignity of their vote.

en: Similar to last month, no single Democratic candidate or potential candidate stands out as unacceptable as the nominee to these primary voters.
de: Ähnlich wie im letzten Monat sticht kein einziger Demokratischer Kandidat oder potenzieller Kandidat für diese Wähler der Vorwahlen als inakzeptabel hervor.
translated_de: As in the last month, no one was a democratic candidate or potenzieller candidate for this electorate.

en: The Democratic candidates, or potential candidates, perform well on some key characteristics among their party's primary voters.
de: Die Demokratischen Kandidaten oder potenziellen Kandidaten erbringen gute Ergebnisse bei einigen wichtigen Merkmalen bei Wählern der Vorwahlen ihrer Partei.
translated_de: The candidates for democratic or potent candidates have achieved good results in a number of important Merkmals in the electorate' s electoral system.

en: Majorities see Clinton, Sanders and Biden as honest and trustworthy and as having strong leadership qualities.
de: Mehrheiten betrachten Clinton, Sanders und Biden als ehrlich und vertrauenswürdig und mit starken Führungsqualitäten ausgestattet.
translated_de: The majority of Clinton, Sanders and Biden are regarded as honest and trustworthy and have strong leadership qualities.

en: Biden does the best of the three on honesty, while Clinton's strength is leadership.
de: Biden schneidet bei den drei Kandidaten am besten ab bei Ehrlichkeit, während Clintons Stärke die Führung ist.
translated_de: Biden is best at securing the three candidates, while Clinton is a strong leader.

en: Thirty percent of Democratic primary voters don't think Clinton is honest and trustworthy, twice as many as say that about Sanders (15 percent), but 27 percent don't have an opinion of him on this.
de: Dreißig Prozent der demokratischen Wähler glauben nicht, dass Clinton ehrlich und vertrauenswürdig ist, doppelt so viele sagen das über Sanders (15 Prozent), aber 27 Prozent haben dazu keine Meinung von ihm.
translated_de: The majority of democratic voters believe that Clinton is honest and trustworthy, two times more than Sanders (15%), but 27%) have no opinion from him.

en: Democratic primary voters also generally see Clinton, Sanders and Biden as in line with their views ideologically.
de: Demokratische Wähler der Vorwahlen sehen im Allgemeinen auch Clinton, Sanders und Biden ideologisch in Übereinstimmung mit ihren Ansichten.
translated_de: Demokrats of the electorate view the general views of Clinton, Sanders and Biden in terms of their views.

en: On all of these measures, about a quarter of Democratic voters do not have an opinion of Sanders.
de: Bei all diesen Messungen hat etwa ein Viertel der demokratischen Wähler keine Meinung von Sanders.
translated_de: In all these meetings, around a quarter of the democratic electorate has no opinion of Sanders.

en: As questions continue about Hillary Clinton's use of a personal email address and server while Secretary of State, most Democratic primary voters are satisfied with her explanation of the matter and say it hasn't impacted their overall views of her.
de: Da Fragen zu Hillary Clintons Verwendung einer persönlichen E-Mail-Adresse und eines Servers während der Amtszeit als Außenministerin weiterhin gestellt werden, sind die meisten Demokratischen Wähler der Vorwahlen zufrieden mit ihrer Erklärung der Angelegenheit und sagen, dass es ihre Meinungen insgesamt nicht beeinflusst hat.
translated_de: In the event Hillary Clinton' s concerns about the use of a personal email address and a server during the presidency as a Foreign Minister, the majority of the democratic voters of the primary elections are satisfied with their declaration of the matter and say that their views have not been influenced in general.

en: But it's a different story among the American public overall.
de: Aber es ist eine andere Geschichte in der amerikanischen Öffentlichkeit insgesamt.
translated_de: But it is another history in the American public.

en: Half of Americans are now dissatisfied with her explanation, while just about a third are satisfied.
de: Die Hälfte der Amerikaner ist jetzt mit ihrer Erklärung unzufrieden, während nur etwa ein Drittel zufrieden ist.
translated_de: The majority of the Amerikaner is now unsatisfied with their declaration, while only one third is satisfied.

en: The public's views on this were split back in March, shortly after the issue came to light.
de: Die öffentliche Meinung hierzu war im März, kurz nachdem das Problem ans Licht kam, gespalten.
translated_de: The public opinion was sprang in March, shortly after the problem was a light.

en: Most Americans say the email controversy has had no effect on their overall opinions of Clinton, although 36 percent say their opinion of her has grown worse.
de: Die meisten Amerikaner sagten, dass die E-Mail-Kontroverse keine Auswirkungen auf ihre allgemeinen Meinungen von Clinton hatte, obwohl 36 Prozent sagten, dass sich ihre Meinung von ihr noch verschlechtert habe.
translated_de: The majority of the Amerikaners say that the E-Mail scams have no impact on their general views of Clinton, although 36 percent say that they have not yet changed their opinion of Clinton.

en: It is mainly Republicans, more than six in 10, who say their views of Clinton have become worse.
de: Es sind hauptsächlich Republikaner, mehr als sechs von 10, die sagen, dass ihre Ansichten von Clinton schlechter geworden sind.
translated_de: It is mainly Republic of America, more than six of 10, who say that their views of Clinton have been worse.

en: Even though Clinton is viewed as honest and trustworthy by her party's voters, this continues to be a problem for her among registered voters overall: only 32 percent see her as honest and trustworthy, down eight points from last month, and 15 points since May.
de: Obwohl Clinton von den Wählern ihrer Partei als ehrlich und vertrauenswürdig angesehen wird, ist dies weiterhin ein Problem für sie unter eingetragenen Wählern insgesamt: Nur 32 Prozent sehen sie als ehrlich und vertrauenswürdig, acht Prozent weniger als im letzten Monat und 15 Punkte weniger seit Mai.
translated_de: While Clinton is perceived as honest and trustworthy by its party, it remains a problem for the majority of the electorates: only 32 per cent view it as honest and trustworthy, 8 per cent less than last month and 15 per cent less since Mai.

en: Sixty-two percent of registered voters don't think of her as honest and trustworthy.
de: 62 Prozent der Wahlberechtigten halten sie nicht für eine ehrliche und vertrauenswürdige Person.
translated_de: 62 % of the electorate are not a genuine and trustworthy person.

en: At the same time, 55 percent of registered voters nationwide don't see Trump as honest and trustworthy either.
de: Zur gleichen Zeit sehen 55 Prozent der Wahlberechtigten landesweit auch Trump als nicht ehrlich und nicht vertrauenswürdig an.
translated_de: At the same time, 55 per cent of the electorate votes are claiming to be incompetent and unworthy.

en: Both Clinton and Trump, however, get good marks on leadership.
de: Clinton und Trump erhalten jedoch gute Noten bei Führung.
translated_de: Clinton and Trump have good intentions in their leadership.

en: Of the six candidates tested, Biden, Carson and Bush do the best on honesty.
de: Von den sechs getesteten Kandidaten schneiden Biden, Carson und Bush am besten bei Ehrlichkeit ab.
translated_de: Of the six candidates tested, Biden, Carson and Bush are the best candidates.

en: More see Sanders as honest than not, but like Carson, many don't have an opinion of him.
de: Eine Mehrheit sieht Sanders eher als ehrlich an, aber wie bei Carson haben viele keine Meinung von ihm.
translated_de: Sanders is a majority of people who see Sanders as honest, but many have no opinion from him.

en: The margin of error for the sample of 351 Democratic primary voters is 6 percentage points.
de: Die Fehlerquote für die Stichprobe von 351 Demokratischen Wählern bei den Vorwahlen beträgt 6 Prozentpunkte.
translated_de: The errorquote for the vote of 351 democratic voters in the primary is 6 points.

en: Ben Carson draws close behind Donald Trump in national poll
de: Ben Carson rückt bei landesweiter Umfrage nahe hinter Donald Trump auf
translated_de: Ben Carson is a sluggish opponent of Donald Trump

en: Ben Carson is running close behind Donald Trump in the newest CBS News/New York Times poll
de: Ben Carson befindet sich bei der neuesten Umfrage von CBS News/New York Times dicht hinter Donald Trump
translated_de: Ben Carson is in the latest debate in CBS News/New York Times about Donald Trump

en: The two candidates account for half the support of voters in the new poll, leaving others scrounging for a foothold
de: Auf die beiden Kandidaten entfällt inzwischen die Hälfte der Unterstützung der Wähler in der neuen Umfrage, und anderen verlieren dramatisch an Halt
translated_de: The majority of the votes of the two candidates are now being supported by the electorate in the new question, and the other is a dramatic one.

en: Republican voters nationwide continue to back Trump in large numbers, climbing from 23% support in the last CBS poll, conducted before the Fox News debate last month, to 27% in the poll out Tuesday.
de: Republikanische Wähler unterstützen landesweit weiterhin Trump in großer Zahl. Die Unterstützung wächst von 23 % in der letzten CBS-Umfrage, die vor Fox News Debatte im vergangenen Monat durchgeführt wurde, um 27 % in der Umfrage vom Dienstag.
translated_de: The Republic' s electorate supports Trump in large numbers, with support growing by 23 % in the last CBS issue, which was conducted last month during the Fox News debate, and a quarter of the vote on Tuesday.

en: But Carson rocketed in that same period from 6% to 23%.
de: Aber Carson schoss im gleichen Zeitraum von 6 % auf 23 %.
translated_de: But Carson schoss in the same period from 6 to 23%.

en: The survey also found Carson doing well across demographic groups, edging out Trump among college-educated Republican voters.
de: Die Umfrage ergab auch, dass Carson bei demographischen Gruppen gut ankommt und Trump unter republikanischen Wählern mit Hochschulbildung übertrifft.
translated_de: The question also raises the question of whether Carson is good for the demographic groups and Trump is good for the Republic' s electorate.

en: The rest of the field, with the exception of Carly Fiorina and Ohio Gov. John Kasich, has slipped behind with Wisconsin Gov. Scott Walker falling farthest from 10% support last month to 2% now.
de: Der Rest des Feldes, mit Ausnahme von Carly Fiorina und Ohio-Gouverneur John Kasich, ist mit Wisconsins Gouverneur Scott Walker abgeschlagen, der am tiefsten gefallen ist, und zwar von 10 % Unterstützung im letzten Monat auf jetzt 2 %.
translated_de: The rest of the field, except Carly Fiorina and Ohio Governor John Kasich, is beaten by Wisconsin Governor Scott Walker, who is the most notably pleased, and which has now been supported by 10% in the last month, now at 2 %.

en: Former Florida Gov. Jeb Bush, former Arkansas Gov. Mike Huckabee and Florida Sen. Marco Rubio all tied for third place with 6%.
de: Der ehemalige Florida-Gouverneur Jeb Bush, der ehemalige Gouverneur von Arkansas Mike Huckabee und Florida-Senator Marco Rubio befinden sich mit 6 % auf dem dritten Platz.
translated_de: The former Florida Governor, Jeb Bush, the former Governor of Arkansas Mike Huckabee and Florida Senator Marco Rubio are on the third place with 6 %.

en: The margin of error for the 376-person sample of Republican voters in this newest poll is plus-or-minus 6%, and was conducted Sept.
de: Die Fehlermarge bei der Stichprobe von 376 Personen von Republikanischen Wählern in dieser neuesten Umfrage ist Plus oder Minus 6 % und wurde im September durchgeführt.
translated_de: The error in the Stichprobe of 376 people from Republic of Ireland in this new question is Plus or Minus 6 % and was carried out in September.

en: The latest CNN/ORC survey, released last week, showed Carson rising in the polls -- landing at 19% support among Republicans, behind Trump's 32% support.
de: Die neueste CNN/ORC-Umfrage, die letzte Woche veröffentlicht wurde, zeigt, dass Carson in den Umfragen steigt - er landet bei 19 % Unterstützung bei den Republikanern, hinter der Trump mit 32 % Unterstützung.
translated_de: The new CNN/ORC question which was published last week shows that Carson has increased in the questions - he is a republican with 19% support, behind Trump with 32 % support.

en: The latest poll from ABC News/Washington Post also showed Trump significantly ahead of Carson.
de: Die jüngste Umfrage von ABC News/Washington Post zeigte auch Trump deutlich vor Carson.
translated_de: The recent question from ABC News/Washington Post showed Trump clearly before Carson.

en: Facing a rising Carson last week, Trump took some potshots at the retired neurosurgeon, even as Carson apologized for questioning Trump's faith.
de: Mit Blick auf einen in der letzten Woche aufsteigenden Carson fand Trump einige Seitenhiebe für den ehemaligen Neurochirurgen, selbst nachdem Carson sich dafür entschuldigte, Trumps Glauben in Frage zu stellen.
translated_de: In regard to Carson' s recent re-election, he has sparked a number of slurs on Trump for the former neurochirurgicals, he himself stating that Carson is responsible for putting Trump in question.

en: "We need energy," Trump said last Saturday during a campaign stop in Iowa.
de: "Wir brauchen Energie", sagte Trump am vergangenen Samstag während eines Kampagnen-Auftritts in Iowa.
translated_de: "We need energy," Trump said last Saturday during a campaign in Iowa.

en: Pleasant temperatures for bathing: the eastern Mediterranean is currently as warm as 29 degrees
de: Angenehme Badetemperaturen: Das östliche Mittelmeer ist derzeit bis zu 29 Grad warm.
translated_de: Badetemperature: The eastern Mediterranean is currently warm up to 29 degrees.

en: Even if peak levels are only measured in the distance, a trip to the Mediterranean is enough for beach lovers to find warm water.
de: Auch wenn Spitzenwerte nur in der Ferne gemessen werden, reicht für Badeurlauber schon ein Trip ans Mittelmeer, um noch warmes Wasser vorzufinden.
translated_de: Even if the tops are measured only in the distance, it is a trip to the Mediterranean to find warm water.

en: A dip in the North Sea or the Baltic Sea can only be a brief treat with temperatures at a maximum of 17 degrees.
de: Ein Bad in Nord- oder Ostsee dürfte bei maximal 17 Grad ein eher kurzes Vergnügen sein.
translated_de: A bad in North or Eastsee could be a short term occurrence at maximum 17 degrees.

en: Many people no longer go into the sea: the water in the North Sea and the Baltic this week is a maximum of 18 degrees, according to the German meteorological office (DWD).
de: Mancher geht da nicht mehr ins Meer: Maximal 18 Grad hat das Wasser in der Nord- und Ostsee in dieser Woche, teilt der Deutsche Wetterdienst (DWD) mit.
translated_de: It is not more in the sea: at maximum 18 degrees, the water in the North and East Sea has been absorbed by the Deutsche Wetterdienst (DWD).

en: The Mediterranean, by contrast, offers suitable temperatures for bathing: in the east they are as high as 29 degrees.
de: Badetemperaturen bietet dagegen weiterhin das Mittelmeer: Im Osten kommt es sogar auf bis zu 29 Grad.
translated_de: Bad temperatures continue to provide the Mediterranean, and in the East, it is so much more than 29 degrees.

en: In the Adriatic peak temperatures are 25 degrees, and in France 23 degrees.
de: In der Adria sind es in der Spitze 25 Grad, in Frankreich 23 Grad.
translated_de: In the Adria, the top 25 degrees are in France, and the top 23 degrees are in France.

en: The Red Sea in Egypt is 28 degrees.
de: Das Rote Meer in Ägypten kommt auf 28 Grad.
translated_de: The sea in Egypt is 28 degrees.

en: Five fraternity members charged in death of Baruch College freshman
de: Fünf Mitglieder der Bruderschaft mit dem Tod eines Baruch College-Neulings belastet
translated_de: Five members of the Brudership with the Tod of a Baruch College-Neulings

en: Nearly two years after a college student died during a fraternity hazing ritual in Pennsylvania's Pocono Mountains, murder charges have been filed against five people.
de: Fast zwei Jahre, nachdem ein Student während eines schikanösen Rituals einer Studentenverbindung in Pocono Mountains, Pennsylvania, verstarb, werden Mordanklagen gegen fünf Personen eingereicht.
translated_de: Fast two years after a student is enlisted in a schikan ritual of student liaison in the Pocono Mountains, Pennsylvania, he will be able to impose a minimum of five people.

en: Members of New York City's Baruch College Pi Delta Psi fraternity brutally assaulted Chun "Michael" Deng during an initiation rite in September 2013 and delayed taking him to the hospital, contributing to his death, police said.
de: Mitglieder der New Yorker Baruch College Pi-Delta-Psi-Bruderschaft griffen Chun "Michael" Deng während eines Einführungsrituals im September 2013 brutal an und verzögerten seinen Transport ins Krankenhaus, was zu seinem Tod beigetragen hat, teilte die Polizei mit.
translated_de: Members of the New York Baruch College of Pi-Delta-Psi-Bruderschaft griff Chun "Michael" Deng during a reintroduction session in September 2013 brutally and threatening his transport in the hospital, which he carried out to his death, and he was part of the police.

en: Officials said he was blindfolded, saddled with a 30-pound backpack full of sand, and repeatedly tackled while he tried to walk toward a target across a frozen field.
de: Beamte sagten, er sei mit verbundenen Augen mit einem 30-Pfund-Rucksack voller Sand belastet worden, und wiederholt attackiert worden, während er versuchte, über ein gefrorenes Feld auf ein Ziel zuzugehen.
translated_de: The officials said that he was a victim of a 30-pfund-sale of sand and attacked again while trying to reach a sandfield.

en: Mr. Deng eventually complained that his head hurt then fell unconscious.
de: Mr. Deng klagte schließlich über Kopfschmerzen, dann fiel er bewusstlos um.
translated_de: Mr Deng klagte a few times over head pains and then he sat down.

en: Pi Delta Psi fraternity members did not call 911 after Deng passed out, and allegedly waited an hour before bringing him to a hospital, police say.
de: Die Mitglieder der Pi-Delta-Psi-Bruderschaft riefen nicht die Notrufnummer 911 an, nachdem Deng ohnmächtig wurde und warteten angeblich eine Stunde, bevor sie ihn in ein Krankenhaus brachten, so die Polizei.
translated_de: The members of the Pi-Delta-Psi-Bruderschaft have not received the call number 911, after Deng was ohnmächtig, and they wait for a minute before they brought him to a hospital, so the police.

en: They did, however, find time to change Deng's clothes, Google his symptoms, and contact Andy Meng, the fraternity's national president to seek advice, Police Chief Chris Wagner said at a news conference.
de: Sie hatten jedoch die Zeit, um Dengs Kleidung zu wechseln, seine Symptome zu googeln und Andy Meng, den nationalen Präsidenten der Bruderschaft zu kontaktieren, um Rat einzuholen, sagte Polizeichef Chris Wagner auf einer Pressekonferenz.
translated_de: However, you had the time to change clothing, to google his symptoms and Andy Meng, the national president of the union, to contact the Council, said policechef Chris Wagner on a press conference.

en: "At this point, members began to hide paraphernalia and basically put the fraternity's well-being over that of Michael Deng's," Chief Wagner said.
de: "An diesem Punkt begannen die Mitglieder, Utensilien zu verstecken und stellten das Wohl der Bruderschaft grundsätzlich über das von Michael Deng", sagte Polizeichef Wagner.
translated_de: "An this point began to be a priority for the members of the Utensilien Council and the welfare of the Bruders is fundamentally based on Michael Deng," said policechef Wagner.

en: He could not be revived and he died the next morning.
de: Er konnte nicht wiederbelebt werden, und er starb am nächsten Morgen an seinen Verletzungen.
translated_de: It was not a new life and he was hungry at the next morning for his crimes.

en: According to an autopsy report, Deng was subjected to repeated blunt force trauma to his head, torso, and thighs.
de: Nach einem Autopsiebericht wurden Deng wiederholt mit stumpfer Kraft Verletzungen an Kopf, Rumpf und Oberschenkel zugefügt.
translated_de: In a report on the autopsie, Deng was re-elected with stumped Kraft rations on the head, the neck and the head.

en: "Too many families have been devastated as a result of fraternity hazing, with at least one student dying every year from hazing since 1970," Douglas Fierberg, an attorney representing Deng's family, said in a statement.
de: "Zu viele Familien wurden durch die Schikanen der Bruderschaft zerstört. Mindestens ein Student stirbt seit 1970 jedes Jahr an den Schikanen", sagte Douglas Fierberg, ein Rechtsanwalt, der Dengs Familie vertritt, in einer Erklärung.
translated_de: "The families of the Bruders are a stumbling block of the Bruders' s Schikane, and the minimum student stirs every year since 1970," said Douglas Fierberg, a legal decree, the Dengs Family, in a statement.

en: Fraternities and their members must be held accountable, and this step by authorities is an important one.
de: Bruderschaften und ihre Mitglieder müssen zur Rechenschaft gezogen werden, und dieser Schritt von Behörden ist sehr wichtig.
translated_de: The Brussels and their members must be re-employeed, and this step by the authorities is very important.

en: A Monroe County grand jury recommended third-degree murder charges for the first five members.
de: Eine County Grand Jury von Monroe empfahl eine Anklage wegen Mordes dritten Grades für die ersten fünf Mitglieder.
translated_de: The Monroe County Grand Jury is requesting a complaint for Mordes in third grade for the first five members.

en: Thirty-two other fraternity members, including Mr. Meng, will also be charged with assault hazing and criminal conspiracy.
de: Zweiunddreißig Mitglieder der Bruderschaft, einschließlich Mr Meng, werden auch wegen schikanöser Attacken und Bildung einer kriminellen Vereinigung angeklagt.
translated_de: Two-thirds of the members of the Brussels, including Mr Meng, are also being slammed for schikanous attacks and for forming a criminal association.

en: "We want to hold not only the individuals involved, but if there's an organization that sanctioned it, whether officially or unofficially, we're going to hold them accountable as well," Wagner said at a news conference Tuesday.
de: "Wir wollen nicht nur die beteiligten Personen verantwortlich machen, sondern wenn es eine Organisation gibt, die - offiziell oder inoffiziell - dies sanktioniert hat, so werden wir auch diese zur Rechenschaft ziehen", sagte Wagner auf einer Pressekonferenz am Dienstag.
translated_de: "We do not want to only make the involved people responsible, but if there is a organisation which has been sanctioned - either official or inoffizial - we will also be able to take this into account", said Wagner on a press conference on Tuesday.

en: Baruch College banned the fraternity and the national fraternity revoked its affiliation with the local chapter.
de: Das Baruch College hat die Bruderschaft verboten, und die nationale Bruderschaft hat ihre Zugehörigkeit zu der Ortsgruppe widerrufen.
translated_de: The Baruch College has shattered the Bruderschaft and the national Bruderschaft has increased its membership to the local group.

en: Here's what will happen when the Fed raises interest rates
de: Das wird passieren, wenn die Fed die Zinsen erhöht
translated_de: This will happen if the Fed increases the Zins

en: A rate hike will come and the bull market will stumble, bond yields will climb and the economy will slip into a recession.
de: Eine Zinserhöhung kommt, und die Hausse wird ins Wanken geraten, Renditen für Anleihen werden steigen, und die Wirtschaft wird in eine Rezession gleiten.
translated_de: The Zinserhöhung is coming, the House will be gerashed, the interest rate will rise, and the economy will be re-energized.

en: This we know.
de: Das wissen wir.
translated_de: We know that.

en: What we don't know is how long all of that will take and how long it will last.
de: Was wir nicht wissen ist, wie lange das alles dauern und wie lange es anhalten wird.
translated_de: We cannot know how long the whole process will take and how long it will take.

en: For the economy specifically, history offers little guide about timing.
de: Insbesondere bietet die Geschichte für die Wirtschaft nur geringe Anleitung zum Ablauf.
translated_de: Insbesondere bietet a very short guide to the economy' s history.

en: A recession has come as quickly as 11 months after the first rate hike and as long as 86 months.
de: Eine Rezession kam innerhalb von nur 11 Monaten nach der ersten Zinssatzerhöhung und dauerte 86 Monate.
translated_de: The first zinc stocking was suspended in 11 months and took 86 months.

en: The Federal Reserve's aggressiveness in raising rates is often, though not always, a determinant in how the economy and financial assets respond.
de: Die Aggressivität der Federal Reserve beim Anheben der Zinssätze ist oft, wenn auch nicht immer, ein Faktor dabei, wie die Wirtschaft und die Finanzanlagen reagieren.
translated_de: The Federal Reserve' s aggressiveness in reducing the interest rates is often a factor, if not always, in the economy and financial systems.

en: That's why officials at the U.S. central bank have stressed so vigorously that investors should not be focused on when it starts raising rates but rather the trajectory of how long it will take to normalize.
de: Daher haben Repräsentanten der US-Zentralbank so heftig betont, dass Investoren sich nicht darauf konzentrieren sollten, wann sie beginnt, die Zinssätze zu erhöhen, sondern vielmehr auf den Zeitraum, der für die Normalisierung benötigt wird.
translated_de: The US-Zentralbank representatives have therefore stressed that investors should not concentrate on the amount of interest they are paying, if they start to increase the interest rates, but rather on the period which is needed for normalisation.

en: There are, indeed, multiple variables at play.
de: In der Tat spielen mehrere Variablen eine Rolle.
translated_de: In fact, there are several variables.

en: In the end, however, market participants may find that all the rate-hike fuss may have been overdone.
de: Am Ende könnten Marktteilnehmer jedoch feststellen, dass die ganze Aufregung wegen einer Zinserhöhung möglicherweise übertrieben wurde.
translated_de: However, at the end of the day, the market sharers could confirm that the whole restructuring due to a Zinserhöhung could be overrun.

en: "The first hike from the Fed since the global financial crisis will inevitably be interpreted by some as signaling the end of the era of 'cheap money,' " Julian Jessop, chief global economist at Capital Economics, said in a note to clients.
de: "Die erste Erhöhung der Fed seit der globalen Finanzkrise wird unweigerlich von einigen als ein Signal für das Ende der Ära des "billigen Geldes" interpretiert werden", sagte Julian Jessop, Chefökonom bei Capital Economics, in einer Mitteilung an Kunden.
translated_de: "The first re-election of the Fed since the global financial crisis will be interpretable by some as a signal for the end of the ra of "billigen money"", said Julian Jessop, Chef of Capital Economics, in a communication with customers.

en: In contrast, we do not expect the gradual return of U.S. interest rates to more normal but still low levels to be the seismic shock that many seem to fear.
de: Im Gegensatz dazu erwarten wir nicht die allmähliche Rückkehr der US-Zinsen zu normalen Höhen, sondern immer noch auf zu niedrigem Niveau, um zum seismischen Schock, den viele zu fürchten scheinen, zu führen.
translated_de: In this regard, we expect not to see the all-time return of the US-Zins to normal levels, but to continue to be at a low level, to lead to a shamble which many seem to be a shamble.

en: That's not to say there won't be effects, however.
de: Das bedeutet jedoch nicht, dass es keine Auswirkungen geben wird.
translated_de: However, this does not mean that there will be any impact.

en: Here's a look at how some areas of the economy could react, based on historical trends:
de: Hier ist ein auf historischen Trends basierender Blick darauf, wie einige Bereiche der Wirtschaft reagieren könnten:
translated_de: This is a historical trend that is based on how some sectors of the economy could react:

en: As the market has seen over the past month or so, anticipation of rate hikes can make things volatile for a while.
de: Wie der Markt im letzten Monat gesehen hat, kann die Vorwegnahme von Zinserhöhungen Dinge für eine Weile volatil machen.
translated_de: As the market has seen in the last month, the proposal for a weile volatil can make a difference to the sulphur-hung things.

en: Once the hike hits, though, the impact is not as dramatic.
de: Sobald die Erhöhung eintrifft, ist der Einfluss nicht so dramatisch.
translated_de: So soon as the eviction is over, the influence is not so dramatised.

en: "It does seem there is a trend for equity returns to stall 12-24 months after the first hike, which again perhaps reflects the lag in monetary policy," Deutsche Bank analysts said in a recent study of what happens after the Fed hikes.
de: "Es gibt anscheinend eine Tendenz, dass Vermögenserträge 12 bis 24 Monate nach der ersten Erhöhung abgewürgt werden, was vielleicht wieder die Verzögerung in der Geldpolitik widerspiegelt", sagten Deutsche-Bank-Analysten in einer neueren Studie zu dem, was nach Zinserhöhungen der Fed passiert.
translated_de: "There is a possibility that assets will be withdrawn 12 to 24 months after the first erhöhung, which may be a reflection of the monetary policy' s s repercussions", a new study by the Deutsche Bank of America said, after the erhöhungs of the Fed.

en: More specifically, the market over the past 35 years or so is most often up sharply - about 14 percent - heading into the rate hike, fairly flat in the 250 days after (average gain of 2.6 percent) then back to normal once 500 days have passed, with average return in the past six cycles of 14.4 percent, according to a recent analysis Bob Doll, chief equity strategist at Nuveen Asset Management, posted on Barron's.
de: Genauer gesagt, der Markt ist in den vergangenen 35 Jahren meistens im Aufwärtstrend - etwa 14 Prozent - auf dem Weg zur Zinserhöhung, ziemlich flach in den 250 Tagen danach (durchschnittlicher Gewinn von 2,6 Prozent), dann zurück zum Normalzustand nach 500 Tagen, mit einer durchschnittlichen Rendite in den vergangenen sechs vergangenen Zyklen von 14,4 Prozent laut einer aktuellen Analyse, die Bob Doll, Chef Anlage-Stratege bei Nuveen Asset Management, bei Barron's veröffentlichte.
translated_de: And, in the last 35 years, the market has been a major improvement in the way of Zinserhöhung, a fairly low yield in 250 days, then back to normal status after 500 days, with a average return of 14,4 percent in six years, according to a recent analysis published by Bob Doll, Chef of the Investment Strategy for Nuveen Asset Management, in Barron' s report.

en: Deutsche said the impact on stocks tends to get more pronounced later in the rate-hiking cycle and returns begin to diminish.
de: Die Deutsche Bank sagte, dass die Auswirkungen auf die Aktien tendenziell später im Erhöhungszyklus auftreten und die Rendite damit beginnt, sich zu verringern.
translated_de: The Deutsche Bank said that the effects on the stock market tend to be a consequence later in the cycle of inflation and that the renewal will begin to be a ring.

en: Recessions are a fact of economic life, but rate hikes often help them along.
de: Rezessionen sind eine Tatsache des Wirtschaftslebens, aber Zinserhöhungen fördern sie oft.
translated_de: Rezessions are a fact of economic life, but they are often encouraged by Zinserhöhungs.

en: In the current case, the Fed is facing some conditions that did not exist before and could hasten a recession.
de: Im aktuellen Fall ist die Fed mit einigen Bedingungen konfrontiert, die es vorher nicht gab und die eine Rezession beschleunigen könnten.
translated_de: In the current case, the Fed is facing some conditions which were not present before and which could be accelerated.

en: Most notably, gross domestic product will be near its lowest point ever for a Fed rate hike.
de: Äußerst bemerkenswert ist hierbei, dass das Bruttoinlandsprodukt in der Nähe seines niedrigsten Punktes bei einer Zinserhöhung der Fed sein wird.
translated_de: It is important to note that the Bruttoinland product is in the vicinity of its lowest points in a Zinserhöhung by the Fed.

en: According to Deutsche Bank, in the 118 rate hikes since 1950, only twice has nominal year over year GDP been below 4.5 percent.
de: Laut Deutsche Bank lag bei den 118 Zinserhöhungen seit 1950 nur zweimal das nominale BIP unter 4,5 Prozent.
translated_de: The Deutsche Bank has lag at 118 Zinsehöhungs in the last 50 years at only two times the nominal BIP of 4,5 %.

en: Even though the second quarter of 2015 was at 3.6 percent, few expect that to last, with the third quarter tracking at just 1.5 percent, according to the Atlanta Fed.
de: Obwohl das zweite Quartal 2015 bei 3,6 Prozent lag, erwarten nur wenige, dass dies andauern wird und erwarten für das dritte Quartal nach Angaben der Atlanta Fed nur 1,5 Prozent.
translated_de: Although the second quarter 2015 was a disappointing 3,6 percent, only a few people expect that the andauern will be a good thing and only 1,5 percent expect the third quarter, according to the Atlanta Fed.

en: Hiking rates into such a fragile economic backdrop could be risky and set up the question of "whether this time is different," Deutsche said.
de: Zinserhöhungen bei einer so fragilen wirtschaftlichen Kulisse könnten riskant sein und werfen die Frage auf, "ob es dieses Mal anders ist", sagte die Deutsche Bank.
translated_de: Zinserhöhungs in a so fragile economic crisis could be risky and raise the question of "ob es this mal anders is" , said the Deutsche Bank.

en: Market participants have been bracing for a Fed hike all year, with all eyes turned toward this week's Federal Open Market Committee meeting, which ends Thursday.
de: Marktteilnehmer haben sich das ganze Jahr auf eine Zinserhöhung der Fed gefasst gemacht, und alle Augen waren auf die Sitzung des Federal Open Market Committee in dieser Woche gerichtet, die am Donnerstag endet.
translated_de: Market participants have spent the whole year on a Zinserhöhung by the Fed and all the eyewitnesses have been placed on the meeting of the Federal Open Market Committee this week, which ended on Donnerstag.

en: While many strategists and economists believe the FOMC could approve a hike at this meeting, futures trading indicates just a 25 percent probability.
de: Während viele Strategen und Ökonomen glauben, dass das FOMC eine Erhöhung in dieser Sitzung genehmigen könnte, gibt der Futures-Handel nur eine Wahrscheinlichkeit von 25 Prozent an.
translated_de: While many politicians and economists believe that the FOMC could be able to accept a re-election in this session, the Futures Act has only a probability of 25%.

en: "In our study since 1950, all hiking cycles to date have been in a super cycle of increasing leverage with GDP eclipsing prerecession peaks very quickly post the recovery commencing," the report said.
de: "In unserer Studie haben alle Erhöhungszyklen von 1950 bis heute in einem Super-Zyklus mit zunehmendem Schwung beim BIP stattgefunden und Vor-Rezessionshöhen sehr schnell nach dem Beginn der Erholung in den Schatten gestellt", so der Bericht.
translated_de: "In our study, all the hippophores of 1950 and today have been spotted in a super-zyklus with a progressively increasing Schwung in the BIP and the pre-recessions are very rapid after the start of the recovery in the shadows", so the report.

en: By contrast this has been a uniquely slow recovery from what was the worst recession in the sample period.
de: Im Gegensatz dazu ist dies eine eindeutig langsame Erholung von dem, was die schlimmste Rezession in der beobachteten Phase war.
translated_de: In contrast, this is a clear, gradual recovery from the worst recession in the contested phase.

en: The current cycle is by far the longest the Fed has waited since the end of the last recession; the record had been 35 months, and this is 74 months and counting.
de: Der aktuelle Zyklus ist bei weitem der längste, den die Fed seit dem Ende der letzten Rezession gewartet hat; der Rekord war 35 Monate, und dies sind bisher 74 Monate.
translated_de: The current Cyprus is the most recent, which has been awaited by the Fed since the end of the last recession; the period of the crisis was 35 months and the period was 74 months.

en: Fixed income also has been volatile as the market anticipates a rate hike, and the pattern is somewhat similar to what equities experience.
de: Das feste Einkommen war auch volatil, da der Markt eine Zinserhöhung vorwegnimmt, und das Muster ziemlich ähnlich ist wie auf dem Kapitalmarkt.
translated_de: The fact that income is very low, as the market is taking a Zinserhöhung and the pattern is quite similar to the market.

en: The principal difference is that the impact happens faster in bonds than stocks when the Fed changes course in policy.
de: Der Hauptunterschied ist, dass die Wirkung bei Anleihen schneller ist als bei Aktien, wenn die ihren strategischen Kurs verändern.
translated_de: The main reason is that the effect of the bonds is faster than the effect of the bonds when their strategynical course changes.

en: For bonds, it does seem yields change direction immediately as the first hike/cut in the cycle arrives.
de: Bei Anleihen scheinen die Renditen die Richtung zu wechseln, sobald die erste Erhöhung/Senkung in dem Zyklus erfolgt.
translated_de: In the interest rate, the direction of the renewals is to change so that the first rehöhung/senkung is done in the Cyprus.

en: At the end of the hiking cycle bond yields fall immediately," Deutsche said.
de: Am Ende des Erhöhungszyklus fallen die Anleiherenditen sofort, sagte die Deutsche Bank.
translated_de: The end of the crisis, the monetary system was wiped out immediately, said the Deutsche Bank.

en: Charles Schwab strategists believe the hike in rates will cause yields between longer- and shorter-dated bonds to move closer together, flattening the curve.
de: Die Strategen von Charles Schwab glauben, dass der Anstieg bei den Zinssätzen dazu führen wird, dass Renditen zwischen längeren und kürzeren Anleihen näher zusammenrücken und zu einer Abflachung der Kurve führen.
translated_de: The rate of Charles Schwab believes that the rise in interest rates will lead to a closer connection between longer and shorter loans and to a reduction in the Kurve.

en: High-yield bonds often perform better in such a climate, though "we are still cautious about stretching for yield," Kathy Jones, fixed income analyst at Schwab, said in an analysis.
de: Hochverzinsliche Anleihen bringen oft in einem solchen Klima bessere Erträge, obwohl "wir noch vorsichtig sind, höhere Erträge zu erwarten", sagte Kathy Jones, Fixed-Income-Analystin bei Schwab, in einer Analyse.
translated_de: In a climate such as this, high-grade bonds can often bring better yields, although "we are still concerned about higher yields," said Kathy Jones, fixed-income analyst at Schwab, in a study.

en: Interestingly, Jones thinks markets already have adapted to Fed policy expectations.
de: Interessant ist, meint Jones, dass die Märkte sich bereits an Fed-Strategie-Erwartungen angepasst haben.
translated_de: It is always interesting to me that the markets have already been adjusted to Fed strategic measures.

en: "In addition to the strength in the dollar and the drop in inflation expectations, there are several signs that the market has adjusted to the prospect of tighter monetary policy," she wrote.
de: "Neben der Stärke des Dollars und dem Rückgang der Inflationserwartungen gibt es einige Anzeichen dafür, dass sich der Markt an die Aussicht auf strengere Geldpolitik angepasst hat" schrieb sie.
translated_de: "Not just the strength of the dollar and the return to inflation, there are some signs that the market has adapted its perspective on a stricter financial policy" he wrote.

en: Short-term interest rates are up, the yield curve is flatter, credit spreads have widened and volatility has increased - all characteristics of the market when the Fed tightens policy.
de: Kurzfristige Zinsen sind gestiegen, die Ertragskurve ist flacher, Kreditspannen haben sich ausgeweitet und die Volatilität ist gestiegen - alles Merkmale des Marktes, wenn die Fed ihre Strategie verschärft.
translated_de: Short-term Zins rises, the risk of a collapse, the credit markets are expanding and the volatility is increasing - all the more important to the markets, if the Fed fails its strategy.

en: Broadly speaking, companies that do the majority of their business in the U.S. will win as interest rates rise and local products become more attractive.
de: Im großen und ganzen werden Unternehmen, die den größeren Teil ihrer Geschäftstätigkeit in den USA abwickeln, davon profitieren, wenn Zinssätze steigen und lokale Produkte attraktiver werden.
translated_de: In large and large companies, which are a part of their business in the USA, profit from rising interest rates and more attractive local products.

en: Multinationals with lots of debt will fare worse, as a rising dollar makes their products more expensive in the global market space and their debt more expensive the finance.
de: Multinationale Unternehmen mit hohen Schulden werden schlechter dastehen, da ein steigender Dollar ihre Produkte auf dem globalen Markt teurer macht und ebenso die Finanzierung ihrer Schulden.
translated_de: Multinational companies with high education are worse than ever, because they are making a rise in the dollar their products are on the global market and, as well, they are financing their schools.

en: "History shows that 'quality' stocks tend to outperform during the three months following an initial rate hike," Goldman Sachs analysts said in a report for clients.
de: "Die Geschichte zeigt, dass "Qualitäts-" Aktien dazu neigen, drei Monate nach einer anfänglichen Zinserhöhung überaus positiv zu reagieren," sagten Goldman Sachs-Analysten in einem Bericht für die Kunden.
translated_de: "The history shows that "Quality-" stocks tend to be too positiv to react three months after a soaring Zinserhöhung," said Goldman Sachs-Analysten in a report for the clients.

en: Firms with strong balance sheets outpaced weak balance sheet companies following each of the 1994, 1999, and 2004 rate hikes, by an average of 5 percentage points.
de: Firmen mit starker Bilanz haben Unternehmen mit schwacher Bilanz nach jeder der Zinserhöhungen 1994, 1999 und 2004 durchschnittlich um 5 Prozentpunkte übertroffen.
translated_de: Companies with a strong Bilanz have a strong Bilanz of 5%, compared to any of the Zinserhöhungs of 1994, 1999 and 2004.

en: Companies with high returns on capital as well as low volatility stocks also outperformed their lower quality counterparts, by an average of 4 (percentage points) and 3 (percentage points), respectively.
de: Unternehmen mit hohen Kapital-Renditen sowie niedriger Volatilität bei ihren Aktien übertrafen auch ihre Pendants mit niedriger Qualität um durchschnittlich jeweils 4 (Prozentpunkte) und 3 (Prozentpunkte).
translated_de: Companies with high capital reserves and low volatility in their shares overtrafe their counterparts with lower quality, mainly in terms of a minimum of 4 (prozent points) and 3 (prozent points).

en: Debt will become a big issue.
de: Schulden werden ein großes Problem.
translated_de: Schulden will be a major problem.

en: Companies with a high percentage of floating rate debt stand to lose the most, Goldman said.
de: Unternehmen mit einem hohen Anteil an flexiblen Zinsen werden am meisten verlieren, sagte Goldman.
translated_de: Companies with a high proportion of flexible zinc will most likely lose their jobs, said Goldman.

en: Outside pure stock plays, consumers stand to benefit as well through the rising dollar.
de: Außerhalb der reinen Aktienspiele werden Verbraucher ebenfalls durch den steigenden Dollar profitieren.
translated_de: The consumer will also benefit from the rise in the dollar.

en: Savers could see gains as well through higher yields at the, though experts differ on how quickly that will take hold.
de: Sparer könnten Gewinne durch höhere Erträge sehen, auch wenn Experten unterschiedlicher Meinung sind, wie schnell das stattfinden wird.
translated_de: Sparers could see gains in higher yields, even if experts are different, how quickly this will be done.

en: BBC Radio 3 is a copy of Classic FM says MP Andrew Bingham
de: BBC Radio 3 ist eine Kopie des Classic FM, sagt Parlamentsmitglied Andrew Bingham
translated_de: BBC Radio 3 is a copy of the Classic FM, said Parliament Member Andrew Bingham

en: Conservative MP Andrew Bingham criticised station for 'dumbing down'
de: Das Konservative Mitglied des Parlaments kritisierte den Sender wegen seiner "Verdummung"
translated_de: The Conservative Member of Parliament criticised the Sender because of his "produzent"

en: Argues it's becoming increasingly indistinguishable from commercial rival
de: Er argumentiert, dass er zunehmend von kommerziellen Rivalen nicht zu unterscheiden ist.
translated_de: It is clear that the increasing number of commercial rivals is not going to differ.

en: Also took aim at the BBC Music Awards, saying they just rip off the Brits
de: Er zielte auch auf die BBC Music Awards und sagte, dass sie nur The Brits imitierten
translated_de: The BBC Music Awards were also a joke and said that they were only the Brits

en: Colleague Damien Collins MP attacked The Voice, saying that too wasn't original
de: Parlaments-Kollege Damien Collins griff die Sendung The Voice an und sagte, dass dies nicht sehr originell sei.
translated_de: Parliament' s President, Damien Collins, slammed the message and said that it is not very original.

en: BBC Radio 3 is "turning into" Classic FM, a leading MP has claimed, piling fresh pressure on the broadcaster to prove that it does something that commercial broadcasters do not.
de: BBC Radio 3 "wandelt sich" zu Classic FM, behauptet ein führendes Parlamentsmitglied und erhöht neuen Druck auf den Sender, zu beweisen, dass er etwas tut, was die Privatsender nicht tun.
translated_de: BBC Radio 3 "changes itself" to Classic FM, claiming to be a leading Member of Parliament and increasing new pressure on the sender, to show that it was not the private sector.

en: Conservative MP Andrew Bingham also told BBC bosses that the public service radio station appeared to be "dumbing down" and is becoming increasingly indistinguishable from its commercial rival.
de: Der Konservative Abgeordnete Andrew Bingham sagte auch den BBC-Bossen, dass der öffentlich-rechtliche Radiosender "verdumme" und zunehmend nicht mehr von seinen kommerziellen Konkurrenten zu unterscheiden sei.
translated_de: The Conservative Member, Andrew Bingham, said to the BBC that public radio broadcasters are "verdoing" and are increasingly not more able to distinguish between their commercial conkurrents.

en: "Radio 3 seems to be - I don't like to use the word "dumbing down" - but it seems to be turning into Classic FM," he said.
de: "Radio 3 scheint - ich benutze das Wort "verdummen" nicht gern - aber es scheint sich zu Classic FM zu verwandeln", sagte er.
translated_de: "Radio 3 seems to be a good thing - I am not sure what is called "verdummen" - but it seems to be a good thing to change to Classic FM", he said.

en: He also took aim at the BBC Music Awards, launched last December.
de: Er zielte auch auf die BBC Music Awards, die im letzten Dezember starteten.
translated_de: It was also a highlight of the BBC Music Awards which started in December last year.

en: The BBC Music Awards which started last year seem to be the Brits by another name.
de: Die BBC Music Awards, die im vergangenen Jahr starteten, scheinen The Brits nur unter einem anderen Namen zu sein.
translated_de: The BBC Music Awards which have been launched in the last year seem to be only under one other name.

en: So, if you're trying to do something different - those are two examples from the top of my head where you're actually just mimicking what is already on the market," Mr Bingham said.
de: Also, wenn Sie versuchen, etwas anderes zu tun - dies sind zwei spontan genannte Beispiele, bei denen Sie eigentlich nur das imitieren, was bereits auf dem Markt ist", sagte Mr Bingham.
translated_de: If you try to do something else, these are two spontaneous examples, which are actually only the ones that you are trying to do, which are already on the market", said Mr Bingham.

en: BBC director general denied the charges, arguing that BBC Radio 3 is far ahead of its commercial rival when it comes to live music and educating the public.
de: BBC-Generaldirektor wies die Vorwürfe zurück und argumentierte, dass BBC Radio 3 weit vor seinen kommerziellen Konkurrenten liege, wenn es um Live-Musik und Aufklärung der Öffentlichkeit geht.
translated_de: BBC Generaldirektor, as the proposal, argued that BBC Radio 3 lies far ahead of its commercial competitors when it comes to live-must-out and public communication.

en: What I learn from Radio 3, I am not going to learn about classical music from anywhere else.
de: Was ich von Radio 3 lerne, das werde ich über klassische Musik nirgendwo anders lernen.
translated_de: I am learning from Radio 3. I will learn about classical music anywhere.

en: And it's commitment to live music and music making is actually second to none.
de: Und es gibt ein Engagement für Live-Musik und Musizieren, das wirklich unübertroffen ist.
translated_de: And there is a commitment to live-musik and musik which is truly uncontrollable.

en: "And also, Radio 3's commitment to finding new music and commissioning new works I think is also really important," he said.
de: "Und das Engagement von Radio 3, neue Musik zu finden und neue Werke in Auftrag zu geben, halte ich auch wirklich für wichtig", sagte er.
translated_de: "It is important to find new music and to give new works to Radio 3, which is why I am really important", he said.

en: Earlier this year, BBC Radio 3 controller Alan Davey argued that it has to work harder to engage audiences than it did in the past, because Britons are less educated about classical music.
de: Anfang dieses Jahres argumentierte BBC Radio 3 Controller Alan Davey, dass härter daran gearbeitet werden müsse, das Publikum zu engagieren, als es dies in der Vergangenheit tat, weil die Briten weniger über klassische Musik informiert sind.
translated_de: In this year' s speech, BBC Radio 3 Controller Alan Davey said that it is better to work with the public than it was in the past because Brits are less informed about classical music.

en: However, Radio 3 was not the only element of the BBC's output which came under fire for treading on the toes of commercial rivals, during the Culture, Media and Sport select committee hearing.
de: Radio 3 war jedoch nicht das einzige Element der BBC-Produktion, das während der Anhörung im Ausschuss für die Auswahl von Kultur, Medien und Sport dafür unter Feuer geriet, den kommerziellen Rivalen auf die Füße zu treten.
translated_de: Radio 3 was not the only element of BBC production which, during the audition in the Committee on Culture, Media and Sport, was a blaze against the commercial rivals.

en: Tory MP Damien Collins attacked The Voice - the musical talent show which the BBC bought in from Dutch producer Talpa Media at an estimated cost of £22million.
de: Der Tory-Abgeordnete Damien Collins griff The Voice an - die musikalische Talent-Show der BBC, die vom niederländischen Produzenten Talpa Media für geschätzte Kosten von 22 Millionen £ gekauft wurde.
translated_de: The Tory Councillor, Damien Collins, sat down on the Voice - the BBC' s musical talent show which was bought by Dutch-produzents of Talpa Media for £ 22 million.

en: Can you see why that programme is often discussed because it is not original and it is not particularly distinctive?
de: Sehen Sie ein, warum dieses Programm oft diskutiert wird, weil es nicht originell ist und nicht besonders markant?
translated_de: What is the reason why this programme is debated often because it is not originell and not particularly important?

en: Lord Hall insisted that the BBC1 show - which stars Paloma Faith and Boy George as judges - was produced "in a particularly BBC way."
de: Lord Hall bestand darauf, dass die BBC 1-Show - mit Paloma Faith und Boy George als Richter - "auf besondere BBC-Weise" produziert wurde.
translated_de: Lord Hall argued that BBC 1-show - with Paloma Faith and Boy George as Richter - "was made on special BBC-Weise".

en: He added that he wants the Corporation to "find a hit from our own in-house stable" next time it launches an entertainment series.
de: Er fügte hinzu, er wünsche sich, dass das Unternehmen "einen Hit aus unserem hauseigenen Stall finde", wenn es das nächste Mal eine Unterhaltungsserie starte.
translated_de: It is also a pleasure to see the company "in the heart of our house" if it starts a series of entertainment.

en: However, he refused to rule out ordering more series of The Voice in the future, or spending licence fee payers' money on other entertainment formats.
de: Allerdings weigerte er sich, die Bestellung von weiteren Reihen von The Voice in Zukunft auszuschließen oder Geld der Gebührenzahler für andere Unterhaltungs-Formate auszugeben.
translated_de: However, it is necessary to accept the order of another number of voices in the future or to give the money to other entertainment clubs.

en: Internet sales increased at slowest ever rate in August and Black Friday may be to blame
de: Internet-Umsätze stiegen im August am langsamsten und der Black Friday kann dafür verantwortlich sein
translated_de: Internet usage has increased in August and Black Friday can be responsible for this.

en: First three months of 2015 saw seven per cent increase in online sales
de: In den ersten drei Monaten des Jahres 2015 gab es sieben Prozent Steigerung im Online-Verkauf.
translated_de: In the first three months of 2015, the increase in online sales was 7 percent.

en: Last month saw lowest growth rise since records began in 2000
de: Im letzten Monat gab es das niedrigste Ergebnis seit Beginn der Aufzeichnungen im Jahr 2000
translated_de: In the last month, the lowest result was achieved since the start of the re-signal period in 2000.

en: Online sales bolstered three years ago by the use of mobile for shopping
de: Online-Verkäufe verstärkten sich vor drei Jahren durch die Verwendung von Handys zum Einkaufen
translated_de: Online purchases have increased over three years by using mobiles to buy

en: Experts believe November's Black Friday could be holding back spending
de: Experten glauben, dass der Black Friday im November die Ausgaben gebremst hat
translated_de: Experts believe that the Black Friday in November has been a very short time since the severance of the severance of the severance of the severance of the severance of the severance of the severance of the severance of the severance of the severance of the severance of the severance of the severance of the severance of the severance of the severance of

en: For over a decade virtual shopping has been booming and turning many of Britain's high streets into ghost towns.
de: Für über ein Jahrzehnt hat das virtuelle Einkaufen geboomt, und viele der Haupteinkaufsstraßen Großbritanniens haben sich in Geisterstädte verwandelt.
translated_de: Over a decade ago, the virtual shopping has exploded and many of the major supermarkets have been transformed in spiriter cities.

en: But experts say there are now signs that online sales are leveling off, after new figures showed just a seven per cent increase in the first three months of 2015.
de: Doch Experten sagen, dass es jetzt Anzeichen gibt, dass die Online-Umsätze stagnieren, nachdem neue Zahlen nur sieben Prozent in den ersten drei Monaten 2015 zeigten.
translated_de: But experts say that it is now an indication that the online usage rate is stagnating, despite new figures showing only 7 per cent in the first three months 2015.

en: Total spending for August presented the lowest increase in growth since records began in 2000, with just a five per cent rise on last year.
de: Die Gesamtausgaben für August präsentierten den niedrigsten Anstieg im Wachstum seit Beginn der Aufzeichnungen im Jahr 2000 mit nur fünf Prozent Steigerung gegenüber dem Vorjahr.
translated_de: The August total expenditures showed the lowest growth increase since the start of the re-signal period in 2000, with only 5 percent increase in growth in comparison to the previous year.

en: Experts say there are signs that online sales are leveling off, after new figures showed just a seven per cent increase in the first three months of 2015
de: Experten sagen, dass es Anzeichen gibt, dass Online-Verkäufe stagnieren, nachdem neue Zahlen nur sieben Prozent Wachstum in den ersten drei Monaten 2015 anzeigten
translated_de: Experts say that there is a sign that online purchases are stagnating, despite new figures showing only 7 percent growth in the first three months 2015

en: 'If you look at growth levels for previous years and go back to 2000, it was always going to rationalise over time,' Andy Mulcahy, editor of IMRG sales index, told the Guardian.
de: "Wenn Sie die Wachstumsraten für die Vorjahre betrachten und bis 2000 zurückgehen, dann hat sich das im Laufe der Zeit immer entwickelt", sagte Andy Mulcahy, Herausgeber des IMRG-Verkaufsindexes dem Guardian.
translated_de: "If you have the growth rate for the past year and then for 2000, then it has always developed in the course of the time," said Andy Mulcahy, the editor of the IMRG-Verkaufsindex.

en: He explained that online sales were bolstered three years ago when shoppers started using their mobile phones to make purchases.
de: Er erklärte, dass die Online-Verkäufe sich vor drei Jahren verstärkten, als Käufer anfingen, mit ihren Handys Einkäufe zu tätigen.
translated_de: It stated that online purchases have increased over three years, as buyers, with their mobile purchases.

en: It meant more people were able to shop online and that people could do it in different contexts, such as on the sofa.
de: Es bedeutete, dass mehr Menschen online einkaufen konnten und dass Menschen dies in unterschiedlichen Umgebungen tun konnten, z. B. zu Hause auf dem Sofa.
translated_de: It means that more people can buy online and that people can do it in different environments, z. B. in house on the sofa.

en: But now that is plateauing a bit, you might see (growth) fall away.
de: Aber jetzt pendelt sich das ein, und wir werden möglicherweise erleben, dass sich das Wachstum verringert.
translated_de: But now we are able to see that growth is ringing.

en: The Black Friday phenomenon, which has been imported from America, is being cited as one of the reasons behind the slowing sales.
de: Das Black-Friday-Phänomen, das aus Amerika importiert wurde, wird als ein Grund für die nachlassenden Umsätze zitiert.
translated_de: The Black Friday-Phänomen, imported from Amerika, is a reason for the arbitrary reversal.

en: Experts believe shoppers could be holding off making purchases ahead of the event, which takes place on the last Friday in November .
de: Experten glauben, dass Käufer ihre Einkäufe vor diesem Ereignis, das jeweils am letzten Freitag im November stattfindet, zurückhalten.
translated_de: Experts believe that the buyer' s purchase of this event, which happens on the last Friday of November, has been stopped.

en: Last year five times the average number of shoppers flocked to their computers to snap up deals crashing a number of retailers websites.
de: Im vergangenen Jahr scharte sich fünfmal die durchschnittliche Anzahl von Käufern um ihre Computer, um ihre Schnäppchen zu machen, und einige Händler-Websites stürzten ab.
translated_de: Last year, five million people were able to make their computers, to make their snaps, and some of the sites of the 'Hastdler' website were stumbling.

en: Experts believe Black Friday, which saw shoppers fight over bargains, could be holding shoppers off from making purchases
de: Experten glauben, dass Black Friday, an dem sich die Käufer wegen Schnäppchen bekämpften, Käufer davon abhalten könnte, Einkäufe zu machen.
translated_de: Experts believe that Black Friday, which is a fight between the buyers and the buyers due to a shortage of goods, could be a good way to make purchases.

en: Research published by the British Retail Consortium found just over £1 in every £5 was being spent online.
de: Eine Studie des British Retail Consortium fand heraus, dass von 5 £ Ausgaben etwas mehr als 1 £ online ausgegeben wurde.
translated_de: A study by the British Retail Consortium found that 5 £ expenditures were more than 1 £ online.

en: For some products, such as TVs and washing machines, more than one third of purchases are now done through web stores.
de: Bei einigen Produkten wie Fernseher und Waschmaschinen werden mehr als ein Drittel der Einkäufe nun über Web-Shops durchgeführt.
translated_de: In some products such as TV and washing machines, more than one third of the purchases are now made via webshops.

en: At the same time, more than a quarter of people are buying clothes and shoes online, rather than using high street fashion chains.
de: Zur gleichen Zeit kauft mehr als ein Viertel der Menschen Kleidung und Schuhe online anstatt in den Modeketten in den Innenstädten.
translated_de: In the same time, more than half of the clothing and footwear is now available online than in the Modeketts in the interior cities.

en: Muslims bury those killed in Mecca crane crash as Bin Laden family sanctioned
de: Muslime begraben die in Mekka beim Kran-Unfall Getöteten - Bin Ladens Familie wird sanktioniert
translated_de: Muslime begraben in Mekka in the Kran-Unfall Getöteten - Bin Laden family will be punished

en: Bodies of 29 of the dead carried through the streets by Muslims as the first funerals take place in Mecca
de: Die Leichen von 29 Toten werden von Muslimen bei den ersten Begräbnissen in Mekka durch die Straßen getragen
translated_de: The slain slain of 29 toten are slashed by Muslim Muslims during the first time in Mekka by the streets

en: Come as Saudi Arabia has partly blamed the collapse on construction giant Saudi Binladin Group
de: Saudi-Arabien legt den Zusammenbruch teilweise der riesigen Saudischen Bin-Laden-Gruppe zur Last
translated_de: Saudi Arabia has a large Saudi Bin-Laden Group which is the last of its kind

en: The Health Ministry said a total of 394 people were also injured after the crane crashed down
de: Das Gesundheitsministerium sagte, dass außerdem insgesamt 394 Menschen verletzt wurden, nachdem der Kran stürzte
translated_de: The Health Ministry said that there were also 394 people injured, according to the Kran stürzte

en: Carried aloft through the streets, hundreds of Muslims gathered to bury 29 of the victims killed when a crane collapsed at Mecca's Grand mosque.
de: Hunderte von Muslimen versammelten sich, als 29 der Opfer durch die Straßen getragen wurden, um die zu begraben, die getötet wurden, als ein Kran an Mekkas Großmoschee einstürzte.
translated_de: Hundert of Muslim victims were gathered in the streets, as 29 were killed in the streets, to be grazed, as a Kran an Mekkas Grossmoschee.

en: Dressed largely in white, mourners packed the route to pay their respects as the first of the dead made their final journey to Al-Moaissem cemetery.
de: Trauernde füllten, weitgehend in weiß gekleidet, die Strecke, um ihren Respekt zu zollen, als die ersten der Toten ihre letzte Reise zum Al-Moaissem-Friedhof antraten.
translated_de: Trauernde has sat down in white to a halt in the route, to express their respect, as the first of the Toten' s last voyage to Al-Moaissem-Friedhof.

en: The sad possession passed by the holy site, where just days earlier a construction crane crashed through the ceiling of the mosque and toppled onto worshipers.
de: Die Trauerprozession zog an der Heiligen Stätte vorüber, wo nur Tage zuvor ein Baukran durch die Decke der Moschee und dann auf die Betenden stürzte.
translated_de: The Trauer process took place at the Saint Stätte where, just days before, a building was built by the Deck of the Moschees and then a stumbling block.

en: The bodies were released for funeral as the Saudi King sanctioned the Bin Laden family construction group over the disaster, which also left 394 injured.
de: Die Leichen wurden für die Beerdigung freigegeben, als der Saudi-König über das Bauunternehmen der Familie Bin Laden wegen der Katastrophe, die auch 394 Verletzte hinterließ, eine Sanktion verhängte.
translated_de: The punishments for beer were freed, as the Saudi-Konig imposed on the construction of the family bin Laden because of the disaster which, in fact, triggered 394 cases, a sanctions.

en: The bodies of 29 of the worshipers killed when a crane crashed collapsed at Mecca's Grand Central Mosque were carried through the streets
de: Die Leichen von 29 Betern, die getötet wurden, als ein Kran durch die Große Zentralmoschee Mekkas stürzte, wurden durch die Straßen getragen.
translated_de: The stouts of 29 animals, which were stürzte by the large central-occurring Mekkas, were stünded by the streets.

en: Among the dead was father-of-four Qasim Akram, from Bolton, Greater Manchester, who was on his first pilgrimage when the crane crashed down.
de: Unter den Toten befand sich Qasim Akram aus Bolton, Greater Manchester, Vater von vier Kindern, der auf seiner ersten Pilgerreise war, als der Kran hinunterstürzte.
translated_de: The Toten are a father of four children who were on his first Pilgerreise in the country, Qasim Akram, from Bolton, Greater Manchester, as a spokesman for Kran.

en: Mr Akram had been in the Grand Mosque with his parents ahead of the start of the annual hajj pilgrimage.
de: Mr Akram war mit seinen Eltern vor dem Beginn des jährlichen Haddsch in der Großen Moschee.
translated_de: Mr Akram was with his parents before the start of the annual Haddsch in the Grand Moschees.

en: Saudi officials have already vowed that the hajj to Mecca will go ahead with thousands continuing to descend on the city.
de: Saudi-Offizielle haben bereits fest zugesagt, dass die Haddsch nach Mekka mit Tausenden, die weiterhin zur Stadt kommen werden, weitergehen werde.
translated_de: Saudi Officielle has already stated that Haddsch will continue to come to Mekka with Tausends, who will continue to come to the city.

en: Today, King Salman said the Binladin Group should not have left the crane's arm up when it was not in use.
de: Heute sagte König Salman, die Bin-Laden-Gruppe hätte den Arm des Krans nicht stehenlassen sollen, als er nicht benutzt wurde.
translated_de: He said today that the Bin-Laden Group would not have to stand the arm of the Krans, as it was not used.

en: An Arabic version of the decree, carried by the state-run Saudi Press Agency, said the Binladin Group was partly to blame for the collapse.
de: Eine arabische Version des Dekrets, das von der staatlichen Saudi Press Agency veröffentlicht wurde, sagte, dass die Bin-Laden-Gruppe für den Zusammenbruch mitverantwortlich sei.
translated_de: A arab version of the Dekrets, which was published by the Saudi Press Agency, said that the Bin-Laden Group for the collapse was responsible.

en: The news agency's English service did not report that detail, but did say leaders of the company have been banned from travelling abroad.
de: Der englischsprachige Service der Nachrichtenagentur berichtete dieses Detail nicht, sagte aber, dass der Führung des Unternehmens Auslandsreisen verboten seien.
translated_de: The English-speaking service of the news agency did not report this detail, but said that the management of the company' s foreign travels would be banned.

en: Earlier this week Salman vowed to reveal what caused the crane to topple into a courtyard of the Grand Mosque, where hundreds of thousands of Muslims have converged ahead of the hajj pilgrimage later this month.
de: Anfang dieser Woche gelobte Salman zu enthüllen, was den Sturz des Krans verursachte, der in einen Innenhof der Großmoschee stürzte, wo Hunderttausende von Muslimen vor der Haddsch, die später in diesem Monat stattfindet, sich versammelten.
translated_de: In this week, Salman was urged to take the blame for the sturz of the Krans, which was caused in a large-scale hospital where hundreds of thousands of Muslim Muslims were collected before the Haddsch, which later this month.

en: Binladin Group has not released any statements about the crane collapse and its representatives have not been made available for comment.
de: Die Bin-Laden-Gruppe hat keine Aussagen über den Zusammenbruch de Krans herausgegeben, und ihre Vertreter standen für eine Stellungnahme nicht zur Verfügung.
translated_de: The Bin-Laden Group has not made any statements on the collapse of Krans and its representatives have not been able to give a position.

en: The royal decree also blamed the group for not using up-to-date safety measures and failing to coordinate with meteorological officials.
de: Das Königliche Dekret tadelte auch die Gruppe wegen nicht aktueller Sicherheitsmaßnahmen und weil sie nicht mit Meteorologen kooperiert habe.
translated_de: The royal dekret also shifted the group because of not being able to implement current security measures and because they have not been able to use Meteorologen.

en: Dozens of cranes surround Mecca's Grand Mosque, part of the massive construction effort headed by the Binladin Group.
de: Dutzende von Kränen umgeben Mekkas Großmoschee als Teil des massiven Bauvorhabens, das von der Bin-Laden-Gruppe geleitet wird.
translated_de: The influx of crans in the Mediterranean is part of the massive construction projects which the Bin-Laden Group is implementing.

en: The Binladin family has been close to Saudi Arabia's ruling family for decades and runs major building projects.
de: Die Familie Bin Laden ist seit Jahrzehnten mit der Herrscherfamilie von Saudi Arabien verbunden und übernimmt größere Bauprojekte.
translated_de: The family Bin Laden has been a member of the Saudi Arab Force for decades and has been involved in major projects.

en: Al Qaida's late leader Osama bin Laden was a renegade son disowned by the family in the 1990s.
de: Der verstorbene Führer von Al Qaida, Osama bin Laden, war ein abtrünniger Sohn, der in den 1990-er Jahren von der Familie enteignet wurde.
translated_de: The dictator of Al Qaida, Osama bin Laden, was a saviour of the family in the 1990s.

en: The crash came amid high winds and rain just days before millions arrive in the kingdom for the pilgrimage, which is required at least once in the life of every able-bodied Muslim.
de: Der Absturz des Krans kam inmitten starker Winde und Regen, nur wenige Tage vor Ankunft von Millionen im Königreich für die Pilgerreise, die mindestens einmal im Leben eines jeden gesunden Muslims erforderlich ist.
translated_de: The Krans' s sturdiness was a severing wind and rain, only a few days before the arrival of millions of people in the Kingdom for the pilgrimage which is at least necessary for every healthy Muslim in the world.

en: Officials said 158 people remain in hospital.
de: Beamte sagten, dass 158 Menschen im Krankenhaus bleiben.
translated_de: The officials said that 158 people remain in hospital.

en: Officials ordered one million riyals (£174,000) be paid to the relatives of those killed, and the same amount to those permanently injured.
de: Regierungsvertreter ordneten an, dass 1 Million Rial (£ 174.000) an die Angehörigen der Getöteten zu zahlen sind und die gleiche Summe an dauerhaft Verletzte.
translated_de: Government officials are able to pay 1 million risots (£ 174.000) to the members of the Getötets and the same sum is guaranteed to be permanently refunded.

en: Others injured will receive half that amount.
de: Andere Verletzte erhalten die Hälfte dieses Betrags.
translated_de: Other things have been reported to have received the majority of this report.

en: B&Q boss says Eastern European tradesmen working cheap is behind trend
de: B&Q Boss sagt, dass die Zeit der billigen osteuropäischen Handwerker vorüber ist
translated_de: B&Q Boss said that the time of the billy European trader is before the time of the

en: Britons are increasingly employing handymen says Veronique Laury
de: Briten beschäftigen zunehmend Handwerker, sagt Veronique Laury
translated_de: Brits are becoming increasingly skilled workers, says Veronique Laury

en: Number of skilled tradesmen from Eastern Europe behind rise
de: Die Anzahl qualifizierter Handwerker aus Osteuropa hat Anstieg hinter sich
translated_de: The number of qualified artisans in Europe has increased

en: Resulting in 200 more Screwfix stores, aimed at tradesmen, opening
de: Das führt dazu, dass 200 weitere Screwfix-Läden, die auf Handwerker abzielen, eröffnet werden
translated_de: This leads to 200 new screwfixes which are being marketed to the artisans.
