en: At same time Kingfisher is closing 60 B&Q outlets across the country
de: Gleichzeitig wird Kingfisher 60 B&Q Verkaufsstellen landesweit schließen
translated_de: The Kingfisher 60 B&Q sales are also a landslide

en: By Rupert Steiner, Chief City Correspondent for the Daily Mail
de: Von Rupert Steiner, City Chef-Korrespondent der Daily Mail
translated_de: Rupert Steiner, City Chef-respondent of Daily Mail

en: Britons are said to be putting down their hammers and paintbrushes in favour of employing skilled Eastern European tradesmen to carry out work in their home
de: Es wird behauptet, dass Briten ihre Hämmer und Pinsel zugunsten des Einsatzes von qualifizierten osteuropäischen Handwerkern, die die Arbeiten in ihrem Zuhause durchführen, niederlegen
translated_de: It is said that Brits are able to use their pigs and pigs to exploit qualified European artisans who are able to work in their home.

en: If you are handy with a hammer or a whizz at painting walls, it seems you are in the minority these days.
de: Wenn Sie geschickt mit einem Hammer oder einem Pinsel zum Anstreichen von Wänden umgehen können, gehören Sie heutzutage anscheinend zu einer Minderheit.
translated_de: If you can send a Hammer or a pin to the wall, you are a smuggler of a sense of self-control.

en: Because Britons are increasingly employing handymen to carry out DIY jobs in their homes, according to the boss of the company behind B&Q.
de: Denn Briten beschäftigen zunehmend Handwerker, um Heimwerkerjobs in ihren Häusern durchzuführen, so der Chef des Unternehmens hinter B&Q.
translated_de: Brits are increasingly working to create Heimwork jobs in their houses, so the chef of the company is behind B&Q.

en: Veronique Laury, new chief executive of Kingfisher, which owns the home improvement chain, said a big rise in the number of skilled tradesmen from Eastern Europe offering services at rock-bottom prices is behind the trend.
de: Véronique Laury, neue Geschäftsführerin von Kingfisher, der die Baumärkte-Kette besitzt, sagte, dass ein großer Anstieg der Zahl von qualifizierte Handwerker aus Osteuropa, die Dienstleistungen zu Tiefstpreisen anbieten sei inzwischen überholt.
translated_de: Véronique Laury, new business leader of the Kingfisher, the Baumärkty, said that a large increase in the number of qualified artisans from Eastern Europe, which offer services to low prices, has now been a priority.

en: As a result, Kingfisher is planning to open 200 more Screwfix stores, which are aimed at tradesmen, while closing 60 B&Q outlets.
de: Daher plant Kingfisher, 200 weitere Screwfix Shops zu eröffnen, die sich an Handwerker richten und 60 Verkaufsstellen von B&Q zu schließen.
translated_de: There are also 200 new Screwfix shops which are being opened by artisans and 60 B&Q sales.

en: Mrs Laury said she wants more women to be employed in B&Q shops because eight out of ten purchasing decisions in store are made by the fairer sex.
de: Mrs Laury sagte, sie wolle mehr Frauen in B & Q-Shops beschäftigen, denn acht von zehn Kaufentscheidungen im Laden werden von Frauen getroffen.
translated_de: Mrs Laury said she wants more women to be employed in B&Q shops because eight of ten women are being questioned in the Laden.

en: Currently the majority of staff are men.
de: Im Augenblick überwiegen bei den Mitarbeitern die Männer.
translated_de: The view of the staff is overwhelming.

en: She said there was a need to address growing demographic trends which have seen more single female households who are doing more home improvements than in the past.
de: Sie sagte, es sei notwendig, sich den wachsenden demographischen Trends zu stellen, die mehr weibliche Single-Haushalte aufweisen, die mehr Renovierungen vornehmen als in der Vergangenheit.
translated_de: You said that it is necessary to present the growing demographic trend which is a result of more weiblich single-handed exploitation and more new developments than in the past.

en: Mrs Laury said: "We still have a majority of men working in our stores.
de: Mrs Laury sagte: "Es arbeitet immer noch eine Mehrheit von Männern in unseren Filialen.
translated_de: Mrs Laury said: "There is always a majority of men in our branches.

en: We need to move more towards a balance.
de: Wir müssen dies stärker hin zu einem Gleichgewicht verschieben.
translated_de: We must move forward with a greater balance.

en: Fundamentally half of our customers are female with 80 per cent of the decisions over items purchased taken by women.
de: Grundsätzlich besteht die Hälfte unserer Kunden aus Frauen mit 80 Prozent der Entscheidungen über den Kauf von Artikeln durch Frauen.
translated_de: The majority of our clients are women, with 80 percent of the decision to buy articles by women.

en: Women play a big part in the decision-making process.
de: Frauen spielen eine große Rolle im Entscheidungsprozess.
translated_de: Women play a major role in the decision process.

en: Mrs Laury, who is one of only five women at the helm of Britain's FTSE100 index of leading firms, has also restructured her top team to reflect an equal number of men and women directors.
de: Mrs Laury, die eine von nur fünf Frauen an der Spitze eines britischen im FTSE100 Index gelisteten führenden Unternehmen ist, hat auch ihr Top-Team umstruktiert, um eine gleiche Anzahl von Männern und Frauen in Führungspositionen zu reflektieren.
translated_de: Mrs Laury, who is one of only five women who is the top of a British company listed in the FTSE100 Index, has also strutted its top team to reflect a number of men and women in leadership positions.

en: Kingfisher is almost alone in having exactly 50 per cent of its team staffed by women, including its chief executive and finance director.
de: Kingfisher ist fast das einzige Unternehmen, das genau 50 Prozent des Teams mit Frauen besetzt hat, einschließlich seiner Geschäftsführung und Finanzvorstand.
translated_de: Kingfisher is fast the only company that has a record 50 percent of women' s teams, including its business and financial finances.

en: Mrs Laury said: "This was a conscious decision - diversity is an important topic here.
de: Mrs Laury sagte: "Dies war eine bewusste Entscheidung - Vielfalt ist hier ein wichtiges Thema.
translated_de: Mrs Laury said: "This was a deliberate decision - diversity is a key issue here.

en: It has not been difficult to find good women to put on our board.
de: Es war nicht schwierig, gute Frauen für unseren Aufsichtsrat zu finden.
translated_de: It was not difficult to find good women for our committee.

en: Kingfisher posted a fall in both half-year profit and sales after the group shouldered the cost of shutting stores.
de: Kingfisher vermeldete einen Rückgang beim Halbjahresgewinn und den Umsätzen, nachdem die Gruppe die Kosten für das Schließen der Läden schulterte.
translated_de: Kingfishers have a return to the market for the quarter-years and the aims of the group, based on the cost of the settlement of the Läden.

en: As a result of the trend Kingfisher, which owns Screwfix and B&Q, is opening 200 new stores
de: Wegen des Trends wird Kingfisher, der Screwfix und B&Q besitzt, 200 neue Filialen eröffnen.
translated_de: The trend is that Kingfisher, Screwfix and B&Q has 200 new Filiales.

en: Officials from Aich-Dob in court for breach of trust
de: Funktionäre von Aich/Dob wegen Untreue vor Gericht
translated_de: The role of Aich/Dob in a dispute with the Court

en: Two officials from the Austrian volleyball runner-up champion team Aich-Dob attended the Klagenfurt regional court on Wednesday to answer charges of breach of trust and tax evasion.
de: Am Landesgericht Klagenfurt haben sich am Mittwoch zwei Funktionäre des österreichischen Volleyball-Vizemeisters Aich/Dob wegen Untreue und Abgabenhinterziehung verantworten müssen.
translated_de: The German court has imposed two functions on the Austrian Volleyball Championships Committee due to irregular and a lack of confidence.

en: The defendants pleaded not guilty.
de: Die Angeklagten bekannten sich nicht schuldig.
translated_de: The accused are not innocent.

en: One of them had also also been charged with abuse of his position.
de: Einer von ihnen war auch wegen Amtsmissbrauchs angeklagt gewesen.
translated_de: One of them was also a victim of a smear attack.

en: He was legally acquitted of this charge in May.
de: Von diesem Vorwurf ist er im Mai rechtskräftig freigesprochen worden.
translated_de: This proposal was drafted in May by the Council.

en: The current case was adjourned.
de: Der aktuelle Prozess wurde vertagt.
translated_de: The current process has been defended.

en: According to senior Public Prosecutor Robert Riffel, it emerged during preliminary investigations that in the years 2006 to 2011 the defendants used monies from the club's accounts, to which they had access due to their roles, for private purposes.
de: Laut Oberstaatsanwalt Robert Riffel hatte sich in der Voruntersuchung herauskristallisiert, dass die Angeklagten in den Jahren 2006 bis 2011 Gelder von Vereinskonten, über die sie in ihren Funktionen disponieren durften, für private Zwecke verwendeten.
translated_de: The President of the General Assembly, Robert Riffel, criticized the fact that the Angeklagtes used funds from the Clubs in the years 2006 to 2011 for private purposes.

en: The loss is estimated at around €400,000.
de: Den Schaden beziffert er mit rund 400.000 Euro.
translated_de: The damage is estimated at around € 400.000.

en: The sports officials are also accused of financial offences.
de: Die Sportfunktionäre sind auch wegen Finanzvergehen angeklagt.
translated_de: Sport functions are also a result of financial constraints.

en: The Chairwoman of the Lay Judge Senate, Judge Michaela Sanin, ordered proceedings on this fact to be postponed.
de: Dieses Faktum schied die Vorsitzende des Schöffensenats, Richterin Michaela Sanin, aus.
translated_de: This act voted the President of the Treaty, Richter Michaela Sanin.

en: It will be tried at a later date.
de: Es soll zu einem späteren Zeitpunkt verhandelt werden.
translated_de: It will be discussed at a later date.

en: On the charge of breach of trust, the defence argued that the club had never at any time suffered any pecuniary disadvantage
de: Zum Verwurf der Untreue legte die Verteidigung dar, dass dem Verein zu keinem Zeitpunkt ein Vermögensnachteil entstanden sei.
translated_de: The failure to comply with the proposal affirmed that the United would not have a wealth share at any time.

en: The sports officials had only offset expense allowances, and brought the sports club for which they worked from 1982 to 2011, and in which they had invested much time and money, out of debt - liabilities in 2001 amounted to around 600,000 Schillings (around €44,000).
de: Die Sportfunktionäre hätten nur Aufwandsentschädigungen verrechnet und den Sportclub, für den sie von 1982 bis 2011 tätig gewesen und in den sie viel Zeit und Geld investiert hätten, aus den Schulden herausgeführt - die Passiva betrugen im Jahr 2001 rund 600.000 Schilling (rd. 44.000 Euro).
translated_de: Sport functions would only have to pay costs and the Sportclub would have paid for it from 1982 to 2011 and, in the long term, spent money and money, which had been invested in the Schulden, the Passiva was wiped out in 2001 at around 600.000 € (44.000 Euro).

en: "At that time we were faced with the situation of whether we should continue with the club or close it down," said one of the defendents, who makes his living as an auditor of large companies for the tax authorities.
de: "Damals standen wir vor der Situation: Führen wir den Club weiter oder sperren wir zu?", erzählte einer der Angeklagten, im Brotberuf Großbetriebsprüfer des Finanzamts.
translated_de: "We were in the situation, we were in the club, or we were in the club?", a spokesman for the Financial Services Department, told one of the Angeklagten.

en: With his colleague and co-defendant, he had then resolved to undertake this task.
de: Mit seinem Kollegen und Mitangeklagten habe er dann beschlossen, diese Aufgabe zu übernehmen.
translated_de: It was then agreed with his colleagues and fellow people that this task was to be taken into account.

en: With all the risks.
de: Mit allen Risiken.
translated_de: All the Risiken.

en: "We advanced money and deposited our life insurance policies with the bank as security," he said during the examination.
de: "Wir haben Geld vorgeschossen, unsere Lebensversicherungen als Sicherheit bei der Bank hingelegt", sagte er bei der Einvernahme.
translated_de: "We have a money crisis, our life insurance as security in the Bank", he said during the withdrawal.

en: It was agreed with the club that they had a free hand to manage the money, but they were not permitted to run up any debts.
de: Mit dem Verein sei vereinbart worden: Sie können das Geld frei verwalten, es dürfen nur keine Schulden gemacht werden.
translated_de: The United Nations has agreed: you can freely collect money, and it must only be made without any debt.

en: Furthermore, if there was appropriate financial success, retrospective payment of the expense allowance back to 1991 was agreed.
de: Weiters sei - bei entsprechendem finanziellen - Erfolg die Auszahlung der Aufwandsentschädigungen rückwirkend bis 1991 beschlossen worden.
translated_de: The future of the payment of the costs of the damages would be refunded - in the appropriate financial terms - until 1991.

en: As a result, a part of the expense allowance was paid off years later, that is to say from the year 2003 when the account went into credit.
de: Daher habe man sich einen Teil der Aufwandsentschädigungen erst Jahre später, nämlich ab dem Jahr 2003, als ein Plus auf dem Konto gewesen sei, ausgezahlt.
translated_de: This has caused some of the costs to be paid, namely, in 2003, as a bonus to the Conto.

en: This is why general and not detailed debit entries appeared, was the former chairman's explanation for the processes.
de: Daher schienen auch Pauschal- und nicht Detailabbuchungen auf, erläuterte der ehemalige Obmann die Vorgänge.
translated_de: This is also a sluggish and non-detail explanation of the former Obmann' s actions.

en: The two defendants managed the accounts and passbooks together, said the second defendant.
de: Die Konten und Sparbücher verwalteten die beiden Angeklagten gemeinsam, sagte der zweite Angeklagte.
translated_de: The consolidated and re-sale books have sparked the two Angeklagten together, a second Angeklagter said.

en: The Judge asked why the payments had not been disclosed to the club in detail.
de: Warum die Auszahlungen dem Verein nicht detailliert offengelegt worden seien, fragte die Richterin.
translated_de: Why the payments made by the United Nations were not disclosed in detail, asked the Richter.

en: The club was not interested in details of the financial arrangements, it was only important that it should be debt free, was the answer.
de: Der Verein habe sich nicht im Detail für die Finanzgebarung interessiert, wichtig sei nur die Schuldenfreiheit gewesen, so die Antwort.
translated_de: The United Nations has not been interested in the details of financial disputes, but it is important that education was given only, so the answer is not given.

en: When investigations into abuse of his position against one of the officers began in 2011, a sum of €120,000 was transferred into the club's account.
de: Als im Jahr 2011 gegen den einen Funktionär Ermittlungen wegen Amtsmissbrauchs begannen, wurde ein Betrag von 120.000 Euro auf das Vereinskonto überwiesen.
translated_de: In 2011, a report on the failure to comply with the rules of the club account was issued in the year 2011 with a total of € 120.000.

en: Those were reserves, explained the defendant.
de: Das seien Rücklagen gewesen, erklärten die Angeklagten.
translated_de: The alleged incident was a reversal, according to the complainant.

en: This securities account was run in the name of the two defendants and according to a statement by the club its existence was not known to the club.
de: Dieses Wertpapierkonto lief auf den Namen des zweiten Angeklagten und war laut dessen Aussage dem Verein nicht bekannt.
translated_de: This value paper account is the name of the second defendant and was not known by the United Nations.

en: "Why?" the Judge wanted to know.
de: "Warum?", wollte die Richterin wissen.
translated_de: "Why?", the Richters wanted to know.

en: There was no answer to this for a long time.
de: Darauf wusste der Befragte lange keine Antwort.
translated_de: We did not know what the question was asking for long.

en: Then he finally said that he had thought it would be best for the club.
de: Dann meinte er schließlich, er habe geglaubt, dass dies das Beste für den Verein sei.
translated_de: Finally, I have granted permission to make the best for the United.

en: Had something happen to him then nobody would have known anything about this money, the State Prosecutor put to the room.
de: Wenn ihm etwas passiert wäre, hätte niemand etwas von diesem Geld gewusst, stellte der Staatsanwalt in den Raum.
translated_de: If it happened, nobody would have thought of this money in the space.

en: The co-defendant knew about it, the official justified himself.
de: Der Mitangeklagte sei informiert gewesen, rechtfertigte sich der Funktionär.
translated_de: The defendant was informed of the functionary.

en: The purpose of the transfer was given as compensation for damages.
de: Diese Überweisung wurde als "Schadenwiedergutmachung" formuliert.
translated_de: This is a "sad-washing" rule.

en: "Why compensation for damages?" the Judge and the State Prosecutor wanted to know.
de: Warum Schadensgutmachung?, wollten Richterin und Staatsanwalt wissen.
translated_de: Why damage is caused?, Richter and the State Department asked.

en: In response, the first defendant said that he had disagreed with this wording because no damage had ever occurred to the club.
de: Darauf erklärte der erste Angeklagte, er sei mit dieser Formulierung nicht einverstanden gewesen, weil dem Verein nie ein Schaden entstanden sei.
translated_de: The first person who complained was not aware of this formulation because the United Nations never suffered any damage.

en: But what can I do when the lawyer says, "This lets us all off the hook"?
de: Aber was soll ich tun, wenn der Anwalt sagt: "Mit dem seid ihr alle aus dem Schneider".
translated_de: But what should I do if the council said: "I am all from the Schneider".

en: "Am I a legal representative?" he asked.
de: "Bin ich ein Rechtsvertreter?", fragte er.
translated_de: "I am a legal lawyer?", he asked.

en: The official carried on that he had never received a cent in salary, he had only charged for mileage and a per diem allowance.
de: Weiters sagte der Funktionär, er habe nie einen Cent Gehalt bezogen, verrechnet habe er lediglich Kilometergeld und Diäten.
translated_de: The functionary said that he never had a Cent of a time limit, but he had only a few kilometers and a few kilometres.

en: The club had set aside €1,000 per month for per diem allowances, which were in fact expenses which would have been much higher, he added.
de: An Diäten habe er dem Verein 1.000 Euro pro Monat in Rechnung gestellt, der tatsächliche Aufwand sei jedoch viel höher gewesen, fügte er hinzu.
translated_de: The amount of the amount paid to the United has been a little more than 1.000 Euros per month, but the cost is much higher.

en: The defendants were not able to provide accurate documentation for the earlier years.
de: Genaue Unterlagen für die frühen Jahre konnten die Angeklagten nicht vorweisen.
translated_de: The exact documents for the early years were not enough to show the Angeklagtes.

en: This was no longer kept since an audit in which everything was properly assessed, they explained.
de: Diese seien nach einer Betriebsprüfung, in der alles als korrekt beurteilt worden sei, nicht mehr aufbewahrt worden, erklärten sie.
translated_de: This is not a case of a business examination, which is a case of correct judgment, which is not more a case of failure.

en: The second defendant had also obtained a mileage allowance.
de: Kilometergeld hatte auch der zweite Angeklagte bezogen.
translated_de: The second Angeklagte was also involved in the calculation of kilometers.

en: All adjustments were made in cash, for which he had to drive from his home in Völkermarkt to the bank in Bleiburg, he explained in his statement.
de: Alle Behebungen seien in bar erfolgt, dazu habe er von seinem Wohnort Völkermarkt zur Bank nach Bleiburg fahren müssen, erklärte er in seiner Aussage.
translated_de: All the allegations are being brought in, so that the bank of his residence in Bleiburg must be re-opened.

en: The trial will continue on 23 September with the questioning of witnesses.
de: Die Hauptverhandlung wird am 23. September mit der Befragung von Zeugen fortgesetzt.
translated_de: The first meeting will take place on 23 September with the destruction of evidence.

en: Hewlett Packard cutting a further 30,000 jobs
de: Hewlett-Packard streicht weitere 30.000 Jobs
translated_de: Hewlett Packard streicht weitere 30.000 Jobs

en: In addition to the job cuts that have been taking place for the past three years, the computer giant is going to lay off even more staff with the splitting of the company.
de: Zusätzlich zum seit drei Jahren laufenden Personalabbau wird der Computerriese bei der Aufspaltung des Unternehmens weitere Jobs abbauen.
translated_de: The Computerries will also build new jobs in the company for three years.

en: There seems to be no end to the job cuts at the US computer giant Hewlett-Packard (HP).
de: Die Stellenstreichungen beim US-Computerriesen Hewlett-Packard (HP) finden kein Ende.
translated_de: The jobs of the US-Computer Industry Hewlett Packard (HP) are not going to end.

en: As part of its restructuring, the US technology group plans to lay off between 25,000 and 30,000 staff in its corporate customer section.
de: Der US-Technologiekonzern plant im Rahmen seiner Umstrukturierung den Abbau von 25.000 bis 30.000 Stellen in seiner Firmenkundensparte.
translated_de: The US-Technological Conzern plant is restructuring the construction of 25.000 to 30.000 jobs in its corporate clients.

en: This should lead to cost savings of around $2.7 billion (€2.4 billion), the company disclosed on Tuesday.
de: Dadurch sollen Kosten in Höhe von 2,7 Mrd. Dollar (2,4 Mrd. Euro) eingespart werden, teilte das Unternehmen am Dienstag mit.
translated_de: This will mean that costs will be lowered to 2,7 Mrd. Dollar (2,4 Mrd. Euro) and the company will be able to share it on Tuesday.

en: The step will lead to a one-off charge of around $2.7 billion, which will be incurred in the fourth quarter.
de: Der Schritt werde zu einer Sonderbelastung von rund 2,7 Mrd. Dollar führen, die ab dem vierten Quartal anfallen werde.
translated_de: The move will lead to a special discharge of around USD 2,7 billion, which will be imposed on the four-quateral.

en: The reduction of 55,000 jobs which has been taking place for three years is not yet completed.
de: Der seit drei Jahren laufende Abbau von 55.000 Jobs ist noch nicht abgeschlossen.
translated_de: The 55,000 jobs have been re-built for three years.

en: At the end of the 2013/14 business year HP still employed around 302,000 staff.
de: HP beschäftigte zum Ende des Geschäftsjahres 2013/14 noch rund 302.000 Mitarbeiter.
translated_de: HP has already employed around 302.000 people for the last 14 years.

en: At the end of trading Hewlett-Packard shares had fallen by 2.3 percent.
de: Nachbörslich gab die Hewlett-Packard-Aktie 2,3 Prozent nach.
translated_de: The Hewlett Packard Act was 2%.

en: The group based in Palo Alto, California, which initially grew through its printer sales, is currently splitting its business: this year the computer and printer side will be combined in a new company, separated from the the promising areas of computer servers and data storage for business as well as other services.
de: Der mit Druckern großgewordene Konzern aus dem kalifornischen Palo Alto spaltet sich derzeit auf: So soll das Computer- und Druckergeschäft noch heuer in einer neuen Gesellschaft gebündelt werden - getrennt von den zukunftsträchtigeren Bereichen mit Computerservern und Datenspeichern für Firmen sowie den sonstigen Dienstleistungen.
translated_de: The large-scale printing company in the Kalifornia is now focusing on: so the computer and printing business will continue to be consolidated in a new society - separated from the most advanced areas of computer servers and data storage for companies and other services.

en: Both operations will be listed on the stock exchange.
de: Beide Geschäftsteile sollen an der Börse notiert werden.
translated_de: Both parties should be notified to the Börse.

en: Repeatedly disappointing sales of PCs as well as a slow demand from business customers for their services have recently afflicted the world's second-largest PC manufacturer after Lenovo.
de: Ein erneut enttäuschender PC-Absatz sowie eine schwächere Nachfrage von Firmenkunden nach seinen Dienstleistungen setzten dem weltweit zweitgrößten PC-Hersteller nach Lenovo zuletzt zu.
translated_de: The new entrant in the PC market and the weaker demand from corporate clients to provide its services have led to Lenovo' s second largest PC-Hersteller in the world.

en: In the third fiscal quarter to the end of July, sales of PCs and printers fell by 11.5 percent.
de: Im dritten Geschäftsquartal zu Ende Juli ging der Absatz von PC und Druckern um 11,5 Prozent zurück.
translated_de: In the third quarter of July, the percentage of PC and printers was reduced to 11,5%.

en: Revenue dropped by eight percent to just under $25.4 billion.
de: Der Umsatz fiel um 8 Prozent auf knapp 25,4 Mrd. Dollar.
translated_de: The sales were up to 8 percent, compared to just 25,4 Mrd. Dollar.

en: This means profits have dropped in 15 out of 16 quarters.
de: Damit gingen die Erlöse in 15 von 16 Quartalen zurück.
translated_de: This has re-opened the stricken in 15 of 16 Quartals.

en: HP responded to the changes in the industry with a split and massive layoffs.
de: HP antwortet mit einer Aufspaltung und massiven Stellenstreichungen auf den Wandel in der Branche.
translated_de: HP sprang with a spliff and massive vacancy in the branch.

en: The 76-year-old business headed by Meg Whitman has been slow to react to the rise in customers buying smartphones and tablets instead of conventional computers and equally carrying out business more and more online.
de: Das 76 Jahre alte Unternehmen unter der Führung von Meg Whitman hat erst spät darauf reagiert, dass Kunden verstärkt Smartphones und Tablets statt herkömmlichen Computern kaufen und immer mehr Geschäfte gleich online erledigen.
translated_de: The 76 years old company under Meg Whitman' s leadership has reacted late to the fact that customers are increasingly buying smartphones and tablets instead of herkömmling computers and increasingly launching online business.

en: Whitman's plans for restructuring include around 55,000 job losses.
de: Whitmans Restrukturierungspläne sehen insgesamt den Abbau von rund 55.000 Stellen vor.
translated_de: Whitman' s restructuring plans see total demolition of around 55,000 jobs.

en: Conflicts: the majority support anti ISIS training mission
de: Konflikte: Mehrheit unterstützt die Anti-IS-Ausbildungsmission
translated_de: Conflicts: Majority supports the anti-IS education initiative

en: The majority of people, however, are opposed to direct involvement of German soldiers in combat operations in Iraq: 54 percent were against it, 35 percent have expressed themselves in favour.
de: Eine direkte Beteiligung deutscher Soldaten an Kampfhandlungen im Irak würde aber überwiegend auf Ablehnung stoßen: 54 Prozent sprachen sich dagegen aus, 35 Prozent zeigten sich zustimmend.
translated_de: A direct participation of German Soldaten to combat negotiations in Iraq would however be a major issue: 54 percent of respondents are against, 35 percent are voted.

en: Sixty-one percent reacted positively to other countries carrying out air attacks against ISIS in Iraq and Syria.
de: Dass andere Staaten Luftangriffe gegen den IS im Irak und in Syrien fliegen, finden 61 Prozent positiv.
translated_de: The other countries which have been able to take air traffic against IS in Iraq and Syria are 61 percent positive.

en: Twenty-four percent are against intervening in the conflict.
de: 24 Prozent sind dagegen, in den Konflikt einzugreifen.
translated_de: 24 % of those who are against the conflict are concerned.

en: Fifty-one percent of those surveyed are against cooperating with the Syrian ruler Bashar al-Assad, but 20 percent were in favour.
de: Eine Zusammenarbeit mit dem syrischen Machthaber Baschar al-Assad lehnen 51 Prozent der Befragten ab, 20 Prozent wären dafür.
translated_de: A collaboration with Syria' s Baschar al-Assad has slowed 51 per cent of the questions, 20 per cent would be the reason for this.

en: Twenty-nine percent were undecided.
de: 29 Prozent konnten sich nicht entscheiden.
translated_de: 29 % of respondents were not able to decide.

en: Cars: Second press day at the 66th IAA
de: Auto: Zweiter Pressetag auf der 66. IAA
translated_de: Auto: Two-page press report on the 66. IAA

en: At the centre of the exhibition until 27 September are interlinked, self driving cars as well as electro-mobility.
de: Im Mittelpunkt der Messe stehen bis zum 27. September vernetzte, selbstfahrende Autos sowie die Elektromobilität.
translated_de: The focus of the meeting is on network, auto-autos and electric mobility until 27 September.

en: After two press days, Chancellor Angela Merkel will officially open the 66th International Automobile Exhibition, whose motto is "Mobility Connects", on Thursday.
de: Nach zwei Pressetagen wird Bundeskanzlerin Angela Merkel die 66. Internationale Automobil-Ausstellung unter dem Motto "Mobilität verbindet" am Donnerstag offiziell eröffnen.
translated_de: The German National Assembly, in two press conferences, will be holding the 66th International Automobile Expo under the motto "Mobility combines" at the Donnerstag.

en: The general public can visit the IAA from Saturday.
de: Das breite Publikum kann die IAA von Samstag an besuchen.
translated_de: The large public can visit the IAA on Saturday.

en: The organisers from the automobile Association VDA estimate that approximately 900,000 visitors, similar to 2 years ago, will attend.
de: Die Veranstalter vom Auto-Verband VDA rechnen wie vor zwei Jahren mit etwa 900 000 Besuchern.
translated_de: The event organizers of the VDA Auto-Verband have a maximum of 900 000 visitors in two years.

en: Röszke: outbreak of violence on the Serbian-Hungarian border
de: Röszke: Gewaltausbruch an serbisch-ungarischer Grenze
translated_de: Rössland: Gewalttampon an serbisch-ungarischen Grenze

en: The Hungarian police have used tear gas and water cannons against several hundred angry refugees on the Serbian border near Röszke.
de: Die ungarische Polizei hat an der serbischen Grenze bei Röszke Tränengas und Wasserwerfer gegen mehrere hundert aufgebrachte Flüchtlinge eingesetzt.
translated_de: The ungarish police have deployed hundreds of refugees to the serb border at the Tränengas and water reservoirs.

en: Euronews correspondent Dániel Bozsik witnessed the outbreak of violence at the border control point.
de: Euronews-Korrespondent Dániel Bozsik hat den Gewaltausbruch am Grenzkontrollpunkt miterlebt.
translated_de: Euronews correspondent Dániel Bozsik has resisted the violence crisis at the border control point.

en: He reported by telephone:
de: Er berichtete telefonisch:
translated_de: He was reported on telephone:

en: A group of refugees broke through the border.
de: Eine Gruppe von Flüchtlingen durchbrach die Grenze.
translated_de: A group of refugees crossed the border.

en: A line of police was formed behind it and behind the police a water cannon stood at the ready.
de: Dahinter hatte sich eine Polizeilinie formiert und hinter den Polizisten stand ein Wasserwerfer bereit.
translated_de: In the meantime, a police line was formed and the policemen were able to supply water.

en: Between 40 and 50 refugees started to throw stones, sticks and plastic bottles at the officers.
de: 40 bis 50 Flüchtlinge begannen mit Steinen, Stöcken und Plastikflaschen nach den Beamten zu werfen.
translated_de: 40 to 50 refugees began to throw stones, socks and plastic bottles to the officials.

en: At first the officers used a continuous spray of pepper spray.
de: Die Beamten setzten zunächst ununterbrochen Pfefferspray ein.
translated_de: The officials have a slap on the head.

en: Then the police used tear gas.
de: Danach benutzte die Polizei Tränengas.
translated_de: The police are using the tinnas.

en: A lot of tear gas was sprayed in the direction of the refugees.
de: Viel Tränengas wurde in Richtung der Flüchtlinge versprüht.
translated_de: Many Tränengas travelled towards refugees.

en: This caused the group to break up.
de: Damit wurde die Gruppe aufgelöst.
translated_de: This group has been dissolved.

en: The group has now reluctantly withdrawn.
de: Die Flüchtlinge haben sich jetzt abwartend etwas zurückgezogen.
translated_de: The refugees have now returned some.

en: A pregnant and obviously injured woman has been carried away from the area.
de: Eine schwangere und offenbar verletzte Frau wurde aus der Zone weggetragen.
translated_de: The situation has been awash and, evidently, a breach of the law.

en: Children who have inhaled tear gas are screaming.
de: Kinder, die das Tränengas eingeatmet hatten, schrien.
translated_de: Children who had been able to enter the Tränengas are stricken.

en: Other refugees have slumped down together and are suffering from respiratory distress.
de: Andere Flüchtlinge sackten in sich zusammen und litten unter Atemnot.
translated_de: Others are sacking together and lit under atemnot.

en: The press spokesman for the Serbian police also sustained injuries from the use of tear gas and pepper spray.
de: Auch die Pressesprecher der serbischen Polizei erlitten Verletzungen durch den Einsatz von Tränengas und Pfefferspray.
translated_de: The press spokeswoman for the serb police also erlits a series of crimes by using tins and pfeffers.

en: Decision time on interest rates for US Federal Reserve
de: Zeit der Entscheidung über Zinssätze für die US-Notenbank
translated_de: Time for the decision on Zinssätze for the USNote Bank

en: The world is watching as the US Federal Reserve meets over two days on Wednesday and Thursday, to take the crucial decision on whether or not to raise interest rates for the first time in nearly a decade.
de: Die Welt beobachtet, wenn die US-Notenbank an zwei Tagen, am Mittwoch und Donnerstag, zusammenkommt, um die wichtige Entscheidung zu treffen, ob zum ersten Mal seit fast einem Jahrzehnt die Zinsen angehoben werden oder nicht.
translated_de: The world should be concerned when the USNote Bank meets at two days, on Wednesday and Thursday, to make the important decision, whether or not the Zins are increased or not, at the first time since a year.

en: A survey of 80 economists polled by Reuters found a little over half who only last week thought the Fed would go for it, now think it will hold fire a bit longer and keep rates at the current 0-0.25 percent range.
de: Eine Umfrage unter 80 Ökonomen, die von Reuters befragt wurden, fand heraus, dass ein wenig mehr als die Hälfte, die noch letzte Woche der Ansicht war, dass die Fed dies tun werde, jetzt denkt, dass die Fed noch etwas länger verharren wird und die Zinssätze auf dem jetzigen Stand von 0 - 0,25 Prozent halten werde.
translated_de: A question raised by Reuters was that a little more than the half of the time, which was the last week, that the Fed will be doing, now thinks that the Fed will be doing more and that the Zins will be a little longer and that the current rate will be 0 - 0,25 %.

en: It's a historical event because it's been seven years since the Fed cut rates to zero.
de: Es ist ein historisches Ereignis, weil es sieben Jahre her ist, seit die Fed Zinsen auf NULL setzte.
translated_de: It is a historical event because it has been seven years since the Fed Zinse has been set to NULL.

en: For the first time we are approaching a situation where a major central bank might be able to get out of the zero bar and start a process of normalization of interest rates," said Angel Ubide, senior fellow at the Peterson Institute for International Economics.
de: "Zum ersten Mal nähern wir uns einer Situation, in der eine große Zentralbank möglicherweise den Null-Bereich verlässt und einen Prozess der Normalisierung der Zinssätze startet", sagte Angel Ubide, Leitender Mitarbeiter am Peterson Institute for International Economics.
translated_de: "First of all, we are approaching a situation where a large central bank could be able to create the Null-Bench and start a process of normalisation of Zinssätze", a spokeswoman for the Peterson Institute for International Economics, Angel Ubide.

en: The US economy has been performing relatively well, the recovery adding trillions of dollars to the balance sheet and generating little inflation.
de: Die US-Wirtschaft ist auf einem relativ guten Leistungsstand, Billionen Dollar werden zur Bilanz hinzugefügt und generieren nur eine geringe Inflation.
translated_de: The US economy is in a relatively good position, Billions Dollar will add to the balance and generate only a small inflation.

en: However the Fed cannot ignore the less rosy global outlook.
de: Jedoch kann die Fed den weniger rosigen Ausblick auf globale Verhältnisse nicht ignorieren.
translated_de: However, the Fed can not ignore the less rosy view of global relations.

en: It has warned markets to be ready for a hike but indications are they also believe the odds are against such a move.
de: Sie hat die Märkte gewarnt, sich auf eine Erhöhung einzustellen, aber die Anzeichen deuten darauf hin, dass die Chancen gegen einen solchen Schritt gut sind.
translated_de: You have warned the Märks to make a point, but the signs indicate that the chances are good for a such step.

en: The decision is due to be announced at 20.00 CET on Thursday.
de: Die Entscheidung soll um 20.00 Uhr MEZ am Donnerstag bekanntgegeben werden
translated_de: The decision will be announced at 20 p.m. on the Donnerstag

en: Delta State University shooter left note of apology
de: Todesschütze an der Delta State University hinterließ Entschuldigungsschreiben
translated_de: Todesschützes an American State University in Delta have thrown out the case

en: After shooting and killing his girlfriend in Mississippi on Monday morning - and before he shot and killed his colleague later that day - Shannon Lamb wrote a note to say that he was "sorry" for the first murder and wished he "could take it back," authorities revealed Tuesday.
de: Nach dem Erschießen und Töten seiner Freundin in Mississippi am Montag Morgen - und bevor er später am Tag seinen Kollegen erschoss und tötete - schrieb Shannon Lamb eine Notiz, um zu sagen, dass es ihm "leid tue" bei dem ersten Mord und wollte, "er könne es ungeschehen machen," gaben Behörden am Dienstag bekannt.
translated_de: After the Erschießen and Töten' s friend in Mississippi, Monday morning - and before he was shot and killed by his colleagues - Shannon Lamb wrote a note to say that he "had a good time" at the first mord and wanted to "make it unreal" - the authorities said on Tuesday.

en: Police in Gautier, Miss. said Lamb, a geography and social science education instructor at Delta State University, called 911 around 10 a.m.
de: Die Polizei in Gautier, Mississippi, sagte, dass Lamb, Dozent für Geographie und Sozialwissenschaftliche Bildung an der Delta State University, die Notrufnummer gegen 10:00 am Montag Vormittag anrief
translated_de: The police in Gautier, Mississippi, said that Lamb, a Dozent for Geographic and Social Science, an American State University, has issued a call to the President at 10:00 am Monday.

en: Monday and said he had shot and killed someone.
de: und sagte, er habe auf jemand geschossen und jemand getötet.
translated_de: And I said that he had a shot at someone and a shot at him.

en: Lamb told the dispatcher that police needed to send officers over to his home.
de: Lamb sagte dem Mitarbeiter der Notrufzentrale, dass die Polizei Polizisten zu seinem Zuhause schicken müsse.
translated_de: Lamb said the staff of the Notrufzentrale that police officers should send them to their home.

en: He said "I shot my wife last night" and also mentioned that there is a "sweet dog" in the house that is "not going to bother anyone" but is likely upset.
de: Er sagte, "Ich erschoss meine Frau gestern Abend" und er erwähnte auch, dass ein "süßer Hund" im Haus sei, der aber "niemand stören wird", aber wahrscheinlich aufgeregt sein wird.
translated_de: I said, "I shot my Mrs yesterday evening" and I mentioned that a "seventh Hund" in House would be a "niemand stör" but it would probably be a 'niemand'.

en: Police asked the caller his name, but he didn't give it.
de: Die Polizei fragte den Anrufer nach seinem Namen, aber er gab ihn nicht.
translated_de: Police asked the caller to his name, but he did not.

en: Lamb did not provide an explanation for the shooting.
de: Lamb gab keine Erklärung für seine Schüsse.
translated_de: Lamb has not made any declaration for his Schüsses.

en: When police got to the scene they found the body of Amy Prentiss, 41, and a handwritten note from Lamb, 45, that said: "I am so sorry I wish I could take it back.
de: Als Polizei die Szene betrat, fanden sie den Körper von Amy Prentiss, 41, und eine handschriftliche Notiz von Lamb, 45, die besagte: "Mir tut es so leid, ich wollte, ich könnte es rückgängig machen.
translated_de: Police officers were able to re-evaluate the body of Amy Prentiss, 41, and a handwritten note of Lamb, 45, which said: "I wanted to make it so much easier.

en: I loved Amy and she is the only person who ever loved me.
de: Ich liebte Amy, und sie ist die einzige Frau, die mich jemals liebte".
translated_de: I love Amy and she is the only woman who I love.

en: After writing the note, Lamb drove 300 miles to Delta State where he killed Ethan Schmidt, a history professor, before eventually taking his own life late Monday as cops closed in.
de: Nach dem Schreiben der Notiz fuhr Lamb 300 Meilen zur Delta State University, wo er Ethan Schmidt, einen Professor für Geschichte, tötete, bevor er schließlich sein eigenes Leben am Montag Abend nahm, als Polizisten ihn umzingelten.
translated_de: The Notiz letter sent Lamb 300 millets to the Delta State University where Ethan Schmidt, a historian, threw his own life before he finally took his own life on Monday evening as a political figure.

en: University President William LaForge said he didn't know of any conflict between Lamb and Schmidt but "obviously there was something in Mr. Lamb's mind."
de: Universitäts-Präsident William LaForge sagte, er wisse nichts von einem Konflikt zwischen Lamb und Schmidt, aber "natürlich gab es etwas in Mr Lambs Vorstellung."
translated_de: Mr President of the University of Texas, William LaForge, said that it does not mean a conflict between Lamb and Schmidt, but that "natürally there was something in Mr Lamb' s view."

en: Despite reports Monday that Lamb allegedly believed Prentiss was also romantically involved with Schmidt, authorities said Tuesday that there was "no information, no evidence" of a "love triangle."
de: Trotz Berichten am Montag, das Lamb angeblich glaubte, dass Prentiss auch mit Schmidt eine Beziehung hatte, sagten Behörden am Dienstag, es gebe "keine Informationen, keine Beweise" für eine "Dreiecksbeziehung".
translated_de: In spite of the reports made by the Montag, Lamb apologises for the fact that Prentiss also had a relationship with Schmidt, the authorities said on Tuesday that it is "informed, no evidence" for a "dreieck relationship".

en: Prentiss was described as a "good person" by Shawn O'Steen, who said he had been married to her for about seven years.
de: Prentiss wurde von Shawn O'Steen, der aussagte, dass sie ungefähr sieben Jahre verheiratet waren, als ein "guter Mensch" beschrieben.
translated_de: Prentiss was written by Shawn O'Steen, who said that they were heiratets of approximately seven years, as a "good person".

en: The two divorced 15 years ago, but remained friends.
de: Die beiden wurden vor 15 Jahren geschieden, blieben aber Freunde.
translated_de: The two were taken over 15 years ago but they were still friends.

en: O'Steen said he and Prentiss had a daughter, who is 19, and she was "devastated."
de: O'Steen sagte, er und Prentiss hätten eine Tochter, die 19 ist, und sie sei "am Boden zerstört".
translated_de: O'Steen said that he and Prentiss had a daughter, which is 19 and that they were "zerstört" on soil.

en: He said Prentiss and her daughter were "absolutely best friends."
de: Er sagte, dass Prentiss ihre Tochter "absolut beste Freunde" waren.
translated_de: He said that Prentiss' daughter was "absolutely best friends".

en: Prentiss worked an online job from her home, according to Linsday Knowles, identified as a close friend of Prentiss by the Sun Herald.
de: Prentiss arbeitete online von zu Hause, nach Aussage von Linsday Knowles, die vom Sun Herald als eine enge Freundin von Prentiss identifiziert wurde.
translated_de: Prentiss has been working online from home, according to Linsday Knowles, which was identified by the Sun Herald as a friend of Prentiss.

en: Knowles said Prentiss, who had a hound dog named Lightning, had been dating Lamb for about three years.
de: Knowles sagte, dass Prentiss, die einen Hund namens Lightning besaß, sich seit ungefähr drei Jahren mit Lamb traf.
translated_de: Knowles said that the prentiss, which has a Hundred - Lightning, has been trafing Lamb for around three years.

en: "She always wanted to help other people," Knowles said.
de: "Sie wollte immer anderen Menschen helfen", sagte Knowles
translated_de: "You wanted to help others immersively", said Knowles

en: Police said Lamb had phoned relatives at some point Monday to tell them "he's not going to jail."
de: Die Polizei sagte, Lamb habe Verwandte zu einem bestimmten Zeitpunkt am Montag angerufen, um ihnen zu sagen, "er gehe nicht ins Gefängnis".
translated_de: Police said Lamb had been summoned to a certain time on Monday to say "he is not in the saviour of the people".

en: When cops caught up with him on Highway 1 near Greenville later that night, Lamb pulled his car over, bailed out on foot, ran into the woods and shot and killed himself.
de: Als Polizisten ihn auf dem Highway 1 in der Nähe von Greenville später in dieser Nacht einholten, fuhr Lamb sein Auto zur Seite, floh zu Fuß, lief in den Wald und tötete sich selbst mit einem Schuss.
translated_de: As police officers walked on the Highway 1 in the vicinity of Greenville, Lamb drove to the side of the road, floated to the ground, lied in the forest and threw himself in a shoe.

en: Lamb received a doctorate in education from Delta State in the spring of 2015, according to his resume posted on the university's website.
de: Lamb erhielt im Frühjahr 2015 von der Delta State University einen Doktortitel, wie sein Lebenslau auf der Website der Universität angibt.
translated_de: Lamb received a Doktortitel in the spring 2015 of the Delta State University, as its life-long title was on the University' s website.

en: Stars who lost their mojo
de: Stars, die ihren Glücksbringer verloren haben
translated_de: Stars who lost their happiness

en: The actor (left), pictured with his son Redmond (right), has had a stressful few years.
de: Der Schauspieler (links), im Bild mit seinem Sohn Redmond (rechts), hatte einige stressige Jahre.
translated_de: The Schauspieler (links), in the image of his son Redmond (right), had some stressing years.

en: In 2001, he battled leukemia, and in 2009, he lost long-time partner, Farrah Fawcett, to cancer.
de: In 2001 kämpfte er gegen Leukämie, und im Jahr 2009 verlor er seine langjährige Partnerin, Farrah Fawcett, wegen Krebs.
translated_de: In 2001, he was fighting against malaria and in 2009, he was a long-time partner, Farrah Fawcett, because of cancer.

de: Der Schauspieler hat auch angeblich mit Drogen zu kämpfen, und im Jahr 2008 wurde er wegen Drogenbesitzes verurteilt.

en: All that stuff sure does take a toll.

en: Eurowings: Lufthansa reconstructing group
de: Eurowings: Lufthansa baut den Konzern um
translated_de: Eurowings: Lufthansa builds the company

en: Lufthansa is planning a major reconstruction of its group.
de: Die Lufthansa plant einen großen Konzernumbau.
translated_de: The Lufthansa plant has a large group building.

en: The Lufthansa group will save half a billion Euros per year through improvements to the organisation alone.
de: Eine halbe Milliarde Euro im Jahr will der Lufthansa-Konzern allein mit einer besseren Organisation sparen.
translated_de: A half billion Euro will be saved by the Lufthansa Group in the year alone with a better organisation.

en: Reconstruction of the group will cost 150 of the approximately 1,000 managers worldwide their jobs.
de: 150 der weltweit rund 1000 Führungskräfte wird der Konzernumbau den Arbeitsplatz kosten.
translated_de: 150 of the world' s around 1000 leaders will cost the company' s job market.

en: Meanwhile new negotiations are being carried out with the pilots' union.
de: Mit der Pilotengewerkschaft gibt es indes neue Verhandlungen.
translated_de: The pilotage work has created new negotiations.

en: Lufthansa is reorganising the structure of its business and upgrading its low-cost subsidiary Eurowings.
de: Die Lufthansa baut ihre Unternehmensstruktur um und wertet die Billigtochter Eurowings auf.
translated_de: The Lufthansa built its corporate structure and rated the Billigtochter Eurowings.

en: The goal of the realignment is a contribution to profits of around €500 million per year from cost and revenue synergies, the airline announced on Wednesday.
de: Ziel der Neuausrichtung sei ein Ergebnisbeitrag von rund 500 Millionen Euro pro Jahr aus Kosten- und Erlössynergien, teilte die Fluggesellschaft am Mittwoch mit.
translated_de: The new direction is a result of a total of EUR EUR 500 million per year, which is part of the airline' s budget and emissions.

en: Among other things, Lufthansa in the future will have no executive board for the passenger business.
de: Unter anderem gibt es bei der Lufthansa künftig keinen Vorstand mehr für das Passagiergeschäft.
translated_de: There is also no more board in the aviation industry in the future for the Passagier business.

en: The Eurowings budget airline will instead be developed to become as independent as possible.
de: Die Billigfluglinie Eurowings solle dafür so eigenständig wie möglich entwickelt werden.
translated_de: The Billig Airline Eurowings should be so eigentiful as possible.

en: In the future, Karl Ulrich Garnadt will be responsible for Eurowings on the management board headed by Carsten Spohr.
de: Im Vorstandsteam um Chef Carsten Spohr werde künftig Karl Ulrich Garnadt für Eurowings verantwortlich sein.
translated_de: The Chairman of the Board, Chef Carsten Spohr, will be responsible for Karl Ulrich Garnadt for Eurowings.

en: With this new realignment Spohr underlines the importance of Eurowings, with which the group wants to compete against Ryanair and Easyjet in the future.
de: Mit der Neuaufstellung unterstreicht Spohr die Bedeutung von Eurowings, mit der der Konzern künftig gegen Ryanair und Easyjet antreten will.
translated_de: With the new report, Spohr highlights the importance of Eurowings, with the company launching in the future against Ryanair and Easyjet.

en: Up to now the organisation of the 120,000 employees has been extremely complex.
de: Bislang war die Organisation des 120 000 Mitarbeiter starken Unternehmens komplex.
translated_de: The organisation of 120 000 employees was a complex business.

en: The airline is consolidating the passenger airline group, which provides three quarters of the annual turnover of €30 billion, under one umbrella.
de: Die Fluglinien firmierten unter dem Dach der Passage Airline Gruppe, die drei Viertel des Jahresumsatz von 30 Milliarden Euro stellt.
translated_de: The airlines are positioned under the Passage Airline Group, which represents a quarter of the annual budget of EUR 30 billion.

en: New negotiations with pilots
de: Neue Verhandlungen mit den Piloten
translated_de: New negotiations with pilots

en: Following the strike which was halted on legal grounds, negotiations with the pilots' union Cockpit (VC) in the pay dispute will be resumed on Thursday.
de: Im Tarifkonflikt mit der Pilotenvereinigung Cockpit (VC) sollen die Verhandlungen nach dem gerichtlich gestoppten Streik an diesem Donnerstag wieder aufgenommen werden.
translated_de: The negotiations should be re-opened after the court order in this Donnerstag.

en: This was announced by the union.
de: Das teilte die Gewerkschaft mit.
translated_de: The work is part of the work.

en: Under discussion will be the pilots' retirement scheme.
de: Thema der Gespräche soll die Ruhestandsregelung für Piloten sein.
translated_de: The issue of the discussions should be the rule of the pause zone for pilots.

en: "In a year with record results predicted" Cockpit wants to come up with a viable solution as quickly as possible
de: Cockpit wolle "in einem Jahr mit einem prognostizierten Rekordergebnis" schnellstmöglich zu tragfähigen Ergebnissen kommen.
translated_de: The cockpit is now able to reach a rapid, stable result "in one year with a prognostic result" which is a good indicator of the results.

en: The conflict between the union and the airline had led to a number of strikes over the past months.
de: Der Konflikt zwischen Gewerkschaft und Airline führte in den vergangenen Monaten zu diversen Streiks.
translated_de: The conflict between work and airlines has led to a number of problems in the last few months.

en: Besides the pilots' transitional pension payments, the background is the "Wings" budget concept.
de: Hintergrund ist neben der Übergangsversorgung der Piloten das Sparkonzept "Wings".
translated_de: The background is the Spare Plan, which is a 'wing' approach, which is a part of the pilot's transitional supply.

en: It proposes that in the battle against competitive routes Lufthansa outsources to the group's own budget airline, Eurowings.
de: Es sieht vor, dass die Lufthansa im Kampf gegen Wettbewerber Strecken an die konzerneigene Billiglinie Eurowings auslagert.
translated_de: It is also possible that the airhansa will be able to defend its competitors' routes against the consolidated Billig Line Eurowings.

en: Paintings by Leena Krüger are on view in the Künstlerhaus under the title "Morning Train to the South".
de: Unter dem Titel "Morgenzug in den Süden" sind Gemälde von Leena Krüger im Künstlerhaus zu sehen.
translated_de: The title "Morgenzug in the South" shows the Gemalde of Leena Krüger in the artist house.

en: The Finn, who has long been a resident of Göttingen, has assembled a selection of untitled works, which encourage viewers to embark on an intellectual journey, for the Weisser Saal in the gallery.
de: Die schon lange in Göttingen ansässige Finnin hat für den Weißen Saal des Hauses eine Auswahl titelloser Arbeiten zusammengestellt, welche ihre Betrachter animieren, sich gedanklich auf Reise zu begeben.
translated_de: The Finnish, who has been in Göttingen for a long time, has created a selection of documents which are animated by their viewers on a trip to the White Saal of the House.

en: Manchester United's Luke Shaw out for months with double fracture
de: Luke Shaw von Manchester United kann monatelang wegen doppelter Fraktur nicht spielen
translated_de: Luke Shaw of Manchester United cannot play a role in double-flagure

en: Luke Shaw suffered a double fracture of his right leg during Manchester United's Champions League defeat at PSV Eindhoven.
de: Luke Shaw erlitt bei der Champions-League-Niederlage von Manchester beim PSV Eindhoven eine doppelte Fraktur seines rechten Beins.
translated_de: Luke Shaw erlitt in the Champions League of Manchester at PSV Eindhoven a double-female slur.

en: While this left the full-back in tears and will rule him out for at least six months, Louis van Gaal remains hopeful Shaw could play again this season.
de: Während dies den linken Außenverteidiger zum Weinen brachte und ihn für mindestens sechs Monate vom Spielen ausschließen wird, gibt Louis van Gaal die Hoffnung nicht auf, dass Shaw wieder in dieser Saison spielen kann.
translated_de: During the time the link between the foreign defense and the wine industry has been brought and he will be able to play for at least six months, Louis van Gaal is hoping that Shaw will be able to play again in this season.

en: The injury was caused by a reckless tackle from Héctor Moreno in the 15th minute after the 20-year-old Shaw had burst into the PSV area.
de: Die Verletzung wurde durch einen rücksichtslosen Angriff von Héctor Moreno in der 15. Minute verursacht, nachdem der 20 Jahre alte Shaw in den PSV-Bereich eingebrochen war.
translated_de: The re-assailment was caused by a re-assailable attack by Héctor Moreno in the 15 minute period, after which the 20 years old Shaw in the PSV-Bereich was abused.

en: He had nine minutes of treatment on the pitch and required oxygen before being taken to hospital.
de: Er wurde neun Minuten auf dem Spielfeld behandelt und benötigte Sauerstoff, bevor er ins Krankenhaus gebracht wurde.
translated_de: The new minutes were spent on the field and the Sauerstoff was needed before he was brought to hospital.

en: Van Gaal said: "He has a double leg fracture and is in hospital."
de: Van Gaal sagte: "Er hat eine doppelte Beinfraktur und liegt im Krankenhaus."
translated_de: Van Gaal said: "It has a double famine and is located in hospital."

en: He will be transferred tomorrow or maybe a day later and then operated on in Manchester.
de: Er wird morgen oder vielleicht einen Tag später verlegt und dann in Manchester operiert.
translated_de: It will be a day or perhaps a day later and then a day later in Manchester.

en: It is awful - a boy who comes to Manchester United at 18, has it very difficult and then plays fantastically and then this happens.
de: Es ist schrecklich - ein Junge, der mit 18 zu Manchester United kommt, es sehr schwer hat und dann fantastisch spielt, und dann geschieht das.
translated_de: It is a shame - a young boy who has 18 at Manchester United, is very hard to play and then fantasise and then happens.

en: When it was in the dressing room he had an oxygen mask on.
de: In der Umkleidekabine hatte er eine Sauerstoffmaske auf.
translated_de: In the tassel, he had a sulfatemaske.

en: He was crying.
de: Er weinte.
translated_de: I am a little confused.

en: I am not a doctor but when you have a double fracture it is six months and he will not play in the group phase.

en: Adam Lyth was clearly at risk of England omission but it's still tough

en: David Cameron's half-baked renegotiation strategy for keeping Britain in the EU gets deeper into trouble with every day that passes, even without the election of genial Jeremy "Is it Yes or No?" Corbyn to the Labour leadership, or the TUC cutting up rough over Europe on Tuesday.
de: David Camerons unausgegorene Neuverhandlungs-Strategie, um Großbritannien in der EU zu halten, wird mit jedem Tag tiefer in Schwierigkeiten geraten, selbst ohne die Wahl des genialen Jeremy "Ist es Ja oder Nein?" Corbyn zum Führer von Labour oder der TUC, die sich wegen Europa am Dienstag heftig zerstritt.
translated_de: David Cameron' s unabdinging new negotiations strategy, to keep Britain in the EU, will be in a deep crisis every day without the choice of the genial Jeremy Corbyn, who is a leader of Labour or the TUC, who is stepping down for Europe on Tuesday.

en: Foreigners have their Corbyns and Nigel Farages too.
de: Ausländer haben auch ihre Corbyns und Nigel Farages.
translated_de: The countries also have their Corbyns and Nigel Farages.

en: A European diplomat chum explained the other day that, sunk in assorted crises as the EU is - not all of their own making - some member states are fed up with Britain's self-absorbed agenda of divisive concessions and disruptive treaty changes which they mostly don't want.
de: Ein europäischer Diplomatenfreund sagte neulich, dass einige Mitgliedsstaaten, so tief verstrickt in verschiedene Krisen, wie die EU es nun mal ist und nicht immer aus eigener Schuld, Großbritanniens selbst erstellte Agenda mit gespaltenen Zugeständnissen und störenden Vertragsänderungen, die sie meistens nicht möchten, satt sind.
translated_de: A European diplomat has said that some Member States, so deeply stumbling in different crises, such as the EU is now mal and not always from their own schools, have created a comprehensive agenda with spherical concessions and stumbling amendments which they most do not want to do.

en: In Brighton for its annual bean, the TUC decided it didn't want them either if they eroded social protection.
de: In Brighton entschied die TUC auf ihrer Jahresversammlung, dass es diese auch nicht mag, wenn sie den sozialen Schutz gefährden.
translated_de: Brighton has agreed to the TUC on its annual meeting that it does not have any powers when it is concerned with social protection.

en: We could even call it Dave and George's selfie agenda.
de: Wir könnten es auch Dave und Georges Selfie-Agenda nennen.
translated_de: We could also name Dave and Georges Selfie-Agenda.

en: PM and chancellor rock up to summits or bilateral sessions in foreign capitals, take a photo of themselves in front of a famous local monument, with or without local grandee, then come home and say they are winning allies for reform.
de: Premierminister und Finanzminister klettern auf Gipfeltreffen oder bilaterale Sitzungen in ausländischen Hauptstädten, machen ein Foto von sich vor einem berühmten lokalen Denkmal, mit oder ohne lokale Größen, kommen dann nach Hause und sagen, dass sie Verbündete für Reformen gewinnen.
translated_de: Premier and Finance Ministers write letters on summits or bilateral meetings in foreign capitals, and they make a photo of themselves in a famous local town with or without local size, then to the House and say that they are gaining a parliamentary vote for reform.

en: It's all about me.
de: Es geht immer um mich.
translated_de: I always want to do this.

en: My European pal, who wants an outward-looking Britain inside the EU tent - "Don't leave us alone with France," says Berlin - suggests that more short-sighted ministers and officials in some capitals have got to the point where they don't care whether we stay or leave.
de: Mein europäischer Freund, der ein nach draußen blickendes Großbritannien im Inneren des EU-Zeltes wünscht - "Lass uns nicht allein mit Frankreich", sagt Berlin - und lässt durchblicken, dass mehr und mehr kurzsichtige Minister und Beamte in einigen Hauptstädten bis zu dem Punkt gekommen sind, an dem es ihnen egal ist, ob wir bleiben oder gehen.
translated_de: My European friend, who is a spokesman for the European Union, who is a spokesman for the European Union, 'we are not only talking with France', says Berlin, and who is a spokesman for the European Union, has seen that there are more and more short-sighted Ministers and officials in some major cities to come to the point where they are equal, whether we remain or we are going to go.

en: Angela Merkel, Germany's cautiously level-headed chancellor, is an ally, but has been in power for 10 years and wants to leave office before it goes bad for her, as it did for overstayers Thatcher (11 years), Mitterrand (14) and Kohl (16).
de: Deutschlands vorsichtig besonnene Kanzlerin Angela Merkel ist eine Verbündete, aber sie ist seit 10 Jahren an der Macht und will das Amt verlassen, bevor es schlecht für sie aussieht, wie es bei den übertrieben lang Ausharrenden wie Thatcher (11 Jahre), Mitterrand (14) und Kohl (16) geschehen ist.
translated_de: Germany' s s most recent Kanzlerin Angela Merkel is a spokesman, but she has been a leader since 10 years and will leave the Amt, before it is too bad for her to be able to do so in the past, such as Thatcher (11 years), Mitterrand (14) and Kohl (16).

en: France's François Hollande is facing re-election or replacement in 2017.
de: Frankreichs François Hollande blickt auf seine Wiederwahl oder seine Ersetzung im Jahr 2017.
translated_de: France' s François Hollande is preparing for his return or a resolution in 2017.

en: He is a fading force too.
de: Er ist auch eine verblassende Kraft.
translated_de: It is also a verbal force.

en: Poland may soon have a nationalistic government of the right, Spain one of the left.
de: Polen hat möglicherweise bald eine nationalistische rechte Regierung, Spanien eine linke.
translated_de: Polens could soon have a nationalist right government, Spain a link.

en: It's hard to see them breaking a leg to help the Selfie Brits, whose energy might be better spent preventing Scotland leaving the UK - something they don't want either because most have similar separatist tendencies.
de: Es fällt schwer, sich vorzustellen, dass sie sich ein Bein ausreißen werden, um den Selfie-Briten zu helfen, deren Energie besser dafür eingesetzt werden sollte, Schottlands Austritt aus dem UK zu verhindern - etwas, was sie auch nicht wollen, weil die meisten ähnliche separatistische Tendenzen haben.
translated_de: It is important to make sure that they are able to re-enter the self-crime to help, to use more energy, to prevent Scottish exit from the UK - something that they do not want because the majority of the same separatists have done so.

en: So some such ministers may even be planning to make deliberately unhelpful remarks, SNP-style, during the UK's 2017 referendum campaign to hasten the Brexit process, my pal suggests.
de: Daher planen möglicherweise einige solche Minister sogar absichtlich nicht hilfreiche Anmerkungen, ganz im SNP-Stil, während Großbritanniens Referendumskampagne 2017, um den Brexit-Prozess zu beschleunigen, vermutet mein Freund.
translated_de: This could be a mistake for some of these Ministers, but I think it is not helpful to make any comments on the SNP until 2017, during the Great Britain referendum, to accelerate the Brexit process.

en: "The renegotiation was a fix" and "Britain got nothing of value out of the renegotiation."
de: "Die Neuverhandlung war eine Pleite" und "Großbritannien hat nichts von Wert aus der Neuverhandlung gewonnen."
translated_de: "The new negotiations were a pleasure" and "the new negotiations were not worth it."

en: The Europeans know to their cost how predatory Fleet Street can be and how EU-sceptic the oligarch press barons are, as they were not during the Tony Benn-inspired 1975 referendum which endorsed our 1973 entry by a ratio of 2:1.
de: Die Europäer wissen, wie räuberisch die Fleet Street auf ihre Kosten sein kann und welche EU-Skeptiker die Oligarchie der Pressebarone ist, wie sie es während des von Tony Benn inspirierten Referendums 1975 aber nicht waren, das unseren Eintritt 1973 mit einem Verhältnis von 2:1 unterstützte.
translated_de: The Europäers know how racially the Fleet Street can be financed and which EU-Skeptic is the Oligarchie of the Pressebarone, as they were in the 1975 referendum of Tony Benn, but not supported our admission in 1973 with a ratio of 2:1.

en: They may dimly remember Boris Johnson, the arch Euro-opportunist, making his name as an "EU straight bananas" Brussels correspondent in the early 90s.
de: Sie können sich schwach an Boris Johnson, den Erz-Euro-Opportunisten erinnern, der sich einen Namen als ein "EU-Gerade-Bananen" Brüssel-Korrespondent in den frühen 90-er Jahren gemacht hat.
translated_de: You can also slam Boris Johnson, the European-European-American, who has made a name as a Brussels correspondent in the early 90s.

en: For all his foolishness Ed Miliband knew who his enemies were.
de: Bei all seiner Verrücktheit wusste Ed Miliband, wer seine Feinde waren.
translated_de: In all its resentment, Ed Miliband knew who was his Feind.

en: They included the medley of tax-shy rascals, phone-hacking foreigners and pseudo non-doms who own most of our great newspapers.
de: Dazu gehörte das Medley von Steuer-fürchtenden-Schurken, Telefon-hackenden Ausländern und den Pseudo Nicht-Inländern, die die meisten unserer großen Zeitungen besitzen.
translated_de: The Medley of tax-appropriate fraud, telephone-hacking foreigners and the Pseudo non-in-in-country, which are the majority of our large newspapers.

en: Actually Tony Blair thought much the same about them, but realised that when you're in a cage with a randy gorilla you have to pass the bananas to distract it from having you for lunch and again for tea.
de: Eigentlich dachte Tony Blair ähnlich über sie, stellte aber fest, dass, wenn man mit einem heißen Gorilla in einem Käfig sitzt, man besser Bananen verteilt, um ihn abzulenken, anstatt zu seinem Mittagessen und Abendessen zu werden.
translated_de: Tony Blair, in fact, was a similar person, but he said that if he has a good gorilla in a cage, he should have better bananas to eat, instead of a meal and dinner.

en: In fact Miliband was more Blairite than Blair in opposing Cameron's referendum wheeze, since Blair had conceded the principle over the EU's aborted constitution, sunk by French and Dutch voters in 2005 who gave him a get-out card.
de: In der Tat war Miliband mehr Blairianer als Blair selbst, als er sich Camerons Referendumswirbel widersetzte, denn Blair hatte das Prinzip über die nicht verabschiedete Verfassung der EU gestellt, die dann von französischen und niederländischen Wählern im Jahr 2005 abgelehnt wurde, die ihm damit eine Hintertür öffneten.
translated_de: In fact, Miliband was more Blairianer than Blair, as he was a result of Cameron' s referendum, because Blair had put the principle on the EU' s not agreed constitution which was then rejected by French and Dutch voters in 2005, which he opened a door to the back door.

en: The press never forgave him that either.
de: Die Presse hat ihm das auch nie verziehen.
translated_de: The press has never seen this.

en: But nice Jeremy Corbyn, who gave me a friendly pat on the back at Westminster on Monday - I told him he no longer has time to waste on me - seems to be in danger of re-adopting Neil Kinnock's boycott Murdoch strategy of the 80s, a mistake then and now.
de: Aber der nette Jeremy Corbyn, der mir am Montag in Westminster einen freundlichen Klaps auf den Rücken gab - ich sagte ihm, dass er keine Zeit mehr für mich zu vergeuden brauche - scheint in Gefahr, Neil Kinnocks Boykott Murdoch Strategie der 80-er Jahre zu wiederholen, ein Fehler damals und heute.
translated_de: But the Jeremy Corbyn, who I am sitting on the back of a friendly clap in Westminster - I said that I had no time to pause for me - seems to be in danger of re-evaluating Neil Kinnocks Boykott Murdoch' s strategy for 80 years, a mistake that was a mistake between the time and the time.

en: It may take time, but he must develop a coherent strategy to engage with the media, not with me, but certainly with Andrew Marr whose BBC sofa he vacated on Sunday.
de: Es kann dauern, aber er muss eine kohärente Strategie entwickeln, um die Medien zu gewinnen, nicht mit mir, aber sicherlich mit Andrew Marr, dessen BBC-Sofa er am Sonntag verlassen hat.
translated_de: It can be long, but it must develop a coherent strategy to gain the media, not with me, but certainly with Andrew Marr, who has left BBC-Sofa on Sunday.

en: Corbyn's official position on Europe is what I will kindly call evolving.
de: Corbyns offizielle Position zu Europa ist - ich drücke es mal freundlich aus - in der Entwicklung.
translated_de: Corbyn' s official position on Europe is - I am mal kind - in development.

en: He says he'd like us to stay in a reformed EU.
de: Er sagt, dass wir in einer reformierten EU bleiben sollten.
translated_de: It said that we should remain in a reformed EU.

en: Well, most people outside Ukip's woad-wearing tendency and the wilder shores of Tory little Englanderism can probably say yes to that.
de: Nun, die meisten Menschen außerhalb von Ukips traditionellen Blaufarbstoff-Tendenz und den wilderen Gefilden von Torys Klein-Engländerismus kann wohl jeder dazu Ja sagen.
translated_de: Now, the majority of people who are outside of Ukips are accustomed to traditional blunders and wild flies of Tory-born small-englandism can say that.

en: It's what Hilary "A Benn, but not a Bennite" Benn said on radio and TV this week as the boy scout in him struggled not to admit that Corbyn's appointment of abrasive John McDonnell as shadow chancellor was a bad idea.
de: Es ist das, was Hilary "Ein Benn, aber kein Bennite" Benn im Radio und im Fernsehen diese Woche sagte, als der Pfadfinder in ihm kämpfte, nicht zuzugeben, dass Corbyns Ernennung des provozierenden John McDonnell als Schattenkanzler eine schlechte Idee war.
translated_de: It is, as Hilary "Be Benn, but no Bennite" Benn said in radio and television this week, as the Pfadfinder in his campaign, not to admit that Corbyns ernennation of John McDonnell as a shadow-kniffler was a bad idea.

en: It reminded me of the 70s, when his old dad struggled on TV to be disloyal to Labour cabinet colleagues without going too far and losing his cabinet job.
de: Es erinnerte mich an die 70-er Jahre, als sein alter Vater sich im Fernsehen darum bemühte, illoyal gegenüber seinen Labour-Kabinettskollegen zu sein, ohne zu weit zu gehen und seinen Kabinettsjob zu verlieren.
translated_de: I remember the 70-year-old father who is now a television presenter who is trying to illoyally face his Labour-Babinettskollege, without going too far and losing his Kabinett job.

en: Hilary's struggle was more attractive.
de: Hilarys Kampf war noch attraktiver.
translated_de: Hilary combat was more attractive.

en: But fighting to stay in "in all circumstances" - Benn's phrase - was not what McDonnell was saying, nor what JC told peers and MPs at their private meeting on Monday night, by all accounts.
de: Aber zu kämpfen, um "unter allen Umständen" zu bleiben - Benns Ausdruck - war nicht das, was McDonnell sagte, noch was JC seinen Mitstreitern und Abgeordneten nach allen Berichten auf ihrer Klausurtagung am Montagabend erzählte.
translated_de: But to fight for "under all circumstances" - Benns' expression - was not the same, as McDonnell said, as JC' s Mitstreiter and Abgeordnete recalled on their Klausurtag on Monday evening, following all the reports.

en: Whatever the bottom-up, touchy-feely image Corbyn wants to convey - remember, he even touched me - message discipline remains important in the age of 24/7 TV and especially in the maelstrom that is social media, a hotbed of paranoia and betrayal.
de: Was auch immer das rührselige Bottom-Up-Image von Corbyn vermitteln will - denken Sie daran, dass er sogar mich gerührt hat - Nachrichten-Disziplin bleibt im Zeitalter von TV rund um die Uhr wichtig und vor allen Dingen in dem Strudel der Sozialen Medien, einer Brutstätte von Paranoia und Verrat.
translated_de: As always, the rogue Bottom-Up Image of Corbyn will - you think that I am so concerned - keep the news-discrimination in the time of television around the clock, mainly in the street of social media, a Brutstätte of Paranoia and Verrat.

en: It's fair enough not to give Cameron a free pass on Europe, allowing him to take Labour's support for granted in the referendum campaign, as McDonnell has said.
de: Es ist richtig, Cameron keine Freikarte für Europa zu geben, die ihm erlaubt, Labours Unterstützung in der Referendumskampagne für eine Selbstverständlichkeit zu halten, wie McDonnell es sagte.
translated_de: It is correct that Cameron cannot give a freecard for Europe which he allows Labour support in the referendumskampagne for a seriousness, as McDonnell said.

en: Simon Jenkins certainly thinks so.
de: Simon Jenkins denkt sicher so.
translated_de: Simon Jenkins thinks that is safe.

en: But McDonnell and Corbyn's basic equivocation about EU membership - consistent with their Bennite siege economy, anti-capitalist past - is no longer just a matter of esoteric discussion among leftwing dissidents for whom the narcissism of small difference is a central tenet of doctrinal squabbles.
de: Aber McDonnell und Corbyns grundlegende Mehrdeutigkeiten zur EU-Mitgliedschaft - im Einklang mit ihrer Bennite Belagerungs-Wirtschaft, ihrer anti-kapitalistischen Vergangenheit - ist nicht mehr nur eine Frage der esoterischen Diskussion unter linken Dissidenten, für die der Narzissmus des kleinen Unterschieds ein zentraler Grundsatz von dogmatischen Streitigkeiten ist.
translated_de: But McDonnell and Corbyns' fundamental adversity to the EU - in accordance with their Bennite lagering force, their anti-kapitalist past - is not more than a question of esoteric debate under link-dissidents, for the Narzissmus of small differences is a central principle of dogmatic stability.

en: As with his equivocation over Nato - Tom Watson is adamant that JC won't campaign to quit - foreign diplomats will be obliged to try to make sense of it all for their masters at home.
de: Wie mit seinen Mehrdeutigkeiten zur Nato - Tom Watson ist felsenfest überzeugt, dass JC keine Kampagne zum Austritt startet - werden ausländische Diplomaten verpflichtet sein, zu versuchen, in allem einen Sinn für ihre Vorgesetzten zu Hause zu finden.
translated_de: As a result of his repeated commitment to Nato - Tom Watson is convinced that JC has not started a campaign for a re-election - foreign diplomats will be obliged to try to find a way to find their own proposals.

en: Why should Paris or Berlin waste political capital - they have suspicious voters too - on concessions to Britain when it may all be pointless?
de: Warum sollten Paris oder Berlin politisches Kapital verschwenden, - sie haben auch misstrauische Wähler - um Zugeständnisse an die Briten zu machen, wenn dies alles sinnlos sein kann?
translated_de: Why should Paris or Berlin invest in political capital - they have also a misstray electorate - to make it easier for Brits to make the most of the money if it is possible to do it?

en: The US is already pretty disappointed with the Brits" feeble military performance in Iraq, Libya and Syria, even with a cost-cutting Tory government in power, as I was reminded at the launch of something called the British Influence Security Forum on Monday.
de: Die USA sind bereits ziemlich enttäuscht von der schwachen militärischen Leistung im Irak, in Libyen und in Syrien, sogar mit einer Kostensenkung der Tory-Regierung an der Macht, woran ich beim Start am Montag von etwas erinnert wurde, was sich British Influence Security Forum nannte.
translated_de: The USA are quite entangled in the military performance of the French in Iraq, Libya and Syria, so that, as I recall, the cost of Tory Regulating is a cost to the power, which I am reminded of at the start of the Montag, British Influence Security Forum has been nannted.

en: Experts criticise Public Health England e-cigarettes review
de: Experten kritisieren Bericht von Public Health England über E-Zigaretten
translated_de: Experts criticise the report by Public Health England on E-cigarettes

en: Claims by a government-funded agency that e-cigarettes are 95% less harmful than smoking arose from a meeting of 12 people, some with links to the tobacco industry, researchers have said.
