de: Behauptungen einer staatlich finanzierten Agentur, dass E-Zigaretten weniger schädlich sind als Rauchen entstand aus einem Treffen von 12 Personen, teilweise mit Verbindungen zur Tabakindustrie, sagten Forscher.
translated_de: The claim made by a government agency that E-cigarettes are less harmful than cigarettes, according to Forscher, from a meeting of 12 people, partly with connections to tobacco industry.

en: Experts writing in the British Medical Journal (BMJ) joined the Lancet in criticising the evidence used by Public Health England (PHE) in its report on e-cigarettes.
de: Experten, die im British Medical Journal (BMJ) schreiben, schlossen sich Lancet an, indem sie die von Public Health England (PHE) in ihrem Bericht über e-Zigaretten verwendeten Nachweise kritisieren.
translated_de: Experts who write the British Medical Journal (BMJ) have launched Lancet, in which they have criticised the Public Health England (PHE) in their report on electronic cigarettes.

en: PHE published the "landmark" report last month, describing it as a "comprehensive review of the evidence."
de: PHE veröffentlichte den "Grundsatzbericht" im vergangenen Monat und beschreibt ihn als eine "umfassende Überprüfung der Beweise".
translated_de: PHE published the "Grundsatz Report" last month and referred to it as a "umfassend examination of evidence".

en: But several researchers have questioned the robustness of the data and pointed to links between some experts and the tobacco industry.
de: Doch einige Forscher haben die Belastbarkeit der Daten infrage gestellt und wiesen auf die Verbindungen zwischen einigen Experten und der Tabakindustrie hin.
translated_de: However, some have raised the question of the reliability of the data and pointed out the connection between some experts and the tobacco industry.

en: An editorial in the Lancet medical journal last month attacked the "extraordinarily flimsy foundation" on which PHE based its main conclusion.
de: Ein Leitartikel in der medizinischen Fachzeitschrift Lancet letzten Monat griff die "außerordentlich windige Grundlage" an, auf der PHE seine wichtigste Schlussfolgerung begründete.
translated_de: The article in the medical journal Lancet last month focuses on the "assuring basis" of the PHE' s important conclusions.

en: Writing in the BMJ, two further researchers have questioned whether the claims were "built on rock or sand."
de: Zwei weitere Forscher schreiben in BMJ und haben gefragt, ob die Behauptungen "auf Stein oder Sand aufbauen".
translated_de: Two other Forschers wrote in BMJ and asked whether they would build the claims on stone or sand.

en: Martin McKee, professor of European public health at the London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine, and Simon Capewell, professor of clinical epidemiology at the University of Liverpool, said: "A fundamental principle of public health is that policies should be based on evidence of effectiveness."
de: Martin McKee, Professor für Europäische Öffentlichde Gesundheit an der London School of Hygiene und Tropical Medicine und Simon Capewell, Professor für Klinische Epidemiologie an der University of Liverpool, sagten: "Ein grundlegendes Prinzip der öffentlichen Gesundheit ist, dass Strategien auf dem Nachweis der Wirksamkeit beruhen sollten."
translated_de: Martin McKee, Professor for European Public Health at the London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine and Simon Capewell, Professor for Clinical Epidemiology at the University of Liverpool, said: "One fundamental principle of public health is that strategic strategies should be based on the proof of the effectiveness."

en: They said the public would expect PHE's claims that "the current best estimate is that e-cigarettes are around 95% less harmful than smoking" would be based on a detailed review of evidence and modelling.
de: Sie sagten, dass die Öffentlichkeit erwartet, dass die Behauptung von PHE, dass "die gegenwärtige beste Schätzung ist, dass E-Zigaretten etwa 95 % weniger schädlich sind als Rauchen" auf einer detaillierten Überprüfung der Nachweise und der Modellierung beruhen.
translated_de: You say that the public expects that the claim of PHE is that "the actual best judgment is that E-cigarettes are less harmful than cigarettes" on a detailed examination of the evidence and modelation.

en: In fact, it comes from a single meeting of 12 people convened to develop a multi-criteria decision analysis (MCDA) model to synthesise their opinions on the harms associated with different nicotine-containing products; the results of the meeting were summarised in a research paper.
de: In der Tat kommt diese Aussage aus einer einzigen Sitzung von 12 Personen, die einberufen wurden, um ein Modell für eine Mehrfachkriterien-Entscheidungs-Analyse (Multi-Criteria Decision Analysis - MCDA) zu entwickeln, um ihre Meinungen über die Schäden von verschiedenen Nikotin-haltigen Produkten zu einer Synthese zu führen; die Ergebnisse des Treffens wurden in einem Forschungsbericht zusammengefasst.
translated_de: In fact, this statement is made from a single meeting of 12 people who were appointed to develop a model for a multi-disciplinary decision analysis (Multi-Criteria Decision Analysis - MCDA) to lead their opinion on the damage caused by various Nikotin products to a synthese; the results of the meetings were compiled in a research report.

en: McKee and Capewell said one sponsor of the meeting was a company called EuroSwiss Health, whose chief executive was reported to have previously received funding from British American Tobacco for an independent study.
de: McKee und Capewell sagten, dass ein Sponsor des Treffens eine Firma namens EuroSwiss Health war, deren Geschäftsführer zuvor von British American Tobacco Mittel (BAT) für eine unabhängige Studie erhalten haben soll.
translated_de: McKee and Capewell said that a sponsor of the meeting of a company named EuroSwiss Health was to be given to the business leader of British American Tobacco funds (BAT) for a independent study.

en: He also endorsed BAT's public health credentials in a sustainability report, they said.
de: Er unterschrieb auch die Referenzen von BAT zur Öffentlichen Gesundheit in einem Nachhaltigkeitsbericht, sagten sie.
translated_de: It also wrote the report on the health of public health that the BAT referees to.

en: One of the 12 people at the meeting declared funding from an e-cigarette manufacturer but not the funding he was reported to have received previously from the tobacco company Philip Morris International, they added.
de: Einer der 12 Teilnehmer an dem Treffen erklärte, Mittel von einem E-Zigaretten-Hersteller zu erhalten, aber nicht die Finanzierung, die er nach Berichten vorher vom Tabakunternehmen Philip Morris International erhalten haben soll, fügten sie hinzu.
translated_de: One of the 12 participants to the meeting said that the money from a E-ZigarettenHersteller would be withdrawn, but not the funding which he should have received from Philip Morris International' s Tabak Company.

en: The rationale for selecting the members of the panel is not provided, but they include several known e-cigarette champions, some of whom also declare industry funding in the paper.
de: Die Gründe für die Auswahl der Mitglieder des Gremiums werden nicht geliefert, aber dazu gehören mehrere bekannte E-Zigaretten-Champions, von denen einige auch eine Branchen-Finanzierung in dem Papier angeben.
translated_de: The reasons for the selection of members of the Gremium are not presented, but there are several known E-Zigaretten-Champions, some of which include a branch financing in the paper.

en: Some others present at the meeting are not known for their expertise in tobacco control.
de: Einige andere Teilnehmer an dieser Sitzung sind nicht bekannt für ihr Know-how in der Tabakkontrolle.
translated_de: Several other participants in this meeting are not known for their knowledge in the tabakkontrolle.

en: The meeting was also attended by the tobacco lead at PHE.
de: An der Sitzung nahmen auch die Tabak-Leitung von PHE teil.
translated_de: The Committee also took part in the discussion of the tabak-led PHE.

en: The research paper produced by the group "tellingly concedes" there is a lack of "hard evidence for the harms of most products on most of the criteria," McKee and Capewell wrote.
de: Die Forschungsarbeit der Gruppe "gesteht bezeichnenderweise", dass es einen Mangel an "harten Beweisen für die Schäden der meisten Produkte bei den meisten Kriterien" gibt, schrieben McKee und Capewell.
translated_de: The research work of the Group "resids" that a mangel is a "harte proof" for the damage caused by the majority of products by the majority criteria, said McKee and Capewell.

en: However, none of these links or limitations are discussed in the PHE report.
de: Jedoch wird keine dieser Verbindungen oder Einschränkungen in dem PHE-Bericht diskutiert.
translated_de: However, there is no discussion on these connections or restrictions in the PHE framework.

en: McKee and Capewell said PHE's claims that "there is no evidence so far that e-cigarettes are acting as a route into smoking for children or non-smokers" were premature.
de: McKee und Capewell sagten, dass die Behauptungen von PHE, dass "es bisher keine Beweise gibt, dass E-Zigaretten als ein Weg zum Rauchen für Kinder oder Nichtraucher dienen" verfrüht waren.
translated_de: McKee and Capewell said that the claims of PHE that "there was no evidence that E-cigarettes were used as a way to smoke for children or non-rauchers" were false.

en: Prof Kevin Fenton, director of health and wellbeing at PHE, said the claims in the BMJ had been responded to before.
de: Prof Kevin Fenton, Direktor für Gesundheit und Wohlbefinden bei PHE, sagte, dass auf die Behauptungen von BMJ bereits vorher reagiert wurde.
translated_de: Prof Kevin Fenton, Director of Health and Wellness at PHE, said that the claims of BMJ have already been addressed.

en: He said: "E-cigarettes are significantly less harmful than smoking."
de: Er sagte: "E-Zigaretten sind wesentlich weniger schädlich als Rauchen."
translated_de: He said: "E-cigarettes are significantly less harmful than smoking."

en: One in two lifelong smokers dies from their addiction.
de: Jeder zweite lebenslange Raucher stirbt an seiner Sucht.
translated_de: Each second life smoker stirs up his such a thing.

en: All of the evidence suggests that the health risks posed by e-cigarettes are small by comparison, but we must continue to study the long-term effects.
de: Alle Beweise legen nahe, dass die Gesundheitsrisiken von E-Zigaretten im Vergleich dazu gering sind, aber dass wir weiterhin die langfristigen Auswirkungen zu studieren haben.
translated_de: All the evidence suggests that the health risks of E-cigarettes are in comparison, but that we continue to study the long-term effects.

en: PHE has a clear duty to inform the public about what the evidence shows and what it does not show, especially when there was so much public confusion about the relative dangers compared to tobacco.
de: PHE hat die eindeutige Pflicht zur Information der Öffentlichkeit über das, was der Nachweis belegt und was nicht, vor allem, wenn es soviel öffentliche Verwirrung über die relativen Gefahren im Vergleich zum Tabak gibt.
translated_de: PHE has the clear obligation to inform the public about the fact that it is a proof of the fact and not, in particular, when there is so much public debate on the relative risks in comparison to Tabak.

en: Nearly 80,000 people a year die of a smoking-related illness and smoking costs the NHS £2bn a year.
de: Fast 80.000 Menschen sterben jährlich an einer Krankheit mit Bezug zum Rauchen, und Rauchen kostet das Nationale Gesundheitssystem zwei Mrd. £ pro Jahr.
translated_de: Fast 80.000 people are killed annually by a disease relating to smoking, and smoking costs the National Health System £2,000 per year.

en: By spelling out clearly the current evidence - that while e-cigarettes are not risk-free, they carry only a fraction of the harm caused by smoking - we are fulfilling our national remit.
de: Durch das klare Vorlegen von aktuellen Beweisen, dass E-Zigaretten nicht ohne Risiko sind, aber nur einen Bruchteil des Schadens, der durch das Rauchen verursacht wird, darstellen, erfüllen wir unsere nationale Zuständigkeit.
translated_de: We are able to fulfil our national competence by presenting clear evidence that E-cigarettes are not without risk, but only one fraction of the damage caused by smoke.

en: BBC should give up EastEnders, says former Channel 4 chief
de: BBC sollte EastEnders aufgeben, sagt ehemaliger Chef von Channel 4
translated_de: BBC should be able to give EastEnders a call, said former chef of Channel 4

en: The former Channel 4 chairman Luke Johnson has said the BBC should stop broadcasting programmes such as EastEnders and The Voice, saying its commercial rivals would "give their right arm" for hit shows such as the Albert Square soap.
de: Der ehemalige Vorsitzende von Channel 4, Luke Johnson, hat gesagt, die BBC sollte aufhören, Programme wie EastEnders und The Voice zu senden. Er sagte, dass kommerziellen Rivalen "ihren rechten Arm geben würden" für Hit-Shows wie die Albert Square Soap.
translated_de: The former Chairman of Channel 4, Luke Johnson, said that BBC should listen to the programme EastEnders and The Voice, and said that commercial rivals would give "right arm" for hit shows such as the Albert Square Soap.

en: Johnson said the licence fee should only be used to make the sort of programmes that are not made by other UK broadcasters.
de: Johnson sagte, dass die Rundfunkgebühr nur dazu verwendet werden sollte, um die Art von Programmen zu machen, die nicht durch andere UK-Sender gesendet werden.
translated_de: Johnson said that the radio revenue should only be used to make the art of programming which will not be slashed by other UK countries.

en: He criticised the BBC for putting public service programmes likely to be watched by a smaller audience in tough slots against its rivals" biggest rating shows, and on channels such as BBC4.
de: Er kritisierte die BBC dafür, dass sie öffentlich-rechtliche Programme, die wahrscheinlich von einem kleineren Publikum gesehen werden, in hart umstrittene Zeitfenster gegen die beliebtesten Shows ihrer Rivalen und von Sendern wie BBC4 zu platzieren.
translated_de: The BBC criticised the fact that it was a public programme, which could be seen by a smaller audience, in a harsh time period against the most popular shows of their rivals and of those who are promoting BBC4.

en: After the BBC's director general, Tony Hall, said the corporation wanted to do more in partnership with other organisations, Johnson said he had tried for six years in his time at Channel 4 to do a tie-up with the BBC without success.
de: Nachdem der BBC-Generaldirektor, Tony Hall, sagte, das Unternehmen mehr in Partnerschaft mit anderen Organisationen tun wollte, sagte Johnson, dass er sechs Jahre lang in seiner Zeit bei Channel 4 ohne Erfolg versucht habe, mit der BBC in Kontakt zu kommen.
translated_de: After the BBC Generaldirektor Tony Hall said that companies would be more involved in partnership with other organisations, Johnson said that he had tried to come to the BBC in contact six years ago, in his time at Channel 4.

en: "I do struggle with the idea that the BBC commissions and broadcasts programmes that would clearly be shown by unsubsidised rivals," Johnson told the House of Lords communication committee, as part of its inquiry into the future of the BBC.
de: "Ich habe Probleme mit der Idee, dass BBC Programme in Auftrag gibt oder sendet, die auch eindeutig von nicht subventionierten Rivalen gezeigt würden", sagte Johnson dem Oberhaus-Kommunikations-Ausschuss im Rahmen seiner Untersuchung über die Zukunft der BBC.
translated_de: "I have problems with the idea that BBC programmes are being delivered or sent, which would also be shown clearly by not subventioned rivals," said Johnson, the Committee on the Environment, in the context of his study on BBC' s future.

en: If you keep the licence fee, which I'm not sure in the medium or long term is a good idea, it should reduce its output at least to programmes that others aren't making and commissioning.
de: Wenn Sie die Rundfunkgebühr halten möchten, was ich mittel- oder langfristig nicht für eine gute Idee halte, sollte man seine Produktion zumindest auf Programme, die andere nicht machen oder in Auftrag geben.
translated_de: If you want to pay the radio station, was I not able to stop it, or if it is not for a good idea, it should be a production of a programme, which is not a programme or a contract.

en: They broadcast The Voice in a prime slot because they want to gain as broad a support as possible for its future.
de: Sie senden The Voice in einem erstklassigen Zeitfenster, weil sie eine möglichst breite Unterstützung für deren Zukunft erreichen wollen.
translated_de: You send the Voice in a very early time, because they want to achieve a very large support for the future.

en: The idea that no one else would show that is a joke, it's ludicrous, it's obviously nonsense.
de: Die Idee, dass sonst niemand dies zeigen würde, ist ein Witz, es ist lächerlich, es ist natürlich Unsinn.
translated_de: The idea that nobody would show it is a joke, it is a joke, it is a joke, it is a shame, it is a disaster.

en: Johnson said: "I don't see why a regressive tax should fund programmes that could be funded without subsidy.
de: Johnson sagte: "Ich sehe nicht, warum eine regressive Steuer Programme finanziert, die auch ohne Subventionen finanziert werden könnte.
translated_de: Johnson said: "I do not know why a regressive tax programme could be financed, and that could also be funded without subsidies."

en: The Voice is one, EastEnders is another, admittedly made in-house.
de: The Voice ist ein solches Programm, EastEnders ist ein weiteres, zugegebenermaßen beides Eigenproduktionen.
translated_de: The Voice is a programme, EastEnder is another, at least two, independent production.

en: Frankly other channels would give their right arm for it.
de: Ehrlich gesagt würden andere Kanäle ihren rechten Arm dafür geben.
translated_de: It is a shame that other Kanäle would give their right arm.

en: I struggle to see how it's public service broadcasting.
de: Ich bemühe mich zu sehen, wie dies öffentlich-rechtliches Fernsehen sein soll.
translated_de: I want to see how public television should be.

en: I don't think that would diminish the BBC at all.
de: Ich glaube nicht, dass dies die BBC überhaupt verringern würde.
translated_de: I do not believe that the BBC would actually be ringing.

en: Johnson, a serial entrepreneur who led Channel 4 from 2004 to 2010, said the BBC was guilty of chasing ratings "because of the ambitions of people who work there, and because they believe that is the best way to secure long-term support."
de: Johnson, ein Unternehmer für Serien, der Channel 4 von 2004 bis 2010 leitete, sagte, dass die BBC schuld an der Jagd nach Bewertungen sei "wegen die Ambitionen der Menschen, die dort arbeiten, und weil sie glauben, dass dies der beste Weg ist, um langfristige Unterstützung zu sichern."
translated_de: Johnson, a businessman for Channel 4 from 2004 to 2010, said that BBC blamed the pursuit of evaluations because of the ambitions of people who work there and because they believe that the best way to ensure long-term support is to be.

en: His comments about the BBC's most popular shows echo those of former Sky executive Tony Ball, who used his MacTaggart lecture in Edinburgh in 2003 to propose that the BBC sell off shows such as EastEnders.
de: Seine Kommentare zu den beliebtesten Sendungen der BBC geben das wieder, was der ehemalige Leiter von Sky, Tony Ball, in seinem MacTaggart-Vortrag in Edinburgh im Jahr 2003 vorschlug, dass die BBC Shows wie EastEnders verkaufen sollte.
translated_de: The comments on the most popular BBC broadcasts have been re-written, as Tony Ball, former head of Sky, in his MacTaggart-Vortrag in Edinburgh, in 2003, said that BBC shows like EastEnders should be sold.

en: Johnson said the BBC's more niche public service programmes "go on to BBC4 where quite often you can't measure the audience but they fulfil their remit and they can argue when they go on their sanctimonious missions about justifying £4bn in licence fee income, "Well of course, we do all these obscure programmes that no one watched."
de: Johnson sagte, dass die eher öffentlich-rechtlichen Nischen-Programme "zu BBC4 gehen sollten, wo man ziemlich das Publikum nicht messen kann, aber sie erfüllen ihre Aufgaben, und sie können argumentieren, wenn sie auf ihre scheinheiligen Missionen zur Rechtfertigung von 4 Milliarden £ Rundfunkgebühren gehen, "Nun, natürlich, wir haben all diese obskuren Programme erstellt, die niemand gesehen hat."
translated_de: Johnson said that the Nischen programme should be drafted to BBC4 where the public cannot be able to measure it but fulfil its duties and can argue if they are going to take a legal fee of £4 billion on their seemingly unofficial missions to produce a round radio programme, "no, we have all these obskurs programme created, which nobody has seen."

en: They put them on a slot where no one was ever going to watch them.
de: Sie legen sie in ein Zeitfenster, in dem niemand sie jemals sehen wollte.
translated_de: You put them in a timetable, in which nobody would see them.

en: On the licence fee, Johnson told the committee: "I challenge you to find a more regressive system in terms of who gets the best value from it.
de: Zur Rundfunkgebühr sagte Johnson dem Ausschuss: "Ich fordere Sie auf, ein eher regressives System in Bezug auf Bedingungen zu finden, wer den besten Wert hieraus erhalten kann.
translated_de: The Commission said Johnson: "I want to find a system which is regressive in terms of conditions, which is the best value here.

en: Of course you all think, we all think, £150 a year is great value, but for people for whom £150 is a lot of money I wonder if they do because they don't consume a lot of the BBC.
de: Natürlich denken Sie alle, denken wir alle, dass man für 150 £ pro Jahr hier einen großen Wert erhält, aber für Leute, die für die 150 £ eine Menge Geld ist, frage mich, ob das stimmt, denn sie konsumieren nicht viel von der BBC.
translated_de: You all think that a huge value is given to people who are paying for 150 pounds, but I wonder if that is true, because they do not support much of the BBC.

en: Former Sky and Channel 5 executive David Elstein, who also gave evidence to the committee on Tuesday, said the BBC should revise its Reithian mission to "inform, educate and entertain."
de: Der ehemalige Sky- und Channel 5-Chef David Elstein, der auch vor dem Ausschuss am Dienstag aussagte, forderte, dass die BBC ihre Reithian-Mission überprüfen solle, "zu informieren, zu bilden und zu unterhalten".
translated_de: The former Sky and Channel 5-Chef David Elstein, who also said on Tuesday at the Committee, called on the BBC to "inform, form and maintain" its reiteration.

en: He said little of the BBC's output was now formally classified as education - he said it was 1% of its TV output and 0.1% on radio - and it should take a lead from public service broadcasters in Australia and Canada and change it to "inform, enlighten and entertain."
de: Er sagte, nur wenig von der BBC-Produktion würde jetzt offiziell als Bildung klassifiziert - er sagte, dass es 1 % ihrer TV-Produktion und 0,1 % im Radio seien - und sie sollte sich an den öffentlich-rechtlichen Fernsehsendern in Australien und Kanada ein Beispiel nehmen dies ändern in "informieren, aufklären und unterhalten".
translated_de: It said that only a few of the BBC products would now be officially classified as education - he said that 1 % of their TV products and 1 % in radio are being sold - and they should take a look at the public broadcasters in Australia and Canada as a way of 'informing, clarifying and keeping' the changes.

en: On the issue of partnerships, Elstein said the BBC should do more in areas such as the Proms, of which he said only a handful were shown on TV, and enter into alliances with commercial broadcasters to make them all available to watch online.
de: Zur Frage der Partnerschaften sagte Elstein, die BBC sollte tun mehr in Bereichen wie die der Proms, von denen er sagte, dass nur eine Handvoll im Fernsehen gezeigt werden, und mit den kommerziellen Sendern Allianzen eingehen, um alles online verfügbar zu machen.
translated_de: The question of partnership said Elstein that BBC should do more in areas such as the Proms, which said that only one hand will be shown in the television and with the commercials to make all the online available.

en: 'Sonogenetics' allows brain cells to be controlled by sound waves
de: 'Sonogenetics' kann Gehirnzellen durch Schallwellen steuern
translated_de: The 'sonogenetics' can be controlled by Schallwells

en: The video shows how the nematodes change direction the moment they are blasted with sonic pulses.
de: Das Video zeigt, wie die Nematoden die Richtung in dem Moment ändern, in dem sie mit Klangimpulsen bestrahlt werden.
translated_de: The video shows how the Nematoden are changing their direction in the moment, in which they are strahlt with klangimpulses.

en: Scientists have bred worms with genetically modified nervous systems that can be controlled by bursts of sound waves.
de: Wissenschaftler haben Würmer mit genetisch veränderten Nervensystemen gezüchtet, die von Ausbrüchen von Schallwellen gesteuert werden können.
translated_de: Scientists have gathered nerve systems genetically modified, which can be controlled by a scavenge from Schallwell.

en: The tiny nematodes change direction the moment they are blasted with sonic pulses that are too high-pitched for humans to hear.
de: Die winzigen Nematoden ändern die Richtung in dem Augenblick, in dem sie mit Klangimpulsen, die für das menschliche Gehör zu hohe Frequenzen haben, um gehört zu werden, bestrahlt werden.
translated_de: The winzige Nematodes change the direction in the view of the klangimpulses which have been injected into the human ears for a high frequency.

en: The pulses work by switching on motor neuron cells that are genetically modified to carry membrane channels that respond to ultrasonic waves.
de: Die Impulse arbeiten durch das Einschalten von Motoneuron-Zellen, die genetisch geändert werden, um die Membran-Kanäle zu tragen, die auf Ultraschallwellen reagieren.
translated_de: The impulses are driven by the insertion of the Motoneuron cells which are genetically modified to support the membranes which react to ultra-wells.

en: Related: Researchers read and write brain activity with light
de: Weiteres zu diesem Thema: Forscher lesen und schreiben Hirnaktivität mit Licht
translated_de: Other issues on this subject: Forscher theen and write hirnactiveity with light

en: Researchers said the worms demonstrate the power of a new procedure, dubbed sonogenetics, in which ultrasound can be used to activate a range of brain, heart and muscle cells from outside the body.
de: Die Forscher sagten, die Würmer zeigten die Macht eines neuen Verfahrens, genannt Sonogenetics, bei dem Ultraschall verwendet werden kann, um eine Reihe von Gehirn-, Herz- und Muskel-Zellen außerhalb des Körpers zu aktivieren.
translated_de: The Forscher said that the Würmer showed the power of a new procedure called Sonogenetics, which can be used in the Ultraschall to activate a number of brain, heart and muscle cells outside of the body.

en: Sreekanth Chalasani, a researcher at the Salk Institute in La Jolla, California, told the Guardian that the procedure could one day replace deep-brain stimulation, an invasive procedure that delivers electrical pulses into people's brains to treat symptoms of Parkinson's disease.
de: Sreekanth Chalasani, Forscher am Salk Institute in La Jolla, Kalifornien, sagte dem Guardian, dass das Verfahren eines Tages die Tiefen-Hirnstimulation ersetzen könnte, ein invasives Verfahren, das elektrische Impulse in das Gehirn von Menschen zur Behandlung der Symptome der Parkinson-Krankheit abgibt.
translated_de: Sreekanth Chalasani, Forscher, at the Salk Institute in La Jolla, Kalifornien, said the Guardian that the procedure could be a day of deep-hearing, invasive procedure which generates electrical impulses in the brain of people to treat Parkinson' s symptoms.

en: Nematode worms do not usually react to ultrasound, but Chalasani found that they did when they were surrounded by a fluid containing microscopic bubbles.
de: Fadenwürmer reagieren in der Regel nicht auf Ultraschall, aber Chalasani stellte fest, dass sie es taten, wenn sie von einer Flüssigkeit mit mikroskopischen Luftblasen umgeben waren.
translated_de: Fadenwürmer react in the rule not on Ultraschall, but Chalasani stated that they were able to do so when they were given a mikroskopic airblase.

en: The bubbles, he found, amplify the ultrasonic waves which then pass inside the worms.
de: Die Blasen, fand er heraus, verstärken die Ultraschallwellen, die dann in die Würmer eindringen.
translated_de: The Blasen, which he has admired, strengthens the ultra-strengthwells which then come into the Würmer.

en: The amplified ultrasound waves act on structures called TRP-4 ion channels, found in the membranes of some of the worms" cells.
de: Die verstärkten Ultraschallwellen wirken auf Strukturen, die TRP-4-Ionenkanäle genannt werden und in den Membranen von einigen der Würmerzellen gefunden werden.
translated_de: The increased ultra-wells are affecting structures which are named TRP-4-Ionenkanäle and which are found in the membranes of some of the Würmerzellen.

en: The sound waves make these ion channels open up and activate the cells they are attached to, according to a report in Nature Communications.
de: Die Schallwellen bewirken die Öffnung dieser Ionenkanäle und aktivieren die Zellen, denen sie zugeordnet sind, so ein Bericht Nature Communications.
translated_de: The Schallwells are influencing the opening of these Ionenkanäle and activating the cells which are allocated to them, so a report Nature Communications.

en: To make ultrasound-controlled nematodes, Chalasani genetically modified the worms so that some of their motor neurons carried TRP-4 ion channels.
de: Um Ultraschall-gesteuerte Nematoden zu schaffen, veränderte Chalasani genetisch die Würmer so, dass einige ihrer Motoneuronen TRP-4-Ionenkanäle tragen.
translated_de: For ultra-sealed neonodes to be created, Chalasani has modified the worm so that some of its Motoneurons TRP-4-Ionenkanäle will be able to be used.

en: When he applied ultrasound to the modified creatures, the sound waves were amplified by the microbubbles and transmitted into the worms, where they switched on the modified motor neurons.
de: Wenn er Ultraschall auf die veränderten Kreaturen anwendet, werden die Schallwellen durch die Mikrobläschen verstärkt und in die Würmer übertragen, wo sie die geänderten Motoneuronen einschalten.
translated_de: If the ultra-scratch is applied to the changes in the Kreaturen, the Schallwells will be increased by the microblenders and transferred to the Würmer where they will be triggered by the changes in the Motoneurons.

en: The procedure has some similarities with optogenetics, a groundbreaking tool that allows scientists to switch neurons on and off with pulses of light.
de: Das Verfahren hat einige Ähnlichkeiten mit Optogenetics, einem bahnbrechenden Tool, das Wissenschaftler ermöglicht, Neuronen mit Impulsen des Lichts ein- und auszuschalten.
translated_de: The procedure has some similarities with the opogenetics, a pathophysiological tool which scientists can enable, neurons with light impulses and to be withdrawn.

en: But Chalasani said that sonogenetics could have some advantages over that technique.
de: Aber Chalasani sagte, dass Sonogenetics einige Vorteile gegenüber dieser Technik haben könnte.
translated_de: But Chalasani said that the Sonogenetics could have some advantages over this technique.

en: Unlike light, which has to be sent down an optic fibre to the desired location inside the brain, low frequency ultrasound waves can pass through tissue unhindered, and so can be sent into the brain from on top of the skull.
de: Im Gegensatz zu Licht, das an einer optische Faser an die gewünschte Stelle im Gehirn herabgesandt werden muss, können Niedrigfrequenz-Ultraschallwellen Gewebe ungehindert passieren und können so in das Gehirn von oben auf dem Schädel geschickt werden.
translated_de: In contrast to light, which is a optical fibre that is needed to be inserted into the brain to the desired place, the Niedrigfrequenz-Ultraschallwells can be inserted into the brain and sent to the brain above the skull.

en: "We believe that, using gene therapy and a therapeutic virus, it may be possible to make target human neurons temporarily susceptible to the ultrasound signal in a clinical setting for certain neurological treatments," said Chalasani.
de: "Wir glauben, dass mit Gentherapie und einem therapeutischen Virus es möglich ist, die angezielten menschlichen Neuronen vorübergehend anfällig für das Ultraschall-Signal in einer klinischen Einstellung für bestimmte neurologische Behandlungen zu machen", sagte Chalasani.
translated_de: "We believe that gentherapy and a therapeutic virus are possible to avoid the potential for human neurons to be able to be able to be able to be able to be able to communicate the invasiveness of the invasive radiation in a clinical setting for certain neurological treatment", said Chalasani.

en: Other applications could focus on muscle cells and insulin-producing cells, he added.
de: Andere Anwendungen könnten sich auf Muskelzellen und Insulin-produzierende Zellen konzentrieren, fügte er hinzu.
translated_de: Other applications could be incorporated into muscle cells and in-insulin-produzier cells.

en: Illegal torture equipment - right on your doorstep!
de: Illegale Foltergeräte - direkt vor Ihrer Haustür!
translated_de: Illegal Foltergeräte - direkt vor your door!

en: The adverts shaming Britain's arms trade
de: Die Anzeigen beschämen Großbritanniens Waffenhandel
translated_de: The public warnings of the trade of arms in Britain

en: Watch Amnesty International's anti-arms fair video.
de: Amnesty International Anti-Waffen Messen-Video ansehen.
translated_de: The International Anti-Waffen Messen-Video of Amnesty International.

en: Horrific killer drones!
de: Schreckliche Mörder-Drohnen!
translated_de: Mr Mr Drohns, sorry!

en: Ankle-shattering leg irons!
de: Fußgelenk zerschmetternde Beinfesseln!
translated_de: The foot-strength zerschmetterns!

en: Cluster bombs!
de: Streubomben!
translated_de: Streubomben!

en: And electric stun batons that cause excruciating pain but leave no trace!
de: Und Elektroschockstäbe, die quälende Schmerzen verursachen, aber keine Spur hinterlassen!
translated_de: And electronic schockstäbes, which are causing terrible pain, but no trace has been left behind!

en: The cheery voice and cartoon imagery leave no doubt that this advert for the world's biggest arms fair is a sharp spoof, produced for Amnesty International to highlight the British government's willingness to flog weapons to repressive regimes via the Defence and Security Equipment International's jamboree at the ExCeL Centre in London's Docklands.
de: Die fröhliche Stimme und die Cartoon-Bilder lassen keinen Zweifel, dass diese Anzeige für die weltweit größte Waffenmesse eine kämpferische Parodie ist, die von Amnesty International produziert wurde, um die Bereitschaft der Britischen Regierung ins Rampenlicht zu bringen, Waffen an repressive Regime über die Defence and Security Equipment International Jamboree im ExCeL Centre in Londons Docklands zu verscherbeln.
translated_de: The frenetic voice and cartoons are not doubtful that this advertisement for the world' s largest armsmesse is a combat parodie produced by Amnesty International, to bring the British government into force to destroy the international Jamborees of Defence and Security Equipment in the ExCeL Centre in London Docklands.

en: Related: DSEI weapons fair: authoritarian regimes descend on London
de: Verwandt: DSEI Waffen-Messe: Autoritäre Regime strömen nach London
translated_de: Weapons of the DSEI: a repressive regime in London

en: But a separate campaign is also leading to many posters cropping up at bus stops and on tube trains that require a second glance.
de: Aber eine separate Kampagne führt auch zu vielen Plakaten, die an Bushaltestellen und in den U-Bahn-Zügen zu sehen sind und die einen zweiten Blick erfordern.
translated_de: But a separate campaign also leads to many Plakats, which are being seen as buses and in the U-Bahn corridors and which require a second view.

en: "Important announcement, Travelling on the DLR from 15th to 18th September?" reads one, using London Underground fonts and branding with the DLR line turning into the image of a tank.
de: "Wichtige Ankündigung: Fahren Sie vom 15. bis 18. September mit der DLR?" (Docklands Light Railway) liest man in den Schrifttypen der London Underground und den Markenzeichen der DLR-Linie, das sich zum Bild eines Panzers wandelt.
translated_de: "What is the actual announcement: you will be driving from 15 to 18 September with the DLR?" (Docklands Light Railway) is the most common in the London Underground and the DLR-Linie logos which are changing the image of a panzer.

en: This September, a swarm of arms dealers will be descending on the DLR ... Customers are requested to help stop the arms fair.
de: Im September wird ein Schwarm von Waffenhändlern mit der DLR fahren ... Kunden werden gebeten, beim Stopp der Waffenmesse zu helfen.
translated_de: In September, a swarm of weapons dealers will be slashed with the DLR... customers will be able to help stop the weaponsmesse.

en: The 300 posters are by artists who exhibited work at the Museum of Cruel Designs in Banksy's Dismaland.
de: Die 300 Plakate sind von Künstlern, die ihre Arbeit im Museum für grausame Designs in Banksys Dismaland ausgestellt haben.
translated_de: The 300 Plakate are from artists who have been commissioned to work in the Museum for grausam designs in Banksy Dismaland.

en: A collective called the Special Patrol Group helped distribute it around London using "Ad Space Hack Packs," a £6 pack of Allen keys which it claims "gain access to around a third of bus stop advertising space on the planet."
de: Ein Kollektiv mit dem Namen Special Patrol Group half bei der Verteilung in London und nutzte "Ad Space Hack Packs", ein 6 £-Pack von Inbusschlüsseln, von denen behauptet wird, dass "Zugriff auf rund ein Drittel der Bushaltestellen-Werbeflächen auf dem Planeten erlangen."
translated_de: A group of special patrol groups, half of which was involved in the London distribution, used "Ad Space Hack Packs", a 6 £ pack of inbusschlüssels, which is said to be a "suicide on around a third of the bus stop-by-way areas on the planets".

en: Transport for London is not amused by this flyposting "vandalism."
de: Transport for London findet diesen Plakatier-"Vandalismus" nicht lustig.
translated_de: Transport for London is not a joke.

en: One of the spoof ads produced by the Special Patrol Group collective.
de: Eine der Parodie-Anzeigen, die von Special Patrol Group produziert wurde.
translated_de: One of the Parodie-Anzeigen produced by Special Patrol Group.

en: According to Gavin Grindon, curator of Cruel Designs and a lecturer at the University of Essex, artists are becoming more questioning and seeking to take political work to audiences outside galleries.
de: Nach Gavin Grindon, Kurator von Crueol Designs und Dozent an der University of Essex, werden Künstler werden kritischer und versuchen, politische Arbeiten zum Publikum außerhalb von Galerien zu bringen.
translated_de: After Gavin Grindon, Kurator of Crueol Designs and Dozent at the University of Essex, artists will be more criticised and will try to bring political work to the public outside of galleries.

en: A lot of artists are moving to work with activists within protest movements, realising they have to get out in the real world for their art to have an impact on society.
de: Viele Künstler machen sich mit Aktivisten innerhalb von Protestbewegungen an die Arbeit und bemerken, dass sie sich nach draußen in die reale Welt begeben müssen, damit ihre Kunst einen Einfluss auf die Gesellschaft hat.
translated_de: Many artists are putting their work together with activists within protest movements and noticing that they must be able to live outside the real world, so that their art has a positive influence on society.

en: Another of the anti-arms trade posters greeting commuters on the tube.
de: Ein weiteres der Anti-Waffenhandel-Plakate grüßt die Pendler in der U-Bahn.
translated_de: Another anti-waffe trade deal is a petty crime.

en: The Amnesty video has been watched more than 100,000 times in 24 hours via Facebook and was created by ad agency VCCP working pro bono, with the graphic designer and voiceover artist also working for free.
de: Das Amnesty-Video wurde mehr als 100.000 Mal in 24 Stunden über Facebook angesehen und entstand durch die Werbeagentur VCCP, die gemeinnützig mit dem Grafiker und Voiceover-Künstler arbeitet, der auch kostenlos arbeitet.
translated_de: The video was watched more than 100.000 times in 24 hours on Facebook and was viewed by the advertising agency VCCP, which works as a community with the graphic and voiceover artists, who also works free.

en: VCCP creative director Matt Lever was struck by the silence surrounding the advertising of the arms fair - with a blank space on ExCeL's calendar - and thought: "Let's give them the campaign they are trying to avoid."
de: VCCP-Kreativdirektor Matt Lever war erstaunt über die Stille, die rund um die Werbung für die Waffenmesse herrschte - durch eine Leerstelle des ExCeL-Kalenders - und dachte: "Geben wir ihnen die Kampagne, die sie zu vermeiden versuchen."
translated_de: The Director of the VCCP-Kreativists, Matt Lever, was first to think about the stills, which are around the advertising for the armsmesse - by a Leerstelle of the ExCeL-Kalenders - and said: "We just want them to try to avoid the campaign."

en: They toyed with creating a more realistic dodgy corporate advert, but "by ramming it home with bright colours and animation, it was more arresting."
de: Sie spielten mit der Erfindung einer realistischeren zwielichtigen Firmenwerbung, aber "durch das Einbläuen mit hellen Farben und Animation bleibt es stärker haften."
translated_de: You play a role in the establishment of realist companies, but "by the blending of hell colours and animation is more akin to the slur of the imagination."

en: "They've done a fantastic job in helping us raise concerns about the selling of illegal torture equipment at the fair," says Tom Davies at Amnesty.
de: "Sie haben einen fantastischen Job gemacht, indem sie uns helfen, das Bewusstsein über den Verkauf von illegalen Folter-Geräten auf der Messe zu schärfen", sagt Tom Davies von Amnesty.
translated_de: "They have done a fantastic job, indem they help us to protect the awareness of the sale of illegal fliers to the Messe", says Tom Davies of Amnesty.

en: What we need now is for the UK government to take action and ensure that torture equipment is not illegally traded on our doorstep.
de: Was wir jetzt brauchen, ist ein Einschreiten der Britischen Regierung und die Garantie, dass Foltergeräte nicht vor unserer Haustür illegal gehandelt werden.
translated_de: We need to make a declaration by the British Government and to ensure that the illegal use of fracking equipment will not be illegal in our house.

en: Perhaps the most creative art surrounding the arms fair comes from inside ExCeL, where exhibitors flog fantastically euphemistic products.
de: Vielleicht die kreativste Kunst rund um die Waffenmesse stammt aus dem Bereich innerhalb von ExCeL, wo Aussteller fantastisch euphemistische Produkte verscherbeln.
translated_de: Perhaps the most realism around the armsmesse originates from the area within the ExCeL, where the tellers are slapping fantasies of products.

en: In a press release, Saab revealed an order from the US army for "the shoulder-launched AT4CS RS."
de: In einer Pressemitteilung offenbart Saab einen Auftrag der US-Armee über "die von der Schulter abgeschossene AT4CS RS."
translated_de: In a press release, Saab revealed a US Army order on "the school of AT4CS RS" .

en: This includes a "unique shaped-charge warhead that delivers outstanding behind-armour-effects inside the target."
de: Dazu gehört ein "einzigartig geformter Gefechtskopf, der herausragende Nachwirkungs-Effekte im Innern des Ziels liefert."
translated_de: This is a "strange, distorted, distorted feisty head" which delivers the most powerful effects on the inner objective.

en: Whatever that does, it won't be pleasant.
de: Was immer das bewirkt, es wird nicht angenehm sein.
translated_de: It is not pleasant to see it done.

en: Eight golden rules for living in student halls
de: Acht goldene Regeln für das Leben in Studentenwohnheimen
translated_de: The golden rules for the lives of students in the home

en: It's been 11 years since I moved into student halls as an oblivious 19-year-old, still believing in berets and moral relativism, but it's only now I recall the strained smiles of those I annoyed - and the numerous, lengthy complaints about others.
de: Vor elf Jahren zog ich als selbstvergessener 19-Jähriger in ein Studentenwohnheim, immer noch im Glauben an Berets und moralischen Relativismus, aber erst jetzt erinnere ich mich an die angespannten Lächeln derer, die ich geärgert habe - und an die zahlreichen, langatmigen Beschwerden über andere.
translated_de: I have been a 19-year-old who was a self-essential student in a student home for a while, always believing in moral and berets, but I have now been reminded of the enthralled Lächeln of the people I have - and of the many, long-term complaints of others.

en: Most of what I learned can be distilled into eight simple rules.
de: Das meiste, was ich gelernt habe, kann in acht einfache Regeln destilliert werden.
translated_de: The most common, I learned, is to distill the rules in eight simple rules.

en: Moving into halls can range from mildly nerve-racking to totally terrifying.
de: Der Einzug in Studentenwohnheime reicht von leicht nervenaufreibend bis zu absolut erschreckend.
translated_de: The arrival in Student accommodation is a simple and nerve-free process.

en: It's tempting to babble: telling people where you're from, whether and where you took a gap year, where you stand on Corbyn and why you "honestly neither love nor hate Marmite because seriously guys it's just yeast extract HAHAHA I'll be in my room."
de: Es ist verlockend zu schwatzen: Menschen erzählen, woher du kommst, ob und wo du Sabbatjahr genommen hast, wo Sie in Bezug auf Corbyn stehen und warum Sie "ehrlich gesagt Marmite weder lieben noch hassen, weil im Ernst, Jungs, es ist nur ein Hefeextrakt HAHAHA, ich bin in meinem Zimmer."
translated_de: It is a shame to be a sham: people are gathered, who has been beaten, who has been beaten, who has been beaten in the Sabbath, who have been quoted in Corbyn and why you "sincerely said Marmite does not love anymore because in Ernst, Jungs, it is only a hefeextricated HAHAHA, I am sitting in my room."

en: Take a breath.
de: Atmen Sie durch.
translated_de: At the same time.

en: And help others take one too - ask questions and show interest.
de: Und helfen Sie anderen, das gleiche zu tun - Stellen Sie Fragen und zeigen Sie Interesse.
translated_de: And help you other, the same way, - ask questions and show your interest.

en: It steers the conversation and helps you to scout out the people you like versus those you wouldn't talk to even if your eyelashes were on fire and they were dispensing extinguishers.
de: Es lenkt das Gespräch und hilft Ihnen, die Menschen herauszufinden, die Sie mögen im Gegensatz zu denen, mit denen Sie nicht sprechen würden, selbst wenn Ihre Wimpern in Brand gerieten und diese Feuerlöscher wären.
translated_de: It is a way of facilitating the dialogue and helps you find people who are unable to speak in opposition to those who would not speak, even if your Wimpers were robbed and blew fire.

en: Give people space.
de: Lassen Sie Menschen.
translated_de: Let us know.

en: People's rooms often morph into drinks receptions, movie-night venues and communal hangout spots, but they're also where people get dressed and adjust their underwear.
de: Die Zimmer von Menschen verwandeln sich oft in Getränke-Rezeptionen, Film-Nacht Veranstaltungsorte und kommunale Treffpunkte, aber sie sind auch die Stellen, an denen Menschen sich anziehen und ihre Unterwäsche zurechtrücken.
translated_de: The rooms of people are often transformed in the Getränke-Rezeptions, Film-Nacht-Special venues and communal meetings, but they are also the places where people are drawn and their underwear are re-evaluated.

en: Related: Don't even think about starting university in a relationship
de: Hierauf bezogen: Denken Sie nicht daran, an der Uni mit einer Beziehung anzufangen
translated_de: This is a question that you do not want to be an Uni with a relationship.

en: Introverts get a raw deal at university.
de: Introvertierte erhalten eine grobe Behandlung an der Universität.
translated_de: The Government is given a robed treatment at the University.

en: Your room should be a retreat, yet many halls form an inter-room-strolling culture that's friendly, social and conducive to lifelong friendships.
de: Ihr Zimmer sollte ein Refugium sein, doch viele Studentenwohnheime bilden eine Raum-zu-Raum-Bummel-Kultur, die freundlich und sozial ist und zu lebenslanger Freundschaft führen kann.
translated_de: The room should be a refuge, but many Student Houses form a space-to-room-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house-house

en: That can be hell for someone who's trying to recharge.
de: Das kann die Hölle für jemand sein, der versucht, sich zu erholen.
translated_de: It can be the horde for anyone who wants to get involved.

en: Nothing in the culture allows you to say, "I like you and I want our friendship to continue, but I need you to go away so I can get back the energy I've expended on interacting with you."
de: Nichts in der Kultur erlaubt Ihnen zu sagen: "Ich mag dich, und ich will, dass unsere Freundschaft weitergeht, aber du musst weggehen, damit ich die Energie zurück erhalte, die ich für die Interaktion mit dir verbraucht habe."
translated_de: In the culture, you cannot say: "I am a good person and I will continue to work with our friendship, but I must take the time to restore the energy I have used for the interaction with you."

en: Try to sense when a fellow student is exhausted from socialising - and maybe text instead of knocking.
de: Versuchen Sie zu spüren, wann ein Kommilitone von Geselligkeit erschöpft ist - und schicken Sie ihm eine SMS statt anzuklopfen.
translated_de: It is tempting to see if a military soldier is a shopper and send him a SMS instead.

en: Speaking of knocking: do it.
de: Apropos anklopfen: Tun Sie es.
translated_de: A proposal is a good one.

en: One guy in my student halls had a policy that if a door wasn't locked he was invited in.
de: Ein Kerl in meinen Studentenwohnheimen hatte die Vorstellung, dass eine nicht verschlossene Tür eine Einladung war.
translated_de: One Kerl in my Student Houses had the idea that a non-concrete Turkish would be a invitation.

en: He saw some things.
de: Er sah einige Dinge.
translated_de: There are some things.

en: Make friends through baking.
de: Freundschaft schließen durch Backen.
translated_de: Friendship is a sign of backs.

en: Since you're starting uni at the height of Bake-Off mania, knocking on people's doors to introduce yourself with a plate of brownies seems marginally less weird, less 1950s "Welcome to the neighbourhood, I baked you something, now smile as I ask you personal questions."
de: Da Sie die Uni auf dem Höhepunkt der Back-Manie beginnen, ist das Klopfen an den Türen von Menschen, um sich mit einem Teller voller Brownies vorzustellen, weniger seltsam als die Begrüßung der 1950-er Jahre "Willkommen in der Nachbarschaft, ich habe Ihnen etwas gebacken. So, und jetzt bitte lächeln, wenn ich Ihnen ein paar persönliche Fragen stelle."
translated_de: The Uni on the back of the country is the Klop of people to the door to see a Teller full of Brownies, less slammed as the beginning of the 1950s "Willful years in the countryside, I have some backs, and I would like to let you know if you have some personal questions."

en: Offering homemade treats is a great way to make friends.
de: Hausgemachte Leckereien anzubieten ist ein guter Weg, um Freundschaften zu schließen.
translated_de: The stale stale stales are a good way to end friendships.

en: Your housemates will feel obliged to chat, and may end up associating your face with a tasty surprise.
de: Ihre Mitbewohner fühlen sich verpflichtet, sich zu unterhalten und werden am Ende vielleicht Ihr Gesicht mit einer leckeren Überraschung assoziieren.
translated_de: Your fellow accomodant must be able to keep up and, perhaps, you will be able to take your face with a stale surprise.

en: Obviously this is subject to you being a decent baker.
de: Natürlich hängt dies davon ab, ob Sie ein anständiger Bäcker sind.
translated_de: It is a matter of course that you are a permanent boozer.

en: Poorly-fused lumps of flour, sugar and fat are more likely to make people pretend to be asleep when you knock.
de: Schlecht vermischte Klumpen aus Mehl, Zucker und Fett führen dazu, dass Leute sich schlafend stellen, wenn Sie anklopfen.
translated_de: The sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish s

en: Stealing food is a common crime in student halls.
de: Lebensmittel zu stehlen, ist ein gängiges Verbrechen in Studentenwohnheimen.
translated_de: Food is a common crime in student housing.

en: Obviously nicking someones chicken is theft, but is taking a drop of milk for your tea stealing?
de: Natürlich ist das Klauen von Hühnchen ein Diebstahl, aber ist es das Nehmen eines Tropfen Milchs für Ihren Tee auch?
translated_de: It is a sour cream, but is it a milk tin for your teeth?

en: Double check with the milk owner.
de: Überprüfen Sie das mit dem Milcheigentümer.
translated_de: You are a bit disappointed with the milk-rich.

en: Chances are they'll tell you to help yourself even if they're seething inside.
de: Die Chancen stehen gut, dass sie sagen, sich selbst zu bedienen, selbst wenn sie im Innern kochen.
translated_de: The chances are that they say they are themselves bedien, even if they cook in the Inner world.

en: If someone steals your stuff, it's annoying and you have my sympathies - but try to deal with it more maturely than my hallmate, who tainted her milk with washing-up liquid to punish those who stole it.
de: Wenn jemand deine Sachen stiehlt, ist das ärgerlich, und Sie haben mein Mitgefühl - aber versuchen Sie, damit ausgewogener umzugehen als meine Mitbewohnerin, die ihrer Milch ein Spülmittel hinzufügte, um Diebe zu bestrafen.
translated_de: If someone asks you to do this, it is a matter of concern and you have my sympathy, but try to be more tolerant than my fellow villagers who add their milk to a spout to the diet.

en: She's in jail now.
de: Sie ist jetzt im Gefängnis.
translated_de: You are now in the midst of the rage.

en: You shouldn't make noise that keeps people from sleeping or studying.
de: Sie sollten keinen Lärm machen, der Leute vom Schlaf oder von der Arbeit abhält.
translated_de: You should not make a noise, do not let people sleep or work.

en: This isn't just to be a decent human, but because you are the proverbial people in glass houses.
de: Es geht nicht nur darum, ein anständiger Mensch zu sein, sondern dass Sie im wahrsten Sinne des Sprichworts zu den Menschen gehören, die im Glashaus sitzen.
translated_de: It is not only about being a permanent person, it is also about being a person who is a person who is sitting in the glass house.

en: A girl on my corridor asked her neighbour if they wouldn't mind turning down the drum and bass because it was 3am and she had an exam in the morning.
de: Ein Mädchen auf meinem Flur fragte ihre Nachbarn, ob es ihnen etwas ausmacht, Drum & Bass etwas leiser zu stellen, denn es drei Uhr morgens, und sie hatte am Morgen eine Prüfung.
translated_de: One girl on my Flur asked their neighbours if they were to make something from the ground, to make drums and bass a little more slick, because it was three hours early and they had a test tomorrow.

en: They responded by turning it up.
de: Sie reagierten darauf mit noch lauterer Musik.
translated_de: You are responding with more slick music.

en: When they finally shut up at 5am, she kindly let them sleep for two hours before blasting her own music, locking her door as she left for her three-hour exam.
de: Als sie schließlich um 5 Uhr aufhörten, ließ sie ihre Nachbarn freundlicherweise noch zwei Stunden schlafen, bevor sie ihre eigene Musik plärren ließ, ihre Tür abschloss und sich zu ihrer dreistündigen Prüfung begab.
translated_de: As they finally listened to them at 5 a.m., they slept happily two hours before they landed their own music plärren, their doors closed and they were able to take their three-hour examination.

en: Wouldn't it be romantic if your future spouse happened to move into the same hall as you?
de: Wäre es nicht romantisch, wenn Ihr zukünftiger Ehepartner zufällig in das gleiche Studentenwohnheim einziehen würde?
translated_de: Would it be not romantic if your future partner would be re-employeed in the same student housing?

en: Conversely, wouldn't it be knuckle-bitingly awkward if you mistook a hallmate for your future spouse, hooked up, broke up and had to see them every day and possibly watch them get custody of all your mutual friends?
de: Umgekehrt wäre es nicht abgrundtief peinlich, wenn Sie eine Mitbewohnerin für Ihre zukünftige Ehepartnerin halten, sich an sie ranmachen, sich wieder trennen und sie dann jeden Tag sehen müssen und vielleicht miterleben, wie sie alle gemeinsamen Freunde zu sich herüberzieht?
translated_de: It would not be a stale excuse to keep a fellow in your future partner, to run into a stalemate and to see it every day and perhaps to live as they all share a common friend?

en: Of course, the heart wants what it wants - but if a hot hallmate is definitely not your future spouse, try to at least talk some sense into your groin.
de: Natürlich geht das Herz seine eigenen Wege - aber wenn eine heiße Mitbewohnerin definitiv nicht Ihre zukünftige Ehepartnerin ist, versuchen Sie zumindest, Ihrem Unterleib ein wenig Vernunft einzureden.
translated_de: It is a natural way to do this, but if one of the most ill-fated people is not your future partner, try to make sure that you are a little sceptical about your support.

en: In the exhilarating moment you realise someone's left their keys inside their unlocked room, the line between pranking and bullying is finer than it seems.
de: In dem aufregenden Moment, in dem Sie bemerken, dass jemand seine Schlüssel in seinem nicht verschlossenem Zimmer hat liegen lassen, ist die Grenze zwischen einem Ulk und Mobbing feiner, als es scheint.
translated_de: In the moment when you notice that someone who has not been given his keys in his room has not been able to find his keys, the border between a slur and a slur is far more difficult than it seems.

en: A good prank is funny, but takes moments to reverse.
de: Ein guter Streich ist lustig, aber es dauert nur Augenblicke, bis er zum Bumerang wird.
translated_de: It is a good thing, but it takes only a few minutes to get to the point of the Bumerang.

en: Teach a valuable and amusing lesson about security by hiding something - but never trash someone's room with toothpaste and shampoo.
de: Erteilen Sie durch Verstecken eine wertvolle und amüsante Lektion über Sicherheit - aber versauen Sie nie jemandes Zimmer mit Zahnpasta und Shampoo.
translated_de: It is a valuable and amusing lesson in security, but you never have a room with toothpaste and shampoo.

en: Lock their door and put their keys in a glass of water, which you then put in the freezer - but don't Blu-Tack their possessions to the ceiling more than twice.
de: Verschließen Sie ihre Tür, und legen Sie ihre Schlüssel in ein Glas Wasser, welches Sie dann in den Gefrierschrank stellen - aber tackern Sie ihre Besitzungen an der Decke nicht mehr als zweimal fest.
translated_de: You have to open your doors and place your keys in a glass of water which you then put in the freezer - but you have not been able to hold their positions on the decks more than two times.

en: Terraced houses for refugees, single parents, low earners
de: Reihenhäuser für Flüchtlinge, Alleinerziehende, Geringverdiener
translated_de: Houses for refugees, allinerziehende, Geringverdiener

en: Property entrepreneur Markus Gildner is building terraced houses in the Middle Franconian town of Eckental for people who do not have much money.
de: Der Immobilienunternehmer Markus Gildner baut im mittelfränkischen Eckental Reihenhäuser für Menschen, die nicht viel Geld haben.
translated_de: The property investor Markus Gildner built in medieval corner houses for people who have not had much money.

en: For example for refugees – but also as a sign: "Not only refugees need accommodation, but also single mothers and people on low incomes."
de: Also etwa für Flüchtlinge - aber auch als Signal: "Nicht nur Flüchtlinge brauchen Wohnhraum, sondern ebenso die allein erziehende Mutter und der Geringverdiener."
translated_de: Also for refugees - but also as a signal: "It is not only for refugees that they need housing, but also the sole mother and the stricken person."

en: "I am demonstrating how it is still possible to build economically and well nowadays," says the 44-year-old in an interview.
de: "Ich zeige, wie man auch heute noch günstig und gut bauen kann", sagt der 44-Jährige im Interview
translated_de: "I am showing how much we can do today, and I am very pleased and happy," said the 44-year-old in interview

en: Thousands of refugees are pushing their way onto the housing market.
de: Tausende Flüchtlinge werden auf den Wohnungsmarkt drängen.
translated_de: Tausende of refugees are being displaced on the housing market.

en: Entrepreneur Marcus Gildner believes he knows how quickly economical housing can be developed: with this project he is building terraced houses for refugees.
de: Der Unternehmer Markus Gildner glaubt zu wissen, wie rasch günstiger Wohnraum geschaffen werden kann: Er baut in einem Projekt Reihenhäuser für Flüchtlinge.
translated_de: The Entrepreneur Markus Gildner has a keen interest in the rapid creation of a more affordable housing space: he builds a project house for refugees.

en: Mr Gildner, thousands of refugees are coming onto the housing market.
de: Herr Gildner, viele Flüchtlinge werden auf den Wohnungsmarkt drängen.
translated_de: Mr Gildner, many refugees are swooped on the housing market.

en: What solution are you offering?
de: Welche Lösung bieten Sie an?
translated_de: What solution can you offer?

en: Markus Gildner: Mass accommodation in containers and gyms is not sustainable.
de: Markus Gildner: Die massenhafte Unterbringung in Containern oder Turnhallen hat keine Nachhaltigkeit.
translated_de: Markus Gildner: Mass-scale breaches in containers or turnhalls have no effect.

en: Because most of the people will be staying here.
de: Denn die Menschen bleiben zu einem großen Teil hier.
translated_de: We are still a large part of the people here.

en: We will also need sufficient housing space to accommodate the influx of refugees over the next decades.
de: Angesichts des Flüchtlingsstroms benötigen wir auch in den nächsten Jahrzehnten genügend Wohnraum.
translated_de: We need adequate housing in the next few decades.

en: A totally standard three-storey terraced house is the solution.
de: Ein ganz banales, dreigeschossiges Reihenhaus ist die Lösung.
translated_de: The solution is a whole banal, three-story house.

en: Gildner: A terraced house needs little space.
de: Gildner: Ein Reihenhaus braucht am wenigsten Platz.
translated_de: Gildner: A house needs to be a house on the most.

en: It facilitates integration.
de: Es erleichtert die Integration.
translated_de: It is easier to integrate.

en: It is different when the people are housed in blocks of flats.
de: Das ist anders, wenn man die Menschen in Wohnblöcken unterbringt.
translated_de: It is anders when people are in a household.

en: Each of the six houses which are currently being built in the pilot project consists of three living units each for four asylum seekers.
de: Jedes der sechs Häuser, die gerade in dem Pilotprojekt gebaut werden, besteht aus drei Wohneinheiten für jeweils vier Asylbewerber.
translated_de: Each of the six houses which are being built in the pilot project is composed of three units for each of four asylbewers.

en: Each living unit has two bedrooms, one bathroom, one kitchen and a lounge.
de: Jede Wohneinheit hat zwei Schlafzimmer, ein Bad, eine Küche und einen Aufenthaltsraum.
translated_de: Each unit has two bedrooms, one bathroom, one kitchen and one living room.

en: It's possible that many refugees will say; now that peace has returned I'm going back.
de: Es kann sein, dass viele Flüchtlinge sagen werden, es ist wieder Frieden, ich gehe zurück.
translated_de: It is possible that many refugees will say that peace is again, I think.

en: Then the houses can easily be converted for different uses.
de: Dann können die Häuser leicht nach den jeweiligen Bedürfnissen umgebaut werden.
translated_de: Then, the houses can be built easily according to the specific needs.

en: What are the costs?
de: Wie hoch sind die Kosten?
translated_de: How much are the costs?

en: Gildner: The price for 160 m² of living space per house amounts to €184,000 without land.
de: Gildner: Der Preis für 160 Quadratmeter Wohnfläche pro Haus beläuft sich auf 184 000 Euro, ohne Grundstück.
translated_de: Gildner: The price for 160 square meters of living space is 184 000 euros, without a lot.

en: That is manageable.
de: Das ist überschaubar.
translated_de: This is too much to see.

en: Construction took six months.
de: Sechs Monate hat der Bau gedauert.
translated_de: It has been a long time since the construction began.

en: That is reasonable.
de: Das ist angemessen.
translated_de: This is a measure.

en: Did building regulations complicate your plans?
de: Haben die Bauvorschriften ihre Pläne verkompliziert?
translated_de: Have the construction proposals been compliant?

en: Gildner: I carried out my project in accordance with building regulations.
de: Gildner: Baurechtlich habe ich mein Projekt korrekt durchgezogen.
translated_de: Gildner: I have done my project rightly.

en: The sword of Damocles threatening special building projects, and parking space regulations, always make it complicated.
de: Besonders kompliziert macht es immer das drohende Damoklesschwert Sonderbau und die Stellplatzverordnung.
translated_de: Particularly compliant, the Damokles-related special construction and the position position regulation are always the most important.

en: Scary.
de: Gruselig.
translated_de: Grusel.

en: It is still assumed that anyone creating three flats in a terraced house needs at least three parking places.
de: Es wird immer noch unterstellt, wer in einem Reihenhaus drei Wohnungen schafft, braucht mindestens drei Stellplätze.
translated_de: It is always underpinned, who creates three apartments in a house, must have minimum three places.

en: Except that there is not enough space in towns.
de: Nur in den Städten fehlt dafür der Platz.
translated_de: Only in the cities there is no place for this.

en: And refugees and asylum seekers have no cars.
de: Und Flüchtlinge und Asylbewerber haben keine Autos.
translated_de: And refugees and asylum seekers have no autos.

en: How have residents reacted to your terraced house project?
de: Wie haben die Anwohner auf ihr Reihenhaus-Projekt reagiert?
translated_de: How have the residents responded to their own house project?

en: Gildner: There were some who accused me of building luxury accommodation for asylum seekers.
de: Gildner: Es gab welche, die haben mir vorgeworfen, Luxusbauten für Asylbewerber zu schaffen.
translated_de: Gildner: I have created the luxury buildings for asylbewerers.

en: That is definitely not true.
de: Was definitiv nicht stimmt.
translated_de: It was not a true thing.

en: But aren't you making the competition for affordable housing worse?
de: Aber verschärfen Sie nicht den Konkurrenzkampf um bezahlbare Wohnungen?
translated_de: But do you not want to pay for apartments?

en: Gildner: The truth is over the last five years we have had a building boom in Germany, but it is luxury accommodation that has been built, which hardly anybody can afford any longer.
de: Gildner: Wahr ist doch: Wir hatten in den letzten fünf Jahren einen Bauboom in Deutschland, aber gebaut wurden Luxuswohnungen, die sich kaum einer mehr leisten kann.
translated_de: Gildner: Yes, we had a construction boom in Germany in the last five years, but they were built in luxury homes which are not enough to do so.

en: My project gives the message that normal people need housing space too.
de: Mein Projekt hat die Botschaft, auch die normalen Menschen brauchen Wohnraum.
translated_de: My project has the message that normal people need living space.

en: Not only refugees need accommodation, but also single mothers and people on low incomes.
de: Nicht nur Flüchtlinge, sondern ebenso die allein erziehende Mutter oder der Geringverdiener.
translated_de: Not only refugees, but also the sole mother or the migrant.

en: I am demonstrating how it is still possible to build economically and well nowadays.
de: Ich zeige, wie man auch heute noch günstig und gut bauen kann.
translated_de: I am able to show how much we can do today.

en: This is what it is about.
de: Darum geht es.
translated_de: It is.

en: Marcus Gildner (44) studied microsystems technology in Regensburg and initially worked in environmental analysis.
de: Markus Gildner (44) studierte Mikrosystemtechnik in Regensburg und beschäftigte sich zunächst mit Umweltanalysen.
translated_de: Markus Gildner (44) has studied microsystems in Regensburg and is working on environmental analyses.

en: iOS 9: how to get new iPhone operating system, as Apple update is released
de: iOS 9: Wie Sie das neue iPhone-Betriebssystem erhalten, wenn Apple-Update veröffentlicht wird
translated_de: iOS 9: How you get the new iPhone-Betriebssystem when Apple Update is published

en: The new operating system can be requested by heading to the Settings app, tapping "General," and then selecting "Software Update."
de: Das neue Betriebssystem kann angefordert werden, indem Sie zur Einstellungs-App gehen, auf "Allgemein" tippen und dann "Software-Update" wählen.
translated_de: The new operating system can be required by selecting the appropriate settings app, selecting the appropriate "all-around" and then "Software Update".

en: If it's ready, the phone will give you the option to download and then install it.
de: Wenn es bereit ist, gibt Ihnen das Telefon die Option zum Herunterladen und dann um Installieren.
translated_de: If it is available, you can call the telephone to be laden and then installed.

en: Some have run into problems after that installation, being hit by an error message telling them that "Software update failed."
de: Einige sind nach der Installation auf Probleme gestoßen, da sie eine Fehlermeldung erhalten, die mitteilt, dass die "Software-Aktualisierung fehlgeschlagen" ist.
translated_de: Several are being contacted after the installation because they have a problem, which is partly due to the "Software-Aktualisation" error.

en: To get around that, users are recommended either to wait for the rush to die down, or to try and upgrade through iTunes.
de: Um das Problem zu umgehen, wird Benutzern empfohlen, entweder zu warten, bis der Ansturm zurückgeht oder zu versuchen, über iTunes zu aktualisieren.
translated_de: If the problem is resolved, users should either wait until the storm is returned or try to update iTunes.

en: The phone itself will guide you through the rest of the process.
de: Das Telefon selbst führt Sie durch den Rest des Prozesses.
translated_de: The telephone itself is the rest of the process.

en: That might include deleting apps to make space - but Apple has made that less likely by slimming down the update, and also easier to do using a special tool that will suggest apps to delete and then re-install them once the process is over.
de: Das kann möglicherweise das Löschen von Apps bedeuten, um Platz zu schaffen - aber Apple hat das durch die Verschlankung des Updates unwahrscheinlicher gemacht. Ebenso wird es einfacher sein, dies zu tun, wenn man ein spezielles Tool einsetzt, Apps zu löschen und sie dann neu zu installieren, sobald der Prozess abgeschlossen ist.
translated_de: It can be possible to create the licensors of apps, but Apple has made it undoubtedly worse by the re-upgrade of the update, and it will be easier to do if there is a special tool, app licensors and they will then be installed again, so that the process is finished.

en: It's worth ensuring that your phone is charged or near a charger while the update happens, so that it doesn't run out of battery.
de: Es lohnt sich, sicherzustellen, dass Ihr Mobiltelefon während der Aktualisierung aufgeladen ist oder sich in der Nähe eines Ladegerätes befindet, so dass die Batterie geladen ist.
translated_de: It is important to ensure that your mobile phone is charged during the activation or is located in the vicinity of a decompressor so that the battery is loaded.

en: If the charge is too low, Apple won't let the update go ahead, since the phone dying halfway through could lead to the update breaking.
de: Wenn die Ladung zu niedrig ist, lässt Apple nicht zu, dass das Update fortgesetzt wird, da das Telefon möglicherweise auf halbem Wege abschaltet und dies zu einem Abbruch des Updates führen könnte.
translated_de: If the delay is too low, Apple does not want to delay the update because the telephone could be stopped and could lead to a break in the update.

en: Read more: iOS 9 release still on track despite WatchOS delay iOS 9 review: the least exciting and best update ever iOS 9: how to prepare for new iPhone operating system
de: Weiterlesen: iOS 9 Release immer noch im Zeitplan trotz der WatchOS Verzögerung bei der Überprüfung von iOS 9: das am wenigsten spannende, aber das bisher beste Update von iOS 9: Wie Sie sich auf das neue iPhone-Betriebssystem vorbereiten
translated_de: Further: iOS 9 releases are still in the time frame, even though WatchOS has been a spokesman for iOS 9: the most exciting update yet, but the most recent update on iOS 9: How you are preparing for the new iPhone-Betriebssystem

en: You should also make sure that you've been through our checklist of all the things to do before you download, to try and stop things going wrong and protect against them if they do. iOS 9 brings new features including a much cleverer personal assistant and huge new productivity features for the iPad, as well as tweaks that speed up and fix the operating system.
de: Sie sollten auch sicherstellen, dass Sie vor Ihrem Download unsere Checkliste aller Dinge durchgesehen haben, um zu verhindern, dass Dinge falsch laufen und sich zu schützen, falls sie es doch tun. iOS 9 bringt neue Funktionen, darunter einen viel klügeren persönlichen Assistenten und enorme neue Produktivitäts-Features für das iPad, ebenso Veränderungen, die beschleunigen und das Betriebssystem reparieren.
translated_de: It should also ensure that you have seen our checklist before downloading to prevent things from happening and protecting them, if they are to be done, and that iOS 9 has new features, including a much more personal and enormous new productivity feature for iPads, as well as changes which are being made, which are being re-established and the operating system is being repaired.

en: Rosberg's only motto: full attack
de: Rosbergs einzige Devise: Volle Attacke
translated_de: Rosberg' s only point: full attacks

en: Nico Rosberg knows only one motto in his fight for the Formula One world championship title against his clearly leading Mercedes teammate Lewis Hamilton: "Full attack".
de: Nico Rosberg kennt im Kampf um den WM-Titel in der Formel 1 gegen seinen klar führenden Mercedes-Teamkollegen Lewis Hamilton nur noch eine Devise: "Volle Attacke".
translated_de: Nico Rosberg has yet to know the WM-Titel in the Formel 1 against his clear lead Mercedes-Team colleague Lewis Hamilton, a Devise: "Volle Attacks".

en: The world championship runner-up stressed before the start of the decisive seven overseas races "that I've got nothing more to lose".
de: Der WM-Zweite betonte vor dem Start in die entscheidenden sieben Übersee-Rennen, "dass ich nichts mehr zu verlieren habe".
translated_de: The WM-Zweite said, before the start of the seven-day session, that "I am not going to lose anything more".

en: Before the night race in Singapore this Sunday, 53 points divide the vice world champion from the titleholder and two times champion Hamilton.
de: 53 Punkte trennen den Vizeweltmeister vor dem Nachtrennen in Singapur an diesem Sonntag von Titelverteidiger und Zweifach-Champion Hamilton.
translated_de: 53 points are contested by the Vizewelter in the night of the Singapur race on Sunday by title champion and two-time champion Hamilton.

en: The Brit has already won seven of the 12 races of the season to date and is also starting the floodlit Grand Prix in the city state as favourite.
de: Der Brite gewann bereits sieben der bisherigen zwölf Saisonrennen und nimmt den Flutlicht-Grand-Prix in dem Stadtstaat ebenfalls als Favorit in Angriff.
translated_de: The Brite has already won seven of the 12 season races and has also won the Flutlight Grand Prix in the city as a Favorite in attack.

en: In 2009 and in the preceding year the 30-year-old Brit was able to win the race.
de: 2009 und im vergangenen Jahr konnte der 30 Jahre alte Brite das Rennen gewinnen.
translated_de: The Rennen of the UK was held in 2009 and last year.

en: Whether the current smog in the city state will have any influence on the Grand Prix in Singapore is as yet unclear.
de: Ob der derzeitige Smog im Stadtstaat auf den Großen Preis von Singapur Einfluss haben wird, ist noch unklar.
translated_de: The impact of the current smog in the city of Singapore on the gross price of Singapore is still unclear.

en: A pall of smog has been hanging over the city for days, caused by fires on the neighbouring island of Sumatra.
de: Seit Tagen hängt eine Dunstglocke über der Stadt, ausgelöst durch Brände auf der Nachbarinsel Sumatra.
translated_de: In recent days, a Dunstlock has been thrown over the city, resolved by Brände on the island of Sumatra.

en: Bad Kissinger chess club has a prominent member
de: Bad Kissinger Schachclub hat ein prominentes Mitglied
translated_de: Bad Kissinger Schachclub has a prominent Member
