en: The "Chess friends of Bad Kissingen" chess club, founded three months ago, has admitted another member to its ranks, taking the number of members to 19 players.
de: Der vor drei Monaten gegründete Schachclub "Schachfreunde Bad Kissingen" hat ein weiteres Mitglied in seinen Reihen aufgenommen, somit erhöhte sich die Mitgliederzahl auf 19 Spieler.
translated_de: The Schachclub "Schachfreunde Bad Kissingen" has a new member in its group, increasing the membership number to 19 players.

en: The new member is businessman Paul Gauselmann, a passionate chess and tennis player, who has stayed in Bad Kissingen more than 40 times for spa treatments.
de: Das neue Mitglied ist der Unternehmer Paul Gauselmann, ein passionierter Schach- und Tennisspieler, der sich mehr als 40 Mal in Bad Kissingen zur Kur aufhielt.
translated_de: The new Member is the Entrepreneur Paul Gauselmann, a passionate Schach- and Tennisspieler who has spent more than 40 years in Bad Kissingen to Kur.

en: Gauselmann is a holder of the Federal Cross of Merit 1st class and is a freeman of the towns of Espelkamp and Lübbecke.
de: Gauselmann ist Träger des Bundesverdienstkreuzes 1. Klasse und Ehrenbürger der Städte Espelkamp und Lübbecke.
translated_de: Gauselmann is the sponsor of the Federal Service Cross 1.

en: Gauselmann supported the chess club in Bad Kissingen with a donation which was accepted by chairman Alfred Klein.
de: Den Schachclub in Bad Kissingen hat Gauselmann mit einer Spende unterstützt, die Vorsitzender Alfred Klein entgegennahm.
translated_de: The Schachclub in Bad Kissingen has supported Gauselmann with a spending which President Alfred Klein endorsed.

en: This makes it possible to take on members who cannot afford the membership fee
de: Damit ist es möglich, Schachspieler, die den Mitgliedsbeitrag nicht aufbringen können, aufzunehmen.
translated_de: It is possible to take a gambler who cannot participate in the Member Treaty.

en: Youth work and talent searches can also be pursued.
de: Jugendarbeit und Talentsuche sollen ebenfalls vorangetrieben werden.
translated_de: Youth work and talent should also be promoted.

en: Gauselmann wants his membership of the chess club as well as his friendly contact with the "Red-white" tennis club to be seen as an expression of his ties with the spa town.
de: Gauselmann wünscht sich, dass die Mitgliedschaft im Schachclub und auch freundschaftliche Kontakt zum Tennisclub "Rot-Weiß" als Ausdruck seiner Verbundenheit mit der Kurstadt gesehen wird.
translated_de: Gauselmann argues that the membership in the Schachclub and the frescoring contact with the Tennis Club "Rot-Weiß" are a manifestation of its solidarity with Kurdish.

en: Accommodation office seeks face-to-face contact
de: Quartiersbüro sucht direkten Kontakt
translated_de: Quartiers bureau such direct contact

en: Saludis and the Antonistift retirement centre have grouped together under the mantle of a social foundation and opened a new contact point on Graf-Stauffenberg-Platz.
de: Saludis und das Altenzentrum Antonistift haben sich unter dem Mantel der Sozialstiftung zusammengetan und am Graf-Stauffenberg-Platz eine neue Anlaufstelle eröffnet.
translated_de: Saludis and the Alten Centre Antonistift have opened a new ad hoc under the Mantel of Social Funding and the Graf-Stauffenberg Plate.

en: In addition to obtaining advice it is also possible to participate in courses there.
de: Neben Beratungen kann man dort auch an Kursen teilnehmen.
translated_de: There are also courses available in the area.

en: The social foundation is moving down from the mountain into the town centre.
de: Die Sozialstiftung zieht es herab vom Berg in die Innenstadt.
translated_de: The social foundation is a shilling in the inner city.

en: More precisely, to Graf-Stauffenberg-Platz.
de: Genauer gesagt an den Graf-Stauffenberg-Platz.
translated_de: More specifically, the Graf-Stauffenberg plaque.

en: A new accommodation office will be opening there shortly.
de: Dort wurde kürzlich ein neues Quartiersbüro eröffnet.
translated_de: In recent years, a new Quartiers Office has been opened.

en: Here, directly next to the shopping centre, senior citizens and other people seeking advice can with immediate effect receive information on issues such as nursing insurance or the services of nursing and health insurance companies.
de: Hier, unmittelbar neben dem Einkaufsmarkt, erhalten ab sofort Senioren und Ratsuchende Information zu Fragen wie zur Pflegeversicherung oder zu Leistungen der Kranken- und Pflegekassen.
translated_de: This is where, directly out of the shopping market, Seniors and Councils are given information on issues such as the care insurance or the services of the hospitals and care providers.

en: With our outpatient care service we have for years realised that family caregivers are often left alone.
de: Seit Jahren stellen wir mit unserem ambulanten Pflegedienst fest, dass oftmals pflegende Angehörige allein gelassen werden.
translated_de: We have been able to establish, with ourambulant services, that oft-needed care is allowed to be a part of the family.

en: This raises numerous questions.
de: Dabei gibt es unendlich viele Fragen.
translated_de: There are, in fact, many questions.

en: "Not infrequently, too, many services provided by insurers are not used because the complexity of the insurance is so difficult to understand," the new manager, Jutta Weigand, who as head of the services division for old people's welfare is also responsible for the Antonistift and the Bürgerspital as well as for "Amadeus" outpatient services, explained.
de: "Auch werden nicht selten viele Leistungen der Kassen nicht in Anspruch genommen, weil die Komplexität der Versicherungen kaum noch verstanden wird", erläuterte die neue Hausherrin Jutta Weigand, die als Geschäftsbereichsleiterin Altenhilfe auch für das Antonistift und das Bürgerspital sowie für den ambulanten Dienst "Amadeus" verantwortlich ist.
translated_de: "As far as many services are not in demand, because the complexity of insurance is still lacking", explains the new househerrin Jutta Weigand, responsible as director of the operative aid, for the Antonistift and the citizens' association and for the ambulance service "Amadeus".

en: Apart from advice, the new accommodation office also offers courses in prevention, health and wellness.
de: Neben den Beratungen bietet das neue Quartiersbüro aber auch Prävention, Gesundheitskurse und Wellness an.
translated_de: The new Quartiers Office also offers prevention, health courses and wellness.

en: Saludis has been taken on board for this.
de: Hierzu wurde das Saludis mit ins Boot genommen.
translated_de: This was the Saludis' s boot.

en: As a result, additional offerings such as prevention of falls, memory training or physiotherapy treatment are also available.
de: Daher kann man zusätzliche Angebote wie Sturzprävention, Gedächtnistraining oder eine physiotherapeutische Behandlung nutzen.
translated_de: This is why there are additional offers such as sturz prevention, stylisting or physiotherapy.

en: The offers from the senior citizens centre and from Saludis complement each other perfectly.
de: Die Angebote vom Seniorenzentrum und dem Saludis ergänzen sich in idealer Weise.
translated_de: The offers from the Senior Centre and the Saludis are complemented in a more ideal way.

en: Saludis represents prevention, precaution, and rehabilitation.
de: Saludis steht für Prävention, Vorsorge und Reha.
translated_de: Saludis is responsible for prevention, prevention and rehabilitation.

en: "The senior citizens' centre for care and nursing," is how Heike Riedel, managing director of Saludis describes it.
de: "Das Seniorenzentrum für Betreuung und Pflege", schilderte Heike Riedel, Geschäftsführerin von Saludis.
translated_de: The Senior Centre for Support and Care, a statement by Mr Riedel, the CEO of Saludis.

en: Both managers see the reason behind the opening of the new accommodation office in the town centre as democratic change,
de: Den Grund für die Eröffnung des neuen Quartiersbüros in der Innenstadt sehen beide Geschäftsführerinnen besonders im demografischen Wandel.
translated_de: The reason for the opening of the new Quartiers Office in the Innenstadt is that both business leaders are particularly in the democracy.

en: as this makes a good decentralised infrastructure in the individual districts of Bamberg essential in the future.
de: Denn dieser mache eine gute dezentrale Infrastruktur in den einzelnen Stadtteilen von Bamberg in der Zukunft unerlässlich.
translated_de: This is a good central infrastructure in the various areas of Bamberg in the future.

en: Furthermore, as Mayor Wolfgang Metzner (SPD) underlined at the opening ceremony, the accommodation office is also dedicated to dealing with the isolation of old people. "There are numerous activities and offers on the programme and these extend invitations to regular social gatherings".
de: Zudem, so unterstrich Bürgermeister Wolfgang Metzner (SPD) bei den Einweihungsfeierlichkeiten, widme sich das Quartiersbüro auch der Vereinsamung im Alter: "Es stehen zahlreiche Veranstaltungen und Angebote auf dem Programm und diese laden zu einem regelmäßigen geselligen Beisammensein ein".
translated_de: In addition, the Mayor, Wolfgang Metzner (SPD), at the event of the event, widened the club' s s s a number of events and offers on the programme and this was laden to a regular meeting.

en: Thus the social foundation makes a big contribution towards making senior citizens as independent as possible and towards enabling them to live well in their familiar environment.
de: Damit leiste die Sozialstiftung einen großen Beitrag, dass Senioren möglichst selbständig und gut in ihrem vertrauten Umfeld leben können.
translated_de: This contributes to ensuring that senior citizens can live in a more self-sufficient and well-like environment.

en: The accommodation office is open Monday, Wednesday and Friday from 9 a.m. to 2 p.m., Tuesday and Thursday from 4 p.m. to 6 p.m. and Saturdays from 10 a.m. to 12 p.m.
de: Das Quartiersbüro ist geöffnet Montag, Mittwoch und Freitag von 9 bis 14 Uhr, Dienstag und Donnerstag von 16 bis 18 Uhr und samstags von 10 Uhr bis 12 Uhr.
translated_de: The Quartiers Office is open Monday, Wednesday and Friday from 9 to 14 p.m., Tuesday and Donnerstag from 16 to 18 p.m. and Saturdays from 10 to 12 p.m.

en: Eintracht Bamberg vs Würzburger Kickers on 6 October
de: Eintracht Bamberg gegen Würzburger Kickers am 6. Oktober
translated_de: The slam of Bamberg against the Würzburger Kickers on 6 October

en: It's now official: after the fixture for the FC Eintracht Bamberg match against third leaguers Würzburger Kickers could not be settled due to repair works at the Fuchspark stadium, the date has now been set for 6 October.
de: Nun ist es amtlich: Nachdem wegen Sanierungsarbeiten am Fuchsparkstadion der Termin für das Spiel FC Eintracht Bamberg gegen den Drittligisten Würzburger Kickers noch nicht festgelegt worden war, wurde nun der 6. Oktober als Termin festgelegt.
translated_de: It is also a good thing that, after the Sanctions of the Termin for the FC Eintracht Bamberg against the Dritters Würzburger Kickers have not been established, the deadline for the game was now set at 6. Oktober.

en: The meeting between FC Eintracht Bamberg and third league FC Würzburger Kickers in the last 16 of the Bavarian football pools cup is now finally scheduled.
de: Die Begegnung des FC Eintracht Bamberg im Achtelfinale des Bayerischen Fußball Totopokals gegen den Drittligisten FC Würzburger Kickers wurde jetzt endgültig terminiert.
translated_de: The start of the FC' s 'Bamberg' in the Achtelfinal of the Bayer Football Totopokals against the third-placed FC Würzburger Kickers has now been canceled.

en: The match will kick-off on Tuesday, 6 October at 7 p.m. in Bamberg's Fuchspark Stadium.
de: Gespielt wird am Dienstag, den 6. Oktober, um 19. Uhr im Bamberger Fuchsparkstadion.
translated_de: The game will take place on Tuesday, 6. October, at 19 p.m. in the Bamberger Fuchsparkstadion.

en: "We are happy that we now know when the match is going to happen; we can make plans now," says FCE team manager KarlheinzHümmer, confirming that ticket sales are now open.
de: "Wir sind froh, dass wir jetzt wissen, wann das Spiel über die Bühne geht, jetzt haben wir Planungssicherheit", so FCE-Teammanager Karlheinz Hümmer, der auch auf den jetzt gestarteten Kartenvorverkauf hinweist.
translated_de: "We are delighted that we are now aware of what is going on on the stage, now we have planning security," said FCE team manager Karlheinz Hümmer, who also mentions the now launched sales of cards.

en: It's something special for our team to be playing against a third league team.
de: Es ist für unsere Mannschaft was besonderes, gegen einen Drittligisten zu spielen.
translated_de: It is a special situation for our team to play against a third party.

en: We are hoping to get a large number of spectators, and not without reason, because floodlit games have a special appeal.
de: Wir hoffen daher auf zahlreiche Zuschauer, und dies nicht ohne Grund, denn Flutlichtspiele haben ja einen besonderen Reiz.
translated_de: We hope to see a lot of spectators and that is not without reason, because the flutlight games have a special reiz.

en: FC Eintracht Bamberg moved into the last 16 with their victory against district league no. 1 FC Oberhaid (3:1) and at home against regional league no. 1 FC Schweinfurt 05 (3:2).
de: In die Runde der letzten 16 Mannschaften zog der FC Eintracht Bamberg 2010 durch Siege beim Bezirksligisten 1. FC Oberhaid (3:1) und zu Hause gegen den Regionalligisten 1. FC Schweinfurt 05 (3:2) ein.
translated_de: In the last 16 teams, FC Eintracht Bamberg won the title in 2010 at the Regional League 1. FC Oberhaid (3:1) and in House against the Regional League 1. FC Schweinfurt 05 (3:2).

en: The winner of the competition receives €5000 and qualifies for the first round of the DFB club cup 2016/2017.
de: Der Sieger des Wettbewerbs erhält 5000 Euro und qualifiziert sich für die erste Runde des DFB Vereinspokals 2016/2017.
translated_de: The competition winner receives 5000 Euro and qualifies for the first round of the DFB Vereinspokal 2016/2017.

en: The defending champions are SpVgg Unterhaching, who have been relegated to the third league.
de: Titelverteidiger ist Drittligaabsteiger SpVgg Unterhaching.
translated_de: Titleverter is the third party spvgg spvgg spvgg spvgg spvgg spvgg spvgg spvgg spvgg spvgg spvgg spvgg spvgg spvgg spvgg spvgg spvgg spvgg spvgg spvgg spvgg

en: Viennese architect Karl Mang dies at the age of 92
de: Wiener Architekt Karl Mang 92-jährig verstorben
translated_de: Karl Mang, 92, of Vienna

en: Karl Mang, one of the doyens of Viennese architecture, is dead.
de: Karl Mang, einer der Doyens der Wiener Architektur, ist tot.
translated_de: Karl Mang, a doyen of the Vienna architecture, is tot.

en: He died on 5 September at the age of 92, according to the Künstlerhaus on Tuesday.
de: Er verstarb bereits am 5. September im Alter von 92 Jahren, wie das Künstlerhaus am Dienstag mitteilte.
translated_de: It was already a month ago, on 5 September, in the Alter of 92 years, as the artist house was a Tuesday.

en: In Meng the Künstlerhaus has lost an honourary member and at the same time "one of the most important architects of the second half of the 20th century in Vienna," it is reported.
de: Mit Mang verliere das Künstlerhaus ein Ehrenmitglied und zugleich "einen der bedeutendsten Architekten der zweiten Hälfte des 20. Jahrhunderts in Wien", wie es in der Aussendung hieß.
translated_de: The artist house is a member of the gallery and, in the same way, is one of the most important architects of the second half of the 20th century in Vienna, as it was in the broadcast.

en: Born in Vienna in 1922, Meng studied architecture at the Technical University in Vienna under Friedrich Lehmann during and after the second World War.
de: 1922 in Wien geboren, studierte Mang während und nach dem Zweiten Weltkrieg Architektur an der Technischen Hochschule in Wien bei Friedrich Lehmann.
translated_de: 1922, in Vienna, he was born and studied at the Technical High School in Vienna during and after the Second World War.

en: He worked from 1952 as a freelance architect, but was also a teacher, writer and institute director.
de: Seit 1952 arbeitete er als freischaffender Architekt, war aber auch als Lehrer, Schriftsteller und Institutsleiter tätig.
translated_de: Since 1952, he worked as a freelance architect, but was also employed as teacher, writer and institutor.

en: From 1972 to 1983 he was President of the Austrian Institute for Design.
de: Von 1972 bis 1983 war er Präsident des Österreichischen Instituts für Formgebung.
translated_de: From 1972 to 1983, President of the Austrian Institute for Formulation.

en: In the 1980s he was commissioned with the establishment of the treasury chamber in the Vienna Hofburg and the renovation of the Palais Lobkowitz in the Austrian Theatre Museum.
de: In den 80er-Jahren wurde er mit der Einrichtung der Schatzkammer in der Wiener Hofburg und dem Umbau des Palais Lobkowitz in das Österreichische Theatermuseum beauftragt.
translated_de: In the 80s, the establishment of the chamber of the Vienna Hofburg and the construction of the Palais Lobkowitz in the Austrian theatre museum were done.

en: Parking penalty: Tim Wiese throws money at traffic warden
de: Parkstrafe: Tim Wiese bewirft Polizistin mit Geld
translated_de: Parkstrafe: Tim Wiese slams Polizistin with money

en: Ex-footballer Tim Wiese attracts the wrong sort of attention in Bremen
de: Ex-Fußballer Tim Wiese ist in Bremen ungut aufgefallen.
translated_de: The former footballer Tim Wiese is not a good player in Bremen.

en: He was once a footballer but now Tim Wiese, ex-national goalie for Germany who also played for Bremen and Hoffenheim, is a wrestler.
de: Fußballer war einmal, mittlerweile ist Tim Wiese, Ex-Nationaltorhüter in Deutschland und bei Bremen und Hoffenheim engagiert, Wrestler.
translated_de: Footballer was once again a fan, and now Tim Wiese, former nationalist in Germany and in Bremen and Hoffenheim, is a tireless wrestler.

en: According to him he wanted to put on 30 kg of muscle mass in the past two years.
de: 30 Kilogramm Muskelmasse will er laut eigener Aussage in den vergangenen zwei Jahren zugelegt haben.
translated_de: 30 kg of muscle will be weighed according to its own statement in the last two years.

en: On the other hand he hasn't put on any intellectual weight.
de: Intellektuell hat er dagegen nicht zugelegt.
translated_de: Intellektuell has not been able to argue against it.

en: Wiese was just having his hair cut in the centre of Bremen when outside he saw a traffic warden putting a penalty notice on his white Chevrolet Camaro.
de: Wiese ließ sich in der Bremer Innenstadt gerade die Haare schneiden, als er sah, wie draußen eine Parkraum-Wächterin einen Strafzettel für seinen weißen Chevrolet Camaro ausstellte.
translated_de: It is as if the hair was cut in the Bremer interior, as if there was a parking area in the outside, a bottle of wine for his white Chevrolet Camaro.

en: Wiese stormed out of the hairdressers, abused the officer and threw down the money for the fine at her feet, according to a report in the "Bild" newspaper.
de: Wiese stürmte daraufhin aus dem Geschäft, beleidigte die Beamtin und warf ihr die fällige Geldstrafe vor die Füße, wie die "Bild"-Zeitung berichtet.
translated_de: The business has sat on the ground and has been slashed by the 'bild' s snafu' s snafu.

en: The accusation has been confirmed by the town of Bremen but it is not yet known what the consequences of this extraordinary incident will be.
de: Bei der Stadt Bremen bestätigt man die Vorwürfe, ist sich über die Konsequenzen für den ungewöhnlichen Vorfall aber noch nicht im Klaren.
translated_de: The Bremen Council confirms the proposal, but it is not clear what the consequences are for the unusual proposal.

en: "The matter is still being investigated," says a spokesperson for the town of Bremen.
de: "Die Sache befindet sich noch in der Prüfung", heißt es von der Stadt Bremen.
translated_de: "The matter is still in the examination," he said in Bremen.

en: Only after that will it be decided whether charges are going to be pressed against Wiese.
de: Erst danach werde entschieden ob Wiese angezeigt wird, oder nicht.
translated_de: First of all, the decision will be made on how to do it or not.

en: Authorities in Panama destroy 4500 marijuana plants.
de: Behörden von Panama vernichten 4500 Marihuana-Pflanzen

en: The fertile ground and the rainforest climate of Isla del Rey are ideal for growing marijuana plants.

translated_de: The fertile soil and the regenwald-like climate of the Isla del Rey are the best suitable for the species of marijuana.

de: Seit drei Tagen reißen die Behörden Panamas die 4500 Pflanzen aus und verbrennen sie.
translated_de: The Panama Government has resorted to 4500 plants and verbally resorted them for three days.

en: Men set upon 17-year-old Afgan

en: Police are seeking witnesses to an incident in Bad Soden-Salmünster. At about 11.45 on Friday evening, three young men were walking from Bad Soden in the direction of Salmünster.
de: Zeugen sucht die Polizei für einen Vorfall in Bad Soden-Salmünster: Am Freitagabend, gegen 23.45 Uhr, waren drei junge Männer zu Fuß von Bad Soden in Richtung Salmünster unterwegs.
translated_de: Police are witnessing a fall in Bad Soden-Salmünster: Friday evening, at 23 a.m., three young men were walking from Bad Soden in the direction of Salmünster.

de: Einer aus der Gruppe, ein 17 Jahre alter Afghane, folgte nach Angaben der Polizei seinen beiden Freunden in einem Abstand von etwa fünf Metern und rief ihnen zu, dass man doch auf ihn warten möge.

en: Three people were standing on the petrol station premises.

en: One of these men shouted at the youth and hit him in the face with his fist.
de: Einer dieser Männer schrie nun den Jugendlichen an und schlug diesem mit der Faust ins Gesicht.

en: This broke the victim's nose and his nose bled heavily.

en: The perpetrator followed the group to their home in a car and drove past it several times in an ostentatious manner.

de: Unter Zuhilfenahme eines Schlagstockes prügelte man auf das Gesicht und die Oberschenkel des Opfers ein.
translated_de: Under the aid of a slur of slur, one can be slurped on the face and the head of the victims.

en: The injured man had to be taken to hospital for medical care.

translated_de: The final decision was to provide a medical emergency in a hospital.

en: Up to now there is only a vague description of the perpetrators.

en: One was a man of about 5ft 11in tall.
de: Einer der Männer war etwa 1,80 Meter groß.

en: The second attacker was about 5ft 5in tall and was dressed in jeans and a brown and white shirt.
