translated_de: The second squirter should have been a huge one-metre tall and was adorned with a Jean and a braun-white hemd.

en: Police are asking any possible witnesses to contact them by telephone on 0049 6181 100 123.
de: Die Polizei bittet Zeugen und Hinweisgeber, sich unter der Telefonnummer 06181/100-123 zu melden.
translated_de: Police must be able to register witnesses and information officer under the telephone number 06181/100-123.

en: Dr Frank Müller takes over Felstehausen practice and invests €310,000
de: Dr. Frank Müller übernimmt Praxis Felstehausen und investiert 310000 Euro
translated_de: Frank Müller is responsible for practice Felstehausen and invested 310000 Euro

en: Sylvia Müller-Gongoll and Frank Müller (from left) take over practice from Karl-Heinrich and Ursel Felstehausen.
de: Silvia Müller-Gongoll und Frank Müller (von links) übernehmen die Praxis von Karl-Heinrich und Ursel Felstehausen.
translated_de: Silvia Müller-Gongoll and Frank Müller (links) take charge of the practice of Karl-Heinrich and Ursel Felstehausen.

en: The mayor of the joint community, Bernd Bormann, business sponsor Uta Seim-Schwartz and Asendorf's mayor Heinfried Kabbert are delighted at this turn of events.
de: Darüber freuen sich auch Samtgemeindebürgermeister Bernd Bormann, Wirtschaftsförderin Uta Seim-Schwartz und Asendorfs Bürgermeister Heinfried Kabbert.
translated_de: The Samtgemeindebürgermeister Bernd Bormann, the economic supporter Uta Seim-Schwartz and the Asendorf Mayor Heinfried Kabbert are also pleased.

en: Many areas in the country have no doctor – Asendorf by contrast is fortunate: on 1 October Dr Frank Müller is taking over the Felstehausen practice.
de: In vielen Orten auf dem Land fehlen Ärzte - Asendorf dagegen hat Glück: Dort übernimmt Dr. Frank Müller am 1. Oktober die Praxis Felstehausen.
translated_de: In many places on the land, doctors are missing - asendorf has a chance: there is Dr Frank Müller taking over the practice at 1. Oktober.

en: While Ursel Felstehausen is retiring, her husband Karl-Heinrich will spend the next few months working part-time with his successor.
de: Während Ursel Felstehausen in den Ruhestand geht, steht ihr Mann Karl-Heinrich seinem Nachfolger in den nächsten Monaten noch mit einer halben Stelle zur Seite.
translated_de: In the course of his stay in the tranquil area, his Mann Karl-Heinrich will be on the right side in the next month.

en: Dr Müller reopens the practice on 12 October after a period of renovation; by then he will have invested €310,000 in the premises at St.-Marcellusstrasse 6.
de: Nach einer Umbauphase eröffnet Müller die Praxis am 12. Oktober wieder, bis dahin investiert er 310000 Euro in die Räumlichkeiten an der St.-Marcellusstraße 6.
translated_de: After a construction phase, Müller opened the practice on 12 October, and now invests EUR 310000 in the racial conditions at the St. Mary' s Road 6.

en: When the Felstehausens met Frank Müller and his wife Dr Silvia Müller-Gongoll, who at the time were finishing their residencies in Verden hospital and also wanted to take on a practice in the next few years, they liked each other immediately
de: Es war Sympathie auf den ersten Blick, als die Felstehausens vor Jahren Frank Müller und dessen Frau Dr. Silvia Müller-Gongoll kennenlernten, die derzeit ihre Facharztausbildung im Verdener Krankenhaus absolviert und kommendes Jahr ebenfalls in die Praxis einsteigen will.
translated_de: It was a very sympathical approach, as Frank Müller and Silvia Müller-Gongoll, who have been in the field for years, have been familiar with the Felstehausens and who have been in the hospital for years and who will be in practice for years.

en: "It was always in the back of our minds that the Müllers would fit into this practice well," says Dr Ursel Felstehausen and laughs.
de: "Wir hatten immer im Hinterkopf, dass die Müllers gut in diese Praxis passen würden", sagt Dr. Ursel Felstehausen und lacht.
translated_de: "We had always been in the back of the head that Müller would pass on in this practice," said Dr Ursel Felstehausen and his wife.

en: "When we were ready, I simply called them up."
de: "Als es soweit war, hab ich sie einfach angerufen".
translated_de: "So I have just called them."

en: The Müller couple liked the idea of running their own practice in Asendorf in the future.
de: Dem Ehepaar Müller gefiel die Idee, künftig in Asendorf die eigene Praxis zu betreiben.
translated_de: The Ehepaar Müller sprang the idea that asendorf will continue to be the centre of its own practice.

en: "The proximity and the continuous contact with the patients are attractive to us," says 39-year-old Müller.
de: "Die Nähe und der ständige Kontakt zu den Patienten sind für uns sehr attraktiv", sagt der 39-jährige Müller.
translated_de: "The proximity and constant contact with patients are very attractive for us," said Müller, 39 years old.

en: "We want to get to know the families and support them over the years."
de: "Wir möchten die Familien über die Jahre kennenlernen und begleiten".
translated_de: "We want to know and guide families over the years".

en: He also sees being his own boss as a benefit.
de: Als Vorteil sehe er auch, bald sein eigener Chef zu sein.
translated_de: It is also a good idea to have a chef.

en: And so it was agreed that the Müllers would buy the house with the practice.
de: Und so wurde man sich einig, die Müllers kauften das Haus mit der Praxis.
translated_de: And so, the Müllers kaufte the house with the practice.

en: However in the meantime they are living in Bruchhausen-Vilsen.
de: Wohnen werden sie indes weiterhin in Bruchhausen-Vilsen.
translated_de: They will continue to live in Bruchhausen-Vilsen.

en: Father of two Frank Müller also grew up there and after his medical studies in Hanover he worked in a number of medical practices as well as in hospitals in Sulingen, Nienburg und Rotenburg.
de: Dort ist der zweifache Familienvater Frank Müller auch aufgewachsen, seinem Medizinstudium in Hannover folgten Stationen in mehreren Arztpraxen sowie in den Krankenhäusern in Sulingen, Nienburg und Rotenburg.
translated_de: In the same area, Frank Müller is a double-family worker and his medical study in Hannover is a continuation of several medical clinics and in hospitals in Sulingen, Nienburg and Rotenburg.

en: He is currently working as a consultant in Sulingen, furthermore he was appointed chief emergency doctor in the county of Diepholz in 2009 and was involved on a voluntary basis in the blood donation service in Bruchhausen-Vilsen.
de: Zurzeit ist er als Oberarzt in Sulingen tätig, ferner wurde er 2009 zum leitenden Notarzt im Kreis Diepholz bestellt und engagiert sich ehrenamtlich in der DRK-Bereitschaft Bruchhausen-Vilsen.
translated_de: He is currently a senior doctor in Sulingen, and since 2009 he was appointed as the chief noturgeon in the Kreis Diepholz and he was actively involved in the DRK-Bereitschaft Bruchhausen-Vilsen.

en: From 19 September the practice will be preparing for the new boss.
de: Ab dem 19. September wird die Praxis für den neuen Chef vorbereitet.
translated_de: The practice for the new chef will be prepared on 19 September.

en: While surgeon Dr Karl-Heinrich Felstehausen worked as a general practitioner, his wife Ursel (a specialist in internal medicine) specialised in gastroenterology.
de: Während der Chirurg Dr. Karl-Heinrich Felstehausen als Hausarzt arbeitet, hat sich seine Gattin Ursel (Internistin) auf die Gastroenterologie spezialisiert.
translated_de: In the Chirurgical Department, Dr Karl-Heinrich Felstehausen is a Hausarzt and has specialised his Gattin Ursel (Internist) on gastroenterology.

en: The Müllers, both specialists in internal medicine, wanted to establish themselves as general practitioners.
de: Die Müllers, beide Internisten, wollen sich als Hausärzte niederlassen.
translated_de: The Müllers, both Internists, want to be a house-aid.

en: "So it's out with the endoscopy," says 38-year-old Sylvia Müller-Gongoll.
de: "Die Endoskopie kommt daher raus", sagt die 38-jährige Silvia Müller-Gongoll.
translated_de: "The endoskopie is therefore a rauss," said Silvia Müller-Gongoll, 38.

en: After the conversion the rooms will look more modern.
de: Nach dem Umbau werden die Räume moderner aussehen.
translated_de: The modern rooms will be enlarged after the renovation.

en: We will offer more ultrasound examinations as well as long-term and stress EKGs and we need one more consulting room.
de: Wir werden mehr Ultraschall-Untersuchungen sowie Langzeit- und Belastungs-EKGs anbieten und brauchen ein Sprechzimmer mehr.
translated_de: We will offer more Ultra-Scale-Scale-Scale-Scale-Scale-Scale-Scale-Scale-Scale-Scale-Scale-Scale-Scale-Scale-Scale-Scale-Scale-Scale-Scale-Scale-Scale-Scale-Scale-Scale-Scale-Scale-Scale

en: The IT system will also be completely renewed.
de: Außerdem wird die EDV komplett erneuert.
translated_de: The EDV will also be completely renewed.

en: The Müllers are receiving a grant totalling €50,000 as part of a funding programme from the county (€2,500) as well as from the joint community (€12,500) and the local authority (€12,500).
de: Einen Zuschuss von insgesamt 50000 Euro bekommen die Müllers im Rahmen eines Förderprogramms vom Landkreis (25000 Euro) sowie von der Samtgemeinde (12500 Euro) und der Gemeinde (12500 Euro).
translated_de: A total of 50 000 euros is given to the Müllers in the framework of a programme of funding from the Landkreis (25.000 Euro), the Samtgemeinde (12500 Euro) and the Community (12500 Euro).

en: "This shows how proud and happy we are that the practice will carry on," stressed the mayor of the joint community Bernd Bormann.
de: "Das zeigt, wie stolz und froh wir sind, dass die Praxis weitergeführt wird", betont Samtgemeindebürgermeister Bernd Bormann.
translated_de: "This shows how proud and proud we are that the practice will be further embraced," he said.

en: According to Sylvia Müller-Gongoll, some 2,000 patients visit the Felstehausen practice every quarter; in north Germany the average practice sees about 500.
de: Etwa 2000 Patienten kommen laut Silvia Müller-Gongoll jedes Quartal in die Praxis Felstehausen, in der norddeutschen Durchschnittspraxis sind es etwa 500.
translated_de: About 2000 patients are reported by Silvia Müller-Gongoll, each of the criteria in the practice Felstehausen, in the nord-deutsche average practice, is about 500.

en: There is another GP practice in Asendorf.
de: In Asendorf gibt es noch eine weitere Hausarztpraxis.
translated_de: In Asendorf there is another house veterinary practice.

en: Frank Müller says that there is another side benefit of their taking over the practice: according to Ursel Felstehausen, the chemist will stay in Asendorf.
de: Ein positiver Nebeneffekt der Praxisübernahme durch Frank Müller: Die Apotheke bleibt laut Ursel Felstehausen in Asendorf.
translated_de: The positive side of practice by Frank Müller: The pharmacy remains in Asendorf, according to Ursel Felstehausen.

en: If they hadn't found any successor, it would have closed down.
de: Wenn sich kein Nachfolger gefunden hätte, wäre sie auch gegangen.
translated_de: If there were no other people who would have been there, they would also be here.

en: Anyone visiting the Müllers' surgery will also first of all see familiar faces: they are taking over the seven medical assistants and the cleaner from the Felstehausens.
de: Wer Müllers Sprechstunde besucht, schaut übrigens auch weiterhin vor allem in vertraute Gesichter: übernimmt die sieben medizinischen Fachangestellten und die Reinigungskraft von den Felstehausens.
translated_de: The Müller speech will certainly be a very familiar one, especially in the face of the seven medical professionals and the cleaning power of the Felstehausen.

en: With their leaving, an era ends in Asendorf; after all the doctors have had their practice there for 30 years.
de: Mit deren Abschied endet in Asendorf eine Ära, immerhin haben die Mediziner 30 Jahre lang dort praktiziert.
translated_de: The decision in Asendorf has always been a ra where the medical profession has been practicing for 30 years.

en: "We started with only two rooms," remembers Ursel Felstehausen with a grin.
de: "Am Anfang hatten wir nur zwei Räume", erinnert sich Ursel Felstehausen schmunzelnd.
translated_de: "Am beginning only two rooms" - a smoky smoky smoky smoky smoky smoky smoky smoky smoky smoky smoky smoky smoky smoky smoky smoky smoky smoky smoky smoky s

en: After such a long time she feels a little wistful.
de: Ein wenig Wehmut verspüre sie nach der langen Zeit schon.
translated_de: It has been a little awesome for a long time.

en: "But we'll still be living in Hohenmoor and I'm sure we will be seeing many of our patients often," says the internal medicine specialist.
de: "Aber wir wohnen ja weiter in Hohenmoor und werden viele Patienten sicher noch oft sehen", sagt die Internistin.
translated_de: "We are staying in Hohenmoor and many patients will be able to see them," said Internistin.

en: Her husband adds with a smile, "We've got a 6000 m² garden."
de: Ihr Mann ergänzt lachend: "Wir haben ein 6000-Quadratmeter-Grundstück."
translated_de: Your Mann added: "We have a 6000-quadratmeter-Grundstück."

en: "Up to now I haven't done much gardening, that might change now."
de: "Bisher habe ich mich immer vor Gartenarbeit gedrückt, jetzt könnte das anders werden".
translated_de: "I have always been putting my garden work on the table, now I could be able to do it."

en: The couple also have two grandchildren and enjoy travelling.
de: Zudem hat das Paar zwei Enkel und reist gerne.
translated_de: The couple has two daughters and is very happy.

en: Croatia: "We are letting the refugees through"
de: Kroatien: "Wir lassen die Flüchtlinge durch"
translated_de: Kroatien: "We let refugees by"

en: "Border control is being brought in now on our southern border too," says Interior Minister Johanna Mikl-Leitner.
de: "Nun werden die Grenzkontrollen auch an unserer Südgrenze hochgefahren", sagte Innenministerin Johanna Mikl-Leitner.
translated_de: "Non, the border controls will also be high in our south", a spokeswoman for the Interior Minister, Johanna Mikl-Leitner.

en: In parallel, checks on the Hungarian border remain in place.
de: Die Kontrollen an der ungarischen Grenze bleiben parallel dazu aufrecht.
translated_de: The controls on the ungarish border remain parallel to that.

en: It is still a priority that anyone wanting to claim asylum can "of course" do so.
de: Nach wie vor sei klar, dass jeder, der einen Asylantrag stellen will, dies auch "selbstverständlich" machen könne.
translated_de: As soon as it is clear that each person who will be able to submit a asylum will be able to make it "separably".

en: The care and safety of people is paramount.
de: Die Versorgung und Sicherheit der Menschen stehe im Vordergrund.
translated_de: The importance of providing and protecting the people is paramount.

en: It is equally clear "that obvious signals are needed," says the minister.
de: Klar sei aber auch, "dass es deutliche Signale braucht", sagte die Ministerin.
translated_de: It is also clear that there is a clear need for a clear signal, said the Minister.

en: People must know that we do not accept an unlimited flow of migration, and not over the Austrian-Slovenian border either.
de: Die Menschen müssen wissen, dass wir grenzenlose Migrationsströme nicht akzeptieren, auch nicht über die österreichisch-slowenische Grenze.
translated_de: The people must know that we do not accept borders, nor are we crossing the Austrian-Slowen border.

en: A controlled procedure is required
de: Es braucht eine kontrollierte Vorgehensweise.
translated_de: It needs a controlled approach.

en: Croatia is considering a "corridor" - Slovenia has refused.
de: Kroatien erwägt "Korridor" - Slowenien verweigert
translated_de: Croatia erwägt "corridor" - Slowenia is a sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sluggish sl

en: The Croatian government had earlier announced that Slovenia also wanted to let incoming refugees travel through towards Austria and Germany, and also potentially establish corridors for the refugees.
de: Die kroatische Regierung hatte zuvor mitgeteilt, auch Slowenien wolle ankommende Flüchtlinge in Richtung Österreich und Deutschland weiterreisen lassen und unter Umständen auch Korridore für die Flüchtlinge errichten.
translated_de: The Croatian Government had previously shared, and Slowenia also allowed refugees to return to Austria and Germany and, under circumstances, also sent refugees to the Korridor.

en: However, Interior Minister Vesna Györkös Znidar in Laibach did not see it in quite the same light.
de: Ganz so sah dies Innenministerin Vesna Györkös Znidar in Laibach allerdings nicht.
translated_de: But the interior minister, Vesna Györkös Znidar, does not.

en: The idea of corridors is "absolutely unacceptable," Sloveina intends rather to step up its surveillance of the borders - especially the border to Hungary.
de: Die Idee von Korridoren sei "absolut inakzeptabel", Slowenien werde vielmehr die Überwachung der Grenze - vor allem zu Ungarn - intensivieren.
translated_de: The idea of Korridors is "absolutely unacceptable" and Slowenia will intensify the surveillance of the border - and, of course, to the point of being ungarned.

en: The border with Croatia, as the external border to the Schengen area, is however already heavily controlled.
de: Die Grenze mit Kroatien sei als Außengrenze des Schengenraums hingegen bereits stark kontrolliert.
translated_de: The border with Croatia is already heavily controlled as a 'external boundary' of the Schengen.

en: But as the Minister stressed, Slovenia is not suggesting sealing its borders for refugees.
de: Wie die Ministerin betonte, will Slowenin damit seine Grenzen für Flüchtlinge aber nicht abriegeln.
translated_de: As Minister said, Slowening will not be able to keep his borders on refugees.

en: "Every member of the EU has to fulfill its obligations, otherwise the system cannot work," stressed Györkös Znidar.
de: "Jedes EU-Mitglied muss seine Verpflichtungen ausfüllen, sonst kann das System nicht funktionieren", betonte Györkös Znidar.
translated_de: "Jeds EU Member must fulfil his obligations, otherwise the system cannot function", he said.

en: According to the Croatian government, the first refugees attempted to enter Eastern Croatia on Monday night over the Tovarnik/Sid border crossing, in order to avoid registration.
de: Wie die kroatische Regierung mitteilte, hätten die ersten Flüchtlinge bereits in den Nachtstunden zum Dienstag versucht, in Ostkroatien am Grenzübergang Tovarnik/Sid vorbei einzureisen, um der Registrierung auszuweichen.
translated_de: As the Croatian government took part, the first refugees had already tried to enter the country in the night of Tuesday, in the East of Croatia, on the border crossing of Tovarnik/Sid, to enter the country.

en: The Croatian police were able to pick them up in the nearby maize field.
de: Die kroatische Polizei konnte sie in den nahen Maisfeldern aufgreifen.
translated_de: The police in the north of the country have stepped up in the near-buttean areas.

en: Since then, according to local media, police vehicles are constantly coming across new refugees in Croatian Tavarnik.
de: Laut lokalen Medien treffen seitdem im kroatischen Tovarnik ständig Polizeifahrzeuge mit neuen Flüchtlingen ein.
translated_de: Local media have gathered in Croatia constantly in police vehicles with new refugees.

en: They are mostly Syrian and Afghans, among them many women and children.
de: Es handle sich vorwiegend um Syrer und Afghanen, darunter zahlreiche Frauen und Kinder.
translated_de: It is a very important role for Syrians and Afghans, among which many women and children.

en: The emergency sevices and the Red Cross are also already in place.
de: Auch Rettungsdienste und das Rote Kreuz seien bereits im Einsatz.
translated_de: So far, rescue services and the Rote Kreuz have been deployed.

en: Interior Minister Ranko Ostojic says that his country is expecting around 4000 refugees in the next few days.
de: In den kommenden Tagen rechne sein Land mit rund 4000 Flüchtlingen, sagte Innenminister Ranko Ostojic.
translated_de: In the coming days, the country will be populated with around 4000 refugees, a spokeswoman for the Interior Minister, Ranko Ostojic.

en: In addition it was reported by both Croatian and Serbian media on Wednesday that buses from Presevo on the Macedonian-Serbian border, which have up to now taken migrants to the Hungarian border, are being diverted to Croatia
de: Zudem würden Busse aus Presevo an der mazedonisch-serbischen Grenze, die bisher Migranten an die ungarische Grenze gebracht hatten, Richtung Kroatien umgeleitet, berichteten kroatische und serbische Medien am Mittwoch übereinstimmend.
translated_de: The buses from Presevo would also be able to take the mazedonian-serb border, which had been imposed by migrants in the ungaric border, towards Croatia, and to report on the Croatian and Serbian media.

en: The government in Belgrade denied, however, that it is the case that they are giving people instructions to take certain routes. "We neither can nor want to do that," they stated.
de: Die Regierung in Belgrad bestritt jedoch, dass sie es sei, die Menschen anweise, bestimmte Routen einzuschlagen: "Weder können wir, noch wollen wir dies tun", hieß es.
translated_de: However, the government in Belgrade has said that it is a way to encourage people to take certain routes: "We can, yet, do what we want to do".

en: According to media reports, at least one bus with around 50 refugees arrived in the Serbian border town of Sid in the early hours, and in the course of the day more buses are expected.
de: Laut den Medienberichten sei jedenfalls in der Früh ein erster Bus mit rund 50 Flüchtlingen in der serbischen Grenzstadt Sid angekommen, im Lauf des Tages würden weitere Busse erwartet.
translated_de: In the early morning, the media reports suggested that a first bus with around 50 refugees in the serb border town of Sid would be coming up in the morning.

en: Over Croatia, Slovenia and Austria to Germany
de: Über Kroatien, Slowenien und Österreich nach Deutschland
translated_de: Croatia, Slovenia and Austria in Germany

en: The detainees were travelling the entire night through Serbia from the Macedonian border, about 500 kilometres away.
de: Die Insassen waren die ganze Nacht von der rund 500 Kilometer entfernten mazedonischen Grenze durch Serbien unterwegs gewesen.
translated_de: The Insassas were travelling the entire night of the 500 km mazedonian border by Serbia.

en: "We heard that Hungary is closed, so the police said we should come here," said one of the refugees.
de: "Wir haben gehört, dass Ungarn zugemacht hat, also hat uns die Polizei gesagt, dass wir hierher fahren sollen", sagte einer der Flüchtlinge.
translated_de: "We have heard that we have been abused, and that police have also said that we should be driving here," said one of the refugees.

en: They wanted to go through Croatia, Slowenia and Austria to get to Germany.
de: Sie wollten durch Kroatien, Slowenien und Österreich weiter nach Deutschland reisen.
translated_de: You wanted to travel further to Germany by Croatia, Slowenia and Austria.

en: This implies that a shift in the former Balkan route through Turkey, Greece, Macedonia, Serbia and Hungary to a route somewhat further to the west, which observers have already predicted, could actually now be happening.
de: Damit könnte es nun tatsächlich zur von Beobachtern bereits vorhergesagten Verschiebung der bisherigen Balkan-Route Türkei-Griechenland-Mazedonien-Serbien-Ungarn zu einer etwas weiter westlich gelegenen Strecke kommen.
translated_de: This could be a further west-facing route for the slums of the previous Balkan-Central Turkey, Turkey, Macedonia, Serbia and Serbia.

en: Croatia: "Widespread options for border control"
de: Kroatien: "Umfassende Möglichkeiten zur Grenzkontrolle"
translated_de: Kroatien: "Umfassend means of border control"

en: Croatian Interior Minister Ostojic had previously stressed that his country has already prepared appropriate plans for potential exceptional situations in the event of a large influx of refugees.
de: Kroatiens Innenminister Ostojic hatte zuvor betont, dass sein Land für den Fall eines starken Zustroms von Flüchtlingen entsprechende Pläne für mögliche Ausnahmesituationen vorbereitet habe.
translated_de: The Interior Minister of Croatia, Mr Ostojic, said that his country was prepared for the fall of a strong surge of refugees to make appropriate plans for possible exception situations.

en: He gave no details, but he indicated that Croatia, as a non-member of the Schengen Treaty, has "widespread options for border control."
de: Details nannte er nicht, er wies aber darauf hin, dass Kroatien als Nicht-Schengen-Mitglied "umfassende Möglichkeiten zur Grenzkontrolle" habe.
translated_de: It is not clear, as well as that Kroatien has "adopting" the possibility of border control as a non-member.

en: Rigorous checks are carried out in order to qualify for membership in the Schegen area.
de: Man führe strenge Kontrollen durch, um sich für die Mitgliedschaft im Schengenraum zu qualifizieren.
translated_de: It is a strict control of the Member States in the Schengen area.

en: Slovenia has been a member since 2007, since when its EU partners have presented a consistently good report on the country as far as border controls are concerned.
de: Slowenien gehört diesem seit 2007 an, die EU-Partner stellen dem Land seitdem durchwegs ein gutes Zeugnis aus, was den Standard der Grenzkontrollen betrifft.
translated_de: Slowenia has been in the process since 2007 and the EU-Partners have been able to prove that Slovakia has been in good hands since the standard of border control.

en: There are also some 300 refugees stuck on the Serbian side behind the Hungarian border fence.
de: Auf serbischer Seite stecken hinter dem ungarischen Grenzzaun weiterhin etwa 300 Flüchtlinge fest.
translated_de: On the serb side, around 300 refugees remain in the ungarised border.

en: According to media reports from Belgrade, they spent the past night at the Horgos border crossing, which leads to Röszke.
de: Laut Belgrader Medienberichten hätten sie die vergangene Nacht am Grenzübergang Horgos, der nach Röszke führt, verbracht.
translated_de: According to Belgrade media reports, they would have bracht the last night of the 'bordering' of Horgos which took place after the earthquake.

en: The Hungarian authorities claim that both the Horgos and the Backi Breg border crossings also remain completely closed.
de: Nach Angaben der ungarischen Behörden bleiben die beiden Grenzübergänge Horgos und Backi Breg weiterhin komplett gesperrt.
translated_de: The two border crossings Horgos and Backi Breg remain completely sperrted, according to the ungaric authorities.

en: Whether the remaining refugees now want to travel on to the Croatian border is still not clear.
de: Ob die verbliebenen Flüchtlinge nun zur kroatischen Grenze weiterreisen wollen, ist noch unklar.
translated_de: The need for refugees to continue to travel to the kroatic border is still unclear.

en: At a local appearance on Wednesday morning, the Serbian Interior Minister, Nebojsa Stefanovic, tried to reassure people: he considers the debate on the refugees' alternative routes after the closure of the Hungarian border to be premature.
de: Der serbische Innenminister Nebojsa Stefanovic versuchte Mittwochfrüh bei einem Lokalaugenschein in Horgos noch zu beruhigen: Er halte die Debatten über Alternativrouten von Flüchtlingen, nachdem die ungarische Grenze nun geschlossen ist, für verfrüht.
translated_de: The serb interior minister, Nebojsa Stefanovic, tried to calm the debate on alternative routes of refugees, which are now closed to the ungaric border.

en: At the moment there is not a large number of refugees involved.
de: Es würde sich derzeit nicht um sehr hohe Flüchtlingszahlen handeln.
translated_de: It would not be a very high number of refugees currently.

en: It is not yet possible to say whether they will continue their journey over Hungary, Croatia or another country.
de: Man könne noch nicht sagen, ob sie ihre Reise über Ungarn, Kroatien oder ein anderes Land fortsetzen würden.
translated_de: It is not possible to say that they would be able to travel through a country of ungarned, croatia or another country.

en: Aid workers advise migrants to take - dangerous - alternative routes.
de: Helfer raten Migranten zu - gefährlichen - Alternativrouten
translated_de: Helfer rate migrants to - dangerous - alternative routes

en: But private Hungarian aid workers have already started to distribute maps marked with alternative routes through Croatia to refugees
de: Allerdings haben private ungarische Flüchtlingshelfer bereits damit begonnen, an die Flüchtlinge Landkarten zu verteilen, auf denen alternative Routen durch Kroatien eingezeichnet sind.
translated_de: However, private ungarish refugees have already begun to share refugees' land cards on alternative routes by Croatia.

en: The border crossing between Serbia and Croatia is however not without danger: in parts of the border region, even 20 years after the end of the Croatian war, there are still uncleared minefields.
de: Der Grenzübertritt zwischen Serbien und Kroatien ist jedoch nicht ungefährlich: In Teilen des Grenzgebietes gibt es auch 20 Jahre nach dem Ende des Kroatienkrieges noch immer nicht geräumte Minenfelder.
translated_de: However, the border between Serbia and Croatia is not dangerous: in some areas of the border there are still no limits on the minefields for 20 years after the Croatiankrieg.

en: On Wednesday afternoon the Croatian police announced that a team of minesweepers has been sent to the border region.
de: Am Mittwochnachmittag gab die kroatische Polizei bekannt, dass ein Team von Minenräumern in der Grenzregion geschickt wurde.
translated_de: The police in the country were aware at the end of the day that a team of mines was sent to the border region.

en: Stock exchange hacker: Ukrainians pay $30 million
de: Börsen-Hacker: Ukrainer zahlen 30 Millionen Dollar
translated_de: Börsen-Hacker: Ukraine pays 30 millions

en: Supranonok belonged to a ring of cyber criminals who since 2010 have repeatedly been accused of providing inside views of as yet unpublished financial reports and press releases on websites such as Business Wire, Marketwired and PR Newswire.
de: Supranonok soll zu einem Ring von Cyberkriminellen gehört haben, dem vorgeworfen wird, sich seit 2010 immer wieder Einblick in noch unveröffentlichte Finanzberichte und Pressemitteilungen auf Websites wie Business Wire, Marketwired und PR Newswire verschafft zu haben.
translated_de: The supranonok should have been a ring of cybercriminality, which will be a major factor in which, since 2010, we have always been able to see the latest financial reports and press releases on websites such as Businesswire, Marketwired and PR Newswire.

en: The information provided enabled insider dealing on the financial markets.
de: Mit den erbeuteten Informationen sollen Insider-Geschäfte an den Finanzmärkten gemacht worden sein.
translated_de: The information contained in the report should be made available to the insiders and the financial markets.

en: By this means, according to investigators, a total of over $100 million was scammed.
de: Auf diese Weise wurden den Ermittlern zufolge insgesamt über 100 Millionen Dollar ergaunert.
translated_de: In this way, the ermittlern have erroneously raised over 100 million dollars.

en: "Current information indicates that even those outside our national borders have finally been caught," an SEC report states.
de: "Der heutige Vergleich zeigt, dass sogar diejenigen außerhalb unserer Landesgrenzen letztlich gefangen werden", heißt es in der SEC-Mitteilung.
translated_de: "The very same comparison shows that sogar those outside our borders are letztlich caught," says the SEC.

en: Proceedings against 32 other suspects in this case are continuing.
de: Die Prozesse gegen 32 weitere Beschuldigte in dem Fall dauerten an.
translated_de: The process against 32 other charges is a long time.

en: Most of the accused come from the Ukraine and Georgia.
de: Die meisten der Angeklagten stammen aus der Ukraine und Georgien.
translated_de: The majority of the complainants are from Ukraine and Georgia.

en: The perpetrators were operating out of both the USA and Eastern Europe.
de: Die Täter sollen sowohl in den USA als auch von Osteuropa aus agiert haben.
translated_de: The täters should be a priority both in the USA and in Europe.

en: Ecumenical Hospice Care celebrates 20 years in Mannheim
de: Ökumenische Hospizhilfe Mannheim besteht seit 20 Jahren
translated_de: The kumeni Hospiz Assistance Mannheim has been in existence for 20 years

en: Business rules around the Paradeplatz in Mannheim
de: Rund um den Mannheimer Paradeplatz herrscht reger Betrieb.
translated_de: The Mannheim Parade is a regular operation.

en: People carry out their errands, some of them walking briskly, some of them strolling along in a leisurely fashion.
de: Die Menschen erledigen ihre Besorgungen, teilweise schnellen Schrittes, teilweise gemütlich bummelnd.
translated_de: People are expressing their concerns, some quick steps, some quiet bummels.

en: They head for the two branches of the Mannheim car showroom.
de: Sie steuern die beiden Stationen des Mannheimer Autosalons am Paradeplatz an.
translated_de: You control the two stations of the Mannheim Autosalons on Parade.

en: Trams stop.
de: Stadtbahnen halten.
translated_de: The streets are still closed.

en: Pulsing, vibrant life in the brilliant autumn sunshine, and right in the middle are four big blackboards each bearing the words, "Before I die I want to…"
de: Pulsierendes, pralles Leben bei herrlichem Herbstsonnenschein und mittendrin vier große Tafeln jeweils mit der Überschrift "Bevor ich sterbe möchte ich"....
translated_de: The slur of the slur of the autumn sunshine and the mittendrin four large tafels each have the title "I want to sterbe"...

en: The Ecumenical Hospice Care organisation is carrying out this campaign to raise awareness of their 20th anniversary, and is encountering extremely mixed reactions.
de: Die Ökumenische Hospizhilfe machte mit dieser Aktion auf ihr 20-jähriges Bestehen aufmerksam und sieht sich durchaus mit gemischten Reaktionen konfrontiert.
translated_de: The European Hospiz Assistance has been able to take action on its 20-year history and is confronted with a number of positive reactions.

en: "It's about life, which is why we are carrying out this campaign in the middle of the town, right among the people," says Josefine Lammer.
de: "Es geht ums Leben, daher sind wir mit der Aktion mitten in die Stadt und unter die Menschen gegangen", sagt Josefine Lammer.
translated_de: "It is a life, we are now in the city and under the people", says Josefine Lammer.

en: The head of Ecumenical Hospice Care is also available to answer questions from and have discussions with passers-by, as are voluntary workers.
de: Die Leiterin der Ökumenischen Hospizhilfe steht den Passanten ebenso für Fragen und Gespräche zur Verfügung wie die ehrenamtlichen Mitarbeiter.
translated_de: The Director of the European Hospiz Assistance is also available to the Passants for questions and discussions as the volunteers.

en: While many passers-by impulsively grab the chalk and complete the sentence with "affirm my life", "be able to read", "drive through the USA in a camper van", "stop war" or "not suffer for long", others stop briefly, read, say things like "I'm not ready for that yet", and carry on.
de: Während manch ein Passant spontan zur Kreide greift und den Satz um "mein Leben bejahen", "lesen können", "mit dem Camper durch die USA fahren", "den Krieg stoppen" oder "nicht lange leiden" ergänzt, bleiben andere kurz stehen, lesen, sagen Sätze wie "so weit bin ich noch nicht" und gehen dann weiter.
translated_de: In the course of a passage spontanely to Kreide, the phrase "mein life" is a stipulation, "lesen can", "mit the camper by the USA" or "not long-term" is a short term term, as I say, and then continue.

en: Again and again little discussions develop in corners about the campaign itself, about life, about dealing with dying.
de: Immer wieder entwickeln sich am Rande kleine Diskussionen über die Aktion an sich, über das Leben, den Umgang mit dem Sterben.
translated_de: We continue to develop in Rande small discussions about the action, about the life, the relationship with the dead.

en: Peter Hübinger is also there now.
de: Auch Peter Hübinger ist gerade vor Ort.
translated_de: Peter Hübinger is just in the area.

en: "It's only when I consider that some day the end of this world is going to come for me that I can live responsibly," says the Director of the Protestant social charity Diakonischen Werk in Mannheim, which is a responsible body along with the Caritas Association for Ecumenical Hospice Care.
de: "Nur wenn ich mir klar mache, dass für mich irgendwann das Ende auf dieser Welt kommt, kann ich verantwortungsvoll leben", sagt der Direktor des Diakonischen Werkes Mannheim, das gemeinsam mit dem Caritasverband Träger der Ökumenischen Hospizhilfe ist.
translated_de: "If I understand that I can end up in this world, I can live fully," said the director of the Diakonic Works Mannheim, who is jointly with the Caritas Association to support the kumeni humanitarian aid.

en: Which is why these high visibility campaigns are good for the 20-year-old organisation.
de: Daher sei diese öffentlichkeitswirksame Aktion zum 20-Jährigen gut.
translated_de: This public action is therefore good for 20 years.

en: Of course it's understandable that not everyone wants to share their message publicly on the blackboards; in the end it's a very personal matter.
de: Dass sich nicht jeder auf den Tafeln öffentlich mitteilen wolle, sei jedoch verständlich, schließlich handle es sich um eine sehr persönliche Sache.
translated_de: It is not clear that anyone in the public opinion is willing to share this with us, but it is clear that it is a very personal matter.

en: The topics of life and death are still steeped in taboos, according to Josefine Lammer's experience, although the hospice movement even over the last few years has done much to help people to accept it.
de: Das Thema Tod und Sterben sei nach wie vor mit Tabus behaftet, so die Erfahrung von Josefine Lammer, wenngleich gerade die Hospizbewegung in den letzten Jahren viel dazu beigetragen habe, dass sich die Menschen öffnen.
translated_de: The topic of tod and death is as much as it was with Tabus, so the experience of Josefine Lammer, who has largely supported the holocaust movement in recent years, has opened the eyes of the people.

en: A perception shared by Angelika Godefroid.
de: Eine Einschätzung, die Angelika Godefroid teilt.
translated_de: A view of Angelika Godefroid.

en: The volunteer worker, who helps people to deal with death and grief, has been with the organisation from the start.
de: Die Sterbe- und Trauerbegleiterin gehört zu den ehrenamtlichen Mitarbeitern der ersten Stunde.
translated_de: The Sterbe- and Trauerbegleiters are the volunteers who have been working in the first hour.

en: Having been confronted with personal experiences of these issues she read a lot of literature and decided she wanted to get involved in helping people who are dying.
de: Durch persönliches Erleben mit der Thematik konfrontiert, las sie viel Literatur und entschied sich, sich in der Sterbehilfe engagieren zu wollen.
translated_de: Through personal life with thematics, they have a lot of literature and are willing to engage in support.

en: When the Ecumenical Hospice Care organisation appealed for volunteer helpers, she signed up immediately and was with them when they started up in 1995.
de: Als die Ökumenische Hospizhilfe per Aufruf Ehrenamtliche suchte, habe sie sich sofort gemeldet und sei bei der Gründung im Jahr 1995 dabei gewesen.
translated_de: As the humanitarian aid for the kumenes was a 'honest' s aid, they have immediately been reported and they have been involved in the creation of the organization in 1995.

en: Godefroid belongs to a team of 45 volunteers - 43 women and two men - who help those people affected and their relatives in private households, hospitals, care homes and in the Sankt Vincent Hospice.
de: Godefroid gehört zu einem Team von 45 Ehrenamtlichen - 43 Frauen und zwei Männer - das Betroffene und Angehörige in privaten Haushalten, Krankenhäusern, Pflegeheimen und im Hospiz Sankt Vincent begleitet.
translated_de: Godefroid is a team of 45 honourable women - 43 women and two men - who are involved in private budgets, hospitals, care homes and in the Hospiz Sankt Vincent.

en: They are all carefully trained.
de: Alle sind sie sorgfältig geschult.
translated_de: All are well-sufficiency.

en: Angelika Godefroid is particularly well suited to handling this job and the experiences and everything it entails.
de: Angelika Godefroid kann gut mit ihrer Aufgabe und den dabei gemachten Erfahrungen und Erlebnissen umgehen.
translated_de: Angelika Godefroid can handle her task and immediately respond to the experiences and experiences that have been made.

en: "I see life from a different point of view, I believe it is precious and I seize the moment," she says.
de: "Ich sehe das Leben von einer anderen Warte, halte es für kostbar und schätze den Augenblick", sagt sie.
translated_de: "I think that the life of a second war is kosty and I appreciate the view," he said.

en: The outpatient services offered by the Ecumenical Hospice organisation are free of charge and denominationally independent.
de: Das Angebot des ambulanten Ökumenischen Hospizdienstes ist kostenfrei und konfessionsunabhängig.
translated_de: The service of the ambulant kumeni hospital is free and is subject to a profession.

en: Financial support from health insurance companies and donations by members enable education as well as training sessions, and training and supervision for palliative care providers and grief counsellors.
de: Die finanzielle Unterstützung der Krankenkassen und Spenden von Angehörigen und Vereinen ermöglicht die Schulung sowie Fortbildungen und Supervisionen der Sterbe- und Trauerbegleiter.
translated_de: The financial support for the hospitals and the expenditures of members and associations has enabled the formation, formation and supervision of the Sterbe and Trauerbegleiter.

en: Training for new staff is offered every two years.
de: Alle zwei Jahre werden Schulungen für neue Mitarbeitende angeboten.
translated_de: All two years will be spent on new work.

en: The blackboards, with the messages written on them on Saturday, are now on display in the Evangelical church (M1, 1a) and the Catholic church (F2, 6).
de: Die am Samstag beschriebenen Tafeln sind nun im Haus der evangelischen Kirche (M1, 1a) und im Haus der katholischen Kirche (F2, 6) ausgestellt.
translated_de: The Tafels were presented on Saturday in the House of the Evangelical Church (M1, 1a) and in the House of the Catholic Church (F2, 6).

en: Anyone who wants to can also write their own personal wishes on postcards there.
de: Auch dort können weitere persönliche Wünsche auf Postkarten notiert werden.
translated_de: There are also other personal requests on postcards.

en: FedEx earnings mixed, lowers fiscal 2016 outlook
de: FedEx-Ergebnis gemischt, Finanz-Aussichten für 2016 gesenkt
translated_de: FedEx-Ergebnis gemischt, financial perspectives for 2016

en: FedEx reported disappointing results for its latest quarter, and the delivery giant cut its full-year profit forecast on weaker demand for freight services and higher costs in its ground division.
de: FedEx berichtet enttäuschende Ergebnisse für das letzte Quartal, und der Liefer-Gigant senkte seinen Gewinnausblick auf ein ganzes Jahr wegen der schwächeren Nachfrage nach Frachtdiensten und höheren Kosten in seinem Bodentransportdienst.
translated_de: FedEx reported disappointing results for the last quarter and the supplier' s profit was sown for a whole year due to the weak demand for freight services and higher costs in its ground transport service.

en: The company also said it plans to hire about 55,000 seasonal workers for the holidays.
de: Die Firma sagte auch, dass sie plant, etwa 55.000 Saisonarbeiter für den Urlaub anzuheuern.
translated_de: The company also said that they would be able to hire around 55.000 seasonal workers for the holiday.

en: At this time last year, FedEx announced it would hire 50,000 seasonal workers for the holidays.
de: Zu diesem Zeitpunkt im vergangenen Jahr kündigte FedEx an, dass das Unternehmen 50.000 Saisonarbeiter für die Urlaubszeit einstellen möchte.
translated_de: In the last year, FedEx announced that 50.000 seasonal workers would be able to work for the holiday season.

en: Its shares fell about 2.5 percent in premarket trading 45 minutes ahead of Wednesday's opening bell.
de: Die Aktie fiel über 2,5 Prozent im Premarket-Handel 45 Minuten vor der Eröffnung am Mittwoch.
translated_de: The Aktie is about 2% in the Premarket Market for 45 minutes before the opening of the lunch.

en: FedEx Corp. said that it expects to earn between $10.40 and $10.90 for the fiscal year that ends next May, down 20 cents from an earlier prediction.
de: FedEx Corp. sagte, einen Gewinn zwischen 10,40 $ und 10,90 $ im Geschäftsjahr zu verdienen, das im nächsten Mai endet, 20 Cent weniger als bei der früheren Vorhersage.
translated_de: FedEx Corp. said that a profit between 10,40 and 10,90 $ would be earned in the business year, which ended in the next Mai, 20 Cent less than the previous year.

en: Analysts expected $10.84, according to a survey by FactSet.
de: Analysten erwarteten laut einer Umfrage von FactSet 10,84 $.
translated_de: Analysts expect to see a question of FactSet - a total of $ 10.84.

en: The reduced outlook comes despite rate hikes averaging 4.9 percent, which will take effect Jan. 4, and higher surcharges for ground shipment of heavy or large packages, which begin in November.
de: Die geringere Aussicht kommt trotz der Preiserhöhungen, die durchschnittlich 4,9 Prozent betragen und am 4. Januar wirksam werden und trotz höherer Zuschläge für Bodentransporte von schweren und großen Paketen, die ab November erhoben werden.
translated_de: The low chance is due to the price hikes, which are averaging 4%, and which are effective on 4 January, and to higher subsidies for ground transport of heavy and large packages which will be collected in November.

en: The company said it still expects earnings to grow over the previous year because of cost-cutting, higher revenue and growth in online commerce.
de: Das Unternehmen sagte, dass es dennoch erwarte, dass das Ergebnis gegenüber dem Vorjahr aufgrund von Kostensenkung, höheren Einnahmen und wegen des Wachstums im Online-Handel sich steigern werde.
translated_de: The company said that, however, it was a warning that the result will be lowered by the year due to costs, higher revenues and increased growth in the online market.

en: Chairman and CEO Fred Smith said the company was "performing solidly given weaker-than-expected economic conditions, especially in manufacturing and global trade."
de: Chairman und CEO Fred Smith sagte, dass das Unternehmen "solide Erträge erbringt, wenn man die schwächer als erwarteten wirtschaftlichen Bedingungen, vor allem in Fertigung und globalem Handel, in Betracht zieht".
translated_de: Chairman and CEO Fred Smith said that the company "has strong earnings when it is viewed as a competitive market, particularly in manufacturing and global handiwork".

en: The holiday-hiring plans were announced a day after rival UPS said that that it plans to hire 90,000 to 95,000 extra workers, about the same that it hired last year.
de: Die Pläne für die Ferien-Beschäftigung wurden einen Tag später als die des Rivalen UPS angekündigt, der plant, 90.000 bis 95.000 zusätzliche Arbeitskräfte, etwa die gleiche Anzahl wie im letzten Jahr, einzustellen.
translated_de: The plans for the holiday damage were announced one day later than the rival UPS plant, which employs between 90.000 and 95.000 additional workers, around the same number as last year.

en: In the quarter that ended Aug. 31, FedEx earned $692 million, up 6 percent from a year earlier.
de: Im Quartal, das am 31. August endete, verdiente FedEx 692 Millionen $, 6 Prozent mehr als im Vorjahr.
translated_de: The Quartal, which ended 31 August, earned FedEx 692 million dollars, 6 percent more than in the previous year.

en: Earnings per share amounted to $2.42, short of the $2.44 per share average forecast of 12 analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research.
de: Das Ergebnis je Aktie belief sich auf 2,42 $ pro Aktie, knapp hinter den 2,44 $ pro Aktie, die zwölf von Zacks Investment Research befragte Analysten vorhersagten.
translated_de: The result of this is a belief in a value of 2.42 USD pro Aktie, just below the value of 2.44 USD, which is the 12 Analysts asked by Zacks Investment Research.

en: Revenue rose 5 percent, to $12.3 billion.
de: Der Umsatz stieg um 5 Prozent auf 12,3 Milliarden $.
translated_de: The sales of the company increased by 5 percent, compared with 12,3 billion dollars.

en: Six analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $12.23 billion.
de: Sechs von Zacks befragte Analysten erwarteten 12,23 Milliarden $.
translated_de: The question asked by analysts is that the sum of 1223 billion is expected.

en: FedEx has been hit in recent years by a decline in priority international shipping, which has caused revenue in its Express unit to stagnate.
de: FedEx hat in den letzten Jahren einen Rückgang beim internationalen Prioritäts-Versand zu verzeichnen, der den Umsatz in seiner Einheit Express-Versand zum Stagnieren brachte.
translated_de: FedEx has resigned its position in the international prioritariat market in recent years, bringing the revenue in its unit Express market to a standstill.

en: But the boom in online shopping has boosted results at FedEx Ground.
de: Aber der Boom im Online-Shopping hat die Ergebnisse bei FedEx Ground gesteigert.
translated_de: But the boom in online shopping has increased the results of FedEx Ground.

en: In the latest quarter, ground revenue rose 29 percent but operating income was basically flat on higher costs for larger packages and self-insurance.
de: Im letzten Quartal stieg der Umsatz beim Bodentransport um 29 Prozent, aber das operative Ergebnis war im Grunde flach wegen höherer Kosten für größere Pakete und Selbstversicherung.
translated_de: The last quarter of the total sales for ground transport increased to 29 percent, but the result was a result of higher costs for larger packages and self-insurance.

en: The express unit saw higher income because of higher base rates, while income fell in the freight business on higher labor costs.
de: Die Express-Einheit verzeichnete höhere Einnahmen aufgrund höherer Preise, während das Ergebnis wegen höherer Arbeitskosten im Frachtgeschäft sank.
translated_de: The Express-Einheit resulted in higher revenues due to higher prices, while the result was a result of higher wages in the freight business.

en: In premarket trading about an hour before the opening bell, FedEx shares were down $3.85, or 2.5 percent, to $150.15.
de: Im Premarket-Handel, etwa eine Stunde vor der Öffnung, sanken die FedEx-Aktien um 3,85 $, oder 2,5 Prozent, auf 150,15 $.
translated_de: In the premarket market, a hour before the opening, the FedEx activity was sunk at 3.385 $, or 2.4 percent, at 150,15 $.

en: They closed Tuesday down 11 percent for the year and 17 percent below a record high on June 11.
de: Am Dienstag schlossen sie mit 11 Prozent Verlust für das Jahr und 17 Prozent unter einem Rekordhoch am 11. Juni.
translated_de: The report was approved on Tuesday with 11 percent loss for the year and 17 percent under a record high on 11 June.

en: At their most anticipated meeting in years, Federal Reserve policymakers will spend two days this week seated around a 27-foot Honduran mahogany table deciding if it's time to raise a key interest rate for the first time in nearly a decade.
de: Auf ihrer am meisten erwarteten Tagung im Jahre verbringen Federal Reserve Strategen zwei Tage diese Woche rund um einen 27-Fuß Honduras-Mahagoni-Tisch sitzend, um zu entscheiden, ob es Zeit ist, zum ersten Mal seit fast einem Jahrzehnt den Leitzins anzuheben.
translated_de: The most anticipated day of the year is the second time this week, when the Federal Reserve is sitting at a 27-year-old Honduras-Mahagoni-Tieth, to decide whether it is time to raise the levy of the levy in the first place since a decade ago.

en: Looming over them at one end of the central bank's ornate, two-story boardroom will be a mural of the United States.
de: Drohend über ihnen an einem Ende des verzierten, zweigeschossigen Sitzungssaals befindet sich ein Wandbild der Vereinigten Staaten.
translated_de: The resurgence of the two-story sittings is a wall of the United States.

en: The map is a reminder that Fed Chairwoman Janet L. Yellen and her colleagues are supposed to put the nation's economic interests above all others.
de: Die Karte ist eine Erinnerung daran, dass die Fed-Vorsitzende Janet L. Yellen und ihre Kollegen die wirtschaftlichen Interessen der Nation vor alle anderen Dinge setzen soll.
translated_de: The card is a reminder that the Fed President Janet L. Yellen and his colleagues should set the economic interests of the nation all the other things.

en: The central bank has a dual charge from Congress: maximize U.S. employment and keep prices here stable.
de: Die Zentralbank hat einen zweifachen Auftrag vom Kongress: Maximierung der US-Beschäftigung und Preise hier stabil halten.
translated_de: The Central Bank has a two-fold task on its own: to keep the US economy and prices stable here.

en: But since the Great Recession, Fed leaders have acknowledged that there's an unwritten third mandate: financial stability.
de: Aber seit der großen Rezession haben die Fed Führer anerkannt, dass es ein ungeschriebenes drittes Mandat gibt: finanzielle Stabilität.
translated_de: But since the massive recession, the Fed leader has recognised that there is a third mandate which is not written: financial stability.

en: And that third mandate could be the X-factor in a too-close-to-predict decision, to be announced Thursday, about whether the U.S. economy is ready to start being weaned from the unprecedented stimulus provided by the near-zero short-term interest rate in place since late 2008.
de: Und dieses dritte Mandat könnte der X-Faktor in einer Entscheidung sei, die zu eng ist, um sie vorherzusagen. Es wird am Donnerstag bekannt gegeben, ob die US-Wirtschaft startbereit ist, von dem beispiellosen Anreiz durch den nahe an Null liegenden kurzfristigen Zinssatz seit Ende 2008 entwöhnt zu werden.
translated_de: This third mandate could be a decision which would be a precedent for the X-factor, as it is known by the Donnerstag that the US-Wirtschaft is starting to see the resulting in a sluggish interest in the near-term Zinssatz since 2008.

en: Even though most data show the economy growing solidly, the recent turmoil in global financial markets could make already-cautious Fed officials skittish about adding to the volatility by raising their benchmark federal funds rate - even by no more than a mere quarter of a percentage point.
de: Obwohl die meisten Daten der Wirtschaft zeigen, dass sie solide wächst, könnten die jüngsten Turbulenzen an den globalen Finanzmärkten die bereits vorsichtigen Fed-Repräsentanten ängstlich machen, diese Volatilität durch die Anhebung des Zinses für Bundesanleihen zu verstärken - und sei es auch nur um einen Viertel Prozentpunkt.
translated_de: Although most economic data show that they are growing, the recent turmoil could be a major factor in the global financial markets which have already been sighted by Fed representatives, this volatility would be boosted by the amplification of the Zins for Federal bonds - and this is only a quarter of the point.

en: "Obviously the labor market and inflation is going to be first and foremost the most important thing they watch," said Lindsey M. Piegza, chief economist at brokerage firm Stifel Nicolaus & Co.
de: "Offensichtlich wird der Arbeitsmarkt und die Inflation in erster Linie das wichtigste sein, was sie beobachten", sagte Lindsey M. Piegza, Chefökonomin bei der Maklerfirma Stifel Nicolaus & Co.
translated_de: "Offensively, the employment market and inflation are the most important factors to observe," said Lindsey M. Piegza, chef-of-the-breath at the Maklerfirma Stifel Nicolaus & Co.

en: "But I think if they were looking for an excuse not to raise the rate, the increased uncertainty surrounding the global marketplace is enough to provide them with justification to wait further," she said.
de: "Aber ich denke, wenn sie auf der Suche nach einem Vorwand waren, den Zinssatz nicht zu erhöhen, ist die erhöhte Unsicherheit rund um den globalen Markt genug Rechtfertigung, weiterhin zu warten", sagte sie.
translated_de: "I think that if they were looking for a proposal, the Zinssatz would not increase, the increased uncertainty around the global market is still a sufficient amount of legal preparation," said the spokesman.

en: There's no consensus about what the Fed will do, which in itself is causing financial market jitters.
de: Es gibt keinen Konsens darüber, was die Fed tun wird, was an sich selbst den Finanzmarkt verunsichert.
translated_de: There is no consensus on what the Fed will do, which is itself a financial market.

en: About half of economists surveyed recently by Bloomberg predicted a rate increase this week.
de: Etwa die Hälfte der Ökonomen, die vor kurzem von Bloomberg befragt wurden, haben eine Zinserhöhung diese Woche vorhergesagt.
translated_de: A quarter of the konomen asked by Bloomberg last week have already said a Zinserhöhung this week.

en: Financial markets, however, are expecting the Fed to hold off, with a key indicator showing only about a 30% chance of a boost.
de: Die Finanzmärkte erwarten jedoch ein Abwarten der Fed, mit einem Schlüsselindikator, der nur eine 30 % Chance auf eine Erhöhung anzeigt.
translated_de: The financial markets are not yet expecting a Fed refusal to provide a key indicator, which only has a 30% chance of a recurrence.

en: That would point to a stock market drop if the Fed raises the rate, unless policymakers were to soften the blow by promising that another increase would be a ways off.
de: Dies deutet auf einen Rückgang des Aktienmarktes hin, falls die Fed den Satz erhöht, es sei denn, dass die Strategen den Schlag abmildern, indem sie versprechen, dass eine weitere Steigerung weit entfernt ist.
translated_de: This is a result of a return to the stock market, because the Fed has increased its position, because the rate of interest is a blow to the head, if they promise that there is a further increase.

en: On Tuesday, the Dow Jones industrial average jumped 228.89 points, or 1.4%, to 16,599.85.
de: Am Dienstag sprang der Dow Jones Industrial Durchschnittswert um 228,89 Punkte oder um 1,4 % auf 16.599,85.
translated_de: On Tuesday, Dow Jones Industrial Average reached 228,89 points or 1,4% on 16,599,85.

en: The rally was triggered by expectations that Fed policymakers will hold the rate steady this week, said John Lonski, chief economist at Moody's Capital Markets Research Group.
de: Die Aktion wurde durch Erwartungen ausgelöst, dass die Fed-Politik den Satz in dieser Woche aufrechterhält, sagte John Lonski, Chefökonom bei Moody's Capital Markets Research Group.
translated_de: The action was triggered by the warning that Fed policy was able to correct the statement in this week, said John Lonski, Chefökonom at Moody's Capital Market Research Group.

en: "It would be a surprise if the Fed hiked rates at this point in time," he said.
de: Es wäre eine Überraschung, wenn die Fed die Sätze zu diesem Zeitpunkt heben würde", sagte er.
translated_de: It would be a surprise if the Fed would raise the question at this time", he said.

en: If Fed policymakers did, "they would have to go to great lengths in their policy statement to hold financial markets' hands so they don't panic."
de: Falls sie es tut, "müsste sie in ihrer Erklärung sehr weit gehen, um die Finanzmärkte zu beruhigen, damit sie nicht in Panik geraten."
translated_de: If they do, "they should go very far in their declaration to calm the financial markets, so that they do not go to Panik."

en: Other experts argued that a rate increase would calm financial markets because it would remove uncertainty about when the Fed would act.
de: Andere Experten argumentierten, dass eine Zinserhöhung die Finanzmärkte beruhigen würde, weil sie die Unsicherheit darüber, wann die Fed handeln wird, beseitigen würde.
translated_de: Other experts argue that a Zinserhöhung would be calm because they would be unable to control the uncertainty of what the Fed will be doing.

en: Just a month ago, the Fed seemed on track to raise the rate by 0.25 percentage point this month, the first small step in a slow tightening of monetary conditions that would validate the strength of the U.S. recovery.
de: Noch vor einem Monat schien die Fed auf gutem Wege, den Satz um 0,25 Prozentpunkte in diesem Monat zu erhöhen, der erste kleine Schritt in einer langsamen Verschärfung der monetären Bedingungen, die die Stärke der Erholung in den USA testen würde.
translated_de: The Fed is still on good track for a month, with a set of 0.025 percent in this month, the first small step in a gradual escalating of monetary conditions which would test the strength of recovery in the USA.

en: Yellen had said through the spring and early summer that she expected a rate increase this year despite complaints from liberals that more economic progress was needed.
de: Yellen hatte im Frühling und im Frühsommer gesagt, dass sie in diesem Jahr trotz der Beschwerden von Liberalen, dass mehr wirtschaftlicher Fortschritt erforderlich wäre, eine Erhöhung des Satzes erwarte.
translated_de: In spring and earlysommer, she said that, in this year, she was able to take advantage of the Liberals' complaints that more economic progress would be needed, and that the statutes were rewritten.

en: Although job creation slowed in August, labor market growth has been solid this year.
de: Obwohl sich die Schaffung von Arbeitsplätzen im August verlangsamte, war die Verbesserung auf dem Arbeitsmarkt in diesem Jahr solide.
translated_de: Although the creation of jobs in August was a major factor, the improvement in the employment market in this year was solid.

en: The unemployment rate dropped to 5.1% last month, the lowest in more than seven years and near the level the Fed considers to be full employment.
de: Die Arbeitslosenquote sank auf 5,1 % im vergangenen Monat, die niedrigste seit mehr als sieben Jahren und in der Nähe des Levels, den die Fed als Vollbeschäftigung ansieht.
translated_de: The unemployment rate has dropped by 5% in the last month, the lowest since more than seven years and in the vicinity of the level where the Fed is putting its jobs under the hood.

en: Wage gains have shown signs of picking up.
de: Lohnsteigerungen haben Anzeichen einer Erholung gezeigt.
translated_de: Lohnsteigerungen have shown signs of a recovery.

en: And although inflation continued to run below the central bank's annual 2% target, Fed policymakers said a key reason was the temporary effect of sharply lower oil prices.
de: Und obwohl die Inflation ständig unter dem Jahresziel von 2 % der Zentralbank verlief, sagten die Fed-Repräsentanten, dass der Hauptgrund die temporäre Wirkung von deutlich niedrigeren Ölpreisen sei.
translated_de: And while inflation continues to rise to 2% in the year, Fed representatives say that the main reason for the rapid effects of significantly lower l prices is the inflation rate.

en: The economy "can cope with higher rates, and needs them, given the tightness of the labor market," said Ian Shepherdson, chief economist at Pantheon Macroeconomics.
de: Die Wirtschaft "kann höhere Zinssätze bewältigen und braucht sie wegen der Anspannung auf dem Arbeitsmarkt", sagte Ian Shepherdson, Chefökonom bei Pantheon Macroeconomics.
translated_de: The economy "cann't afford higher Zinssätze and needs them because of the tension on the job market", said Ian Shepherdson, Chef of Pantheon Macroeconomics.

en: But financial markets around the world started convulsing late last month after China devalued its currency.
de: Aber die Finanzmärkte auf der ganzen Welt zuckten Ende letzten Monats zusammen, nachdem China seine Währung abgewertet hatte.
translated_de: But the financial markets in the world had sunk together for the last month, after China had sunk its currency.

en: The Dow Jones industrial average dropped as much as 16% below its record high in May as investors feared a slowing Chinese economy would drag down global growth.
de: Der Dow Jones Industrial Durchschnittswert fiel im Mai um mehr als 16 % unter seinen Höchststand, als Investoren befürchteten, dass eine Verlangsamung der chinesischen Wirtschaft das globale Wachstum drosseln würde.
translated_de: The Dow Jones Industrial Average was at more than 16% below its maximum level, as investors believe that a compromise of the Chinese economy would lead to global growth.

en: The market has rebounded somewhat this month, with the Dow now down nearly 10% from the May high.
de: Der Markt hat sich in diesem Monat etwas erholt, wobei der Dow jetzt um fast 10 % unter dem Hoch vom Mai liegt.
translated_de: The market has been a bit holster in this month, with the Dow now at fast 10% below the peak of Mai.

en: For Fed policymakers, the market turmoil adds to the complex calculus of when to raise the interest rate.
de: Für die Fed-Repräsentanten beeinflussen die Marktturbulenzen die komplexe Kalkulation, wann man die Zinsen erhöhen solle.
translated_de: For the Fed' s representatives, the complex Kalkulation should be a factor in the market turmoil, if the Zins increase.

en: "Absent what happened in financial markets and the news about the weakness in the Chinese economy over the past couple weeks, they would be tightening at this meeting," said Stephen D. Oliner, a senior research fellow at the UCLA Ziman Center for Real Estate and a former Fed official.
de: "Wenn die Ereignisse auf den Finanzmärkten und die Nachrichten über die Schwäche der chinesischen Wirtschaft in den letzten paar Wochen nicht aufgetreten wären, würden sie in dieser Sitzung die Zügel anziehen", sagte Stephen D. Oliner, Senior Research Fellow am UCLA Ziman Center for Real Estate und ein ehemaliger Mitarbeiter der US-Notenbank.
translated_de: "If the events on the financial markets and the news on the difficulties of the Chinese economy in the last few weeks were not present, would they be a zoo in this sitting", said Stephen D. Oliner, Senior Research Fellow at the UCLA Ziman Center for Real Estate and a former employee of the USNote Bank.

en: Now, he predicts they'll wait at least a month to get a better handle on the effects.
de: Jetzt sagt er voraus, dass sie mindestens einen Monat warten werde, um die Auswirkungen besser in den Griff zu bekommen.
translated_de: Now, he says that they will wait at least one month to get the effects better in the hand.

en: "There's a lot of uncertainty about what the impacts on the U.S. economy are going to be, and they have almost no data to rely on that post-dates the developments in China," Oliner said.
de: "Es gibt eine Menge Unsicherheit darüber, was die Auswirkungen auf die US-Wirtschaft sein werden, und es gibt fast keine verlässlichen Daten, die die Entwicklungen in China beschreiben," sagte Oliner.
translated_de: "There is a lot of uncertainty about the impact on the US economy and there is no reliable data which is a result of the development of China," said Oliner.

en: The health of the global economy isn't one of the Fed's primary concerns, so technically it shouldn't be factored into its decision-making.
de: Die Gesundheit der Weltwirtschaft ist keines der Hauptanliegen der Fed, daher sollte sie technisch bei ihrer Entscheidungsfindung nicht einbezogen werden.
translated_de: The health of the world economy is not the principal issue of the Fed, therefore it should not be taken into account in terms of decision making.

en: But, in effect, the Fed has become the monetary authority of the world.
de: Aber im Endeffekt ist die Fed Währungsbehörde der Welt geworden.
translated_de: But in the end, the Fed Währungs Authority of the world has become a reality.

en: The central bank's influence in recent years has been enormous.
de: Der Einfluss der Zentralbank war in den letzten Jahren enorm.
translated_de: The central bank' s influence has been enormous in recent years.

en: The mere hint by then-Chairman Ben S. Bernanke in 2013 that the Fed might "taper" its monetary expansion triggered market convulsions around the globe.
de: Der bloße Hinweis des damaligen Leiters Ben S. Bernanke im Jahr 2013, dass die Fed ihre monetäre Expansion "verengen" könne, löste Verwirrungen rund um den Globus aus.
translated_de: The simple indication made by the damaligen Leiter Ben S. Bernanke in 2013 that the Fed could "verengen" its monetary expansion, triggered confusion around the Globus.

en: In a world where markets and economies are increasingly intertwined, Fed officials can be expected not only to monitor the developments elsewhere but also to consult with other central bankers and experts to get a better read on the global economy.
de: In einer Welt, in der Märkte und Volkswirtschaften zunehmend miteinander verflochten sind, kann von den Fed-Repräsentanten erwartet werden, dass sie nicht nur die Entwicklungen an anderer Stelle überwachen, sondern sich auch mit anderen Zentralbanken und Experten beraten, um ein besseres Verständnis für die globale Wirtschaft zu erhalten.
translated_de: In a world where markets and economies are increasingly converged, the Fed representatives can expect that they will not only monitor the development of other countries, but also consult with other central banks and experts to gain a better understanding of the global economy.

en: Its decision-making process is "more art than science," said Zachary Karabell, head of global strategy for wealth-management firm Envestnet Inc.
de: Ihre Entscheidungsfindung ist "mehr Kunst als Wissenschaft," sagte Zachary Karabell, Leiter der globalen Strategie für das Vermögensmanagement der Firma Envestnet Inc.
translated_de: Your decision-making is more than science, said Zachary Karabell, head of the global strategy for the management of assets of Envestnet Inc.

en: Jeffrey Lacker, president of the Federal Reserve Bank of Richmond, Va., noted this month that "the Fed has a history of overreacting to financial market movements that seem unconnected to economic fundamentals."
de: Jeffrey Lacker, Präsident der Federal Reserve Bank of Richmond, VA., bemerkte diesen Monat, dass "die Fed eine Geschichte von Überreaktionen auf Finanzmarkt-Bewegungen hat, die mit anscheinend nicht mit den wirtschaftlichen Fundamentaldaten verknüpft sind."
translated_de: Jeffrey Lacker, President of the Federal Reserve Bank of Richmond, VA, said this month that "the Fed has a history of overreactions on financial markets which are not akin to economic fundamental data."

en: Lacker, a voting member of the policymaking Federal Open Market Committee who has been pushing for a rate increase, cited decisions in 1998-99 as an example.
de: Lacker, stimmberechtigtes Mitglied des Federal Open Market Committee, de sich für eine Zinserhöhung einsetzt, zitierte Entscheidungen in den Jahren 1998/1999 als Beispiel.
translated_de: The more qualified Member of the Federal Open Market Committee, who has taken a Zinserhöhung, is a example of a zitated decision in 1998/1999.

en: A financial crisis in Asia led the Fed to cut its benchmark rate by 0.75 percentage point over three meetings "despite limited identifiable implications for U.S. growth," Lacker said.
de: Eine Finanzkrise in Asien brachte die Fed dazu, ihren Leitzins um 0,75 Prozentpunkte in drei Sitzungen "trotz begrenzter erkennbarer Auswirkungen auf das Wachstum in den USA" zu senken, sagte Lacker.
translated_de: The Fed' s interest rate in Asien was a factor in reducing its quotas by a percentage point in three seats, 'trotz affecting the growth in the USA', said Lacker.

en: A year later, Fed officials reversed those cuts.
de: Ein Jahr später machten die Fed-Repräsentanten diese Kürzungen rückgängig.
translated_de: One year later, the Fed' s representatives have resorted to these rumours.

en: The Fed should put financial stability concerns first only during a major crisis, such as the 2008 market meltdown, said Adam S. Posen, a former member of the Bank of England's rate-setting committee.
de: Die Fed sollte Aspekte der finanziellen Stabilität nur während einer schweren Krise wie dem Marktzusammenbruch 2008 an die erste Stelle setzen, sagte Adam S. Posen, ehemaliges Mitglied des Ausschusses für zur Zinsfestlegung der Bank of England.
translated_de: The Fed should only take into account financial stability in the first place during a difficult crisis, such as the market collapse in 2008, said Adam S. Posen, former Member of the Committee on Zinsfestation of the Bank of England.

en: The latest turmoil doesn't come close to that level, he said.
de: Die jüngsten Turbulenzen kommen nicht in die Nähe dieser Ebene, sagte er.
translated_de: The recent turmoil is not in the vicinity of this level, he said.

en: "You certainly don't want to be put in a situation of being scared of a rate hike because markets got upset," said Posen, president of the Peterson Institute for International Economics.
de: "Sie will sicherlich nicht in die Situation geraten, in der sie Angst vor einer Zinserhöhung hat, weil die Märkte sich aufregen", sagte Posen, Präsident des Peterson Institute for International Economics.
translated_de: "I will certainly not be able to get into the situation of fear of a Zinserhohung because the markets are in the way," said Posen, President of the Peterson Institute for International Economics.

en: The Federal Reserve Act still has the dual mandate and does not mention financial stability, and until that is changed, I don't think they should get ahead of the curve.
de: Der Federal Reserve Act enthält immer noch das doppelte Mandat und erwähnt nicht die Finanzstabilität, und bis das geändert wird, glaube ich nicht, dass sie der Zeit vorauseilen sollte.
translated_de: The Federal Reserve Act has always been a double mandate and does not mention financial stability and, until this is changed, I do not believe that it should be a time to do so.

en: Need a great Thai market?
de: Brauchen Sie einen tollen Thai-Markt?
translated_de: Do you have a great Thai market?

en: Try LAX-C in Chinatown.
de: Versuchen Sie LAX-C in Chinatown.
translated_de: Try to take LAXC in Chinatown.

en: Yes, Chinatown
de: Ja, Chinatown
translated_de: Ja, Chinatown

en: The market/warehouse opened in 1997 and is owned by LAX-C Inc.
de: Der Markt/das Lager wurde 1997 eröffnet und ist im Besitz von LAX-C Inc.
translated_de: The market/the stock was opened in 1997 and is now owned by LAX-C Inc.

en: Frequently referred to as the Thai Costco, LAX-C is a wholesale Thai market that also sells to the public.
de: LAX-C wird häufig als Thai Costco bezeichnet und ist ein Thai-Großhandelsmarkt, der auch an die Allgemeinheit verkauft.
translated_de: LAX-C is often referred to as Thai Costco and is a Thai-Großhandel which also sells generality.

en: Yes, it's in Chinatown and not Thai Town.
de: Ja, er befindet sich in Chinatown und nicht in Thai Town.
translated_de: It is located in Chinatown and not in Thai Town.

en: The market/warehouse is a one-stop shop, offering an dizzying array of fresh, frozen and dried goods, popular Thai and Asian snacks, and kitchenware, furniture, religious and holiday decorations.
de: Der Markt/das Lager ist eine zentrale Anlaufstelle und bietet eine verwirrende Anzahl von frischen, gefrorenen und getrockneten Waren, beliebte thailändische und asiatische Snacks, und Geschirr, Möbel, religiösen Schmuck und Weihnachtsdekorationen.
translated_de: The market/das warehouse is a central area and offers a huge number of fresh, frozen and getrocknet goods, popular Thai and Asian snacks, and schirrs, furniture, religious jewellery and Christmas decorations.

en: There's even an automotive section if you need to pick up some motor oil.
de: Es gibt sogar eine Auto-Abteilung, wenn Sie Motorenöl benötigen.
translated_de: There is a car-sharing service if you need motor oil.

en: The store is massive, and it will take over an hour to comb through all the aisles.
de: Der Laden ist riesig, und es dauert über eine Stunde, durch die Gänge zu schlendern.
translated_de: The Laden is huge and it takes a minute to get the Gone.

en: If all that shopping makes you hungry, grab a meal at the LAX-C BBQ Express.

translated_de: If you are hung up in the entire shopping area, you can make a meal in the LAX-C BBQ Express.

de: Die Garküche (gut und preiswert) in diesem Laden liegt in der Nähe der Kassen und hat verschiedene Mitnahme-Optionen.

en: What it stocks: Need something - anything - Thai?

en: LAX-C probably has it.
de: LAX-C hat es wahrscheinlich.

en: Items are reasonably priced, and a number of items are sold in bulk.

en: Fresh produce includes specialty Asian and regional Thai herbs, fruits and more.

en: The meat counter is extensive, as is the fish - the staff behind the counter will clean and fillet fish, and even fry it for you if you'd like.

translated_de: The meat is vast, and the fish is a personal one, which is a small fish and a fish is a fish that is a fish that is a fish that is a fish that is a fish that is a fish that is a fish that is a fish that is a fish that is a fish that is a fish that is a fish that is a fish that is a fish that is a fish that is a fish that is a fish that is a fish

en: A good portion of the store is given over to the massive freezer section, where you'll find frozen curry leaves, bitter melon and galangal, whole ducks, fish, beef blood and bile, pork casings, fish balls, regional sausages, commercially-prepared foods and more.
de: Ein guter Teil des Ladens gehört der massiven Gefrierabteilung. Hier finden Sie gefrorene Curry-Blätter, bittere Melone und Galgant, ganze Enten, Fisch, Rinderblut und Galle, Schweine-Naturdarm, Fischbällchen, regionale Wurst, kommerziell zubereitete Lebensmittel und mehr.
translated_de: The vast flier division is a great part of the Laden, where you can find frosted Curry, bitter Melone and Galgant, whole enten, fish, Rinderblut and Galles, pork, fishbällchen, regional sausage, commercial food and more.

en: Who shops there: Restaurant owners and chefs, also single families and individuals.
de: Wer kauft hier ein: Restaurantbesitzer und Köche, auch einzelne Familien und Einzelpersonen.
translated_de: The owner is a restaurant owner and a chef, and he is a family member and a single person.

en: The wide aisles accommodate both shopping carts and forklifts.
de: Die breiten Gänge sind für Einkaufswagen und Gabelstapler geeignet.
translated_de: The large quantities are suitable for shopping carts and Gabelstaplers.

en: The find: Fresh monthong durian next to the checkout stand.
