de: Geplant ist eine Mischung aus Handel, Gewerbe und Wohnen - konkrete Angebote gibt es aber noch nicht.
translated_de: It is a mix of hand, business and housing - but there are no specific offers.

en: Emden - The town of Emden wants to sell a plot of land of around 4000 square metres directly adjacent to the Alte Post youth centre.
de: Emden - Die Stadt Emden will ein rund 4000 Quadratmeter großes Grundstück in direkter Nachbarschaft zum Jugendzentrum Alte Post vermarkten.
translated_de: Emden - The city of Emden will be able to sell a large area of around 4000 square metres in direct proximity to the Jugend centre Alte Post.

en: Preparations are currently underway.
de: Die Vorbereitungen dafür laufen derzeit.
translated_de: The preparations are currently underway.

en: It is planned to use the land for a mixture of trade, commerce and housing.
de: Geplant ist, das Gelände für eine Mischung aus Handel, Gewerbe und Wohnen zu nutzen.
translated_de: It is the place to use a mixture of hand, business and living.

en: A spokesperson for the town states that it is awaiting suitable offers.
de: Man warte auf entsprechende Angebote, heißt es seitens der Stadt.
translated_de: The city has a lot of options to offer.

en: The identities of possible investors are not yet clear.
de: Welcher Investor infrage komme, sei noch nicht klar.
translated_de: What investor is in question is still not clear.

en: Consequently, no contract has yet been concluded.
de: Entsprechend seien auch noch keine Verträge geschlossen worden.
translated_de: In addition, there is no agreement on this.

en: The town of Emden sold a part of the site, situated on the Ringstrasse/corner of Grosse Strasse a few months ago and the building which previously stood there was demolished.
de: Die Stadt Emden hatte einen Teil des Grundstücks, das an der Ringstraße / Ecke Große Straße liegt, bereits vor einigen Monaten gekauft und das darauf befindliche Gebäude abreißen lassen.
translated_de: The city of Emden had a part of the property which is situated on the Ring Road/Citizen-Groß-Straße, which has already been bought for a few months and which has been re-opened.

en: Hieve project: facts are in the open
de: Projekt Hieve: Details liegen auf dem Tisch
translated_de: Project Hieve: Details are on the table

en: Plans for the holiday home development at the Kleines Meer near Emden are taking shape.
de: Die Planungen zur Ferienhaussiedlung am Kleinen Meer bei Emden nehmen Gestalt an.
translated_de: The planning for a small house in Emden takes shape.

en: Investors have presented their plans for the project to the public.
de: Der Investor stellte erstmals öffentlich Pläne für das Projekt vor.
translated_de: The Investor first announced public plans for the project.

en: A number of residents are again concerned – they are worried about the sale of their leisure refuge.
de: Etliche Anlieger sind weiter beunruhigt - sie befürchten den Ausverkauf ihres Freizeitrefugiums
translated_de: The etiquette is still being re-evaluated - they are concerned about the sale of their leisure facilities

en: Plans have been negotiated, mulled over, debated, and plotted behind closed doors for months.
de: Monatelang war hinter verschlossenen Türen verhandelt, gegrübelt, debattiert und gezeichnet worden.
translated_de: Several months ago, Turkey has been negotiating, negotiating, debated and negotiating.

en: Now the plans for a new holiday home development on the Kleines Meer near Emden are in the open.
de: Nun liegen die Pläne für eine neue Ferienhaussiedlung am Kleinen Meer nahe Emden auf dem Tisch.
translated_de: The plans for a new apartment in the small sea near Emden are now on the table.

en: The interested party, the Emden company "System-Bau", presented their plans to the Emden Council development committee for the first time on Monday evening.
de: Der Interessent, das mittelständische Emder Unternehmen "System-Bau", stellte am Montagabend im Stadtentwicklungsausschuss des Emder Rates seine Pläne zum ersten Mal öffentlich vor.
translated_de: The interests of the medium-sized Emder company "System-Bau" presented its plans to the first Mal public on Monday evening in the Emder Council' s Urban Development Committee.

en: Originally this point was scheduled as a part of the agenda not open to the public.
de: Ursprünglich hatte dieser Punkt auf dem nicht-öffentlichen Teil der Tagesordnung gestanden.
translated_de: This point has been referred to in the non-public part of the agenda.

en: Under pressure from critics of the project and from the FDP faction, who had accused investors and the administration of secretiveness, Ralf Behrends of the System-Bau management went on the offensive. "We don't yet have an answer for all the questions," he said in front of the council members and more than 50 spectators.
de: Unter dem Druck der Projektkritiker und der FDP-Fraktion, die dem Investoren und der Verwaltung Geheimniskrämerei vorwarfen, ging Ralf Behrends von der System-Bau-Geschäftsleitung in die Offensive: "Wir haben noch nicht auf alle Fragen eine Antwort", sagte er vor den Ratsmitgliedern und mehr als 50 Besuchern.
translated_de: Under the pressure of the project critics and the FDP group, which was a threat to investors and the administrative gyptical institute, the Ralf Behrends of the system-bau business administration have been in the offensive: "We have not yet answered all questions", said the Chairman of the Council and more than 50 visitors.

en: But it is good to be able to counter all the rumours now.
de: Aber es sei gut, allen Gerüchten jetzt begegnen zu können.
translated_de: But it is good to see all the Geries now be able to be able to get to the table.

en: The €10 - 12 million project has been under discussion for months.
de: Das rund zehn bis zwölf Millionen Euro teure Vorhaben steht seit Monaten in der Diskussion.
translated_de: The proposal of around ten to twelve million euros is in the debate for months.

en: Pictures and new details of the proposed hotel building provoked strong reactions among owners of properties at the lake who attended the meeting,
de: Heftige Reaktionen unter Meerbudenbesitzern, die in die Sitzung gekommen waren, riefen die Bilder und neuen Details zum gewünschten Hotelbau hervor.
translated_de: The response from the seabuden-besitzers who were present in the meeting sparked the images and new details to the desired hotel construction.

en: Roberto Schulz, property owner and member of the board of the residents' lobby group, Pro Hieve, claims: "It's going to be a huge development which looms over all the other buildings".
de: Roberto Schulz, Meerbudenbesitzer und Vorstandsmitglied bei der Interessenvertretung der Anlieger, Pro Hieve, klagt: "Das wird ein Riesenklotz, der alle anderen Gebaude überragt".
translated_de: Roberto Schulz, a marine spokesman and chairman of the Committee on the protection of the savage, Pro Hieve, said: "This is a savage, which is a savage of all other savages".

en: Furthermore, like a number of other critics of the project, he is afraid that traffic will increase enormously due to the proposed size of the facility. "We have to reckon with whole busloads arriving," said Schulz.
de: Zudem fürchtet er wie etliche andere Projektkritiker, dass der Verkehr durch die beabsichtigte Größe der Anlage stark zunehmen würde: "Da müssen ganze Busladungen kommen, damit sich das rechnet", so Schulz
translated_de: As a project critic, it is a shame that the return to the complex would be a huge one: "It must be a whole bunch of buses to be financed so that we can do this".

en: However it is not yet clear what exactly is going to happen on the hectare sized area of the former restaurant.
de: Was genau auf dem gut einen Hektar großen Areal der ehemaligen Gaststätte geschieht, ist allerdings noch offen.
translated_de: But what is happening in the gut of a large area of the former Gaststätte is still offending.

en: No operator has yet been identified.
de: Noch gibt es keinen Betreiber.
translated_de: There is no operator.

en: "First of all we have to present a coherent concept," says Ralf Behrends.
de: "Erst müssen wir ein schlüssiges Konzept vorliegen haben", sagte dazu Ralf Behrends.
translated_de: "We must have a coherent approach," said Ralf Behrends.

en: Since this does not yet exist, construction plans are still subject to variation.
de: Weil dieses noch fehlte, seien auch die Bebauungspläne noch variabel.
translated_de: If this is still lacking, the plans for the construction are still being modified.

en: Twin gorillas born in Frankfurt Zoo
de: Zwillings-Nachwuchs bei Gorillas im Frankfurter Zoo
translated_de: Zwillings-Nachwuchs in Gorillas at the Frankfurt Zoo

en: Frankfurt Zoo is celebrating the birth of two gorillas.
de: Der Frankfurter Zoo freut sich über Nachwuchs bei seinen Gorillas.
translated_de: The Frankfurt Zoo is delighted with the young people at its Gorillas.

en: Twenty-six year old Dian brought twins into the world yesterday.
de: Die 26-Jährige Dian hat gestern Zwillinge zur Welt gebracht.
translated_de: The 26-year-old Dian has pushed the world forward.

en: Twin births are rare for gorillas.
de: Zwillingsgeburten sind bei Gorillas selten.
translated_de: The swillings of the sand are rare in the Gorillas.

en: The last time it happened in a German zoo was almost 50 years ago in 1967, also in Frankfurt, according to the zoo.
de: Die letzte in einem deutschen Zoo liegt fast 50 Jahre zurück und sei 1967 auch in Frankfurt gewesen, heißt es von dem Zoo.
translated_de: The last in a German Zoo is fast 50 years ago and it was also in Frankfurt in 1967, he said.

en: The sex of the new-born gorilla twins is not yet certain as so far mother Dian has kept a close hold on them.
de: Das Geschlecht der neugeborenen Gorilla-Zwillinge stehe noch nicht fest, da Mutter Dian sie bislang eng am Körper hält.
translated_de: The gender of the new guinea pigs is still unknown, since the mother of the pigs is still in the body.

en: First reported in the "Bild".
de: Zuerst hatte die "Bild" berichtet.
translated_de: The "Bild" was reported by the public.

en: NHC says 60 percent chance of cyclone south of Cape Verde Islands
de: NHC sagt 60-prozentige Chance für Zyklon südlich der Kapverdischen Inseln voraus
translated_de: NHC says 60-prozentious chance for Cyprus to be a viable destination for the Kapverdi islands

en: A broad low-pressure system about 350 miles (560 km) south of the southernmost Cape Verde Islands has a 60 percent chance of developing into a tropical cyclone in the next 48 hours, the U.S. National Hurricane Center said Tuesday.
de: Das US National Hurricane Center sagte am Dienstag ein breites Tiefdrucksystem etwa 350 Meilen (560 km) südlich von den südlichsten Kapverdischen Inseln voraus, das eine 60-prozentige Chance hat, sich in den nächsten 48 Stunden zu einem tropischen Wirbelsturm zu entwickeln.
translated_de: The US National Hurricane Center said on Tuesday that a large depth pressure system of around 350 miles (560 km) was a threat to the most remote Cape Islands, which has a 60-year-old chance of developing a tropic sturm in the next 48 hours.

en: Another well-defined low-pressure system about midway between the Cape Verde Islands and the Lesser Antilles also has a 60 percent chance of tropical cyclone formation in the next two days, the Miami-based weather forecaster added.
de: Ein anderes deutlich definiertes Tiefdrucksystem etwa in der Mitte zwischen den Kapverdischen Inseln und den Kleinen Antillen hat auch ein 60-prozentiges Potential, in den nächsten zwei Tagen einen tropischen Wirbelsturm zu bilden, fügten die in Miami stationierten Wetterexperten hinzu.
translated_de: A further clearly defined depth printing system, which is situated in the middle of the Kapverdi islands and the small Antillen, has a 60-fold potential, in the next two days a trope sturm to form, adding the weather experts in Miami.

en: Google launches donation-matching campaign to raise $11 million for refugees
de: Google startet Verdoppelungs-Spenden-Kampagne, um 11 Millionen $ für Flüchtlinge zu sammeln
translated_de: Google launched a double-price campaign to collect 11 million dollars for refugees

en: Google Inc (GOOGL.O) announced a donation-matching campaign that aims to raise $11 million for humanitarian organizations aiding the thousands of refugees that have overwhelmed European nations as they flee war-torn and impoverished countries.
de: Google Inc (GOOGL. O) kündigte eine Verdoppelungs-Spenden-Kampagne an, die 11 Millionen $ für humanitäre Organisationen aufbringen soll, die Tausenden von Flüchtlingen helfen soll, die die Europäischen Nationen überrollt haben, da sie aus vom Krieg zerrissenen und verarmten Ländern fliehen.
translated_de: Google Inc (GOOGL) launched a double-price campaign to raise $1 million for humanitarian organisations, to aid refugees who have been displaced by the European nations because they have been displaced by the war and the armed countries.

en: Google took an uncharacteristically personal approach in announcing the donation drive on its blog.
de: Google hat einen ungewöhnlich persönlichen Ansatz bei der Bekanntgabe des Spenden-Aufrufs auf seinem Blog.
translated_de: Google has a peculiar personal approach to the publicisation of spending on its blog.

en: Rather than having an executive make the announcement, Rita Masoud, a Google employee who fled Kabul with her family when she was seven years old, wrote about her personal experience.
de: Anstatt einen Manager die Ankündigung machen zu lassen, schrieb Rita Masoud, eine Google-Mitarbeiterin, die mit ihrer Familie aus Kabul geflohen ist, als sie sieben Jahre alt war, über ihre persönlichen Erfahrungen.
translated_de: In addition, a manager who has been notified of the incident, Rita Masoud, a Google worker who has been a member of the family of Kabul, as a seven-year-old, wrote about his personal experiences.

en: "Our journey involved many dark train and bus rides, as well as hunger, thirst, cold and fear," she wrote.
de: "Zu unserer Reise gehörten viele dunkle Bahn- und Busfahrten, ebenso Hunger, Durst, Kälte und Angst", schrieb sie.
translated_de: "We have many dark rail and bus routes, as well as hunger, stability, cold and fear", he wrote.

en: I was lucky.
de: Ich hatte Glück.
translated_de: I had a great deal of luck.

en: But as the refugee and migrant crisis in Europe has grown, many people like my family are desperate for help.
de: Aber da die Flüchtlings- und Migranten-Krise in Europa gewachsen ist, suchen viele Menschen wie meine Familie verzweifelt nach Hilfe.
translated_de: But since the refugees and migrants are growing in Europe, many people, such as my family, are seeking assistance.

en: The donations will go toward four nonprofit organizations that are providing aid to refugees and migrants: Doctors Without Borders, International Rescue Committee, Save the Children and UN High Commissioner for Refugees.
de: Die Spenden gehen an vier gemeinnützige Organisationen, die Hilfe für Flüchtlinge und Migranten zur Verfügung stellen: Ärzte ohne Grenzen, International Rescue Committee, Save the Children und UN-Hochkommissar für Flüchtlinge.
translated_de: The funds go to four charitable organisations which provide humanitarian aid to refugees and migrants: doctors without borders, International Rescue Committee, Save the Children and UN Refugee Commissioner.

en: Google said it will match the first $5.5 million worth of donations globally at google.com/refugeerelief until it raises $11 million.
de: Google sagte, dass die ersten global gesammelten Spenden bis zu einem Wert von 5,5 Millionen auf google.com/refugeerelief auf 11 Millionen $ verdoppelt werden.
translated_de: Google said that the first global spending of 5,5 million will be doubled to $1 million on google.com/refugeerelief.

en: Europe is facing its worst refugee crisis since World War II, largely driven by the four-year-old civil war in Syria, which has displaced more than 4 million people this year.
de: Europa wird mit seiner schlimmsten Flüchtlingskrise seit dem Zweiten Weltkrieg konfrontiert, weitgehend verursacht durch den vierjährigen Bürgerkrieg in Syrien, der mehr als 4 Millionen Menschen in diesem Jahr vertrieben hat.
translated_de: Europe is facing its worst crisis in refugees since the Second World War, which has been caused by the four-year civil war in Syria, which has killed more than 4 million people in this year.

en: Many are also fleeing war-torn Afghanistan, Yemen, Iraq and Libya.
de: Viele flüchten auch aus dem vom Krieg zerrütteten Afghanistan, Jemen, Irak und Libyen.
translated_de: Many of the flinchings were also attributed to Afghanistan, Yemen, Iraq and Libya.

en: Reporting By Yasmeen Abutaleb; Editing by Christian Plumb
de: Berichterstattung von Yasmeen Abutaleb; Bearbeitung von Christian Plumb
translated_de: Report by Yasmeen Abutaleb; work by Christian Plumb

en: For mildly obese diabetics, weight loss surgery may be helpful
de: Für leicht übergewichtige Diabetiker kann Gewichtsverlustchirurgie hilfreich sein.
translated_de: For a less weighty diabetic, weight loss surgery can be helpful.

en: The benefits of weight loss surgery for mildly obese people with type 2 diabetes can last at least five years, according to a new study.
de: Die Vorteile der Gewichtsverlustchirurgie für leicht übergewichtige Menschen mit Typ 2 Diabetes können nach einer neuen Studie mindestens fünf Jahre dauern.
translated_de: The benefits of weight loss surgery for people with type 2 diabetes can be at least five years after a new study.

en: It's still to early to say whether mildly obese people with diabetes live longer after weight loss surgery than those who receive non-surgical treatments, however.
de: Es ist noch zu früh, um zu sagen, ob leicht übergewichtige Menschen mit Diabetes nach der Gewichtsverlustchirurgie länger leben als diejenigen, die nicht-chirurgische Behandlungen erhalten.
translated_de: It is still early to say that a few people with diabetes who are overweight are longer in the midst of weight loss surgery than those who have not received surgical treatment.

en: "The mortality data take a long time to show up," said Dr. Robin Blackstone, a weight loss surgery expert who wrote an editorial on the new study in JAMA Surgery.
de: "Die Sterblichkeitsdaten benötigen eine lange Zeit, um etwas zu zeigen," sagte Dr. Robin Blackstone, ein Experte der Gewichtsverlust-Chirurgie, der einen Leitartikel zu der neuen Studie in JAMA Surgery schrieb.
translated_de: "The stability data needs to be shown for a long time," said Dr Robin Blackstone, expert in weight loss surgery, who wrote a statement on the new study on JAMA surgery.

en: Weight loss operations, or bariatric surgery, use various methods to shrink the size of the stomach.
de: Gewichts-Verlust-Operationen oder Adipositas-Chirurgie, verwenden verschiedene Methoden, um die Größe des Magens zu verkleinern.
translated_de: Weight-Verlust-Operation or Adipositas-Chirurgie use different methods to reduce the size of the Magen.

en: They reduce hunger and limit the body's ability to absorb food.
de: Sie reduzieren Hunger und begrenzen die körpereigene Fähigkeit, Nahrung aufzunehmen.
translated_de: You reduce hunger and limit the body' s ability to feed, reduce food.

en: Over the years, bariatric surgeries have proved effective for treating type 2 diabetes, but most studies were done in people who are morbidly obese, with a body mass index (BMI) of 35 or above.
de: Über die Jahre haben sich Adipositas-Operationen zur Behandlung von Typ-2-Diabetes als effizient erwiesen, aber die meisten Studien wurden bei Menschen durchgeführt, die krankhaft fettleibig mit einem Body-Mass-Index (BMI) von 35 oder höher sind.
translated_de: Over the years, the effectiveness of the positas-operation of type-2-Diabetes has been shown, but the majority of studies were carried out by people who are fettered by a Body Mass Index (BMI) of 35 or higher.

en: BMI, a measure of weight in relation to height, is considered normal between 18.5 and 24.9.
de: BMI, ein gewisses Maß an Gewicht in Bezug auf Größe, gilt als normal zwischen 18,5 und 24,9.
translated_de: IMI, which has a certain weight in relation to size, is normal between 18,5 and 24,9.

en: A BMI of 25 or higher indicates that someone is overweight, and people with a BMI over 30 are considered obese.
de: Ein BMI von 25 oder mehr zeigt an, dass jemand übergewichtig ist, und Menschen mit einem BMI über 30 gelten als fettleibig.
translated_de: A BMI of 25 or more shows that someone is overweight and people with a BMI of 30 are overweight.

en: You can calculate your BMI here: 1.usa.gov/1D0ZqDv.
de: Sie können hier Ihren BMI berechnen: 1.usa.gov/1D0ZqDv.
translated_de: You can also calculate your BMI: 1.usa.gov/1D0ZqDv.

en: For the new study, researchers from Taiwan's Min-Sheng General Hospital used data collected since 2007 in a trial comparing two kinds of bariatric surgery - gastric bypass and sleeve gastrectomy - to medical treatments for type 2 diabetes in people who were mildly obese.
de: Für die neue Studie verwendeten die Forscher aus Taiwans Min-Sheng General Hospital Daten, die sie seit 2007 in einer Studie gesammelt haben und vergleichen dabei zwei Arten von Adipositas-Chirurgie - Magenbypass und Magenschlauchbildung - zu medizinischen Behandlungen für Typ-2-Diabetes bei Menschen, die leicht übergewichtig waren.
translated_de: For the new study, the Forschers from Taiwan' s Min-Sheng General Hospital data collected in a study since 2007 have been used and compare two types of adipositas-hirurgie - Magenbypass and Magenschlauchbildung - to medical treatment for type-2-Diabetes in people who were easily overweight.

en: The average BMI among those who had surgery fell from 31 to 24.5 by the end of their fifth year in the study.
de: Der durchschnittliche BMI unter denen, die sich dieser Operation unterzogen, sank von 31 auf 24,5 bis Ende des fünften Jahres in dieser Studie.
translated_de: The average BMI in the last five years of this study was 31 on 24,5 in the last five years.

en: Meanwhile, the BMI among those receiving non-surgical diabetes treatments stayed about the same at 29.
de: Unterdessen blieb der BMI bei denjenigen, die nicht-chirurgische Diabetes-Behandlungen erhielten ungefähr gleich bei 29.
translated_de: The BMI was the same for those who had not surgically cured diabetes at 29.

en: Among those who had surgery, diabetes resolved completely in 36 percent and partially in 28 percent.
de: Unter denjenigen, die sich einem chirurgischen Eingriff unterzogen, löste sich bei 36 % die Diabetes-Erkrankung völlig und bei 28 % teilweise.
translated_de: In those who have taken a surgical intervention, 36 % of diabetes suffer completely and 28 % partly.

en: In the medically-treated group, by comparison, diabetes resolved completely in only 1 percent and partially in only about 2 percent.
de: In der medizinisch-behandelten Gruppe löste sich im Vergleich dazu der Diabetes vollständig nur bei einem Prozent und teilweise bei nur etwa zwei Prozent.
translated_de: In the medical-behandeling group, diabetes is a total problem, only 1%, and partly 2%.

en: In addition, control of blood pressure, triglycerides, and "bad" LDL cholesterol "was generally better in the surgical group," the authors found.
de: Darüber hinaus waren die Ergebnisse bei den Kontrollen des Blutdrucks, der Triglyceride und des "schlechten" LDL-Cholesterins "im Allgemeinen besser in der 'chirurgischen' Gruppe", fanden die Autoren heraus.
translated_de: The results of the control of blood pressure, the triglyceride and the "schlechten" LDL cholesterol were also found to be "more common in the surgical group" .

en: The researchers also monitored patients' blood levels of hemoglobin A1c, which reflect blood sugar levels over time.
de: Die Forscher überwachten auch den Patienten-Blutspiegel von Hämoglobin A1c, der die Blutzuckerwerte im Laufe der Zeit widerspiegelt.
translated_de: The Forscher also monitors the blood glucose levels of the patient in the case of Hippoglobin A1c, which is a higher blood glucose level in the course of the time.

en: Hemoglobin A1c is best kept below 7 percent, the researchers write.
de: Hämoglobin A1c wird am besten unter 7 Prozent gehalten, schreiben die Forscher.
translated_de: The a1c of the hippoglobin is best rated at 7%, compared with the Forscher.

en: After surgery, the average hemoglobin A1c level fell from about 9 percent to about 6 percent.
de: Nach der Operation sank das durchschnittliche Hämoglobin A1c Niveau von rund 9 Prozent auf rund 6 Prozent.
translated_de: After the operation, the average level of A1c in the globulin accounted for around 9 % and around 6 %.

en: In the medical therapy group, however, it remained steady at about 8 percent.
de: In der medizinischen Therapie-Gruppe blieb es jedoch stabil bei etwa 8 Prozent.
translated_de: The medical group was still stable at around 8 %.

en: But this better "glycemic control" - as reflected by the improved hemoglobin A1c levels - did not reduce the mortality rate at five years, according to lead researcher Dr. Chih-Cheng Hsu and colleagues.
de: Aber diese bessere "glykämische Kontrolle" - wie Sie sich in dem verbesserten Hämoglobin A1c Niveau widerspiegelt - verringerte nicht die Sterblichkeit in fünf Jahren, so der Leitende Forscher Dr. Chih-Cheng Hsu und seine Kollegen.
translated_de: But this better "glykämische control" - as you have seen in the improved HCMA1c level - does not affect the stability of five years, so the Leitcher Dr Chih-Cheng Hsu and his colleagues.

en: The research team also compared average outcomes with the two types of surgery.
de: Das Forschungsteam verglich auch durchschnittliche Ergebnisse bei den zwei Arten der Chirurgie.
translated_de: The research team has average results in two types of chirurgie.

en: At the fifth year, compared to the sleeve gastrectomy group, the bypass surgery group had lost more weight (18.7 vs 14.2 kg), achieved larger drops in BMI (7.4 vs 5.1) and in hemoglobin A1c (3.1 percent vs 2.1 percent) and were more likely to have complete diabetes remission (46.9 percent vs 16.7 percent).
de: Im fünften Jahr hatte die Bypass-Chirurgie-Gruppe im Vergleich zu der Gastrektomie-Gruppe mehr Gewicht verloren (18,7 vs. 14,2 kg), erreichte größere Rückgänge im BMI (7,4 gegen 5.1) und Hämoglobin A1c (3,1 % vs. 2,1 %) und verzeichneten eher eine komplette Überwindung des Diabetes (46,9 % vs. 16,7 %).
translated_de: In five years, the Bypass Chirurgie Group lost more weight in comparison to the Gastrektomie Group (18,7 vs 14,2 kg), achieved greater reductions in BMI (7,4 vs 5,1) and Hippoglobin A1c (3,1 % vs 2,1 %) and achieved a complete reduction in diabetes (46,9 % vs 16,7 %).

en: While the new study does not show a survival benefit or surgery after five years, there is evidence from a study of heavier people in Sweden that surgery does lead to a longer life, says Blackstone, of the University of Arizona College of Medicine-Phoenix.
de: Während die neue Studie keinen Überlebensvorteil der Chirurgie nach fünf Jahren zeigt, gibt es Hinweise aus einer Studie schwererer Menschen in Schweden, dass Operation zu einem längeren Leben führt, sagt Blackstone von der University of Arizona, College of Medicine Phoenix.
translated_de: In the course of the new study, there has been no pre-revival of the Chirurgie after five years, there is evidence from a study of the hardest people in Sweden that Operation to a longer life, says Blackstone of the University of Arizona, College of Medicine Phoenix.

en: In the Swedish study, obese people who had bariatric surgery were about 29 percent less likely to die over 15 years, compared to a group who tried more conventional methods.
de: In der schwedischen Studie war es bei fettleibigen Menschen, die sich einer Adipositas-Operation unterzogen, etwa 29 Prozent weniger wahrscheinlich im Laufe von 15 Jahren zu sterben - im Vergleich zu einer Gruppe, die konventionellere Methoden versuchte.
translated_de: In the Swedish study, fettleibing people who were re-elected by a post-operation were at least 29 percent less likely to be re-elected in 15 years - in comparison to a group which tried conventional methods.

en: Though the new study didn't show a benefit in survival among surgery patients, Blackstone said it's reassuring for people with a BMI under 35 interested in the procedure.
de: Obwohl die neue Studie keinen Vorteil für das Überleben bei den Chirurgie-Patienten zeigte, sagte Blackstone, es sei beruhigend für Personen mit einem BMI unter 35, die an dem Verfahren interessiert sind.
translated_de: Although the new study does not have any benefit for the survival of the Chiroprurgical patients, Blackstone said, it is a concern for those with a BMI of under 35 who are interested in the procedure.

en: "This is where this paper is critical, because it says this surgery is safe in that lower BMI group," with no increased risk of death or renal disease, she said.
de: "Das ist der kritische Punkt dieser Studie, weil sie sagt, dass diese Operation in dieser unteren BMI-Gruppe niedriger ist", ohne erhöhtes Risiko des Todes oder einer Nierenerkrankung, sagte sie.
translated_de: "This is the critical point of this study because they say that this operation in this BMI group is lower," without increasing the risk of a tod or a nincence, they said.

en: Blackstone added that people and their doctors should start taking weight seriously once the patient's BMI falls between 27 and 30.
de: Blackstone fügte hinzu, dass Menschen und ihre Ärzte anfangen sollten, Gewicht ernst zu nehmen, sobald der Patient mit seinem BMI zwischen 27 und 30 liegt.
translated_de: Blackstone adds that people and their doctors should take the weight to ensure that the patient has a BMI between 27 and 30.

en: "I think we wait too long to get people to be serious about this," she said.
de: "Ich denke, dass wir zu lange warten, bis wir Menschen dazu bringen, dies ernst zu nehmen", sagte sie.
translated_de: "I believe that we have to wait until we can bring people who are willing to take them," said the spokesman.

en: I think that once they've accumulated these genetic changes that hardwired their bodies into obesity and diabetes, reversing that is really hard.
de: Ich denke, dass sobald sie diese genetischen Änderungen angesammelt haben, die ihre Körper mit Fettleibigkeit und Diabetes fest verbunden haben, ist eine Umkehrung wirklich schwer."
translated_de: I believe that so soon they have collected genetically modified changes that have been linked to their body with fat-loss and diabetes, it is a real change of mind."

en: Love story set in Hunsrück

translated_de: Liebesgeschichte plays in Hunsrück

en: It is a theme being used increasingly in fiction nowadays: a young woman, plain and unpopular when she was at school, meets her teenage crush years later and he falls in love with her.
de: Es ist ein Thema, das derzeit in der Belletristik vermehrt Beachtung findet: Eine junge Frau, zu Schulzeiten unbeliebt und unansehnlich, trifft nach Jahren den Schwarm ihrer Jugend wieder, und dieser verliebt sich in sie.

en: This is what happens in the recently published novel "We're not really like that" by Luisa Binder.

translated_de: The principal author is growing in Langweiler and is pleased that she has put her home in a literary era.

en: "It is impossible for everyone to come to Europe" - Dalai Lama - RT News
de: "Es ist unmöglich, dass jeder nach Europa kommen kann" - Dalai Lama - RT-News
translated_de: "It is impossible that every member of Europe can come to Europe" - Dalai Lama - RTNews

en: Europe could not host all refugees, the Dalai Lama has said, adding that the real solution to the current refugee crisis lies in the Middle East.
de: Europa könne nicht alle Flüchtlinge aufnehmen, sagte der Dalai Lama und fügte hinzu, dass die wirkliche Lösung der Flüchtlingskrise im Nahen Osten liege.
translated_de: Europe cannot accept all refugees, he said, and added that the real solution to the crisis in the Nah East lies.

en: The Tibetan Buddhist leader has called for the ending violence in the refugees" home countries.
de: Der tibetisch-buddhistische Führer forderte dazu auf, die Gewalt in den Heimatländern der Flüchtlinge zu beenden.
translated_de: The tibetist Führer has called on the refugees to be abused in their own countries.

en: The Dalai Lama addressed the issue of the ongoing refugee crisis in his speech at the opening of the Dalai Lama Centre for Compassion in Oxford, which is dedicated to ethics studies, at the beginning of his 10-day visit to the UK.
de: Der Dalai Lama sprach das Problem der andauernden Flüchtlingskrise zu Beginn seines zehntägigen Besuches im Vereinigten Königreich in seiner Rede anlässlich der Eröffnung des Dalai Lama Centre for Compassion in Oxford an, das sich Ethik-Studien widmet.
translated_de: The Dalai Lama spoke of the problem of the refugees in the United Kingdom, which began its ten-day visit to the United Kingdom in his speech, at the opening of the Dalai Lama Centre for Compassion in Oxford, which is widened by Ethik students.

en: He claimed that, under current circumstances, the interests of humanity should be put before the interests of single nations or even continents.
de: Er forderte, dass unter den gegebenen Umständen die Interessen der Menschlichkeit vor die Interessen der einzelnen Nationen oder sogar Kontinente gestellt werden sollten.
translated_de: It is therefore necessary that, under the circumstances, the interests of the human beings be posed before the interests of individual nations or sogar of the continents.

en: He also stressed that, however admirable, the West-European countries" response to the refugee crisis is inadequate to the situation.
de: Er betonte auch, dass die Reaktion der westeuropäischen Länder auf die Flüchtlingskrise zwar bewundernswert, aber der Situation nicht angemessen sei.
translated_de: It also highlights that the response of the West European countries to refugees crisis is a surprise, but the situation is not appropriate.

en: "It it's impossible for everyone to come to Europe," he said in his speech.
de: "Es ist unmöglich, dass jeder nach Europa kommen kann", sagte er in seiner Rede.
translated_de: "It is impossible for everyone to come to Europe", he said in his speech.

en: Although the Dalai Lama praised Germany's and Austria's efforts in dealing with the crisis, he stressed that it was only a temporary solution.
de: Obwohl der Dalai Lama Deutschlands und Österreichs Bemühungen bei der Bewältigung der Krise lobte, betonte er, dass es nur eine temporäre Lösung sei.
translated_de: Although the Dalai Lama Germany and Austria have lobbied for the resolution of the crisis, it has stressed that it is only a temporary solution.

en: "So taking care of several thousand refugees is wonderful, but in the mean time you have to think about long-term solutions, how to bring genuine peace and genuine development, mainly through education, for these Muslim countries," he emphasized.
de: "Sich um mehrere tausend Flüchtlinge zu kümmern, ist wunderbar, aber in der Zwischenzeit müssen Sie über langfristige Lösungen nachdenken, wie ein echter Friede und echte Entwicklung, hauptsächlich durch Bildung, für diese muslimischen Länder geschaffen werden kann", betonte er.
translated_de: "It is wonderful to be able to handle a number of thousands of refugees, but in the meantime, you must think about long-term solutions such as a real Fried and real development, in particular through education, for these Muslim countries", he said.

en: Ultimately we have to think about how to reduce the killing in their countries.
de: Letztlich müssen wir darüber nachdenken, wie die Tötung in ihren Ländern verringert wird.
translated_de: Let us then think about how the tepidation in their countries will be ringed.

en: We have to reduce the use of force.
de: Wir müssen den Einsatz von Gewalt reduzieren.
translated_de: We must reduce the use of violence.

en: The use of force has never solved these problems," he added.
de: "Die Anwendung von Gewalt hat nie diese Probleme gelöst", fügte er hinzu.
translated_de: "The use of violence has never solved these problems", he added.

en: Addressing the issue of violence, the Dalai Lama also commented on George Bush's actions following 9/11 terrorist attacks, claiming that the US" violent response engendered a chain of uncontrollable events.
de: Der Dalai Lama sprach das Problem der Gewalt an und kommentierte auch George Bushs Handeln nach dem Terroranschlag vom 11. September und stellte heraus, dass die gewalttätige Reaktion der USA eine Kette von unkontrollierbaren Ereignissen nach sich zog.
translated_de: The Dalai Lama spoke of the problem of violence and commented on George Bush' s action following the terrorist attack on 11 September and pointed out that the massive response of the USA was a result of unconstitutional events.

en: After 9/11 I expressed my condolences in a letter to President Bush and told him the way to solve this problem was through non-violence.
de: Nach dem 11. September habe ich mein Beileid in einem Brief an Präsident Bush ausgedrückt, und ich sagte ihm, der Weg zur Lösung dieses Problems liegt in Gewaltlosigkeit.
translated_de: I have spoken to President Bush on 11 September and I said that the way to resolve this problem is in violence.

en: I know his motives were good but he used force and it created unexpected consequences," the Dalai Lama said.
de: "Ich weiß, seine Motive waren gut, aber er setzte Gewalt ein, und das hat unerwartete Konsequenzen hervorgerufen", sagte der Dalai Lama.
translated_de: "I know that his motives were good, but it was a force which has a long-term consequence," said Dalai Lama.

en: Scots unemployment remains unchanged as UK total rises
de: Arbeitslosigkeit in Schottland bleibt unverändert, während sie im Vereinigten Königreich insgesamt steigt.
translated_de: The unemployment in Schottland remains unchanged, while the UK is increasing.

en: UNEMPLOYMENT in Scotland remained unchanged at 164,000 during the period May to July while the number out of work for the UK as a whole increased by 10,000 to 1.82 million during the same period.
de: Die Arbeitslosigkeit in Schottland blieb im Zeitraum Mai bis Juli unverändert bei 164.000, während die Zahl der Menschen ohne Arbeit für das Vereinigte Königreich als Ganzes im selben Zeitraum um 10.000 auf 1,82 Millionen stieg.
translated_de: The unemployment rate in Schottland was unchanged from Mai to Juli, a record of 164.000 people, while the number of people without employment for the United Kingdom as whole increased by 10.000 in the same period, on 182 million.

en: Scotland's unemployment rate of 5.9 per cent was above the UK's rate of 5.5 per cent, the Office for National Statistics (ONS) figures showed.
de: Schottlands Arbeitslosenquote von 5,9 Prozent lag über der des UKs von 5,5 Prozent, wie die Zahlen des Büros für Nationale Statistik (ONS) zeigten.
translated_de: The Schottlands unemployment rate is 5,9 % higher than the UK, as the figures of the Office for National Statistics (ONS) show.

en: Meanwhile, employment in Scotland fell by 12,000 during the three month period, with the number of those in work now standing at 2,612,000.
de: In der Zwischenzeit fiel die Beschäftigung in Schottland um 12.000 während der drei Monate, mit der Zahl von Beschäftigten jetzt bei 2.612.000.
translated_de: In the period between the two months, employment in Schottland was estimated at 12.000, with the number of workers now at 2.612.000.

en: The employment rate for Scotland fell over the quarter at 74.0 per cent - a figure above the UK average of 73.5 per cent.
de: Die Beschäftigungsquote für Schottland fiel im Laufe des Quartals auf 74,0 Prozent - eine Zahl über dem UK-Durchschnitt von 73,5 Prozent.
translated_de: The employmentquote for Scotland was 74,0 % in the Quartals, a figure of 73,5 % in the UK.

en: Secretary of State for Scotland David Mundell, commenting on the latest figures, said: "The government's long term plan has laid the foundations for a stronger economy."
de: Der Staatssekretär für Schottland David Mundell kommentierte die neuesten Zahlen und sagte: "Der langfristige Plan der Regierung hat den Grundstein für eine stärkere Wirtschaft gelegt."
translated_de: The Scottish Secretary of State David Mundell compiled the latest figures and said: "The long-term plan of the Government has laid the foundation for a stronger economy."

en: It is almost exactly a year since Scotland made the historic decision to remain part of the UK.
de: Es ist fast genau ein Jahr her, dass Schottland die historische Entscheidung getroffen hat, Teil des Vereinigten Königreichs zu bleiben.
translated_de: It is almost a year since Schottland has taken the historic decision to remain a part of the United Kingdom.

translated_de: In these 12 months, we have experienced further improvements on the competitive employment market with a reduction in employment and a reduction in unemployment.

en: Why I'm A Witness At An Execution In Oklahoma
de: Warum ich Zeuge einer Exekution in Oklahoma sein werde
translated_de: Why I will be witnessing a leak in Oklahoma

en: Later today, barring a late legal intervention, I will watch a man being put to death.
de: Etwas später heute, ausgenommen bei einer späten rechtlichen Intervention, werde ich zusehen, wie ein Mann zu Tode gebracht wird.
translated_de: Until then, if we are to take a late legal intervention, I will see how a man will be brought to the table.

en: If it happens, and I hope it won't, I will sit in a viewing gallery in the death chamber at Oklahoma State Penitentiary as Richard Glossip is executed by lethal injection.
de: Wenn es passiert, und ich hoffe, dass es nicht geschieht, werde ich in einer Zuschauer-Galerie in der Todeskammer im Oklahoma State Penitentiary sitzen, wenn Richard Glossip durch die Giftspritze exekutiert wird.
translated_de: If it happens, and I hope that it does not happen, I will sit in a spectator-gate in the Todeskammer in Oklahoma State Penitentiary, if Richard Glossip is exekutated by the Giftspritze.

en: He has asked me to be one of four official witnesses to his death.
de: Er hat mich gebeten, einer der vier offiziellen Zeugen bei seinem Tod zu sein.
translated_de: I have been a witness of one of the four official witnesses in his speech.

en: The invitation was first made back in January, via his best friend, and though I was shocked, I agreed.
de: Die Einladung erfolgte bereits erstmals im Januar über seinen besten Freund, und obwohl ich schockiert war, stimmte ich zu.
translated_de: The invitation was made in January, and I was pleased to be able to make it.

en: As the day approaches, I've come to dread it.
de: Als der Tag näher rückte, begann ich, mich zu fürchten.
translated_de: As the day approached, I began to think.

en: So why do it?
de: Also, warum sollte ich es tun?
translated_de: Why should I do this?

en: I agreed because I thought it was a good way of telling the full story about the death penalty.
de: Ich stimmte zu, weil ich dachte, es wäre eine gute Möglichkeit, die ganze Geschichte über die Todesstrafe zu erzählen.
translated_de: I agree, because I thought it would be a good opportunity to enlarge the entire history of the crime.

en: It would offer a unique perspective.
de: Es würde eine einzigartige Perspektive bieten.
translated_de: It would offer a unique perspective.

en: True, journalists are permitted to watch executions in America and because there are often more applications than seats available, a macabre lottery takes place to decide who will be chosen.
de: Es stimmt, dass Journalisten Hinrichtungen in den USA sehen dürfen, und da oft mehr Bewerbungen als Plätze zur Verfügung stehen, findet eine makabere Lotterie statt, um zu entscheiden, wer gewählt wird.
translated_de: It is true that journalists should be able to see their opinions in the USA and there are often more candidates available as places to be chosen, and there is a macra-series to decide who will be chosen.

en: Oklahoma has reduced the number of media seats from 12 to five.
de: Oklahoma hat die Anzahl der Medienplätze von 12 auf fünf reduziert.
translated_de: Oklahoma has reduced the number of media outlets from 12 to five.

en: Whoever is picked will watch it dispassionately.
de: Wer ausgewählt wird, der wird es emotionslos beobachten.
translated_de: The selection will be a reflection of emotions.

en: I cannot do that.
de: Ich kann das nicht.
translated_de: I cannot do that.

en: I will be sitting alongside Richard Glossip's closest friends, and I have developed my own relationship with him through months of phone calls, and one visit lasting two-and-a-half hours.
de: Ich werde neben Richard Glossips engstem Freund sitzen, mit dem ich meine eigene Beziehung im Laufe der Monate mit Telefonaten und einem zweieinhalb Stunden Besuch entwickelt habe.
translated_de: I will sit alongside Richard Glossips as a friend, with whom I have developed my own relationship in the course of the months with telephones and a two-hour visit.

en: I like the guy.
de: Ich mag den Kerl.
translated_de: I am the Kerl.

en: We often laugh a lot when we talk.
de: Wir lachen oft viel, wenn wir sprechen.
translated_de: We are often slammed.

en: The prison authorities say I cannot be both a witness and a journalist, so I won't be allowed a notebook and pen to record what I see.
de: Die Gefängnis-Behörden sagen, dass ich nicht ein Zeuge und ein Journalist sein kann, also wird es mir nicht erlaubt sein, ein Notizbuch und einen Stift mitzunehmen, um aufzeichnen, was ich sehe.
translated_de: The spokesman said that I cannot be a witness and a journalist, but I cannot accept a note and a stift, to mark, I was.

en: I will just have to try to remember all the details.
de: Ich muss einfach versuchen, mich an alle Details zu erinnern.
translated_de: I must simply try to remind you of all the details.

en: One Oklahoma journalist accused me on Twitter of compromising my impartiality.
de: Ein Journalist aus Oklahoma beschuldigte mich auf Twitter, meine Unparteilichkeit aufzugeben.
translated_de: A journalist from Oklahoma blames me on Twitter and I admit my incompatibility.

en: Here's the lesson.
de: Hier ist die Lektion.
translated_de: This is the case.

en: Tell the inmate's story the way he likes it, get access.
de: Erzählen Sie die Geschichte des Häftlings, wie er es will, und Sie erhalten Zugang.
translated_de: You will be able to read the history of the famines, as it will, and you will be able to access them.

en: I complained to her.
de: Ich beschwerte mich bei ihr.
translated_de: I appreciate you.

en: She admitted that she "could have phrased it better," but still thinks I'm wrong to do what I'm doing.
de: Sie räumte ein, dass sie "es hätte besser formulieren können", aber sie denkt immer noch, dass es falsch ist, was ich tue.
translated_de: You said that they could "make it better" but they think that it is wrong, I think.

en: Richard Glossip has taken issue with some of the things I've said and written.
de: Richard Glossip hatte Problem mit einigen der Dinge, die ich gesagt und geschrieben habe.
translated_de: Richard Glossip had a problem with some of the things I said and wrote.

en: He doesn't tell me what to write, and I wouldn't do it even if he did.
de: Er sagt mir nicht, was ich zu schreiben habe, und ich würde es nicht tun, selbst wenn er es tun würde.
translated_de: I did not say what I would write and I would not do it, even if it would do it.

en: I've told him he can remove me from his list of witnesses at any time.
de: Ich habe ihm gesagt, dass er mich aus seiner Liste der Zeugen jederzeit entfernen kann.
translated_de: I have said that I can remove myself from his list of witnesses.

en: But he wants an international reporter to be there to write about it.
de: Aber er will, dass ein internationaler Reporter anwesend ist, um dort zu schreiben.
translated_de: But he will be able to write to a international report here.

en: If he dies, he thinks the publicity will help the anti-death penalty movement.
de: Wenn er stirbt, denkt er, dass die Öffentlichkeitsarbeit der Bewegung gegen die Todesstrafe helfen wird.
translated_de: If you stir up, you think that the public movement against the crime will help.

en: Kim Bellware, a reporter from the Huffington Post, will be alongside me.
de: Kim Bellware, eine Reporterin der Huffington Post, wird neben mir sitzen.
translated_de: Kim Bellware, a reporter for the Huffington Post, sits beside me.

en: If you want to know more about the case, please listen to the series of podcasts I've made.
de: Wenn Sie mehr über den Fall wissen wollen, hören Sie bitte die Serie von Podcasts, die ich gemacht habe.
translated_de: If you want to know more about the Fall, listen to the series of podcasts which I made.

en: I won't go over all the details again here.
de: Ich will hier nicht wieder auf alle Details eingehen.
translated_de: I will not again go into all the details here.

en: I cannot say with certainty that Richard Glossip is innocent.
de: Ich kann nicht mit Sicherheit sagen, dass Richard Glossip unschuldig ist.
translated_de: I cannot say in security that Richard Glossip is unjustified.

en: His actions after the murder of Barry Van Treese would make him guilty of being an accessory after the fact.
de: Seine Handlungen nach der Ermordung von Barry Van Treese würden ihn schuldig machen, ein Begünstigter der Tat zu sein.
translated_de: The actions of Barry Van Treese would be a good thing.

en: But I believe there is a strong probability that he is not guilty of murder.
de: Aber ich glaube, dass eine starke Wahrscheinlichkeit besteht, dass er nicht des Mordes schuldig ist.
translated_de: But I believe that there is a strong possibility that it is not responsible for the Mordes.

en: I certainly believe there was not enough evidence to justify a death sentence.
de: Ich glaube sicher, dass es nicht genügend Beweise gibt, um ein Todesurteil zu rechtfertigen.
translated_de: I believe that there is not enough evidence to justify a judgment.

en: I believe his execution is wrong.
de: Ich glaube, dass seine Hinrichtung falsch ist.
translated_de: I believe that his orientation is wrong.

en: And it's from this perspective that I will watch him die.
de: Und aus dieser Perspektive werde ich ihn sterben sehen.

en: What you will get from me is what it's like to watch a man I like die an unnecessary death.

translated_de: What you will get from me is to see a man who is not required to do so.

en: Man coaxed from Canning River after soggy police chase

translated_de: The fishing industry in the Canning Vale was dry, as he retreated from the Canning River.

en: A Perth man's bid to lose a police tail came undone after he found himself in shallow, muddy water just metres from a police officer trying to "coax him gently back to shore."
de: Ein Versuch eines Mannes von Perth, die Polizei abzuhängen, war erfolglos, als er sich im seichten und sumpfigen Wasser befand, nur wenige Meter von einem Polizeibeamten entfernt, der versuchte, "ihn sanft zu überreden, zum Ufer zurückzukehren."
translated_de: The attempt to re-enter the sand of Perth, which is a police force, was unsuccessful, as it was in the water, only a few meters from a police force, which tried to "slowly overreach" the sand of the water.

de: Die Polizei von Canning Vale wurde am Dienstag zu einem Hausfriedensbruch-Vorfall in Beckenham gerufen.

en: When they spotted the suspect he tried to ditch them by heading into the Canning River.

en: But he didn't get too far.

translated_de: The Commissioner Lachlan Perhavec has not been enthusiastic about making his uniform, therefore he has a more reliable strategy - "Good policy negotiate".

en: "Sometimes people do funny things to try and escape," Senior Sergeant Castledine said.
de: "Manchmal tun Leute lustige Dinge um zu versuchen zu entkommen", sagte Senior Sergeant Castledine.
translated_de: "Some people are a bit savior to try to get involved", said Senior Sergeant Castledine.

en: Champion footballer Ben Cousins provides a memorable example.

translated_de: The German footballer Ben Cousins offers a very unique example.

en: In 2006, Cousins ditched his car to avoid a booze bus and attempted to swim across the Swan River.
de: Im Jahr 2006 fuhr Cousins sein Auto in den Graben, um einer Alkohol-Kontrolle zu entgehen und versuchte dann, über den Swan River zu schwimmen.
translated_de: In 2006, Cousins was able to take a car in the Grabs to enter a alcohol control and then try to smuggle over Swan River.

en: His efforts were unsuccessful, but did inspire locals to begin planning a tongue-in-cheek Ben Cousins biathlon.

en: Peter Moody alleges stewards tried to spy on him and threatens to quit racing
de: Peter Moody behauptet, dass Stewards versuchten, ihn auszuspionieren und droht, den Rennsport zu beenden
translated_de: Peter Moody said that Stewards tried to spy on him and threatened to re-run the sport

en: Peter Moody has alleged Racing Victoria stewards attempted to plant a spy in his stables last year and threatened to quit racing immediately.
de: Peter Moody behauptet, dass Stewards von Racing Victoria versucht haben, im vergangen Jahr einen Spion in seinen Ställen zu installieren und drohte, das Rennen sofort zu beenden.
translated_de: Peter Moody said that the Stewards of Racing Victoria had tried to install a spy in his Ställen last year and threatened to be able to immediately be able to do so.

en: He took aim at stewards and Racing Victoria's integrity department, alleging they have a personal campaign against him with the late scratching of Lady Tatai because of a race day treatment the final straw on Wednesday.
de: Er zielte auf die Stewards und die Integritäts-Abteilung von Racing Victoria und behauptete, dass sie eine persönliche Kampagne gegen ihn mit dem Late Scratching von Lady Tatai wegen einer Renntages-Behandlung, dem letzten Strohhalm am Mittwoch, durchführten.
translated_de: The spokesman for the Racing Victoria Committee and the 'integrity' section, he said, said that they would lead to a personal campaign against him, a campaign which led to the late scandal of Lady Tatai, due to a re-election process, which ended in a sham.

en: Moody told Fairfax Media he had always tried to do what is best for racing and has found himself in difficult circumstances when it comes to Lidari's positive swab to cobalt, which he can not explain.
de: Moody sagte Fairfax Media, dass er immer versucht habe, das zu tun, was am besten für den Rennsport ist und er sich selbst unter schwierigen Bedingungen vorgefunden habe, als es um die positive Kobalt-Tupferprobe bei Lidaris ging, die er nicht erklären kann.
translated_de: Moody said Fairfax Media that he always tried to do what was best for Rennsport and that he had been able to find himself in difficult conditions as a result of the positive Kobalt-Tupferprobe in Libya which he cannot explain.

en: He had bitten his tongue about the spy allegations for 18 months and didn't want it "to look like sour grapes."
de: Er hatte sich 18 Monate wegen der Spionage-Vorwürfe zurückgehalten und wollte nicht, dass es "aussehe wie zu hoch hängende Trauben."
translated_de: It had been held for 18 months due to the spionage scandal and did not want to say that it was "a very high snafu" .

en: "I wasn't going to say anything about that and I have sat on it for a long time but sometimes you get so frustrated it all comes out at once," Moody said.
de: "Ich hatte vor, nichts dazu zu sagen, und ich habe lange darauf gesessen, aber manchmal sind Sie so frustriert, dass alles auf einmal herauskommt", sagte Moody.
translated_de: "I had not said anything about it and I have long been sceptical, but sometimes you are so frustrated that everything is coming back," said Moody.

en: They know it went on.
de: Sie wissen, dass es weiterging.
translated_de: You know that this is going to be a long way.

en: Sometimes you react and have to live the consequences and I will have to live with what I said.
de: Manchmal reagiert man, und man muss mit den Folgen leben, und ich muss damit leben, was ich gesagt habe.
translated_de: Sometimes, people react and they must live with the consequences and I must live with them, as I said.

en: I will go home tonight and sleep well.
de: Ich werde heute Abend nach Hause gehen und gut schlafen.
translated_de: I will go to the house today and sleep well.

en: I want to walk around with my head held high and want my owners to think that I am trying my best for them.
de: Ich möchte erhobenen Hauptes umhergehen, und ich möchte, dass meine Besitzer denken, dass ich mein Bestes für sie versuche.
translated_de: I would like to raise the question of the main point and I would like to remind my fellow shopper that I am my best for them.

en: When they start to think I'm not that's when I shouldn't be a trainer.
de: Wenn sie anfangen zu denken, ich tue das nicht, dann sollte ich nicht mehr Trainer sein.
translated_de: If they are to think, I do not think that this is the case, then I should not be more trainer.

en: I would then have to consider what I do with my licence.
de: Ich muss dann überlegen, was ich mit meiner Lizenz tue.
translated_de: I must then ask myself what I am entitled to.

en: Earlier, Moody had dropped the bombshell in a racing.com interview that the integrity department had tried to spy on his stable.
de: Zuvor hatte Moody die Bombe in einem Interview mit racing.com hochgehen lassen, dass die Integritäts-Abteilung versucht hatte, seinen Stall auszuspionieren.
translated_de: Moody has been able to take the bombs in a interview with racing.com, and that the Integrity Assessment had tried to spy on his sham.

en: "Eighteen months ago Terry Bailey, Dayle Brown and Dr Brian Stewart sat in a room with a man - who I will name if asked - and offered him employment to work in my stables to offer information on what I was doing within my stables," Moody said on Racing.com.
de: "Vor achtzehn Monaten saßen Terry Bailey, Dayle Brown und Dr. Brian Stewart in einem Raum mit einem Mann - den ich benennen werde, wenn ich gefragt werde - und boten ihm eine Beschäftigung in meinen Ställen an, um Informationen über das, was ich innerhalb meiner Ställe tue, zu liefern", sagte Moody auf Racing.com.
translated_de: "Pour eight months Terry Bailey, Dayle Brown and Brian Stewart were sitting in a space with a man - who I will be benennen if I ask - and boten him a job in my Ställen to provide information on what I was delivering within my Ställe", said Moody on Racing.com.

en: They obviously believe I'm a cheat.
de: Sie glauben offenbar, dass ich ein Betrüger bin.
translated_de: You believe that I am a spokesman.

en: If that's the case surely they should all hand in their briefs because they've been incompetent in trying to catch me.
de: Wenn das der Fall ist, sollten sie sich sicherlich an ihre Nasen fassen, weil sie bei dem Versuch, mich zu fassen, versagt haben.
translated_de: If this is the case, they should certainly take their noses, because they have said that they are doing the same thing.

en: Robert Roulston, former chairman of RVL, David Moodie, current chairman of RVL, and Bernard Saundry, current CEO of RVL, were aware of that at the time and are aware of that today.
de: Robert Roulston, ehem. Vorsitzender des RVL, David Moodie, amtierender Präsident des RVL und Bernard Saundry, aktueller CEO des RVL, waren sich dessen zu der Zeit bewusst und sind es heute noch.
translated_de: Robert Roulston, President of the RVL, David Moodie, President of the RVL and Bernard Saundry, current CEO of the RVL, were aware of the moment and are still in the process.

en: Should that make me think it's becoming personal?
de: Sollte mich das zu der Ansicht bringen, dass es persönlich wird?
translated_de: What should I do to say that I will be able to do this personally?

en: Has RVL got a grow a set of balls and maybe make people outside of trainers responsible for what it is going on the industry?
de: Hat der RVL sich feige verhalten und macht vielleicht Leute außerhalb von Trainern verantwortlich dafür, was in der Branche vorgeht?
translated_de: Has the RVL behaved well and maybe people outside trainers are responsible for this, was it in the sector?

en: Am I bad for the industry?
de: Bin ich schlecht für die Branche?
translated_de: Is this bad for the sector?

en: Am I that bad for the industry?
de: Bin ich so schlimm für die Branche?
translated_de: Is this so bad for the sector?

en: Maybe people out there think I am.
de: Vielleicht denken die Leute da draußen, dass ich es bin.
translated_de: Perhaps you think people outside that I am.

en: Maybe they need to take my licence off me and push me away and I've got no doubt what I'm saying now might make them think about that.
de: Vielleicht müssen sie mir meine Lizenz nehmen und mich verstoßen, und ich habe keinen Zweifel, dass das, was ich sage, sie jetzt darüber nachdenken lässt.
translated_de: Perhaps I should take my licence and I should be able to do so, and I have no doubt that I think that it is now a question that I have asked.

en: But I've got to the point now where I don't care and that saddens me.
de: Aber ich bin jetzt an dem Punkt angekommen, an dem mir das egal ist, und das macht mich traurig.
translated_de: But I am now referring to the point which I am equally concerned about and which makes me irrite.

en: That really saddens me.
de: Das macht mich wirklich traurig.
translated_de: I really feel traurig.

en: I will put the pressure on them and onus on them to make a decision.
de: Ich werde den Druck auf sie ausüben und sie drängen, eine Entscheidung zu treffen.
translated_de: I will exert pressure on them and ask them to make a decision.

en: I've got the support of my family and I can walk away.
de: Ich habe die Unterstützung meiner Familie und ich kann gehen.
translated_de: I have supported my family and I can go on.

en: The trainer's frustration levels have built with the long-running cobalt inquiry involving Lidari and the late scratching had him saying that he could "throw my licence across the table."
de: Die Frustrations-Niveaus des Trainers haben sich mit der lang andauernden Kobalt-Untersuchung bei Lidari aufgebaut, und das Late Scratching führte dazu, dass er sagte, dass er "seine Lizenz über den Tisch werfen könne."
translated_de: The Frustrations-Niveaus of Trainers have built up the long and persistent Kobalt-underseas in Lidari and the late Scratching has led to the conclusion that he said that he could "take a seat seat" on the table.

en: Moody, best known for preparing unbeaten champion Black Caviar, labelled the race-day treatment rule "ridiculous" after a mud or clay poultice had been applied to the horses legs, which is against the rules.
de: Moody, am besten bekannt durch seine Vorbereitung des ungeschlagenen Meisters Black Caviar, bezeichnete die Renntags-Behandlungs-Regel "lächerlich", nachdem eine Packung Schlamm oder Ton auf die Pferdebeine aufgetragen worden war, was gegen die Regeln verstieß.
translated_de: Moody, which is best known by his preparation for the untapped Black Caviar, called the Renntags-Behandlungs-Regel "loyal", a packing sack or a pound on the pferdebee, was against the rules.

en: It's against the rules of racing.
de: "Es ist gegen die Regeln des Rennsports.
translated_de: "This is against the rules of Rennsport.

en: I've got to accept full responsibility for that," he said.
de: Ich muss dafür die volle Verantwortung übernehmen", sagte er.
translated_de: I must take responsibility for it," he said.

en: One of my staff mistakenly laced mud on its leg.
de: "Einer meiner Mitarbeiter hat irrtümlicherweise Schlamm auf das Bein aufgetragen.
translated_de: "I have been a little disappointed with the fact that my staff has abused the pigs.

en: It could have had it last night.
de: Es hätte gestern Abend so sein können.
translated_de: It would be possible to do so yesterday evening.

en: It could have had it yesterday, which it did have.
de: Es hätte gestern den ganzen Tag so sein können, was auch so war.
translated_de: It would have been possible to do so yesterday, but it was also so.

en: It had it on race day.
de: Es hatte es aber auch so am Renntag.
translated_de: It was also the case in Renntag.

en: Moody could be faced with a three-month disqualification for the race day treatment using the poultice, which stewards have opened an inquiry into.
de: Moody könnte mit einer dreimonatigen Disqualifikation für die Behandlung mit der Packung am Renntag konfrontiert werden. Eine Untersuchung dieser Angelegenheit wurde eröffnet.
translated_de: Moody could face three-monational discrimination for treatment with the Packing at the end of the day, and a probe of this issue has been launched.

en: It is a joke.
de: Es ist ein Witz.
translated_de: It is a joke.

en: People making these rules know nothing about the horse.
de: Menschen, die diese Regeln aufstellen, wissen nichts über das Pferd.
translated_de: People who are aware of these rules are not aware of the plight.

en: "We all understand that we need for rules but it has gone too far," Moody said.
de: "Wir alle sehen ein, dass wir Regeln brauchen, aber hier ist man zu weit gegangen", sagte Moody.
translated_de: "We all see that we need rules, but this is too far away," said Moody.

en: Cobram hit-and-run driver arrested
de: Mann nach Fahrerflucht verhaftet
translated_de: Mann after driver flight

en: Police have arrested a man over a hit-and-run collision with a cyclist in Cobram at the weekend.
de: Die Polizei hat am Wochenende einen Mann nach einem Zusammenstoß mit einem Radfahrer und anschließender Fahrerflucht in Cobram verhaftet.
translated_de: Police have reacted on a weekend after a meeting with a cyclist and then a driver flight in Cobram.

en: The cyclist was airlifted to the Royal Melbourne Hospital with serious injuries after being struck by a car on the Murray Valley Highway on Saturday morning.
de: Der Radfahrer wurde mit dem Hubschrauber in das Royal Melbourne Hospital mit schweren Verletzungen eingeliefert, nachdem er von einem Auto am Samstagmorgen auf der Murray-Valley-Autobahn getroffen wurde.
translated_de: The cyclist was beaten by the Hubschrauber in the Royal Melbourne Hospital with serious injuries, after a car was parked on the Murray-Valley highway on Saturday morning.

en: Police said the motorist drove away without stopping to help the injured rider.
de: Die Polizei sagte, der Autofahrer fuhr weiter, ohne zu stoppen, um dem verletzten Fahrer zu helfen.
translated_de: Police said that the driver continued to drive without stopping to help the driver who was injured.

en: On Monday a 50-year-old Nathalia man handed himself in to police at Shepparton.
de: Am Montag stellte sich ein 50 Jahre alter Mann aus Nathalia der Polizei in Shepparton.
translated_de: The Montag commissioned a 50-year-old man from the Nathalia of the Police in Shepparton.

en: He is expected to be charged with failing to stop at an accident, failing to render assistance, and other traffic offences.
de: Er wird voraussichtlich wegen Fahrerflucht und unterlassener Hilfeleistung und wegen anderer Verkehrsdelikte angeklagt werden.
translated_de: It will be a concern for driver departure and underage assistance and other transport delays.

en: The cyclist, a 40-year-old Cobram man, remains in hospital in a stable condition.
de: Der Radfahrer, ein 40-jähriger Mann aus Cobram bleibt im Krankenhaus. Er befindet sich in einem stabilen Zustand.
translated_de: The cyclist, a 40-year-old man from Cobram, remains in hospital and is in a stable condition.

en: Melbourne Storm coach Craig Bellamy hits back at rivals over wrestling claims
de: Melbourne-Storm-Trainer Craig Bellamy schlägt gegen Rivalen wegen Behauptungen zu Ringkämpfen zurück
translated_de: Melbourne-Storm-Trainer Craig Bellamy schlägt against rivals because of claims to fight back

en: Melbourne Storm coach Craig Bellamy has called criticism of his side's tackling as "agenda setting" by the NRL's two premiership favourites.
de: Melbourne-Storm-Trainer Craig Bellamy hat Kritik am Tackling seiner Spieler als "Agenda-Setting" von zwei Premier League Favoriten der NRL bezeichnet.
translated_de: Melbourne-Storm-Trainer Craig Bellamy has criticised his players' attitude to the 'Agenda Setting' of two Premier League Favorites of the NRL.

en: Sydney Roosters coach Trent Robinson said the referees allowed the Storm to "wrestle" his side during the Storm's upset win in the qualifying final in Sydney on Friday night.
de: Sydney Roosters Trainer Trent Robinson sagte, dass die Schiedsrichter den Storm-Spielern "Ringkämpfe" mit seinem Team während des hohen Storm-Siegs im Qualifying-Finale in Sydney am Freitagabend erlaubt haben.
translated_de: The Sydney Rooster Trainer Trent Robinson said that the Schiedsrichter allowed the Storm-James to "fight" with his team during the high Storm-Sieg in the Qualifying Final in Sydney on Friday evening.

en: Brisbane Broncos coach Wayne Bennett made a thinly veiled reference to the Storm after his side's qualifying final win over North Queensland Cowboys on Saturday night when he called that game a "showcase" of the rugby league and said the two Queensland weren't "too big" into wrestling.
de: Brisbane Broncos Trainer Wayne Bennett machte eine kaum verhüllte Anmerkung zu dem Storm-Team, nachdem seine Mannschaft den Final-Sieg gegen North Queensland Cowboys am Samstagabend erzielt hatte. Er nannte das Spiel ein "Musterbeispiel" der Rugby League und sagte, dass die zwei aus Queensland nicht "zu gut" im Ringen seien.
translated_de: The Brisbane Broncos Trainer Wayne Bennett made a very poor impression on the Storm Team, after his team achieved the final victory against North Queensland Cowboys on Saturday evening, and said that the game was a "musterbeispiel" of Rugby League and that the two players from Queensland were not "too good" in the Rings.

en: Bellamy defended his side's tackling and said they just focused on their "contact" when tackling.
de: Bellamy verteidigte das Tacklimg seiner Mannschaft und sagte, dass sie beim Tackling nur auf ihren "Kontakt" konzentriert seien.
translated_de: Bellamy defends the Tacklimg team and said that they are only concentrating on their "contakt".

en: Bellamy added he took confidence from having two leading coaches criticise his side as it meant they were concerned about the Storm beating them.
de: Bellamy fügte hinzu, dass die Kritik von zwei führenden Trainer an seiner Mannschaft ihn zuversichtlich stimme, da es bedeute, dass sie sich Sorgen machten, vom Storm-Team geschlagen zu werden.
translated_de: Bellamy adds that the criticism of two leading trainers in his team is a sign of a scepticism that they are making concerns about the Storm Team.

en: "That keeps coming up - I didn't hear Trent Robinson bring up wrestling when they beat us 24-2," Bellamy said on Wednesday.
de: "Das taucht immer wieder auf - ich habe nicht gehört, dass Trent Robinson über Ringkämpfe sprach, als sie uns 24:2 geschlagen haben", sagte Bellamy am Mittwoch.
translated_de: "I have never heard of Trent Robinson' s ring fight, as they have fought 24:2," said Bellamy am Mittwoch.

en: I can guarantee we haven't changed nothing all year with our defensive systems or techniques, it's just that the last six weeks we have made a real emphasis with our contact in tackles and that has been the turn around for us.
de: Ich kann garantieren, dass wir im ganzen Jahr nichts an unserem defensiven System oder den Techniken geändert haben. Aber in den letzten sechs Wochen haben wir unseren Kontakt bei Tackles zu einem wirklichen Schwerpunkt gemacht, und das hat für uns die Trendwende erbracht.
translated_de: I can assure you that we have not changed our defensive system or our techniques in the whole year, but in the last six weeks we have made our contact with the subject of a real focus and that has been a key focus for us.

en: Trent has been there three years and he obviously has a great side to coach so he is probably not used to losing so it was a bit of a shock to him.
de: Trent ist jetzt seit drei Jahren dort, und er hat offensichtlich eine großartige Mannschaft zu trainieren. Er ist daher wahrscheinlich nicht daran gewöhnt zu verlieren, so war es ein bisschen ein Schock für ihn.
translated_de: Trent has been in the area for three years now and he has obviously been able to train a great team, and it is likely not to lose it, so it was a bit of a sock for him.

en: It's funny how this always comes up at this time of year.
de: Es ist schon komisch, wie dies immer wieder zu dieser Jahreszeit auftaucht.
translated_de: It is already a complex one, as it is repeated in this year.

en: Bellamy challenged Bennett's idea of "exciting football" reminding his mentor that Bennett's St George-Illawarra Dragons won the premiership in 2010 by playing "boring" football.
de: Bellamy hat Bennetts Idee vom "spannenden Fußball" angegriffen und seinen Mentor daran erinnert, dass Bennetts St George Illawarra Dragons die Premier League im Jahr 2010 mit "langweiligem" Fußball gewann.
translated_de: Bellamy has embraced Bennett' s idea of "long-term football" and his mentor reminded him that Bennett' s St George Illawarra Dragons won the Premier League in 2010 with "long-term" football.

en: Wayne is talking about exciting footy.
de: Wayne spricht von spannenden Fußball.
translated_de: Wayne speaks of exciting football.

en: He made a point of comparing his game on Saturday night with our one on Friday night and how exciting their game was," Bellamy said.
de: Er hat sein Spiel am Samstagabend mit unserem am Freitagabend verglichen und wie aufregend ihr Spiel war", sagte Bellamy.
translated_de: It has been played on Saturday evening with our game on Friday evening and it has been played on the same day as it was, said Bellamy.

en: I remember in 2010 St George was criticised a lot for being a boring team and Wayne said he didn't give a rat's arse.
de: Ich erinnere mich, dass im Jahr 2010 St George als ein langweiliges Team kritisiert wurde, und Wayne sagte, dass er sich einen Scheißdreck darum kümmern werde.
translated_de: I have been reminded that St George was kritised in 2010 as a long-term team and Wayne said that he will be able to take care of a squeak.

en: But now he has a team which can play what we would see as exciting footy, especially his young halves with their speed.
de: Aber jetzt hat er ein Team, das spielen kann und das wir als spannend ansehen, insbesondere seine jungen Spieler mit ihrer Geschwindigkeit.
translated_de: But now, I have a team that can play and we are a bit of a thrill, especially for its young players.

en: That's the footy you would want to play when you have those sort of players.
de: Das ist das Ballspiel, das man spielen möchte, wenn man diese Art von Spielern hat.
translated_de: This is the ball game that you want to play if you have this type of player.

en: He made that point in 2010, now he wants everyone to play his style of footy - not every team has two halves like Anthony Milford and Ben Hunt so they can play like that.
de: Er machte diese Aussage im Jahr 2010, jetzt will er, dass alle seine Art von Fußball spielen - nicht jedes Team hat zwei Spieler wie Anthony Milford und Ben Hunt, so dass sie wie diese spielen können.
translated_de: This statement was made in 2010, and now it will be clear that all his players are playing football - not every team has two players, Anthony Milford and Ben Hunt, so that they can play football.

en: To me it builds more confidence because they are saying these things because they are a little bit concerned about playing us.
de: Ich baue stärkeres Vertrauen auf, weil sie diese Dinge sagen, weil sie ein bisschen besorgt sind, gegen uns spielen zu müssen.
translated_de: I want more trust because they say that they are a little concerned about what we must do.

en: Six weeks ago they probably weren't thinking of us when they get to the big games.
de: Vor sechs Wochen haben sie wohl nicht an uns gedacht, als es um die Big Games ging.
translated_de: It was not a chance that they had been able to attend the big games for six weeks.

en: Bellamy also pointed out the Storm and Roosters game was a higher scoring contest than the Broncos and Cowboys game.
de: Bellamy wies auch darauf hin, dass das Spiel Storm gegen Roosters ein höheres Ergebnis erzielte als das Spiel Broncos gegen Cowboys.
translated_de: Bellamy also insists that the game Storm against the Roosters has a higher result than the game Broncos against Cowboys.

en: The Broncos game was probably a good game, I haven't watched it yet but what was the score? 16-12?
de: Das Spiel der Broncos war wohl ein gutes Spiel, ich habe es noch nicht angesehen, aber was war das Ergebnis? 16 : 12 ?
