en: In conjunction with the cold front, the wind will get stronger increasing to stormy, and temperatures will decrease sharply.
de: Zusammen mit der Kaltfront frischt der Wind stark bis stürmisch auf, und die Temperaturen gehen deutlich zurück.
translated_de: The cold front is a bit colder and the temperatures are a bit lower.

en: The following days will be autumnal in the north with temperatures of 15 to 20 degrees, whereas in the south it will be sunnier and warmer at the weekend with temperatures up to 25 degrees.
de: Die folgenden Tage präsentieren sich im Norden herbstlich mit 15 bis 20 Grad, im Süden hingegen wird es am Wochenende sonniger und wärmer mit bis zu 25 Grad.
translated_de: The following days present in the North with a minimum of 15 to 20 degrees, and in the South, the weekend will be sonning and a warm up of up to 25 degrees.

en: Rome now has a Martin Luther Square
de: Rom hat jetzt einen Martin-Luther-Platz
translated_de: Rom has now a Martin-Luther-Platz

en: Some 500 years after the Reformation, Rome now has a Martin Luther Square.
de: Knapp 500 Jahre nach der Reformation gibt es in Rom jetzt einen Martin-Luther-Platz.
translated_de: In Rom, 500 years after the reform, there is now a Martin-Luther-Platz.

en: In the presence of the Mayor of the City, Ignazio Marino, a hitherto unnamed square in the park on the Oppio Hill was on Wednesday bestowed with the name of the German reformer.
de: In Anwesenheit von Stadtpräsident Ignazio Marino wurde am Mittwoch ein bisher namenloser Platz im Park auf dem Oppio-Hügel auf den Namen des deutschen Reformators getauft.
translated_de: In the presence of Mayor Ignazio Marino, he was able to take a name on the left of the park on the Oppio-Hügel, on behalf of the German reformators.

en: On the "Piazza Martin Lutreo" he is now recognised as the "German theologian of the Reformation".
de: Auf der "Piazza Martin Lutero" wird er jetzt als "Deutscher Theologe der Reformation" gewürdigt.
translated_de: On the "Piazza Martin Lutero" it is now regarded as the German Theologue of Reformation.

en: The park is in the centre of Rome right next to the Colosseum
de: Der Park liegt mitten im alten Rom gleich neben dem Kolosseum.
translated_de: The park is situated in the old Rom, just outside the Kolosseum.

en: The consortium of Evangelical churches in Rome proposed the choice of name.
de: Die Namensgebung war von der Arbeitsgemeinschaft der evangelischen Kirchen in Rom beantragt worden.
translated_de: The name of the church was requested by the work group of the evangelists in Rom.

en: Jens-Martin Kruse, minister of the Evangelical Lutheran community in Rome, recalled on Wednesday that for centuries Protestants in the Pope's city often had to hide their faith.
de: Jens-Martin Kruse, Pfarrer der Evangelisch-Lutherischen Gemeinde in Rom, erinnerte am Mittwoch daran, dass die Protestanten in der Stadt der Päpste über Jahrhunderte als Minderheit oft nur im Verborgenen ihren Glauben leben konnten.
translated_de: Jens-Martin Kruse, Pfarrer of the Catholic Church of Rom, reminded me of the fact that the Protestants in the Päpste city of Päpste lived in the midst of centuries of their faith in the borgs.

en: The square is a visual symbol that their tradition of the Christian faith is welcome in Rome.
de: Mit dem Platz werde in symbolischer Weise sichtbar, dass ihre Tradition des christlichen Glaubens in Rom willkommen sei.
translated_de: On the place, symbolically, it will be visible that the tradition of the Christian faith in Rom will be incorporated.

en: As a young Augustinian monk, Martin Luther (1483-1546) stayed in Rome for a few months at the turn of the year between 1510 and 1511.
de: Martin Luther (1483-1546) hielt sich als junger Augustinermönch um die Jahreswende 1510/11 einige Monate in Rom auf.
translated_de: Martin Luther (1483-1546) sat as a young Augustinermönch in the year 1510/11 in Rom for some months.

en: At the time he considered the city to be a degenerate hotbed of vice.
de: Er empfand die Stadt damals als verkommenes Sündenbabel.
translated_de: The city was a sündenbabel.

en: According to historians, his negative impressions may have been reinforced in his later fight against Rome.
de: Seine negativen Eindrücke dürften ihn nach Ansicht von Historikern in seinem späteren Kampf gegen Rom bestärkt haben.
translated_de: He could be able to make a negative impression on his own in his later fight against Rom.

en: Luther heralded the beginning of the Western Church with his theses against the selling of indulgences.
de: Luther hatte dann mit seinen Thesen gegen den Ablasshandel die Spaltung der abendländischen Kirche eingeleitet.
translated_de: Luther then sat against the ablation of the evening church with his own sham.

en: Talented artist invests three years in his personal interpretation of the Bible.
de: Hammer Künstler investierte drei Jahre in die persönliche Interpretation der Bibel
translated_de: Hammer artist spent three years in the personal interpretation of the Bibel

en: Jesus with the (gilded) crown of thorns is one of the major works that Otmar Alt has painted for his Bible.
de: Jesus mit der (vergoldeten) Dornenkrone ist eines der Hauptwerke, die Otmar Alt für seine Bibel gemalt hat.
translated_de: Jesus with the (golden) Dornenkrone is one of the main works which Otmar Alt has for his Bibel gemalt.

en: Klaus Altepost has written an introduction and updated the text of the Bible.
de: Klaus Altepost hat die Einführung geschrieben und Bibeltexte aktualisiert.
translated_de: Mr Altepost has written and updated the introduction.

en: In the beginning was the word?
de: Am Anfang war das Wort?
translated_de: What was the first word?

en: No, not in the Otmar Alt Bible, which has now been issued with magnificent pictures.
de: Nein, nicht bei der Otmar-Alt-Bibel, die jetzt mit prächtigen Bildern erschienen ist.
translated_de: It is not the Otmar Alt-Bibel which is now showing a picture of the savage images.

en: For Otmar Alt, who has devised his own personal interpretation of biblical stories in 150 motifs on paper and canvas, in the beginning was the picture.
de: Am Anfang war das Bild für Otmar Alt, der in 150 Motiven seine ganz persönlichen Interpretationen biblischer Geschichten auf Papier und Leinwand formuliert hat.
translated_de: At the beginning, the image of Otmar Alt, which has compiled his very personal interpretations of the history of the bibliographers on paper and linen, was based on 150 motives.

en: The 75-year-old conceived his "language" with bright colours and imaginative forms - which are however by no means synonymous with "funny" pictures.
de: Seine "Sprache" mit bunten Farben und fantasievollen Formen hat der 75-Jährige erhalten - was aber keineswegs gleichbedeutend ist mit "lustigen" Bildern.
translated_de: The 75-year-old has received a slew of "seen" colors and fantasies - but nothing is equal to "smoking" images.

en: On the contrary: depending on the respective themes, they can appear to be thoroughly gloomy.
de: Im Gegenteil: Den jeweiligen Themen angepasst, kann das durchaus recht düster wirken.
translated_de: In other words, the appropriate theme can be applied to the specific subject matter.

en: Otmar Alt worked on his Bible project for around three years and for this project he made a subjective choice from an artistic perspective from the many subject areas in the "Book of books".
de: Rund drei Jahre hat Otmar Alt an seinem Bibel-Projekt gearbeitet, für das er eine subjektiv-künstlerische Auswahl aus den vielen Themenbereichen des "Buches aller Bücher" getroffen hat.
translated_de: Over the course of three years, Otmar Alt has worked on his Bibel project, which has shaped the selection of subjektive books from the many subjects of the book.

en: Cycles evolved, dedicated to topics such as the Way of the Cross, plagues, the Commandments or the Lord's Prayer.
de: Entstanden sind Zyklen, die sich Themen wie Kreuzweg, Plagen, Gebote oder Vaterunser widmen.
translated_de: There are a number of symbiotics which are widened, such as cross-country, plag, gypsy or fatherunser.

en: Without even approaching them, he immediately attacted multiple partners: this applies to the Luther Verlag, a publisher specialising in theological works as well as the Kettler Verlag, who focus on publishing art books.
de: Damit hat er spontan gleich mehrere Partner fasziniert: Das gilt für den Luther-Verlag mit seiner theologischen Ausrichtung ebenso wie für den Kettler-Verlag mit seinem Schwerpunkt auf Kunstbüchern.
translated_de: This has also been a catalyst for a number of partners: the Luther-Verlag with its theological orientation, the Kettler-Verlag with its emphasis on art books.

en: And in particular author Klaus Altepost, who has grappled with the particular Bible passages based on the paintings.
de: Und da ist vor allem der Autor Klaus Altepost, der sich auf Grundlage der Malerei mit den jeweiligen Bibelstellen auseinandergesetzt hat.
translated_de: And this is, in particular, the author Klaus Altepost, who has sat down on the basis of malerei with the respective Bibels.

en: He has interpreted the Bible texts selected by Otmar Alt and "translated" them to the current day, in a topical context.
de: Er hat die von Otmar Alt ausgewählten Bibelstellen interpretiert und so ins Heute, in aktuelle Zusammenhänge "übersetzt".
translated_de: It has interpreted the Bibels selected by Otmar Alt and, in the moment, it is "overset" in the current joint.

en: These texts are like verbal mirrors of Alt's paintings.
de: Diese Texte sind wie verbale Spiegel von Alts Malerei.
translated_de: These texts are as verbal mirrors of the old Malerei.

en: They are embedded between the original Bible quotations of Martin Luther and each composition by the artist, who has here formulated his own personal concepts for the respective situations.
de: Eingebettet sind sie zwischen dem Original-Bibelzitat von Martin Luther und jeweils einem Satz des Künstlers, der hier seine ganz persönlichen Gedanken zur jeweiligen Situation formuliert.
translated_de: They are a combination of the original Bible of Martin Luther and a set of artists who form their own personal thoughts on the situation.

en: The decorated cover of the book is lettered in gold.
de: Der Schmuckeinband hat goldene Lettern.
translated_de: The jewelerie has golden letters.

en: The 75-year-old allows at the same time a twofold insight, deep into both his soul and his emotions.
de: So erlaubt der 75-Jährige gleich doppelt einen tiefen Einblick in seine Seele, seine Emotionen.
translated_de: This gives 75-year-olds the same opportunity to see his soul, his emotions.

en: This is particularly intimate.
de: Das ist ein hohes Maß an Intimität.
translated_de: This is a high level of honesty.

en: Ultimately, his emotions were the key trigger for the Bible project: Otmar Alt, who was born in Wernigerode in 1940 and grew up in Berlin, comes from a family belonging to the strict Protestant Herrnhut order.
de: Emotionen waren letztlich überhaupt Auslöser für das Bibel-Projekt: Otmar Alt, 1940 in Wernigerode geboren und in Berlin aufgewachsen, kommt aus einer Familie, die dem strengen protestantischen Herrnhuter-Orden angehörte.
translated_de: The emotions were all the more apathetic to the Bibel Project: Otmar Alt, 1940 in Wernigerode, and Berlin, is born from a family which is a strict protestant-ord.

en: "Education there took place under the shadow of the cane", remembers Otmar Alt.
de: "Da geschah die Erziehung schon mal mit dem Rohrstock", erinnert sich Otmar Alt.
translated_de: "The recession has been a problem with the Rohrstock," recalls Otmar Alt.

en: "I have tried to process this, so that perhaps I can come to terms with the Lord again.
de: "Ich habe versucht, das aufzuarbeiten, um mich vielleicht auch wieder mit dem Herrn Vater zu vertragen".
translated_de: "I have tried to work together to make a deal with Mr Father".

en: His second point is that he wants to help art once more to take a more significant place in this fast moving age: "The perception of the visual world today is shaped by advertising, which is loud.
de: Sein zweites Anliegen sei, der Kunst in schnelllebiger Zeit wieder zu mehr Stellenwert zu verhelfen: "Die Wahrnehmung von Bildwelten ist heute von Reklame geprägt, und die ist laut.
translated_de: The second aim is to increase the importance of the art in rapid times: "The perception of the world of image is now influenced by reklamation and this is the case.

en: Symbolism has been driven out.
de: Symbolik wird da verdrängt.
translated_de: The symbolism is a sign of the remark.

en: Artists have a different passion and joy in presenting things.
de: Künstler haben eine andere Lust und Wonne, Dinge zu zeigen.
translated_de: Artists have another desire and desire to show things.

en: Pictures always have something mysterious about them; they are not decoration.
de: Bilder haben immer etwas Geheimnisvolles und sind nicht dekorativ.
translated_de: The images have always been a bit of a solitary and are not dekorative.

en: "In this respect, I am a dinosaur."
de: "In dieser Hinsicht bin ich ein Dinosaurier".
translated_de: "In this regard I am a dinosaur".

en: Otmar Alt wants his viewers to let themselves "fall into" the pictures, to let them leave their impression, to discover and experience the power they have: "The picture is looking for its counterpart".
de: Otmar Alt möchte, dass sich die Betrachter in die Bilder "hineinfallen" lassen, sie auf sich wirken lassen, entdecken und spüren, welche Kraft sie haben: "Das Bild sucht sich sein Gegenüber".
translated_de: Otmar Alt wants that the viewer in the images "inspired" and sees what they have: "This image is a reflection of the viewer".

en: At the launch of the Otmar Alt Bible on Tuesday, Klaus Altepost confessed to having "always" been a lover of Otmar Alt's art: "I like the way he sees life with his pictures".
de: Klaus Altepost gestand am Dienstag bei der Präsentation der Otmar-Alt-Bibel in der Otmar-Alt-Stiftung, "schon immer" ein Liebhaber von Otmar Alts Kunst gewesen zu sein: "Ich mag, wie er mit seinen Bildern Leben begreift".
translated_de: Mr Altepost, at the Otmar Alt Foundation' s presentation on Tuesday, said that "I am always" a lover of Otmar Alts art: "I am like to be alive with his images".

en: Alt was not interested in recording the whole of the Bible, selecting only the the themes which were for him the most significant and also the most mysterious.
de: Alt habe nicht darauf geachtet, die Bibel vollständig zu erfassen, sondern die für ihn wichtigen, auch geheimnisvollen Themen ausgewählt.
translated_de: It is not the case that the Bibel should be fully drafted, but the important, and even the most comprehensive issues for him.

en: "This wasn't a collaboration between partners," says Altepost, "it was about the pictures; the text is merely an explanation." The result is a picture Bible.
de: "Das war keine Zusammenarbeit auf Augenhöhe", sagt Altepost: "Hier geht es um die Bilder, der Text erläutert lediglich". Entstanden sei eine Bilder-Bibel.
translated_de: "This is not a cooperation in the eye", says Altepost: "This is the image, the text is only a picture-bomb."

en: For Hans Möhler of the Luther Verlag this work is an invitation "to add depth to his life and to find freedom".
de: Für Hans Möhler vom Luther-Verlag ist dieses Werk eine Einladung, "sein Leben zu vertiefen und Freiheit zu finden".
translated_de: Hans Möhler of the Luther-Verlag is a welcome to this work, "in the deepest and the most libertarian life".

en: Otmar Alt's pictures speak, for Möhler, the (biblical) language of love as well as that of responsibility.
de: Otmar Alts Bilder sprechen für Möhler sowohl die (biblische) Sprache der Liebe als auch die der Verantwortung.
translated_de: Otmar Alts images speak for Möhler both the (biblical) language of love and responsibility.

en: Some of the originals - paper and canvas - will be shown for the first time in an exhibition which opens on 15th November in the Otmar Alt Foundation.
de: Ein Teil der Originale - Papier- und Leinwandbilder - wird erstmals in einer Ausstellung präsentiert, die am 15. November in der Otmar-Alt-Stiftung eröffnet wird.
translated_de: One part of the original - paper and linen images - is presented in a exhibition which will be opened at the Otmar Alt Foundation on 15 November.

en: Start of construction draws closer for BMX track
de: Baubeginn für BMX-Bahn naht
translated_de: Construction of BMX trains is a good idea.

en: Plans made, site found, company commissioned, mound for a circuit modelled: one year later, everything was nearly finished - but even before the official opening of the BMX track it was closed again.
de: Pläne gemacht, Platz gefunden, Unternehmen beauftragt, Erdhügel für einen Rundkurs modelliert: Ein Jahr später war fast alles fertig - doch noch vor der offiziellen Eröffnung der BMX-Bahn war damit schon wieder Schluss.
translated_de: Plans were made, companies were ordered to create a round course, and Erdhügel was modelled: a year later everything was done, but before the official opening of the BMX railway, it was already done.

en: Political and administrative failings caused anger, particularly with residents who did not want to put up with the track.
de: Versäumnisse in Politik und Verwaltung sorgten für Verdruss, vor allem bei den Anwohnern, die die Bahn nicht dulden wollten.
translated_de: Politics and administration are a key factor in druss, especially for those who do not want to go to the rail.

en: So the mound was demolished and the search began for a new site - now with a formal application for planning permission.
de: Also Hügel abgeschoben, neuen Platz gesucht - nun mit förmlicher Planung und Antrag auf Baugenehmigung.
translated_de: Also, Hügel has rejected the need for a new place - now with a proposal for planning and construction.

en: Approval will be received in October, chief local councillor Sabine Mosebach-Boch has now been able to inform the children's and young people's committee.
de: Die Genehmigung werde im Oktober eingehen, konnte die Erste Gemeinderätin Sabine Mosebach-Bock jetzt im Kinder- und Jugendausschuss mitteilen.
translated_de: The approval will be granted in October and the first municipality of Sabine Mosebach-Bock has now been granted a grant in the Children and Youth Committee.

en: "I hope that this year something will be seen to happen," she said.
de: "Ich hoffe, dass dieses Jahr noch Sichtbares passiert", sagte sie.
translated_de: "I hope that this year will be seen more clearly," said the spokesman.

en: The work should then be started without any "further pause for thought" at the site of the former indoor swimming pool.
de: Es solle dann ohne "weitere Gedenkpause" mit den Arbeiten beim ehemaligen Hallenbad begonnen werden.
translated_de: It should then begin without a "longer period" with the work at former Hallenbad.

en: DFB steps up its commitment to refugees
de: DFB intensiviert Engagement für Flüchtlinge
translated_de: DFB intensifies its commitment to refugees

en: The German football league gave clear indications at the weekend that the DFB is extending its commitment to refugees to 2019.
de: Der DFB weitet sein Engagement für Flüchtlinge bis 2019 aus, die Bundesliga setzt am Wochenende ein deutliches Zeichen.
translated_de: The DFB has a large commitment to refugees until 2019 and the Bundesliga is a sign of a significant increase in the weekend.

en: Football has reacted to the deteriorating situation in Germany and promised politicians its help with the current problems.
de: Der Fußball reagiert auf die sich zuspitzende Lage in Deutschland und sichert der Politik seine Hilfe bei der Bewältigung der anstehenden Probleme zu.
translated_de: The football team is responding to the situation in Germany and ensures that the policy will be able to help with the resolution of the issues which are currently being dealt with.

en: "I consider this to be the biggest challenge in our country since reunification."
de: "Ich halte das für die größte Herausforderung unseres Landes seit der Wiedervereinigung."
translated_de: "I am the biggest challenge to our country since the re-election."

en: "Basically nobody knows, it's no concern of mine, it's not my doing."
de: "Da kann im Prinzip niemand sagen, das geht mich nichts an, ich habe damit nichts zu tun."
translated_de: "I can't say that, in principle, I do not want to do anything, I have nothing to do."

en: "It is in the interests of everybody to get to grip with this issue," says DFB chief Wolfgang Niersbach.
de: "Das muss jeden einzelnen interessieren, dieses Thema in den Griff zu kriegen", sagte DFB-Chef Wolfgang Niersbach.
translated_de: "Everyone must be interested in this issue in the Griff to war", said DFB chef Wolfgang Niersbach.

en: He wants to debate the subject of the refugee situation in Germany intensively at the annual meeting with German Chancellor Angela Merkel on 23 September in Berlin.
de: Beim jährlichen Treffen mit Bundeskanzlerin Angela Merkel am 23. September in Berlin will er die Flüchtlingssituation in Deutschland intensiv erörtern.
translated_de: The German refugees' situation in Germany will be intensified at the annual meeting with the German national Angela Merkel on 23 September in Berlin.

en: I'm going to be in the Chancellor's office next Wednesday and I'm meeting there with State Minister Ms Özoğuz and the Chancellor."
de: "Ich bin nächsten Mittwoch im Kanzleramt und treffe dort die Staatsministerin Frau Özoğuz und die Kanzlerin."
translated_de: "I am going to be in Kanzleramt next week and I met the Minister of State, Mrs zouz, and the Kanzlerin."

en: "I'm sure the topic will play a central role there," he announces.
de: "Da wird das Thema sicher eine zentrale Rolle spielen", kündigte er an.
translated_de: "This is a crucial issue," he said.

en: Football can and will help.
de: Der Fußball könne und wolle helfen.
translated_de: The football can and will help.

en: But the politicians must set the deciding guidelines.
de: Die entscheidenden Weichen muss aber die Politik stellen.
translated_de: The crucial issues must be addressed in the policy.

en: The German Football Association has therefore extended its refugee initiative "1:0 for a welcome" to four years.
de: Der Deutsche Fußball-Bund hat deshalb seine Flüchtlingsinitiative "1:0 für ein Willkommen" um vier Jahre ausgeweitet.
translated_de: The Deutsche Fußball Foundation has therefore extended its Refugee Initiative "1:0 for a welcome" for four years.

en: "Through the Egidius-Braun foundation we have ensured that this program will continue until 2019," declared Niersbach on the brink of the UEFA meeting in St Julian's, Malta
de: "Über die Egidius-Braun-Stiftung haben wir sichergestellt, dass dieses Programm bis 2019 weiterläuft", erklärte Niersbach am Rande der UEFA-Tagung in St. Julian's/Malta.
translated_de: "We have assured the Egidius-Braun Foundation that this programme will continue until 2019", a statement from Niersbach, who is the Rande of the UEFA conference in St. Julian' s/Malta.

en: Several teams are also supporting the programme.
de: Auch einige Bundesligisten unterstützen dieses Programm.
translated_de: Several Bundesligists also support this programme.

en: This very weekend the 36 professional clubs will be sending out a clear message when they wear the words "We are helping – #refugeeswelcome" on the left sleeve of their strip instead of the usual sponsor's logo (Hermes).
de: Bereits an diesem Wochenende setzen die 36 Profivereine ein deutliches Zeichen, wenn sie auf dem linken Trikotärmel statt des sonst üblichen Sponsorenlogos (Hermes) den Aufdruck "Wir helfen - #refugeeswelcome" tragen werden.
translated_de: The 36 Profivereins are already a sign of a strong sign that they are promoting the slogan "We help - #refugees welcome" on the link between the Trikotarymel and the usual Sponsorlogos.

en: "We are doing this to make it clear that everyone should help where and in any way they can," Leverkusen's sport boss Rudi Völler told the "Bild" newspaper on Tuesday, and describes the scheme as "a matter of course".
de: "Wir wollen damit auch deutlich machen, dass alle helfen sollen, wo und wie sie nur können", sagte Leverkusens Sportchef Rudi Völler der "Bild"-Zeitung (Dienstag) und bezeichnete das Vorhaben als "Selbstverständlichkeit".
translated_de: "We want to make sure that all aid should be done where and how they can", said Leverkusen Sportchef Rudi Völler of the "Bild"-Zeitung (Services) and describes the proposal as "selbstverständlich".

en: "The refugee drama concerns everyone, nobody can look away."
de: "Das Flüchtlings-Drama geht jeden an, keiner darf wegsehen."
translated_de: "The refugees' drama is all about nothing.

en: "We football teams can, no, we must use our charisma, our influence, and our opportunities to help the many refugees who have already suffered tremendously," says Hertha manager Michael Preetz.
de: "Wir Fußball-Bundesligisten können, nein, wir müssen unsere Strahlkraft, unseren Einfluss und unsere Möglichkeiten nutzen, um den vielen Flüchtlingen, die schon so unglaublich gelitten haben, zu helfen", sagte Hertha-Manager Michael Preetz.
translated_de: "We can't be football-bossilly, we must use our power, our influence and our opportunities to help the many refugees who have been so incredibilly gelitte," said Hertha' s manager, Michael Preetz.

en: Hoffenheim's Managing Director Peter Rettig spoke of a prominent signal by the league.
de: Hoffenheims Geschäftsführer Peter Rettig sprach von einem "prominenten Zeichen der Liga".
translated_de: Mr Peter Rettig, Hoffenheim' s businessman, referred to a "prominent sign of the Liga".

en: The women's national team is inviting 100 refugees to Halle (Saale) for the World Cup qualifying match against Hungary.
de: Zum EM-Qualifikationsspiel gegen Ungarn an diesem Freitag lädt die Nationalmannschaft der Frauen 100 Flüchtlinge nach Halle/Saale ein.
translated_de: The EM Qualificationsspiel against Ungarn on this Friday invites the Nationalmannschaft of Women 100 refugees to Halle/Saale.

en: Niersbach describes supporting the refugees as "a grand joint effort by German football."
de: Niersbach bezeichnete die Unterstützung von Flüchtlingen als "ein großes Gemeinschaftswerk deutscher Fußball".
translated_de: Niersbach describes the support of refugees as a "grand communist group" in German football.

en: It is amazing that all 36 licensed clubs have started their own projects in their own locations.
de: Dass alle 36 Lizenzvereine in ihren Orten eigene Projekte gestartet hätten, sei großartig.
translated_de: The 36 licensing agreements in their local areas have been launched, and it is a huge undertaking.

en: It is just as amazing that both small and large clubs are doing this.
de: Genauso großartig ist, dass kleine und kleinste Vereine da aktiv sind.
translated_de: It is also so important that small and small groups are active.

en: The message "1:0 for a welcome," that we have sent out is being lived in football.
de: Die Botschaft "1:0 für ein Willkommen", die wir ausgegeben haben, wird im Fußball gelebt.
translated_de: The message "1:0 for a welcome", which we have received, will be revived in football.

en: "That is of enormous significance," he said.
de: "Das ist von enormer Bedeutung", sagte er.
translated_de: "This is of enormous importance," he said.

en: In both this year and next year the association together with the DFB team and the Federal government are making €300,000 available for the integration of refugees.
de: In diesem und dem nächsten Jahr stellt der Verband gemeinsam mit der DFB-Auswahl und der Bundesregierung jeweils 300 000 Euro für die Integration von Flüchtlingen zur Verfügung.
translated_de: In this and the next year, the Council will be able to provide a total of 300 000 euros for the integration of refugees with the DFB and the Bundesregierung.

en: "The clubs have already already released the entire sum for 2015," reports Niersbach.
de: "Die Vereine haben die ganze Summe für 2015 auch schon abgerufen", berichtete Niersbach.
translated_de: "The United Nations have already withdrawn the whole sum for 2015", a report by Niersbach.

en: Reports: SAP chief executive loses an eye in accident
de: Berichte: SAP-Vorstandschef verliert bei Unfall ein Auge
translated_de: Reports: SAP-Vorstandschefs are in danger of a crash in a january

en: According to several reports, the chief executive of Europe's largest software group, Bill McDermott, lost his left eye through a fall at the beginning of July.
de: Der Vorstandschef von Europas größtem Software-Konzern, Bill McDermott, hat mehreren Berichten zufolge durch einen Sturz Anfang Juli das linke Auge verloren.
translated_de: The CEO of the largest software company in Europe, Bill McDermott, has lost several reports by a stumbling point in July.

en: In an accident on the stairs in his brother's house in the USA after midnight, he fell on a water glass he was carrying in his left hand, reported the "Wirtschaftswoche" on Wednesday.
de: Bei dem Unfall auf der Treppe im Haus seines Bruders in den USA sei er nach Mitternacht auf ein Wasserglas gefallen, das er in der linken Hand getragen habe, berichte die "Wirtschaftswoche" am Mittwoch.
translated_de: The accident on the Treppe in the House in the USA was a water bottle which was borne in the link-up, and the "Wirtschaftswoche" was a joint incident.

en: "He almost bled to death, he was unconscious, then he dragged himself out onto the road - so he told us last week," the "WiWo" quoted SAP co-founder Hasso Plattner.
de: "Er ist fast verblutet, war ohnmächtig, hat sich dann raus geschleppt auf die Straße - das hat er uns so erzählt letzte Woche", zitiert die "WiWo" SAP-Mitbegründer Hasso Plattner.
translated_de: "It is fast verbluted, it is ohnmächtig, and it has then slammed on the Straits - which we have so told us last week", he zitted the "WiWo" SAP-Mitbegründer Hasso Plattner.

en: McDermott will however be able to return to work.
de: McDermott könne aber seiner Arbeit nachgehen.
translated_de: McDermott could however continue his work.

en: "We are meeting up at the board meeting in Walldorf at the beginning of October," said Plattner.
de: "Anfang Oktober treffen wir uns vor der Aufsichtsratssitzung in Walldorf", sagte Plattner.
translated_de: "An October we meet in Walldorf before the Council meeting," said Plattner.

en: The 54-year-old manager will be at the meeting and "fully fit for work".
de: Der 54 Jahre alte Manager sei bei dem Treffen dabei und "voll arbeitsfähig".
translated_de: The 54-year-old manager is in the process of meeting and is "full-time" in the process.

en: McDermott announced in an interview with the "Süddeutschen Zeitung" (Thursday's edition) that he will come back to Germany in October and take over the lead at the software group again.
de: McDermott kündigte in einem Interview mit der "Süddeutschen Zeitung" (Donnerstagsausgabe) an, er werde im Oktober wieder nach Deutschland kommen und weiter den Softwarekonzern führen.
translated_de: McDermott sat down in a conversation with the "Süd German Zeitung" (Donnerstagsausgabe) and will return to Germany in October and continue to lead the softwarekonzern.

en: "I am definitely there for SAP, completely involved in my job."
de: "Ich bin voll für SAP da, voll in meinem Job."
translated_de: "I am full of SAP, full of my job."

en: "I have of course been in regular contact with the board and its chairman, Hasso Plattner, the whole time," McDermott told the "SZ".
de: "Selbstverständlich stand ich die ganze Zeit in regelmäßigem Kontakt mit dem Aufsichtsrat und dessen Vorsitzenden Hasso Plattner", sagte McDermott der "SZ".
translated_de: "I have to keep in constant contact with the Council and with Mr Hasso Plattner' s President, in principle," said McDermott of the SZ.

en: McDermott normally commutes between Germany and the USA, but since the summer he has no longer been in the SAP German headquarters in Walldorf.
de: McDermott pendelt üblicherweise zwischen Deutschland und den USA, seit dem Sommer aber war er nicht mehr in der deutschen SAP-Zentrale in Walldorf.
translated_de: McDermott has a tendency to move between Germany and the USA, but since summer, he has not been more active in the German SAP centre in Walldorf.

en: Ii is important to him to go public with such a personal story, the manager told the "SZ": "It could happen to anyone".
de: Ihm sei es wichtig, mit einer solch persönlichen Geschichte an die Öffentlichkeit zu gehen, sagte der Manager der "SZ": "Jedem kann so etwas passieren."
translated_de: It is important to have a personal history in the public, said the manager of the SZ: "It is possible that something can pass."

en: "The important thing is to get up again if you fall down."
de: "Wichtig ist, wieder aufzustehen, wenn man hingefallen ist."
translated_de: "It is now a reality, if it is a matter of fact."

en: McLaren reserve driver Magnussen out of action…
de: McLaren-Ersatzpilot Magnussen außer Gefecht ...
translated_de: McLaren-Ersatz pilot Magnussen außer Gefecht ...

en: Magnussen twittered a photo of the damage and explained that he received the injury falling from a bike.
de: Magnussen twitterte ein entsprechendes Foto und erklärte, er habe die Verletzung erlitten, als er vom Rad gestürzt sei.
translated_de: It is a good idea to tweet a photo of the incident and to explain that it has been a slander as he was sworn by the Rad.

en: This means that his chances of being reserve driver to the two main drivers, Fernando Alonso and Jenson Button, for the night race in Singapore at the weekend are as slim as those for the Grand Prix in Japan a week later.
de: Er kommt daher beim Nachtrennen in Singapur am Wochenende ebenso wenig als Reservefahrer für die beiden Stammpiloten Fernando Alonso und Jenson Button infrage, wie eine Woche später beim Großen Preis von Japan.
translated_de: It is therefore not the only one who is in doubt at the weekend of the night race in Singapore as Reserve pilots Fernando Alonso and Jenson Button, as a week later, at the Japanese Grand Prix.

en: Football: BVB v Krasnodar without Reus: Weidenfeller in goal
de: Fußball: BVB ohne Reus gegen Krasnodar: Weidenfeller im Tor
translated_de: Football: BVB without Reus against Krasnodar: Weidenfeller in Tor

en: All hopes have been crushed for Borussia Dortmund that Marco Reus might make a comeback in the first group match of the European league.
de: Bei Borussia Dortmund haben sich alle Hoffnungen auf ein Comeback von Marco Reus im ersten Gruppenspiel der Europa League endgültig zerschlagen.
translated_de: In Borussia Dortmund, all hopes of a return by Marco Reus in the first group game of the European League have been stalemated.

en: The international player will also be missing from the German Bundesliga leader's match in its dual with FK Krasnodar on Thursday (7 p.m. on Sky).
de: Der Nationalspieler wird dem Tabellenführer der Fußball-Bundesliga auch im Duell mit dem FK Krasnodar am Donnerstag (19.00 Uhr/Sky) fehlen.
translated_de: The national player will also be missing the table leader of the football league in duell with the FK Krasnodar on Donnerstag (19.00 p.m. / sky).

en: "Unfortunately he isn't in the running," said Thomas Tuchel on Wednesday.
de: "Wir können auf ihn leider nicht zurückgreifen", sagte Thomas Tuchel am Mittwoch.
translated_de: "We can unfortunately not return to him", said Thomas Tuchel am Mittwoch.

en: The BVB coach is leaving it open as to whether Reus will be there on Sunday in the Bundesliga top match against Leverkusen: "We are expecting him to return to training on Friday".
de: Ob Reus am Sonntag im Bundesliga-Topspiel gegen Leverkusen wieder dabei sein wird, ließ der BVB-Coach offen: "Wir rechnen mit einer Rückkehr von ihm ins Training am Freitag".
translated_de: The BVB-Coach said that, after the Sunday game against Leverkusen, "we are reliant on the return of him in training on Friday".

en: In light of the heavy burden on his professionals, Tuchel does not want to change his first choice 11 just because of Reus's position.
de: Angesichts der hohen Belastung seiner Profis wird Tuchel seine Stammelf nicht nur auf der Reus-Position verändern.
translated_de: The high pressure of his Profis will not only change his Stammelf' s position in the Reus.

en: So he has announced a change of goalkeeper.
de: So kündigte er einen Wechsel auf der Torhüterposition an.
translated_de: It is therefore a change in the position of the Torhüter.

en: Thus Roman Weidenfeller is taking the place of regular keeper Roman Bürki.
de: Deshalb nimmt Roman Weidenfeller den Platz von Stammkeeper Roman Bürki ein.
translated_de: This is why Roman Weidenfeller is a member of the Stammkeeper Roman Bürki.

en: "He's training at absolute top level," praised the world champion's football coach.
de: "Er trainiert auf einem absoluten Top-Niveau", lobte der Fußball-Lehrer den Weltmeister.
translated_de: "It is a very high-level country," says the football champion to the world champion.

en: Tuchel is leaving it open as to whether Weidenfelder will be used in all European league matches in the future.
de: Ob Weidenfeller in Zukunft in allen Europa-League-Spielen zum Einsatz kommt, ließ Tuchel jedoch offen.
translated_de: Weidenfeller will be able to use all the European games in the future, but it will offend Tuchel.

en: It is highly likely that he will also play the second game.
de: Mit hoher Wahrscheinlichkeit wird er auch die zweite Partie bestreiten.
translated_de: It is also possible that the second parties will be contested.

en: Midfielder Julian Weigl considers team mate Reus's brisk statement that the final of the European league must be BVB's objective quite understandable: "Marco isn't so far off the mark with that".
de: Die forsche Aussage von Mitspieler Reus, dass der Finaleinzug für den BVB in der Europa League das Ziel sein müsse, hält Mittelfeldspieler Julian Weigl für nachvollziehbar: "Damit liegt Marco nicht so falsch."
translated_de: The foregoing statement by the player Reus, that the final vote for the BVB in the European League should be the objective of the midfielder Julian Weigl, said: "It is Marco not so wrong."

en: "I think we've got a good chance of picking up the title."
de: "Ich denke, dass wir eine gute Chance haben, den Titel abzugreifen."
translated_de: "I believe that we have a good chance to take the title."

en: Robot cars: Government wants Germany to take a leading role
de: Roboterautos: Regierung will Vorreiterrolle für Deutschland
translated_de: Roboterautos: The government will take over Germany

en: The Federal Government wants Germany to be technological leaders in changes to cars.
de: Deutschland soll nach dem Willen der Bundesregierung beim Wandel des Autos technologischer Vorreiter sein.
translated_de: Germany should be able to do so in the case of the Federal Government' s desire to change the technological advances of the auto industry.

en: On Wednesday the German cabinet resolved on a policy document introduced by the Minister of Transport Alexander Dobrindt (CSU) which provides, among other things, for investment in development of digital infrastructure.
de: Das Bundeskabinett beschloss am Mittwoch ein Strategiepapier aus dem Haus von Verkehrsminister Alexander Dobrindt (CSU), das unter anderem Investitionen in den Ausbau digitaler Infrastruktur vorsieht.
translated_de: The Bundesbank of India has signed a strategic document from the House of Transport Minister Alexander Dobrindt (CSU), which will be a priority under the stipulation of investment in the development of digital infrastructure.

en: Dobrindt spoke in Frankfurt on Wednesday, on the brink of the IAA motor show, about a "new era of mobility".
de: Dobrindt sprach am Mittwoch in Frankfurt am Rande der Automesse IAA von einem "neuen Mobilitäts-Zeitalter".
translated_de: Dobrindt spoke at the Frankfurter Mittwoch, on the Rande of the IAA Automesse, of a new "monetary crisis".

en: Automated and networked driving will increase traffic safety and ensure fewer traffic jams, said Dobrindt.
de: Das automatisierte und vernetzte Fahren werde die Verkehrssicherheit erhöhen und für weniger Staus sorgen, sagte Dobrindt.
translated_de: The automatic and networked transport will increase traffic safety and provide less Staus, said Dobrindt.

en: He wants to discuss the topic with his counterparts from the G7 countries, who are also meeting with representatives of industry at the IAA.
de: Er will das Thema auch mit seinen Amtskollegen aus den G7-Staaten besprechen, die auf der IAA auch mit Vertretern der Industrie zusammenkommen.
translated_de: This will also be discussed with the members of the G7 Council, which also co-exist with representatives of the industry in the IAA.

en: The Transport Ministry policy document stressed among other things the importance of the development of mobile broadband and a rapid switch to digital radio.
de: Das Strategiepapier des Verkehrsministeriums betont unter anderem die Bedeutung des mobilen Breitband-Ausbaus und eines zügigen Umstiegs auf digitalen Hörfunk.
translated_de: The Transport Ministry' s strategy highlights the importance of mobile broadband broadband and a rapid increase in digital audio.

en: There is currently a test area on the A9 motorway to try out the new technology.
de: Zur Erprobung neuer Technik entsteht derzeit eine Teststrecke auf der Autobahn 9 in Bayern.
translated_de: The new technology is currently being used to test the Autobahn 9 in Bayern.

en: In order that "no extra liability risk will be imposed" on drivers, the government wants to "examine and, where necessary, adapt" legal parameters to the new developments.
de: Damit dem Fahrer "keine zusätzlichen Haftungsrisiken aufgebürdet werden", will die Bundesregierung die rechtlichen Rahmenbedingungen "überprüfen und, wo nötig, an die neuen Entwicklungen anpassen".
translated_de: The driver will "reduce additional liability" and, if necessary, pass the new developments into the Bundesreglementation.

en: Germany wants to agree on international provisions for the speed limit for driverless cars to be raised from 10 to 130 kilometers per hour.
de: So will sich Deutschland etwa international dafür einsetzen, dass die zulässige Höchstgeschwindigkeit für selbstfahrende Autos von 10 auf 130 Stundenkilometer angehoben wird.
translated_de: It will also be possible for Germany to set up international standards for a maximum speed of 10 to 130 km for autos.

en: The German government also wants to reach an agreement on changes to the Vienna Convention, which to date only provides for human beings as drivers.
de: Die Bundesregierung will sich außerdem für eine Änderung des Wiener Übereinkommens einsetzen, das bislang nur den Menschen als Fahrer vorsieht.
translated_de: The Bundesreglement will also introduce a amendment to the Vienna Convention which only applies to drivers.

en: With automatic driving the car increasingly takes control and the driver becomes more and more the passenger.
de: Beim automatisierten Fahren übernimmt in zunehmendem Maße das Auto die Führung, der Fahrer wird mehr und mehr zum Passagier.
translated_de: In the case of automated driving, the driver becomes more and more passenger.

en: The technology is primarily based on sensors and cameras which capture the environment and process data in seconds.
de: Die Technologie basiert vor allem auf Sensoren und Kameras, die die Umgebung erfassen und die Daten in Sekundenschnelle verarbeiten.
translated_de: The technology is based in particular on sensors and cameras, which are able to create the environment and produce data in seconds.

en: According to a study submitted by the Ministry of the Environment, highly automated driving will be technically possible on motorways by 2020.
de: Nach einer vom Wirtschaftsministerium vorgelegten Studie wird hochautomatisiertes Fahren auf Autobahnen bis 2020 technisch möglich sein.
translated_de: The economic department has proposed a study on high-automatised vehicles for automobiles until 2020.

en: However driverless vehicles "are not anticipated until 2020" on public roads.
de: Trotzdem seien fahrerlose Fahrzeuge auf öffentlichen Straßen "erst weit nach 2020 zu erwarten".
translated_de: However, drivers are "not expected to be far from 2020" on public roads.

en: The authors of the study estimate the added value in the field of driver assistance systems and highly automated driving functions in Germany will be around €8.4 billion for 2025.
de: Die Wertschöpfung im Bereich der Fahrerassistenzsysteme und der hochautomatisierten Fahrfunktionen am Standort Deutschland schätzen die Autoren der Studie für 2025 auf rund 8,4 Milliarden Euro.
translated_de: The value of the scalability in the area of driver assistance and high-automatised driving functions at Germany' s site estimates the authors of the study for 2025 at around EUR 8,4 billion.

en: "Digital networking of cars can lead to greater safety and efficiency in road traffic," says SPD transport politician Sören Bartol.
de: "Die digitale Vernetzung des Pkws kann zur mehr Sicherheit und Effizienz im Straßenverkehr führen", sagte der SPD-Verkehrspolitiker Sören Bartol.
translated_de: "The digital network of Pkws can lead to more security and efficiency in road transport", said SPD-Policy Sören Bartol.

en: However the issue of liability for accidents and the security of drivers' personal data must be conclusively clarified.
de: Die Frage der Haftung bei Unfällen und die Sicherheit der persönlichen Daten der Fahrer müsse aber eindeutig geklärt sein.
translated_de: The question of liability for accidents and safety of personal data must be clearly addressed.

en: And Germans still view driverless cars sceptically – much more than the French or Americans.
de: Noch sehen die Deutschen selbstfahrende Autos allerdings skeptisch - viel mehr als Franzosen oder Amerikaner.
translated_de: But the Germans are still skeptic - much more than French or American.

en: A survey by the Forsa Institute commissioned by the testing organisation Dekra, presented to the IAA on Wednesday, concludes that only eight percent of Germans believe that autonomously driven vehicles will catch on in the coming 10 years, 32 percent estimate it will take 20 years and 31 percent do not believe it will happen at all.
de: Eine am Mittwoch auf der AA vorgelegte Umfrage des Forsa-Instituts im Auftrag der Prüforganisation Dekra kommt zu dem Ergebnis, dass nur acht Prozent der Deutschen glauben, dass sich autonom fahrende Autos in den kommenden zehn Jahren durchsetzen werden, 32 Prozent rechnen erst in 20 Jahren damit, 31 Prozent glauben überhaupt nicht daran.
translated_de: One of the concerns raised by the AA in the order of the Dekra testing organisation is that only 8 percent of Germans believe that autonomes will be able to drive cars in the next 10 years, 32 percent believe that in 20 years, 31 percent believe that they are not.

en: In France 21 percent of those asked expect to see autonomously driven cars by 2025 and in the USA 33 percent.
de: In Frankreich rechnen 21 Prozent der Befragten bis 2025 mit autonom fahrenden Autos, in den USA 33 Prozent.
translated_de: In France, 21 percent of respondents are asked until 2025 with autonomes, in the USA 33 percent.

en: Anyway drivers in Germany are not yet ready to rely on a completely self driven car.
de: Ohnehin sind die Autofahrer in Deutschland noch nicht bereit, sich komplett auf ein selbstfahrendes Fahrzeug zu verlassen.
translated_de: Without that, the German automaker is still not ready to abandon a vehicle completely.

en: According to a survey by the digital association Bitkom, only seven percent agree that control should be handed over to the car during the entire journey on all roads.
de: Nach einer Erhebung des Digitalverbands Bitkom würden nur sieben Prozent zustimmen, die Kontrolle während der gesamten Fahrt auf allen Straßen abzugeben.
translated_de: After the re-election of the Digital Council, only 7 percent would vote for control during the entire journey on all roads.

en: Nevertheless, 15 percent could imagine this happening on motorways in free-flowing traffic and 45 percent in traffic jams.
de: Auf der Autobahn könnten sich das im fließenden Verkehr immerhin 15 Prozent vorstellen, im Stau 45 Prozent.
translated_de: On the highway, the number of people who are cruising in the car could be at least 15 to 45.

en: Approximately one in four would never give control to the car under any circumstances.
de: Gut jeder Vierte würde dem Auto die Kontrolle unter keinen Umständen überlassen.
translated_de: Every person who has been voted would be allowed to do so under no circumstances.

en: Boll not to play in team and doubles in European Championship
de: Boll sagt Team- und Doppelstart bei Tischtennis-EM ab
translated_de: Boll says Team and Doublestart at the tabletennis-EM

en: As things stand, the Dusseldorf player plans to play only in the singles in the competition, running from 25 September to 4 October.
de: Der Düsseldorfer will nach jetzigem Stand bei den Titelkämpfen vom 25. September bis 4. Oktober nur im Einzel aufschlagen.
translated_de: The Düsseldorfer will only be able to take a single shot at the title fights from 25 September to 4. Oktober.

en: The final decision will be made on 22 September.
de: Die endgültige Entscheidung soll spätestens am 22. September fallen.
translated_de: The end-of-the-year decision will be voted on on 22 September.

en: "It is a major loss for our team."
de: "Das ist ein Riesenverlust für unser Team."
translated_de: "This is a slur for our team."

en: "The lads heard about it this morning."
de: "Die Jungs haben es am Morgen erfahren."
translated_de: "The Jungle has learned about it at dawn."

en: "But we are strong enough to pick up the title without Timo," said national coach Jörg Rosskopf during European Championship training in Dusseldorf.
de: "Wir sind aber stark genug, auch ohne Timo den Titel zu holen", sagte Bundestrainer Jörg Roßkopf während des EM-Lehrgangs in Düsseldorf.
translated_de: "We are very strong enough, even without Timo being able to get the title," said Bundestrainer Jörg Roßkopf during the EM-Lehrgang in Düsseldorf.

en: At this time Boll was on a flight to a long arranged appointment with sponsors in China.
de: Boll befand sich zu diesem Zeitpunkt auf dem Flug zu einem langfristig vereinbarten Sponsorentermin in China.
translated_de: Boll will be able to negotiate a long-term sponsorship agreement in China at this time.

en: The 34-year-old German champion is expected back on Friday.
de: Der 34 Jahre alte deutsche Meister wird am Freitag zurückerwartet.
translated_de: The 34-year-old German minister will be back on Friday.

en: "Without Timo we have the disadvantage of no longer being the clear favourites," declared individual European champion Dimitrij Ovcharov.
de: "Ohne Timo ist das Nachteil, wir sind jetzt nicht mehr so ein klarer Favorit", erklärte Einzel-Europameister Dimitrij Ovtcharov.
translated_de: "With Timo, we are not now more than a clear favor," said Dimitrij Ovtcharov, a single Europameister.

en: But the Hamelin player, who is the top seed in Ekaterinburg, also remembers the European Championship in Schwechat in 2013.
de: Der Hamelner, der die Setzliste in Jekaterinburg anführt, erinnerte aber auch an die EM 2013 in Schwechat.
translated_de: The Hamelner, who is the setlist in Jekaterinburg, also reminded us of the EM 2013 in Schwechat.

en: "We didn't have Timo then either, and we still became European Champions."
de: "Damals hat Timo ebenfalls gefehlt, und wir sind Europameister geworden."
translated_de: "It has also been a failure to get Timo, and we are now Europemeisters."

en: "That is what we need to focus on," declared the world number five.
de: "Daran sollten wir uns orientieren", erklärte der Weltranglisten-Fünfte.
translated_de: "We should be orientated towards the right thing", a statement from the World Trade Organization.

en: The English football national player Luke Shaw, of Manchester, United has sustained a severe injury to his right leg.
de: Der englische Fußball-Nationalspieler Luke Shaw von Manchester United hat sich eine schwere Verletzung am rechten Bein zugezogen.
translated_de: The English football national player Luke Shaw from Manchester United has a serious misunderstanding which is rightly contested.

en: In the course of the tackle in the Champions League game with PSV Eindhoven, the defender was hit by Héctor Moreno and after a long bout of treatment was replaced.
de: Beim Champions-League-Spiel bei der PSV Eindhoven wurde der Verteidiger bei einem Tackling von Héctor Moreno getroffen und nach langer Behandlung ausgewechselt.
translated_de: The champions-league game at the PSV in Ireland was contested by Héctor Moreno and a long-term treatment was re-examined.

en: Initial diagnosis indicates that the 20-year-old who used to play with Bastian Schweinsteiger has broken his tibia.
de: Die erste Diagnose deutete bei dem 20 Jahre alten Mitspieler von Bastian Schweinsteiger auf einen Schienbeinbruch hin.
translated_de: The first diagnosis was a slur of a slur at the 20-year-old Swedish player from Bastian Schweinsteiger.

en: Gaultier feels too old to be an enfant terrible
de: Gaultier fühlt sich zu alt für ein Enfant terrible
translated_de: Gaultier feels like a stale stale

en: It is a mixture of a huge fashion show and a waxworks chamber of horrors: designer Jean Paul Gaultier (63) presented an exhibition of his work in Munich on Wednesday.
de: Es ist eine Mischung aus ganz großer Modenschau und einem Wachsfiguren-Gruselkabinett: Der Designer Jean Paul Gaultier (63) hat am Mittwoch in München eine Ausstellung über sein Werk vorgestellt.
translated_de: It is a mixture of a very large modality and a Wachsfigure-Gruselkabinett: Designer Jean Paul Gaultier (63) has presented his work at the Munich exhibition.

en: The highlights: mannequins which look alarmingly human thanks to video projection.
de: Die Höhepunkte: Schaufensterpuppen, die dank Videoprojektionen erschreckend menschlich aussehen.
translated_de: The heights: the window-ups, which are soaring thanks to video projects, are a great example.

en: They wear the French designer's spectacular creations, which among other things became the big star of the fashion scene with Madonna's stage outfits - and also put men in skirts.
de: Sie tragen die spektakulären Kreationen des französischen Designers, der unter anderem mit Madonnas Bühnenoutfits zum großen Star der Modeszene wurde - und damit, dass er Männer in Röcke steckte.
translated_de: You are presenting the spectacular Kreation of French designers, which, among others, was a major star of the Modest, and that they were stectified by men in the ring.

en: "These days I can't say I'm the enfant terrible of haute couture any longer, because I have white hair."
de: "Ich kann heute nicht mehr sagen, dass ich das Enfant terrible der Haute Couture bin, weil ich weißes Haar habe."
translated_de: "I cannot say more today that I am the enfant terrible of the skin because I have a hair.

en: “It used to be bleached, nowadays it's real,” says Gaultier.
de: "Früher war es gebleicht, inzwischen ist es echt", sagte Gaultier.
translated_de: "It was a little easier to get started, now it is real," said Gaultier.

en: For visitors to the exhibition, "From the Sidewalk to the Catwalk", which can be seen in the Kunsthalle at the Hypo Culture Foundation from 1 September, it is fortunate that the fashion designer has changed his initially reluctant attitude to a show about his own character.
de: Für die Besucher der Ausstellung "From The Sidewalk To The Catwalk" (Vom Bürgersteig auf den Laufsteg), die vom 18. September an in der Kunsthalle der Hypo-Kulturstiftung zu sehen ist, ist es ein Glück, dass der Modeschöpfer seine anfangs ablehnende Haltung zu einer Schau über seine Person geändert hat.
translated_de: The chance for the visitors to see the exhibition "From the Sidewalk to the Catwalk" (Vom citizensteig on the floor) which is being shown at the 18 September exhibition in the arthalle of the Hypo-Kulturstifting, is that the Modestöpfer has changed his initial position to a view of his person.

en: Originally he was against it because, "For me an exhibition sounded a bit like death," he said.
de: Eigentlich sei er dagegen gewesen, denn: "Für mich klang eine Ausstellung ein bisschen nach Tod", sagte er.
translated_de: It was actually a mistake to say that "I am a little more interested in a exhibition than I did" he said.

en: When you die, you get put into a museum.
de: Wenn man stirbt, kommt man ins Museum.
translated_de: If you stir up, you will come to the museum.

en: This remarkable collection has already been staged in Montreal, Canada, and in Paris.
de: Die beeindruckende Sammlung hatte vorher schon im kanadischen Montreal und in Paris Station gemacht.
translated_de: The collection of images had already been made in the Canadian Montreal and at Paris Station.

en: It's about a lot more than beautiful clothes," says the director of the Kunsthalle, Roger Diederen.
de: "Es geht um so viel mehr als nur schöne Kleider", sagte der Direktor der Kunsthalle, Roger Diederen.
translated_de: "It is more than just beautiful clothes," said the director of the arthalle, Roger Diederen.

en: It is about tolerance, acceptance and the vision of an open society.
de: Es gehe um Toleranz, Akzeptanz und die Vision einer offenen Gesellschaft.
translated_de: It is a matter of tolerance, action and vision for a open society.

en: The exhibits provide an insight into the hard to overlook work of the man who wrote the history of fashion without ever having finished his education.
de: Die Exponate geben einen Einblick in das kaum noch zu überblickende Werk des Mannes, der Modegeschichte geschrieben hat, ohne jemals eine Ausbildung absolviert zu haben.
translated_de: The Exponate gives a glimpse into the only way to view the work of the Mannes, which has been written in the Modestyls, without having to have a course.

en: The show is not constructed chronologically, but it is a brilliantly choreographed complete work of art which has involved a great deal of effort: for example a stylist has been engaged especially to look after the mannequins' hair.
de: Chronologisch ist die Schau nicht aufgebaut, aber sie ist ein hervorragend choreographiertes Gesamtkunstwerk, für das viel Aufwand betrieben wurde: Um die Puppen zu frisieren, wurde zum Beispiel eigens ein Stylist engagiert.
translated_de: The spectacle is not a logical one, but it is a great choreographed wholekunstwerk, which has been a huge undertaking: to frenzy the Puppen, for example, has been a stylist.

en: According to curator Thierry-Maxime Loriot, the creators carted 14 tonnes of material to Munich.
de: 14 Tonnen Material haben die Macher nach Angaben des Kurators Thierry-Maxime Loriot nach München gekarrt.
translated_de: 14 Tonnen of material have been karrted by the Macher according to the Kurators Thierry-Maxime Loriot at Munich.

en: Shortly before the start of Oktoberfest there was also a special treat in store: a Lederhosen outfit with a corset.
de: Kurz vor dem Start des Oktoberfestes war noch ein besonderes Schmankerl dabei: ein Lederhosen-Outfit mit Korsett.
translated_de: Just before the start of Octoberfest, there was a special smear: a leather jacket with corsett.

en: Heidi meets Madonna
de: Heidi meets Madonna.
translated_de: Heidi meets Madonna.

en: He has always been interested in strong women ("Women are cleverer than men") and in people who are a little different, says Gaultier.
de: Er habe sich immer für starke Frauen interessiert ("Frauen sind schlauer als Männer") und für Menschen, die ein bisschen anders sind, sagte Gaultier.
translated_de: I always wanted to see a strong female audience ("Frauen are schlauer than men") and people who are a little different, said Gaultier.

en: Even Gaultier's old teddy is on show in the exhibition.
de: Auch Gaultiers alter Teddy ist in der Ausstellung zu sehen.
translated_de: Even the gallows alter Teddy is in the exhibition.

en: He represents the designer's first, tentative steps at fashion.
de: Er steht für die ersten, zaghaften modischen Gehversuche des Designers.
translated_de: It is the first, zagly, modical attempt of the designers.

en: As a child (he was not a good pupil and he was bad at football), he dressed his teddy in bras and dresses.
de: Als Kind (er war kein guter Schüler und schlecht im Fußball) habe er seinem Teddy BHs und Kleider angezogen, sagte Gaultier.
translated_de: As Kind (he was not a good student and a bad footballer) he had his Teddy BHs and clothes, said Gaultier.

en: His parents did not allow him to play with dolls.
de: Mit einer Puppe zu spielen, hätten seine Eltern ihm nicht erlaubt.
translated_de: If a Puppe would play, it would not be allowed to play with his parents.

en: Later he taught himself fashion design.
de: Das Entwerfen von Mode habe er sich später dann selbst beigebracht.
translated_de: The resolution of the Mode has then been taken into account.

en: He stole fashion magazines and scrutinised other designers' creations, Gaultier told us in Munich.
de: Er stahl Modezeitschriften und sah sich die Entwürfe anderer Designer an, wie Gaultier in München erzählte.
translated_de: The Modezeitschrifts and the drafts of another designer, as Gaultier in Munich told us, are a good example.

en: Of course, later I bought them.
de: Später habe ich die dann aber natürlich gekauft.
translated_de: I was able to buy the stuff then.

en: He was not able to pay the models for his first fashion show.
de: Für seine erste eigene Modenschau habe er die Models nicht bezahlen können.
translated_de: The first model of the first model has not been paid for.

en: They got nothing, but they were allowed to keep the clothes.
de: Sie bekamen nichts, durften aber die Klamotten behalten.
translated_de: You did not have any, but they were still allowed to keep the cloaks.

en: Decoration instead of curtains – Plauen lace as a fashion niche
de: Schmuck statt Gardine - Plauener Spitze als Mode-Nische
translated_de: Schmuck instead of gardine - Plauener Spitze as Mode-Nische

en: There used to be long embroidery machines in and around Plauen making many metres
de: Früher ging es an den langen Stickmaschinen in und um Plauen darum, Meter zu machen.
translated_de: In the early stages, the long stick machines were used to make a meter in and out of the sand.

en: of embroidered fabrics and laces in vast quantities for customers who made, for example, table cloths and curtains.
de: Die bestickten Stoffe und Spitzen entstanden in großer Menge für Kunden, die sie beispielsweise zu Decken und Gardinen weiterverarbeiteten.
translated_de: The smoky materials and tops have been produced in a large number of cases for customers, such as decks and sandstones.

en: This is no longer the case today, explains Andreas Reinhardt, managing director of Modespitze Plauen.
de: Das allein funktioniert heute nicht mehr, erklärt Andreas Reinhardt, Geschäftsführer der Modespitze Plauen.
translated_de: It is not the only thing that works today, said Andreas Reinhardt, CEO of the Modest Plauen.

en: Instead, fashion is once more important.
de: Stattdessen ist die Mode wieder wichtig.
translated_de: This is the mode of the present.

en: In the early days of Plauen lace, fashion played a large role, then it was replaced by the home textile industry – and now it is being rediscovered as a niche.
de: In den Anfangszeiten der Plauener Spitze spielte Mode eine größere Rolle, wurde dann durch die Heimtextilindustrie verdrängt - und wird jetzt als Nische wiederentdeckt.
translated_de: In the early stages of the Plauener Spitze, the industry was re-enterprised by the Heimtextil Industry and now it is re-enterprised by the Niger.

en: Reinhardt gave a few examples: lace in decoration, for accessories such as bags and for traditional costumes.
de: Reinhardt nennt einige Beispiele: Spitze in Schmuck, bei Accessoires wie Taschen und bei regionalen Trachten.
translated_de: Reinhardt cites some examples: top in jewellery, accessoires such as Taschen and regional tassels.

en: Generally, so-called vintage fashion, based on style eras from the past, is producing an increasing potential for orders.
de: Überhaupt bilde die sogenannte Vintage-Mode, die sich an vergangene Stilepochen anlehnt, ein zunehmendes Auftragspotential.
translated_de: The so-called vintage-mode which has been rejected by the past is a growing potential for a job.

en: Anyone in the textile industry in Germany who cannot serve a niche is no longer in the market.
de: Wer in der Textilbranche in Deutschland keine Nischen bedient, ist nicht mehr am Markt.
translated_de: If the textile industry in Germany is not a national market, it is not more.

en: We are already getting half of all our contracts this way.
de: Bei uns machen sie bereits die Hälfte aller Aufträge aus.
translated_de: We have already made the majority of the complaints.

en: Modespitze Plauen, together with nine other businesses, is a member of the Plauener Spitze und Stickereien trade association.
de: Modespitze Plauen ist zusammen mit neun weiteren Unternehmen Mitglied im Branchenverband Plauener Spitze und Stickereien.
translated_de: Modespitze Plauen is a joint venture with new companies in the Branch Branch Association of Plaueners Spitze and Stickerei.

en: Only they are allowed to bear the protected label.
de: Nur sie dürfen das geschützte Label tragen.
translated_de: Only they must be protected.

en: Sales have fallen by around 80 percent over the last 15 years.
de: In den letzten 15 Jahren seien rund 80 Prozent des Umsatzes weggebrochen.
translated_de: In the last 15 years, around 80 percent of the sales were lost.

en: There are now hardly any private speciality shops or wholesalers.
de: Private Fachgeschäfte und auch den Großhandel gibt es fast nicht mehr.
translated_de: Private trade and even the gross trade are not more.

en: Our products hardly reach the customers over these channels.
de: Unsere Produkte erreichen den Kunden auf diesem Wege kaum noch.
translated_de: We are not yet able to reach the customer on this way.

en: Nowadays mass produced goods are manufactured much more cheaply in the Asian region and sold almost exclusively through chains.
de: Die Massenware werde heutzutage im asiatischen Raum viel billiger hergestellt und fast ausschließlich über Ketten vertrieben.
translated_de: Massware will be produced in the Asiatic space much more expensive and will be sprayed fast exclusively by Ketten.

en: Furthermore exports to Russia and the USA are currently weakening slightly.
de: Außerdem schwächle der Export, aktuell nach Russland und in die USA.
translated_de: The exports are also weak in Russia and in the USA.

en: This is enough reason for new directions.
de: Genügend Gründe also für neue Wege.
translated_de: We are also looking for new ways to make it.

en: The trade association is also trying to score with environmental consciousness, as Cordelia Bauer of Stickperle in Falkenstein explains. "As of this year we have implemented a seal of quality which shows that our production is ecologically and socially compatible.
de: Der Branchenverband versucht auch durch Umweltbewusstsein zu punkten, wie Cordula Bauer von der Stickperle in Falkenstein erklärt: "Seit diesem Jahr führen wir ein Qualitätssiegel, das zeigt, dass wir ökologisch und sozial verträglich produzieren".
translated_de: The Branch Council also tried to take environmental awareness into account, as Cordula Bauer of the Stickperle in Falkenstein said: "This year we have a quality test which shows that we are environmentally and socially responsible."

en: Reinhardt added, "This also applies to the materials we use".
de: Reinhardt ergänzt: "Das bezieht sich auch auf die verwendeten Materialien".
translated_de: The rest is added: "This is also a reference to the materials used".

en: Qualified designer Ute Schmidt teaches in the faculty for applied arts at the Schneeberg branch of the West Saxony University of Zwickau and specialises in embroidery and lace.
de: Diplomdesignerin Ute Schmidt lehrt an der Schneeberger Außenstelle der Westsächsischen Hochschule Zwickau - an der Fakultät für angewandte Kunst - und ist auf Stickereien und Spitzen spezialisiert.
translated_de: The designer, Ute Schmidt, is a member of the Snowberger - the outsider of the West-Saxon Hochschule Zwickau - and is a specialist in Stickerei and Spitzen.

en: In order to face the competition from the Asian regions one has to find high-quality and innovative products.
de: Um der Konkurrenz aus dem asiatischen Raum etwas entgegenzusetzen, muss man hochwertige und innovative Produkte finden.
translated_de: To counter the competition in the Asia-Pacific space, we need to find quality and innovative products.

en: That takes time and courage.
de: Das braucht Zeit und Mut.
translated_de: It needs time and courage.

en: There is a field of tension between the designers' newest ideas and businesses, who must think primarily in commercial terms," says Schmidt.
de: Es entsteht ein Spannungsfeld zwischen den frischesten Ideen der Designer und den Betrieben, die vor allem wirtschaftlich denken müssen", sagt Schmidt.
translated_de: It creates a tension between the freshest ideas of designers and the businesses, which must be conceived economically, says Schmidt.

en: This is why existing designs are often only slightly varied in order to keep core customers.
de: Deshalb werde ein bestehendes Design oftmals nur leicht variiert, um einen Kundenstamm zu halten.
translated_de: This is why a design of the past will not be able to be modified to keep a client' s mind.

en: A few years ago textile designer Kati Reuter revitalised the historic snowball lace.
de: Vor einigen Jahren belebte Textildesignerin Kati Reuter die historische Schneeballspitze neu.
translated_de: In recent years, textile designer Kati Reuter has been reviving the historic snowball slope.

en: The machines embroider small beads in selected places.
de: Dabei stickt die Maschine an einigen Stellen kleine Kügelchen.
translated_de: It is also important to stick the machine to some small kilns.

en: Plauen master goldsmith Bianca Hallebach-Krauße was inspired by this. "In the past I had no use for traditional Plauen lace".
de: Die Plauener Goldschmiedemeisterin Bianca Hallebach-Krauße ließ sich davon inspirieren: "Vorher konnte ich mit traditioneller Plauener Spitze nichts anfangen".
translated_de: The Plauener Goldschmiedemeister Bianca Hallebach-Krauße said: "I did not have any idea of what I was doing with the tradition of Plauener Spitze".

en: Now she uses the snowball lace for her jewellery.
de: Jetzt verwendet sie die Schneeballspitze für ihren Schmuck.
translated_de: Now they use the snowballspread for their jewellery.

en: Using an elaborate process she embosses the pattern in silver.
de: In einem aufwendigen Verfahren prägt sie das Muster in Silber.
translated_de: In a re-process, they are preparing the pattern in silver.

en: "Many people in the region identify themselves with Plauen lace – young and old," says Reuter.
de: "Viele Menschen der Region identifizieren sich mit dem Thema Plauener Spitze - jung und alt", sagt Reuter.
translated_de: "Viele people of the region identify with the topic of the Plauener Spitze -jung and alt", says Reuter.

en: She also delivers to the USA, Australia and Finland – primarily to customers whose forefathers lived in Plauen and the surrounding area and who want to have a memento.
de: Sie liefert auch in die USA, nach Australien und nach Finnland - vor allem an Kunden, deren Vorfahren in Plauen und Umgebung gelebt haben und die ein Erinnerungsstück möchten.
translated_de: You also deliver in the USA, Australia and Finland - particularly an individual who has lived in Plauen and surrounding areas and who want to remember it.

en: So with my jewellery I see myself as a modern ambassador for Plauen lace.
de: Damit sehe ich meinen Schmuck als modernen Botschafter der Plauener Spitze.
translated_de: I therefore like to be a modern ambassador of the Plauener Spitze.

en: Disney plans new "Mary Poppins" film
de: Disney plant neuen "Mary Poppins"-Film
translated_de: Disney plant new "Mary Poppins"-Film

en: You shouldn't interfere with legends, but Disney is daring to make a new film of the classic "Mary Poppins" anyway.
de: Legenden soll man ja nicht anrühren, aber Disney wagt sich trotzdem an einen neuen Film seines Klassikers "Mary Poppins".
translated_de: Legends should not be a concern, but Disney still has a new film whose name is "Mary Poppins".

en: But according to "Entertainment Weekly" it is not going to be a remake but a sort of sequel, set 20 years after the first film with the magical nanny.
de: Dabei geht es laut "Entertainment Weekly" allerdings nicht um eine Neuverfilmung, sondern um eine Art Fortsetzung, die 20 Jahre nach dem ersten Film mit dem magischen Kindermädchen spielt.
translated_de: It is not a new film, but a new art production which takes place 20 years after the first film with the magnanimous children.

en: It is about the nanny's experiences with the Banks family in the time of the Great Depression in England.
de: Es geht um die Erfahrungen der Nanny mit der Familie Banks in Zeiten der Weltwirtschaftskrise in England.
translated_de: It is about the experiences of the Nanny with the Family Bank in the world economy in England.

en: Who is going to take the role of Mary Poppins, played 50 years ago by Julie Andrews, is not yet certain.
de: Wer Poppins mehr als 50 Jahre nach Julie Andrews spielt, ist noch unklar.
translated_de: If the poppins have played for more than 50 years after Julie Andrews, it is still unclear.

en: But the director has been decided: Rob Marshall, whose most recent film was "Into the Woods".
de: Aber der Regisseur steht schon fest: Rob Marshall, zuletzt mit "Into the Woods" im Kino.
translated_de: But the Regisseur is already aware: Rob Marshall, lastly, in the film "Into the Woods".

en: Xi urges to open economy wider to world
de: Xi drängt darauf, die Wirtschaft breiter für die Welt zu öffnen
translated_de: Xi wants to open the world' s economy to the public.

en: The economy must open wider to the outside world to fuel growth, President Xi Jinping told a group tasked with steering reform on Tuesday.
de: Die Wirtschaft muss sich breiter nach außen hin öffnen, um Wachstum zu fördern, sagte Präsident Xi Jinping am Dienstag einer Gruppe, die mit der Lenkung der Reform beauftragt wurde.
translated_de: The economy must be enlarged to expand to encourage growth, said President Xi Jinping on Tuesday, a group which was appointed with the direction of reform.

en: "China should be committed to attracting foreign investment and expertise, and improve opening-up policies," he said, addressing the 16th Meeting of the Central Leading Group for Deepening Overall Reform.
de: "China sollte sich dafür einsetzen, ausländische Investitionen und Know-how anzulocken und die Strategien für Geschäftsgründungen zu verbessern", sagte er in einer Ansprache bei der 16. Sitzung der Zentralen Führungsgruppe für die Vertiefung einer umfassenden Reform.
translated_de: "China should therefore be able to stop foreign investment and knowledge and improve the strategic planning strategies", he said in a speech at the 16th meeting of the Central Executive Group on the approving of a comprehensive reform.

en: Promoting opening up while pushing forward reforms will add new impetus and vitality, and provide new room for economic growth, Xi said.
de: Neugründungen zu fördern und Reformen voranzutreiben wird neuen Schwung und Vitalität herbeiführen und neuen Platz für das Wirtschaftswachstum bieten, sagte Xi.
translated_de: The new ideas to encourage and reforms will lead to new challenges and vitality and new place for economic growth, said Xi.

en: The leading group adopted a series of guidelines including a negative list regulating market access, relaxation of border-control policies, encouraging state-owned enterprises (SOE) to absorb private capital and overhauling the resident registration system.
de: Die Führungsgruppe hat eine Reihe von Richtlinien verabschiedet, einschließlich einer Negativliste zur Regelung des Marktzugangs, Entspannung der Grenzkontrollen-Politik, Förderung der Staatsbetriebe (SOE), privates Kapital aufzunehmen, und Überholung des Einwohner-Meldesystems.
translated_de: The leadership group has adopted a number of directives, including a Negativeliste on the regulation of market access, relaxation of border control policy, promotion of public affairs (SOE), private capital and the elimination of population-based systems.

en: According to the statement, a negative list, identifying sectors and businesses that are off-limits for investment, will be drawn up.
de: Nach dem Statement wird eine Negativliste erstellt, die Sektoren und Unternehmen identifiziert, die für Investitionen nicht in Frage kommen.
translated_de: The statement will be compiled with a Negative List of sectors and companies which are not in question for investment.

en: The system will be gradually tested and improved through trial programs.
de: Das System wird nach und nach getestet und durch Testprogramme verbessert.
translated_de: The system will be improved after and after testing and by testing programmes.

en: The move is significant as it will give the market a bigger role in allocating resources, ensuring a law-based business environment and making the market more open, the statement said.
de: Die Initiative ist von Bedeutung, da sie dem Markt eine größere Rolle bei der Zuteilung von Ressourcen zuweist, ein rechtsstaatliches Geschäftsumfeld gewährleistet und den Markt offener gestaltet, sagte das Statement.
translated_de: The initiative is of great importance because it carries a greater role on the market in the allocation of resources, ensures a legal business field and offends the market, said the statement.

en: The government will also loosen controls on the powers it delegates to companies, making sure that companies decide how to run their businesses.
de: Die Regierung wird auch Kontrollen über die an die Unternehmen übertragenen Befugnisse lockern und dafür sorgen, dass Unternehmen entscheiden, wie sie ihre Geschäfte führen.
translated_de: The Government will also control the company' s transfer of cash and ensure that it will decide how they operate.

en: The statement also said China will allow border areas to explore new models of cross-border economic cooperation and new mechanisms for promoting regional growth.
de: Das Statement sagte auch, dass China Grenzgebieten erlauben wird, neue Modelle der grenzüberschreitenden Wirtschaftskooperation und neue Mechanismen zur Förderung des regionalen Wachstums zu erkunden.
translated_de: The statement also said that China' s borders will allow for new models of transnational economic cooperation and new mechanisms to promote regional growth.

en: In a bid to open up state-controlled sectors, more areas will be open to private investment.
de: Im Rahmen eines Angebots, staatlich kontrollierte Sektoren zu öffnen, werden weitere Bereiche für private Investitionen geöffnet.
translated_de: In the context of a proposal to open public sector sectors, there will be further areas for private investment.

en: "The government will not change its policy toward foreign investment, and will protect the lawful interests of foreign-funded companies and provide better services for them," said the statement.
